column1: ","Diva Milano company has been producing special parenting outerwear for several years, with the experience based on a cold Russian winter. A new 4in1 model was presented last year and was a huge success, with 1000+ units sold all around the world.
Diva 4in1 Jacket is the world's most multifunctional and thoroughly designed parenting jacket, already approved by hundreds of users.

Thanks to all our last year sales, we are fully funded which means we are 100% Guaranteed to be shipping starting this September with 30-day money back guarantee! Pre-Order your Diva Jacket now by tapping “Select A Perk”
Diva outerwear is produced at the ISO-certified factory, under the control of the company professionals.
Hi! I'm Elena, Co-founder of Diva Milano and a Mom of 3!

I am a very active mother and was babywearing all 3 of my babies until they were 2 y.o. It was very important for me to keep doing my things, work and care of the family without separating with my babies. As I was living in a very cold climate, in winter it was very hard to wear kids outdoors, and outerwear options offered on the market were very uncomfortable & expensive. So together with Italian designers I have developed a design that has become the most advanced and comfortable for parenting in the world.
Our goal was to create a jacket that will be perfect in each possible use: regular coat, maternity, babywearing. Features that makes it a great piece of outerwear even without babywearing:
✅ 100% water resistant & windproof fabricYou will get complete protection from wind and heavy rain, but not feel as if covered with rubber, the fabric is breathable and lightweight.

✅ High-tech lightweight Shelter® insulationModern thin-fiber material with maximum warming capacity with the minimum volume and weight. 2 temperature options: -10C°/+14°F & -25C°/-13°F (depending on the model)
✅ All inserts included, no need to purchase anything extra, it includes(1) detachable maternity insert
Front babywearing function gives perfect comfort & warmth both to you and your baby:
✅ Special mother's & baby's neck protectionInnovative system mother's collar + baby's hood with collar gives a 100% protection from cold to your neck & chest
column2: as well as allows to use the jacket from birth to 2-3 years

column1: ✅ Perfect adjustabilityAll inserts, collars, hoods, sleeves & belt are fully adjustable. This is important because you body is changing and the baby is growing, so the coat should change with you!Cords with fixers on inserts are hidden (adjusted from the inner side)
✅ Perfect baby controlWe made 2 rows of zippers from each insert side, with central openings
column2: meaning any moment you can reach your baby without taking off the whole jacket.

column1: Back babywearing was never so comfortable & safe:
✅ Rollable mother's hoodWhen the hood is not used, you can fix it in a roll, to avoid any risk of baby's suffocation.
✅ Special mother's back protectionWe have developed a special system with an inner fabric layer under the mother's hood, to protect your back from cold when a baby is behind.
Please note the Diva jacket is not a baby carrier and needs a baby to be in a baby carrier (of any brand) under it!
We are using a special high-tech lightweight Shelter® insulation.This is a modern thin-fiber material with maximum warming capacity with the minimum volume and weight.

Shelter is made of very thin & light polymer fibers that are fixed under high temperature to create a special porous texture. The material is very elastic & homogeneous. Due to a large number of cells it is very breathable but ensures maximum warmth protection.
All these qualities makes Shelter a much lighter & practical insulation materialvs. down, feathers or any regular synthetic materials

column2: ✅ Dries quickly & stays lofted even when wet
column3: ✅ Breathable & does not keep moisture inside.

column1: Currently there are very few brands producing multifunctional babywearing outerwear& we are absolutely sure that Diva Milano is offering the most elaborate design and using the best materials vs. competitors, for a lower price.
There are models that have an insert with a hole in it for a baby's head, and we really do not recommend it for the following reason:
three colors: Notte (Grey Blue), Nero (Black Snowflakes) & Azzurro (Blue Snowflakes)
To choose your size, please check the size chart.TIP: Most important is your chest size.
IMPORTANT! if the size of the jacket you ordered will not suite you, we will replace it for another size for free.
If you live in a warmer climate and do not need a warm jacket, we offer a nice 4in1 hoodie, with almost the same features that a Diva jacket.
✅ Natural warm fabric (cotton fleece)70% cotton, 30% PE warm fabric, plain on outer side and brushed on the inner side. Ideal warm hoodie fabric!
✅ Detachable mother's hoodAside of the same features as our jacket (2 detachable inserts, detachable mother's collar & baby's hood with collar) it also has a detachable mother's hood.
✅ Thumb holes on sleeve cuffsLong sleeve cuffs have thumb holes for better warmth protection of your hands.
✅ Get both seasonal options and be covered for any weather conditions!A hoodie + a high-warm jacket = perfect comfort in any weather!

✅ Easy to use, lightweight and soft - ideal for a newborn!A Diva stretchy wrap is made from a natural cotton fabric with a touch of elastane. It is very easy to use (a detailed instruction leaflet is attached).
Diva wrap is ideal to be used under a Diva jacket or hoodie!
You can get a Diva Sretchy Wrap as a separate perk or get it as add-on to a Diva Jacket or a Diva Hoodie.

✅ Start going out with a baby without a stroller right after birth!A jacket/hoodie + a wrap = your freedom to go anywhere you want, in any weather conditions!Get a bundle with extra discount, choose any color!✅ PERFECT NEWBORN GIFT!

Diva Milano is a small family business, but we believe in our product and want to increase the production, adding more colors and types of outerwear (parka, softshell, raincoat).Our production is easily scalable so we can quickly increase this season production with timely product delivery.

✅ Shipping time: September, 2019We plan to ship all perks in September, by Priority mail.A part of jackets & hoodies are already in production so they could be shipped even earlier!Important! To EU countries we ship from our warehouse in Portugal.
✅ Exchange termsIf you chose a wrong size, you can send the jacket back to us and we will ship the replacement to you for free!

If you like our jacket but do not need a parenting item, but you know someone is planning to have a baby or is already having one, please spread the word on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Reddit and anywhere else you can think of!",42.0,1,"1 Campaign

last year I built a PET-bottle based catamaran of wood. The prototype is working fine. I think, that the sizes of this prototype is too small: 4000mmX2000mm. 

I would like to build a bigger version with electric motor and solar charger, which could be a bigger news
column2:
)

The new version with sizes 8000mmX4000mm could be more awareness. I would like to draw the attention to environmental protection, that the PET-bottles could be used for very good things.

column1: • Three heating levels controlled directly from your wrist
• Charge your mobile devices on the go
• Heating on both the front and the back of the jacket
• Heats up to 14 hours depending on the heat setting

Surround Jacket Heating:

Our heating panels line both the front and the back of the jacket to provide complete warmth and comfort in the most severe conditions. 

Charge Your Mobile Device on the Go:

Wherever you go, always stay connected with our on the go mobile charger. Works with both Android and iOS.

Lightweight Thermal Design:

Wears like a thermal but heats like a jacket. Wear it by itself or underneath a jacket. 

Tired of Bulky Winter Coats? So are we!

Three Heating Levels Controlled From Your Wrist:

Easily control your perfect temperature at the click of a button

Complete Durability...

>
column2:
Where can I use it?

Perfect for any outdoor activities. Great for winter sports, hiking, traveling, or just hanging out. 

https://media.giphy.com/media/3ohhwtX5jz9YXlbyu...

  

Rewards:

Choose Your Size:

If you have any questions regarding sizing, please send us a message so we can help sort our your perfect size. 

U.S Sizes: Large = Large

U.K Sizes: Large = Extra Large

Asian Sizes: Large = Extra Extra Large

Batteries + charges come separately. Add $35 to your current pledge for every extra battery and charger that you would like. 

 3 Different Heating Modes

We built in a secret battery pocket which allows you to utilize your regular pockets as well. 

 

Jacket Specifications

Light fleece material

8 oz Polyester

International Buyers:

Please check your country's import tax law. We have no way of adding extra tax costs in our product pricing. It is up to the customer to understand that his/her country may charge extra costs upon delivery. Thank you for your understanding. 

Timeline

September: Indiegogo Launch

November and December: Getting Ready for Manufacturing

January - February: Finalizing Manufacturing

March: Shipping and Delivery!!

Stretch Goals

$50,000 - If we reach $50,000, we will introduce a new color jacket of your choice

$100,000 - if we reach $100,000, we will add a universal adapter with every jacket

$500,000 - if we reach $500,000, all of the jackets will automatically come with a battery and charger

About Me

My name is Dmitriy and I love working with new and innovative products. I work to brand and create different businesses that I am passionate about. I worked with heated sports clothing for quite some time and decided to create a useful and awesome product for the general public. I appreciate all of your support and I'm excited to launch this project on kickstarter!

Risks and challenges

There are always risks when it comes to manufacturing. However, we have been working with heated clothing for several years and we know the ins and outs of manufacturing within this industry. We will do our best to minimize any hurdles as well as update our customers on every detail throughout the process.

Kitatoz is both a statement of personal style and an immensely practical kit. It contains the tools one uses to transform from a shuffling, scruffy zombie to a well-groomed dynamo. If you’re traveling with others, your kit also speaks to who you are. Starting your day with an attractive, well-packed kit says volumes about what kind of day you intend to have.

Your travel accessories should be practical and useful (and this kit is certainly that), but I also think they should be awesome and stand out, too. 

There are so many useless and overpriced kits out there, and you will love that unlike other kits this one truly has everything you need — most importantly, it will make you smile! 

Definitely a statement piece.
column3:
> 

 

Where do you tuck your toiletries into when making a short trip across town or a long travel across the country?

The guess is, you really don’t know, and we’ll go one better to predict that sometimes you forget some of these important toiletries because they don’t pack themselves.

Sometimes, after a little bit of travel your toiletries may become a little roughed up because nobody said you had to pamper them like babies. With Kitatoz, you have a one stop store to turn to for an affordable and already packed luxury toiletry for adults and kids. 

This will ultimately make that vacation holiday preparation, Gym workout and work trip a tad faster than when you had to go through a chore to find and organize all your toiletries.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

  • Everybody does!

 

It comes in handy if you’re going to be out of your home for a while. So, you’ll need this if you’re going to hit the gym, work late at the hospital, do some camping, night outs at hotels, sleepovers at a friend’s or staying long hours to get your Airbnb booking.

People are constantly on the move, travelling from place to place for a bunch of reasons. The best reason I can give you is “that’s what people do naturally”
column4:
travel to get what they need wherever they find it. So, travelling to the gym for fitness purposes is not going to stop, travelling to work, school, a new state or country, sleepover nights, and military missions will not stop either.

 With Kitatoz, you have a one stop store to turn to for an affordable and already packed luxury toiletry for adults and kids.

We are determined to change the way you travel , now you don't need to go to stores to buy each item individually and pack them in a messy bag. We have taken care of all this.

 

 

 

We have designed kitatoz with a minimal footprint. Built to last and designed to adapt. 

At a terrific price point help round out the kit’s approachable charms. 

We want you to carry more but worry less.

 

 

 A supremely economic design and easy-to-use construction allow the bag to fit pretty much anywhere. It is one handsome piece of utility that’s really minimal. The interior has convenient slots along the perfect edges for little things that you might need to bring. Unlike other typical kits, bags with just a zipper on top, this one goes nearly all the way around, so you can easily slide in and out — nothing gets in or out. That’s actually what makes it so much more than a Dopp kit.

 

 

Kitatoz comes in 3 cases:

WHITE , BLACK and CLEAR Case both for men and woman.
column11:
> 

Kitatoz is available both in HIS and HER Models.

Each is carefully designed to fulfill the basic needs of both genders.

 

 

Don’t let the so-called big names fool you — You will get everything you need without the premium price. This is a super durable and handsome, A very power-ful and feature-full kit. Furthermore, it’s an extremely durable kit and all the things you need a travel kit to be!

 

 

 

The best part of all this is that you can have subscriptions for Kitatoz blister and have them shipped to your doorstep. 

So you don't have to go to store every time.

 

 

 

 

At Kitatoz we are creating innovative solutions that simplify daily life .We have created the next generation of Luxury Toiletry Kit. 

We are a team of friends,doctors, engineers, designers, problem solvers, and explorers. We are bound together with one sole purpose in mind: create stuff to simplify and enhance everyday living!  

Our product offering is results of solutions that we seek while experiencing the problems with the existing systems around us. We constantly strive to make human experiences better and more fulfilling. Our product is designed to enable people maintain their health and beauty anywhere , anytime .

Kitatoz is simple and classic in the sense that you don’t have to overthink it. The result is a perfect, minimalist kit of exceptional quality and genuine distinction. At an unbeatable price and you’re looking at a all in one kit that’s simply too good to refuse. Honestly, what more do you need?

 

 

 

 

Touting premium materials and versatile designs, Here is the best toiletry kit for men, women, and kids. 

It is vital for travel as the very things you put inside them. After all, you’re a person of style and patience, and haphazardly stuffing your toiletries in a Ziploc bag or the spare pockets of your luggage is practically beneath you. Such a maneuver not only lacks discipline but infers improper planning and poor organization skills. 

Show the world what you’re truly made of by never leaving home without a quality toiletry.  

 

Harrying a process as it can be, travel can be made an actual pleasure once you devise a system for everything. 

From the no-fuss carry-on to the multipurpose toiletries to the game-changing packing organizers, we have got you all the essentials for maximizing your travel experience, all packed in Kitatoz!  

Put it all together and you have a handy kit that’s as practical as it is luxurious. 

Without question, this is one of the best toiletry bags for men of a certain prestige.  

You’ll aspire to greater things just by owning it.

 

We ask that you spread the word about Kitatoz Luxury Traveling Kit. The more people know about this, the more capital we can raise to develop more products like this. All contributions are greatly appreciated. We thank you for your time and support.

BigInBerlin verwirklicht, was schon Wilhelm Busch (1832 - 1908) wusste:
column5:
>Viel zu spät begreifen viele die versäumten Lebensziele: 
Freude, Schönheit der Natur, Gesundheit, Reisen und Kultur, 
Darum, Mensch, sei zeitig weise! 
Höchste Zeit ist's! Reise, reise!

column2: >BigInBerlin steht für Mut. Mut, sich eine Existenz aufzubauen. Neues zu wagen, Althergebrachtes in Frage zu stellen, um seine eigenen Ideen zu verwirklichen.

column1: BigInBerlin wird definitiv Menschen und Orte verbinden. Im wahrsten Sinne des Wortes. Reisen zählt zu der ältesten Gewohnheit der Menschen, um die Umgebung zu erkunden und neue Perspektiven, Dinge, Regionen und Geschmäcker zu entdecken: Für unerwartete, unvorhergesehene und unvergessliche Momente.
BigInBerlin bietet Fremden die Möglichkeit, Freundschaft zu knüpfen und zu festigen.

BigInBerlin ist ein einzigartiges Projekt. In Zeiten, in denen der Tourismus zur Industrie verkommt, lasst uns ihn überdenken, einen Gang zurückschalten und die Menschen mit Ihren Bedürfnissen in den Mittelpunkt stellen. Eine Vielzahl von Sehenswürdigkeiten europaweit und sogar in Deiner Nachbarschaft sind immer noch nicht entdeckt, vielleicht auch nur deshalb, weil sich niemand als Begleitung (bereit) fand. Die Zeit ist reif dafür!

BigInBerlin liebt Landstraßen zu entlegenen Schlössern, versteckten Seen oder zu ausgewählten Orten, denen einen besonderer Zauber innewohnt. Ein spezieller Schwerpunkt auf Architektur, Literatur, Wissenschaft, Kabarrett, Single-Reisen, Mode usw. ist denkbar. Warum nicht eine Foto-Safari durch Brandenburg oder an die Ostsee? Oder einen Ausflug zu Preussens Whisky-Destillierien? Wir machen es möglich!

BigInBerlin bietet mehr als Platz genug, um auf langen oder kurzen Strecken komfortabel zu reisen, ob im Kreis Deiner Familie, Deiner Freunde oder Kollegen, mit Deiner Firma, Deinem Sportverein, Deiner Fan-Gemeinschaft oder Hochzeitsgesellschaft, alles auf Dich und Deinen Wünschen abgestimmt.

BigInBerlin ist definitiv groß genug, um Aufmerksamkeit für Dein Produkt, Deine Werbung oder Kampagne zu erzeugen. Dabei entscheidest Du, wohin und wo lang es geht, mit insgesamt 160 Quadratmeter mobiler Werbefläche. Definiere mit uns den Begriff ""Straßenlage"" neu!

BigInBerlin bewegt bis zu 32 Tonnen auf 10 Rädern. Mit vier Meter Höhe und 15 Meter in der Länge braucht es mehr als 500 Pferde um den Koloss zu bewegen. Der Neoplan Megaliner ist der größte jemals in Deutschland entwickelte und produzierte Doppeldecker-Reisebus. Hergestellt Anfang der 1990er in Berlin, wurde er zu DEM Meilenstein der heutigen Omnibus-Branche. Dank dessen Entwickler Dr. Dipl-Ing. Konrad Auwärter, der das damals gesetztlich festgeschriebene Standard-Maximalmaß von 12 Meter Länge provokativ in Frage stellte, wurde die vergleichbare Wendigkeit nur durch mitlenkende Achsen erreicht... d.h. beim Neoplan sind es alle Vier! Deshalb trägt er den Namen MEGAliner zu recht!

BigInBerlin verbindet leidenschaftliche Menschen und bringt sie mit dem außergewöhnlichen und historisch-bedeutsamen Neoplan Megaliner zusammen. In Deutschland sind nicht mehr als 10 Modelle bekannt, von denen weniger als fünf amtlich zugelassen sind. Damit schwindet die Chance tagtäglich, um ein rettenswertes Fahrzeug zu finden. Also, die Zeit läuft, um im Kampf gegen die Uhr und Gevatter Rost die Oberhand zu behalten. Deshalb bitten wir Dich uns dabei zu unterstützen, diesen mobilen Meilenstein nach Hause zu holen, zu restaurieren und zurück auf die Straße zu bringen. Die geschätzten Gesamtkosten belaufen sich auf:
Egal ob und wieviel Du spendest, jeder Einsatz hilft!

column2: >BigInBerlin will bring to life what Wilhelm Busch (1832 - 1908) already claimed:

>Way to late many realize their missed dreams to waste: 
Happines, Beauty of Nature, Health, Travelling and Taste, 
That´s why, human, be eager at an early state! 
Time is right! To travel it´s never to late!
>BigInBerlin stands for courage. Courage to establish his own living. To try something new, to question tradition, for setting up his own ideas.

column1: BigInBerlin definitely brings the people and places together. Literally and physically. Travelling is the oldest habit of human mankind to explore, to open the mind for new perspectives to discover new things, regions and tastes: For unexpected, unforeseen and unforgettable moments.

column2: >BigInBerlin is the opportunity to arrive as a stranger and leave as a friend. Because friends always return.

>BigInBerlin is a unique project. In a time when tourism becomes an industrial machine, let´s reinvent it, slow down and make it more personal. A lot of attractions all over Europe and even in your neighbourhood are still not discovered yet as you might always have planned to go but never found someone else to accompany you. Let´s make it finally happen!

>BigInBerlin chooses the country roads to lead you to enchanted castles, hidden lakes or simply to places where magic and mystery is awaiting you. Everything that comes to your mind, e.g. a special focus on architecture, literature, science, comedy, dating, fashion etc., let´s make it possible!

>BigInBerlin offers you much space and comfort for long and short trips, with your family, friends, colleagues, company, sports team, groupies etc. Scheduled or spontaneously, it is up to you and your needs and wishes.

>BigInBerlin is definitely big enough to serve as a breath-taking eye catcher to raise attention to your product or campaign. Thousands of people looking at it when driving or walking by. You decide where and when to go with a total availability of 160 square meters surface to be covered for your purposes or needs.

>BigInBerlin runs on 10 wheels to carry 32 tons. With 4 meters in height and 15 meters in length, it needs the power of more than 500 horses to hit the road. The Neoplan Megaliner has been the largest double-decker tour bus produced in Germany.  Built in Berlin in the early 1990s, it became the milestone for today's bus production after its maker Konrad Auwärter contested the so far permissible standard dimension of 12 meters in length for buses, reachable only by co-steering rear axes: all four. That´s why it is named Mega.

>BigInBerlin brings passionate people together with the extra-ordinary and vintage bus named Neoplan Megaliner. As there are only about 10 known models in Germany, from which there are less than 5 registered, the chance to find one sufficient will become less and less each single day. So, time is ticking away and the rust is doing its job. That´s why we ask you to help us bringing this one-of-a-kind back to its birthplace, preserve it and bring the giant back on the road. The estimated costs are:

column1: No matter how and how much you like to contribute, every input counts!

BigInBerlin will bring to life what Wilhelm Busch (1832 - 1908) already claimed:

Way to late many realize their missed dreams to waste: Happines, Beauty of Nature, Health, Travelling and Taste, That´s why, human, be eager at an early state! Time is right! To travel it´s never to late!
BigInBerlin stands for courage. Courage to establish his own living. To try something new, to question tradition, for setting up his own ideas.

BigInBerlin definitely brings the people and places together. Literally and physically. Travelling is the oldest habit of human mankind to explore, to open the mind for new perspectives to discover new things, regions and tastes: For unexpected, unforeseen and unforgettable moments.
BigInBerlin is the opportunity to arrive as a stranger and leave as a friend. Because friends always return.

BigInBerlin is a unique project. In a time when tourism becomes an industrial machine, let´s reinvent it, slow down and make it more personal. A lot of attractions all over Europe and even in your neighbourhood are still not discovered yet as you might always have planned to go but never found someone else to accompany you. Let´s make it finally happen!

BigInBerlin chooses the country roads to lead you to enchanted castles, hidden lakes or simply to places where magic and mystery is awaiting you. Everything that comes to your mind, e.g. a special focus on architecture, literature, science, comedy, dating, fashion etc., let´s make it possible!

BigInBerlin offers you much space and comfort for long and short trips, with your family, friends, colleagues, company, sports team, groupies etc. Scheduled or spontaneously, it is up to you and your needs and wishes.

BigInBerlin is definitely big enough to serve as a breath-taking eye catcher to raise attention to your product or campaign. Thousands of people looking at it when driving or walking by. You decide where and when to go with a total availability of 160 square meters surface to be covered for your purposes or needs.

BigInBerlin runs on 10 wheels to carry 32 tons. With 4 meters in height and 15 meters in length, it needs the power of more than 500 horses to hit the road. The Neoplan Megaliner has been the largest double-decker tour bus produced in Germany.  Built in Berlin in the early 1990s, it became the milestone for today's bus production after its maker Konrad Auwärter contested the so far permissible standard dimension of 12 meters in length for buses, reachable only by co-steering rear axes: all four. That´s why it is named Mega.

BigInBerlin brings passionate people together with the extra-ordinary and vintage bus named Neoplan Megaliner. As there are only about 10 known models in Germany, from which there are less than 5 registered, the chance to find one sufficient will become less and less each single day. So, time is ticking away and the rust is doing its job. That´s why we ask you to help us bringing this one-of-a-kind back to its birthplace, preserve it and bring the giant back on the road. The estimated costs are:
No matter how and how much you like to contribute, every input counts!
you ever been on a holiday and been lost? Have you ever been on a holiday at a
new place and only find the best bar in town on your last day?
name is Kamen Nenov and I’m working on a mobile app to guide you around the
biggest holiday resort in Bulgaria, the so called Sunny Beach. Currently I’m
working as property manager here at Sunny Beach. With every new season to start
many new visitors are coming over and those same people are wondering around
trying to find best places for them to visit.
an offline mobile app with all the places of interest will make everyone’s
holiday more enjoyable, will make them feel more comfortable around and will
safe them lots of precious time to rest. And this is what holidays are for,
be extremely thankful if we are able to raise the funds needed to complete the task. So far with my colleagues we have created a web site to go with the app.
we have added all the places that
might be interesting for the guests and visitors. We have invested a lot in this to make the system go and fill up all the places. It came out that creating an up to date and
users friendly application is even harder job to be done.
I continue I would like to explain you a bit more about our idea.
Wayzzguide.com is a informational portal which lists of all the places you can
stay, all the things you can do, all the services offered from the companies
that are working in the area and of course a list of concerts and events. The
system we developed works as a search engine with key words, where after you
find which is the nearest Italian restaurant next to you it can guide your way
there with build in GPS navigation.
I hope it’s sounds useful to you!?
…But imagine having this as a mobile app with no
internet needed for it to function.
for Sunny Beach and the area is that the local
population is just less than 16000 people and during the summer season we are
around 450 000 people. This combines tourists and seasonal workers. Targeting all those people our main goal and it is one
of the differences between us and other similar programs. We are aiming to
provide complete and up to date information about the area. With Wayzzguide you
will not only find hotels, restaurants and bars, but also all kind of services,shops, free parking areas and concert venues.
Big part from the work has been done, by creating the
data base and developing the website.
Our plan is to spend the funding on designing and
developing one useful mobile application. From those 15000 USD we will spend :
- 90% will go for developing and design

for taxes

As perks to our backers we have chosen some Bulgarian very own hand crafted items. We have a range of doll with traditional clothing, wooden canteens and hand crafted boxes. For our top 4 backers we offer a week holiday here at Sunny Beach, Bulgaria.  You may see the perks in the pictures menu and read more about it in the perk's descriptions. 

I believe we have chance to create something that can help the society. The wayzzguide application will be free to download and use. Have a offline guide at a place where not many are familiar with. We believe will bring that extra thing to their holiday to make it a little bit more special.  With our background of creating the website we are looking forward staring the project and use all the experience in this. We are very passionate about it and will give our best to complete it the way it should be. 


Risks &
column2:
Challenges

With our work on  the website we have earn some experience on how its done and now main focus is on creating one users friendly application. This is where most of the funds will go. Until than we are continuing on adding more and more places of interest and adding and much as possible information about them. 

If we are unable to rise all the money needed we have negotiated with the developing company to do as much as they can for the money. It may take us longer but we will go there.

On the brighter side if we get more than this we are going to put those extra money in additional advertising and SEO marketing.  



Other Ways You Can Help

column1: Don't have the cash flow right now to make a contribution? Help us spread
the word by sharing this campaign with your beloved ones! Post it, tweet it,

blog it, pin it...


Progress Update. 

As the campaign goes we are very happy to announce that we are about to launch our very own online taxi booking system. System is ready and its online on our site for a testing period of one week. After that it will be all yours. We have develop one very straight forward and easy to use platform where every one may not only book a taxi, but to get a full information about the cost and time of pick up.  We hope this to be in help for everyone who is coming on a holiday.  Feed back is appreciated. Please have in mind that helping as with the campaign you are helping everyone coming on a holiday to enjoy themselves. This will also be included to our mobile application. 

Thank you very much for supporting us and please follow for more up to date information on our progress.

North Carolina has so much more to offer than just superior breweries, eclectic, small towns, and incredible food. Western NC is home to some of the most beautiful mountain vistas, waterfalls, and natural splendor that this state has to offer and a day hike to experience only a sliver of it just isn't enough.

Appalachia Camping Company offers the opportunity to camp in comfort in the great outdoors without the hassle of packing, setting up, breaking down, and lugging all that heavy and expensive gear! This service is ideal for:
• Visitors who didn't bring (or don't have) gear
We are a small business with a big philanthropic mission. With each authentic camping experience, 6% of proceeds (or $17 per booking ) are directly donated to Brother Wolf Animal Rescue each month.

Brother Wolf Animal Rescue is more than the largest no-kill animal rescue organization in North Carolina. It's a community center, pet food pantry, education hub, and a vital piece of Asheville's thriving vegan collective. Offering spay/neuter assistance, hiking clubs, foster homes, behavioral counseling, enrichment services, and youth education services, this non-profit is committed to the respect, care, and quality of life for all animals thanks to the dedicated staff and many volunteers.
​And with continued success and funding, We hope to add more non-profits to this list and more ways to have fun in the outdoors by providing:

By pledging to contribute to this campaign, you're helping us to provide a service that gets more people and their pets outside and donate much needed funding for non-profit animal rescue organizations.
Okay, folks, here's the breakdown to get the company off the ground:

This may seem to go without saying, but what you see in the video is a (very) rough idea of what the ideal camping set up would look like. The goal is to provide campers with quality and durable camping gear meant for the outdoors like the following:

column2: feature=youtu.be"" rel=""noopener nofollow"">High-quality 10-12ft camping tents with standing room

column1: Plush, double sleeping pads  and Alps Mountaineering Cots
• High quality double and single sleeping bags
Rumpl blankets (made from the same material as your synthetic or down winter jackets. Super durable, repels water and dog hair!)

column7: gclid=CJjxvozV9tECFYePswodBe4D-w"" rel=""noopener nofollow"">LED lanterns  with charging stations

column1: • Double burner propane camp stove (w/propane)
• Insurance to cover damaged or lost gear

We want our backers to be as much of a part of this project as possible and have the chance to experience it. After all, you are the ones who are helping to take this endeavor from just an idea to a fully functional business!  That's why each perk was created with personal attention, gratitude, and most of all, with you in mind so that you can be involved in the process as we grow. Building this business isn't just about camping and giving back to the community, it's also about creating a network of like-minded folks like you who love nature and dogs, and who believe in us.

In the event that our entire goal is not reached, what money is raised will go towards initial business expenses to get the company off the ground and running with at least one camping set up. The rest will be bootstrapped, begged, and borrowed as we save up enough to offer additional services. Either way, this is happening and we want you to be a part of it!
Can't contribute right now? Hey, we get it. We're broke too but you can still help and support us by getting the word out in these ways:
• Follow us on Instagram @appalachiacampingco. and share our project
• Use the Indiegogo share tools to get the word out!
• Share our campaign and campaign video with your friends and family!

We want our backers to be as much of a part of this project as possible and have the chance to experience it. After all, you are the ones who are helping to take this endeavor from just an idea to a fully functional business!  That's why each perk was created with personal attention, gratitude, and most of all, with you in mind so that you can be involved in the process as we grow. Building this business isn't just about camping and giving back to the community, it's also about creating a network of like-minded folks like you who love nature and dogs, and who believe in us.

In the event that our entire goal is not reached, what money is raised will go towards initial business expenses to get the company off the ground and running with at least one camping set up. The rest will be bootstrapped, begged, and borrowed as we save up enough to offer additional services. Either way, this is happening and we want you to be a part of it!
Can't contribute right now? Hey, we get it. We're broke too but you can still help and support us by getting the word out in these ways:
Follow us on Instagram @appalachiacampingco. and share our project
Use the Indiegogo share tools to get the word out!
Share our campaign and campaign video with your friends and family!
Une 2 CV à San Francisco - Etats Unis
Je m appelle Did Bernard et Rental Vintage est ma petite compagnie de location de voitures vintages Américaines.Je suis Français et nous sommes implantés à San Francisco depuis 2 ans.

Notre projet "" Une deuche à San Francisco "" est de faire venir et restaurer une vieille et mythique 2 CV citroen pour la proposer à la location.Notre statut de loueur professionnel nous permet de pouvoir proposer à chaque donateur un retour sur donation dès sa premiere reservation-location et ainsi de pouvoir avoir le plaisir de circuler en Californie avec la plus emblématique voiture que la France ait jamais connue.
Chez Rental Vintage nous savons assurer et entretenir un véhicule pour le rendre disponible et fiable toute l' année.

""Une deuche à San Francisco""  en crownfunding c est un clin d'oeil, que dis je un appel de ( vieux) phares, entre notre bonne vieille France des villages et cette Californie de la technologie du futur.

Cette vieille 2 CV nous la voulons rutilante et complètement restaurée. Nous imaginons un magnifique logo et pour ceux qui le souhaite leur nom comme contributeur.Elle doit être très bien entretenue, bien assurée et disponible à l'année.Chacun pourra l utiliser en la réservant auprès de Rental vintage, mais vous pourrez aussi la voir circuler régulièrement dans la city, ou sur les routes de la napa Valley par exemple par des Américains épris de notre belle culture.
Notre contrepartie unique c est de vous proposer cette voiture en location avec des ristournes basées sur votre donation
vous contribuez à hauteur de $ 250.Réservez la voiture pour une journée et vous ne paierez rien.
vous contribuez à hauteur de $ 150.Reservez la voiture une journée pour seulement $ 100
vous contribuez à hauteur de $ 500.reservez la voiture pour un week end et vous ne paierez rien.
Vous souhaitez donner plus ou moins, pas de problème chaque contribution est deductible à partir de $ 100.
Chaque contributeur et quelque soit le montant à partir de $ 20 recevra la carte postale de la voiture restaurée avec son logo et un code pour une réservation rapide.
Pour les français ayant une activité professionnelle dans la baie et voulant utiliser cette voiture en exposition, nous proposons également celle ci, n hésitez pas à nous en parler.

Ce projet ne sera pas sans embuches car nous devons trouver en France celle qui deviendra notre ambassadrice. Il faut la faire venir, la légaliser, la restaurer entièrement, la repeindre, l'assurer et être quotidiennement aux petits soins mais ce projet est magnifiquement motivant.

J ai déja eu une 2 cv en France, une AZAM de 1965 et je connais bien tous les points faible de cette inconditionnelle voiture.Je connais les réseaux pour trouver les pieces et les transitaires fiables pour la faire venir.J'ai déniché ici un mécanicien amoureux de cette voiture à qui je pourrais en confier la restauration.Autant d heures et de reflexions que je me propose de passer, en votre compagnie discrete, car chaque étape vous sera expliquée et commentée par le biais d'une page Facebook et d'un instagram dédié.

Pour ceux qui ne peuvent contribuer financièrement, un simple relais de votre part auprès de gens susceptibles d être intéressés nous serait également précieux, et peut être serez vous aussi un généreux loueur plus tard, alors n hésitez pas à en parler autour de vous.

column5: >We believe India has so much more to it than just the Taj Mahal, and that is what we aspire to bring to you. In this process, we have developed an offbeat travel guide to India to help you find the most eccentric of destinations that paint the unseen picture of India and content to let you know the India that is yet to be discovered.

column1: We help you plan your travel by providing expertly narrated reviews of places, stays, eateries, shops and much more so that you have all the valuable information about our country in the pre travel phase.

column5: >Eccentric travels endeavours to redefine how offbeat travel takes place in India. In the course of achievement of this aim, we have created a travel guide and are now investing in ways to improve our features, revenue model and technology.

column1: We have already taken the first step towards our goal by having started our portal http://eccetrav.com/ .

column5: >We are a newly launched offbeat travel guide and therefore, need money for technology development, content writers and YES, of course for reaching out to people.
>We welcome suggestions which can help improve us in any way possible.

>India is a country often referred to as the ‘mother of civilizations’, an incredible manifestation of diversity of customs and cultures. Empires, dynasties, traditions and religions of all colours went into making India the land of wonder that it is. And just imagine travellers are unable to see beyond the Taj Mahal or the Humayun Tomb in such a vibrant country.

>That is why we feel there still remains a definite need to explore beyond the boundaries. There lies a need to present and explore this diversity- India’s soul, through centuries and millenniums under a common solution. Yes, we just don’t mean business. Eccentric Travels is more about the love that we have for our country.

>A completely untouched, unexplored India lies hidden behind the clichéd India. We intend to bring to the attention of travel enthusiasts such destinations in India and promote ecotourism in those places.

>Travel isn’t just reaching a destination. There is a lot more waiting behind closed doors. We hope to open those doors for travellers coming to India. The articles featured on our guide are written bringing to the front the history, culture, people, attractions, archaeology, alleys, shop, food, lanes, traditions, hues and the very length, breath and heart of India.

>We aim to present the service providers in the Indian travel industry in a better and more educated fashion through finely weaved reviews. These reviews intend to bring out the good and the best of a place, eateries, stays, shops so as to help travellers plan their trip

column6: >Our biggest challenge is technology development since we are all from a non technical background.

column5: >But we are passionate to overcome all hurdles and obstacles, and we think we have accomplished our aim to an extent by creating a basic travel guide. We now need creative brains to help us execute features which we have planned.
>We have recently brought tech lead into our team. We hence need investment to sustain the development of the technology we need.

column2:
>

Other Ways You Can Help

column1: We are definitely looking for monetary help, but we heartily welcome and appreciate any help you can lend us.

column5: >We value your help with suggestions, sharing our idea on social media to help us get more audience and in any way you find suitable or want to contribute.

>Become our voice and inform people who are interested in travelling to India about our initiative, this would help them too as they won't end up thinking they know India after only visiting the Taj Mahal.
>You can also write travel articles and share your travel stories about India with us and we will be more than happy to publish them on our website.

column1:
Remind people you know to use the Indiegogo share tools!

","We believe India has so much more to it than just the Taj Mahal, and that is what we aspire to bring to you. In this process, we have developed an offbeat travel guide to India to help you find the most eccentric of destinations that paint the unseen picture of India and content to let you know the India that is yet to be discovered.

We help you plan your travel by providing expertly narrated reviews of places, stays, eateries, shops and much more so that you have all the valuable information about our country in the pre travel phase.

Eccentric travels endeavours to redefine how offbeat travel takes place in India. In the course of achievement of this aim, we have created a travel guide and are now investing in ways to improve our features, revenue model and technology.
What We Need & What You Get
We have already taken the first step towards our goal by having started our portal http://eccetrav.com/ .
We are a newly launched offbeat travel guide and therefore, need money for technology development, content writers and YES, of course for reaching out to people.
We welcome suggestions which can help improve us in any way possible.

India is a country often referred to as the ‘mother of civilizations’, an incredible manifestation of diversity of customs and cultures. Empires, dynasties, traditions and religions of all colours went into making India the land of wonder that it is. And just imagine travellers are unable to see beyond the Taj Mahal or the Humayun Tomb in such a vibrant country.

That is why we feel there still remains a definite need to explore beyond the boundaries. There lies a need to present and explore this diversity- India’s soul, through centuries and millenniums under a common solution. Yes, we just don’t mean business. Eccentric Travels is more about the love that we have for our country.

A completely untouched, unexplored India lies hidden behind the clichéd India. We intend to bring to the attention of travel enthusiasts such destinations in India and promote ecotourism in those places.

Travel isn’t just reaching a destination. There is a lot more waiting behind closed doors. We hope to open those doors for travellers coming to India. The articles featured on our guide are written bringing to the front the history, culture, people, attractions, archaeology, alleys, shop, food, lanes, traditions, hues and the very length, breath and heart of India.

We aim to present the service providers in the Indian travel industry in a better and more educated fashion through finely weaved reviews. These reviews intend to bring out the good and the best of a place, eateries, stays, shops so as to help travellers plan their trip
Risks & Challenges Our biggest challenge is technology development since we are all from a non technical background.

But we are passionate to overcome all hurdles and obstacles, and we think we have accomplished our aim to an extent by creating a basic travel guide. We now need creative brains to help us execute features which we have planned.
We have recently brought tech lead into our team. We hence need investment to sustain the development of the technology we need.
We are definitely looking for monetary help, but we heartily welcome and appreciate any help you can lend us.
We value your help with suggestions, sharing our idea on social media to help us get more audience and in any way you find suitable or want to contribute.

Become our voice and inform people who are interested in travelling to India about our initiative, this would help them too as they won't end up thinking they know India after only visiting the Taj Mahal.
You can also write travel articles and share your travel stories about India with us and we will be more than happy to publish them on our website.
Remind people you know to use the Indiegogo share tools!",2.0,0,"1 Campaign

column4:
>Inflates 5X Faster

 

Our goal at Windcatcher® was to revolutionize the world of inflation. We did just that with our patented Windcatcher® valve. Since 2013, our AirPads have been the go to gear for anyone seeking a rapidly inflating place to rest. After our success on Shark Tank™ in 2015, we have spent the past 3 years designing and prototyping many versions of the next AirPad we wanted to release. We listened to all of our supporter's feedback and.........

The result: The Fastest Inflating, the Lightest Weight, and the Largest Windcatcher® AirPad we've ever designed. We've even added Insulation to make this a year round AirPad.

column1: Our patented Windcatcher® valve uses the simple principle of entrainment to amplify your own breath
column2:
thus inflating the Ultra AirPad much faster than conventional valves.

When you blow into the Windcatcher® valve you create a stream of fast moving, low pressure air. The surrounding air has a higher pressure and is sucked into the low pressure air stream. As a result, the air entering the Windcatcher® valve is 5 times greater than the air you expelled from your lungs.
column4:
> 

Some people will find the Windcatcher® valve to be easy and will have no issues inflating the Ultra AirPad
column5: others may require a few extra breaths and a little bit of practice.

column1: • Inflated size:  74"" (187.96 cm) x 25.5"" (64.77 cm) x 2.5"" (6.35 cm).
• Primaloft® Insulation:  Aids in retaining body heat on cooler nights.
• Material:  Lightweight polyester material laminated with TPU (Very durable and healthier than PVC).

Color: The Ultra AirPad will first be available in our NEW Windcatcher® Green. If we reach $100,000 in funding we will produce the Windcatcher® Blue Ultra AirPad or the Black Ultra AirPad. After we hit our goal, we will send out a survey with the colors to choose from. The winning color choice will be made available to our fans.
column4: >

column1: • G-hook Fastener:  Quickly and easily open and close the Windcatcher® valve.
• Insulation:  Makes sleeping a bit warmer for those cooler nights.
• Horizontal baffles:  Means it is very comfortable!!
• No Stuff Sack Required:  The built-in elastic band attaches to the G-hook, allowing you to pack up the Windcatcher® Ultra AirPad without the need for a stuff sack.
• Sanitary:  The valve never touches your mouth.

Other mats and air pads are such a hassle to inflate and pack-up, they aren't practical to use for just an hour or less. However, the Windcatcher® Ultra AirPad inflates and also packs-up so quickly, it's perfect for every occasion!
column2: >5X FASTER INFLATION, WITHOUT PUMPING OR POWER
column4:
>

Each time you blow into the Windcatcher® valve, your breath is amplified FIVE times, pulling in more of the surrounding air to expedite the inflation process. This far surpasses airpads with a small conventional valve
column5:
saving you countless headaches and wasted breaths.

And if that wasn't enough, we have designed and constructed the Ultra AirPad from some of the lightest and most durable material we could source. Our baffled design is Ultra comfortable and Ultra sleek!  The Ultra AirPad packs up small and can be taken anywhere you go.
column7:
> 

 

The large Windcatcher® valve allows for near instant deflation, letting you pack-up with ease and efficiency. NO WAITING, NO HASSLE.
column17: >What's Been Said About Us:
column22:
>The Windcatcher® AirPillow

If we reach our goal of $150,000 we will be able to begin manufacturing our very own Windcatcher® AirPillow. It is the perfect companion to our Ultra AirPad! On average, it inflates in 1 breath!

column1: • Inflated size:  15"" (38.1 cm) x 12"" (30.48 cm) x 3"" (7.62 cm
• Folds up small and fits in your pocket!
• Material: 75D x 150D brushed polyester for a soft feeling
• Having a romantic evening out by the lake
• Watching the sunset (or rise) along the beach
• Waiting in line for the latest gadget
• Use as a spare bed for an unexpected guest
• Emergency bedding at hurricane shelter (or relative's house)
• Great if you ever get stuck at the airport
• Glovebox bedding - Too tired to drive home safe, crash on your friend's floor instead

column5:
>Instructional Demo:

Please see the video below as our founder, Ryan Frayne, demonstrates how to inflate and deflate our Original AirPad. Some features won't apply to the new Ultra AirPad, but the inflation directions are the same.
column9:
> 

Referral Program Rules:

1. Starts March 5th 2019 00:00 EST, ends April 1st 2019 23:59 EST.
2. A successful referral is counted when someone uses your referral link to go to Indiegogo and purchase the Windcatcher® Ultra AirPad.
3. For every 5 referrals you may choose 1 new Windcatcher® Ultra AirPad. If we manufacture several colors, you will get a choice of colors.
4. Rewards estimated delivery will be July 2019.
5. Rewards are unlimited!!
6. Your reported referral statistics may not be accurate due to Indiegogo limitations.
7. If you have any problems regarding the referral program, please contact geneve@windcatchergear.com.
8. Your referrals will usually be updated every 24 hours. You may check your referral count if you go to your Indiegogo account under My Contributions >
column11:
>The Windcatcher® Story

""There I was laying on the beach in Hawaii around Christmas time. After blowing two breaths of air into an inflatable raft/mat
column12: and seeing what pitiful progress I had made, I decided laying directly on the beach was really my only choice. My brother
column13: who now had a wife and kid to worry about, felt more compelled to inflate his own raft. As such, he continued this charade for another thirty seconds before ultimately giving up. Upon quitting, my brother looked down at the valve and said something to the effect of ""this is f----ing ridiculous"". As I laid there and listen to his words of wisdom, my mind raced with ideas about how........ oh, shave ice!""
column14:
>Ryan Frayne on how he conceived the Windcatcher® valve

 

""Our founder, Ryan Frayne, passed away in June of last year after a long battle with pancreatic cancer
column15: this was such an incredible loss for us. I have known Ryan for almost 20 years, so in 2015 when he asked me to join Windcatcher® as the Chief Operating Officer, I was honored. After we appeared on Shark Tank™, things got busy! Over the past few years our Windcatcher® family has been designing and prototyping products that utilize our patented technology and the Ultra AirPad was one of the last things Ryan was designing. We find it fitting to be releasing this new AirPad on Indiegogo, as crowd funding is how our business began. It became our passion at Windcatcher® to change the world of inflation and our team is determined, more than ever, to continue Ryan's vision.""
column17:
>The Future

With your support, our Windcatcher® technology has the potential to inspire new ideas and future innovative products. Our first shot at crowdfunding did really well thanks to you, our fans, and now we need your support again. Windcatcher® has had its fair share of tough times, but we are back and even more motivated and prepared to bring you the best products.

We will continuously update you regarding the manufacturing and shipping of the Ultra AirPad. In an attempt to prevent issues that we've had in the past, we have our factory ready to go and we have ensured plenty of production time.
column18: >Together we can keep Windcatcher® going strong.
column19: >Thanks again for your continued support!

Our first shot at crowdfunding did really well thanks to you, our fans, and now we need your support again. Windcatcher® has had its fair share of tough times, but we are back and even more motivated and prepared to bring you the best products.We will continuously update you regarding the manufacturing and shipping of the Ultra AirPad. In an attempt to prevent issues that we've had in the past, we have our factory ready to go and we have ensured plenty of production time.  Together we can keep Windcatcher® going strong.Thanks again for your continued support!   The Windcatcher® Family           © 2019 Windcatcher Technology LLC. WINDCATCHER, the WINDCATCHER logos, RAPID INFLATION TECHNOLOGY, and QUICKSTREAM are trademarks and/or registered trademarks of Windcatcher Technology LLC in the United States and other countries. www.windcatchergear.com/patents Patents Pending Worldwide U.S. Patent No. 8,979,693",22.0,4,"1 Campaign

column1: As a founding partner of Elephant Pools you get to spend time on safari with us at the Victoria Falls and stay at Elephant Pools Safari Lodge.  The lodge will be built in the Musi O Tunya National Park on the site of a derelict National Parks Staff Camp. The site has 36 old houses that are completely derelict (see photos). These will be removed to make way for Elephant Pools luxury 5 star lodge development.

The lodge will accommodate 36 guests in air conditioned rooms with each room having a view of the waterhole. The park is home to a large elephant population as well as many other animals. Sit on your private veranda and relax while watch the animals coming and going or take a dip in the infinity pool at the main lodge while sipping your favourite drink.

As well as offering a great holiday experience the lodge will create employment for the local people, help run anti poaching patrols in the national park, run conservation education programs in local schools and preserve this amazing National park.

By being one of the founding partners of this campaign you get an amazing holiday in an area of outstanding natural beauty, contribute to conservation and education and creat long term employment in this incredible area.
As a founding partner of Elephant Pools you will be afforded VIP service at the lodge with exclusive events and activities tailored specifically for you.

Your holiday to Elephant Pools will remain valid for a period of 10 years from the date the lodge opens which will be in June 2020. You can swap your holiday with friends or family if you cant make it or sell the tickets to a 3rd party. There are no restrictions on this.

The development of Elephant Pools will be followed on all social media channels as well as our own dedicated u-tube channel. You can share the developments with family and friends as work progresses and you plan your holiday.

The Periscopic Mask - is an upgrade from the wide variety of existing leisure full-face masks to a new class device of adventure, sport, and rescue. Sea Voice Inc. made two dozen modifications for this upgrade.

The Periscopic Mask - is the safest full face snorkeling mask in the World that brings into the water a personal periscope and adapter to a mini air tank. 

Comparison of modifications of the Periscopic Mask from Sea Voice Inc. with the types of the existing masks:

PERISCOPE

You should know where you are when you are moving at high speed,

or swim in a group, near a pontoon/boat/rocks.

We shifted the tube to the left and inserted two mirrors - in the top of the tube and on the glass inside the mask above the left eye. 

In the Periscopic Mask, the snorkeler in the water can see what is above the water. 

MAXIMIZED SAFETY 

We made more than a dozen modifications to fix the safety errors that are in ALL other masks created before the Periscopic Mask.

With new type air membrane, we achieved a reduction in the level of CO2 consumption by 30-50% as compared to any full-face snorkeling mask.

Increased air ducts, air duct openings, and maximum-direct air flow allow you to breathe freely even when you are actively moving.

Manual blocking of the float (in addition to the standard) allows you to roll upside down and tumble in the water without filling the mask with water.

The new latch allows you to conveniently fasten the mask, regardless of hairstyle and shape/size of the head, 

as well as quickly remove the mask if necessary.

Increased buoyancy will protect not experienced, tired swimmers and will help not to drown in a storm.

The spherical shape of glass distributes the water pressure much better than masks with corner joints and planes.

SPEED &
column2:
DIVING ACCESSORIES

The Periscopic Mask has an adapter for attaching a mini air-tank of other manufacturers. You can use it when the SCUBA is not available or not applicable.

CAUTION Using compressed air underwater requires special training (PADI and others), untrained divers can cause serious harm to their health - the air-tank adapter should not be used by untrained divers.

Adapters for snorkeling tubes for connecting a mini air-tank have been on the open market for several years, and are even approved by the army. We created the first such adapter for a full face mask.

Using a periscopic mask with a balloon makes it easy to sail at speeds near the surface.

Using a mini air-tank, you can dive to a depth up to 33 feet (10 meters) for up to 5 minutes (with an average inhalation volume of 1.5 liters).

Adapter connector design allows you to replace the tank without lifting your head out of the water

Our cuffs allow you to carry up to 4 mini air-tank (two on the shoulders and two on the hips)

Special strip for blowing nose is designed to equalize the pressure in the skull with increasing depth

And automatic float switching of the air source from clean to compressed (and vice versa) saves air in the tank and allows using the Periscopic Mask as a rescue device in a storm.

Trained divers can use our Periscopic Mask with a mini air-tank of other manufacturers for short-term work and entertainment at minor depths.

 DESIGN PROCESS

We created a full-face mask that would become a really safe mask of this type, with corrected engineering errors of the past, with simultaneous use of different mask nodes for several functions, and for symbiosis with related types of activity. Below are a few sketches showing how our mask has changed. 

COLOR OPTION

SIZING  

3 AVAILABLE SIZES FOR A PERFECT FIT. To determine your mask size simply measure from the bridge of your nose to the bottom of your chin. 

 

HOW TO ORDER  

1. Click Back this Project Below:  

Select the available reward tier you would like to pledge on the right side of the page.  

2. Payment:  

Enter your payment information.  

3. Size, Color:  

Hold your (sea)horses! Don’t worry about that yet! You will get to select your size, color choice and submit your shipping a few days after the campaign ends. 

*Sizing chart below for reference.

SHIPPING INFORMATION 

Don’t worry about that yet! After the end of the company, on the basis of the geography of financing, we will determine in which countries the wholesale warehouses will be located to reduce the cost of international delivery. You will get to select and submit your shipping a few days after the campaign ends. This will save your money on commissions that are collected during this company. 

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

The manufacturer is selected, working prototypes are made and tested. Our primary challenge today is to organize production correctly. We have many years of experience in organizing plastic product heading in large factories. But no one is immune from force majeure, which can lead to a delay of plans. For example, due to recent hurricanes, some of the components for our prototypes were sent to us with a two-week delay. And only the provision of reserve time in case of unforeseen situations helped us not to disrupt the timing of the shooting. 

Specifying the delivery time “May 2019”, we provided two months for solving unforeseen tasks, changing suppliers (if our requirements are not met) and reconfiguring the technological process. We believe that this is sufficient time to ensure that the masks are delivered on time. And if a solution to the foreseen tasks is not required, then it will be 1-2 months ahead of the planned delivery time.

THANK YOU! 

Thanks to everyone for helping in organizing the production of masks of the new generation. The Sea Voice mask is in the process of adapting prototypes to production. In the process of adaptation, we will make minor adjustments at the mask nodes to simplify production and assembly at Protom Technology Limited. Kickstarter pledges will help:

column1: • finish the adaptation of drawings and materials for production,
• make moldings for pressing out plastic parts
• create test benches and organize quality testing
• cover the production costs of the first industrial batch

Our entire team thanks you for your confidence in us solving engineering tasks and creating a full-face mask of an entirely new class.

0,"

Introducing our version of the alpine pole. Adjustable at the press of a button, it enables you to be instantly adaptable without the fuss of traditional methods.

 

 

 

So what's wrong with traditional adjustable poles? They have some major flaws: they take too long to adjust, they're easily broken and often cumbersome. Whether it's avoiding buying them or simply not bothering to adjust them, these problems result in a product/feature with huge benefits going largely underutilised. We fixed that and more. 

 

 

We spent the last 4 years applying our background in mechanical engineering to redesign the adjustable pole from the ground up, minimising weight and cost, while maximising utility and reliability.

 

 

Ensuring every part was thoroughly tested and built to exceed international standards. 

 

 

Our goal was to improve your experience on all terrain. Giving you the perfect length poles at all times. Helping you finally get the most out of adjustable poles.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Incredibly satisfying to use. 

Even when designing these poles we couldn't have begun to imagine how satisfying they would be to use. Changing lengths instantly at the press of a button and hearing that *click* of the pins locking into place. Flowing from one terrain to another.  

You simply press the button, change the length and release the button as you pass the desired hole. The spring loaded pins do the rest. 

 

 

 

 

How we like to use them.

When we asked our lovely followers how they liked to use adjustable poles, we found that (as you'd expect) most people use them to adapt to varying gradients and terrains. Some use them for growing children and some even use them for tent poles. But you haven't lived until you've poled along the flat with poles set to 140cm. A level of efficiency hitherto unseen. You'll never arrive at the bottom of a lift, after a long flat, close to blacking out ever again.

Oh that doesn't happen to you? Just us? Okay, cool.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Strong. Simple. Reliable

During the development process for the ATP-01 we toyed with many different features. We even made a prototype that could be split into three pieces, for compactness. However, we decided this was exactly the kind of design we were trying to get away from. Too many failure points and lots of added weight. We wanted to incorporate our new feature effectively while producing a robust and reliable pole. We think we nailed it.

 

Change lengths precisely and instantly without thought. 

 

It’s instantly secure

 

And won’t be accidentally released.

 

 

 

The features you're used to.

While we didn't want to overload the ATP-01 with gimmicks that would potentially reduce its reliability we still wanted to keep the creature comforts that we've all grown used to.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

ATP-01 Materials, Specs + Options

When designing our take on the adjustable pole we weren't willing to compromise compared to the products currently available. We pushed to achieved a strong, light, affordable product while still adding our new feature. 

 

 

Colour Options:

 

Seperation Option:

The ATP-01 is designed with a limiter to stop the poles from separating when performing the extension shown below. However, this limiter also means the poles cannot be separated at all, even for travel. Therefore, we recommend that if you desire compactness over this one functionality, that you opt to have the limiter removed when selecting your perk. The adjustability still works exactly the same, but if you attempted the below manoeuvre, you'd leave two pole segments behind.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Rest easy, we've got you covered.

At MONT.BLACK we aim to produce products that you will use for years to come. To this end, we offer a 2 year warranty with all of our products. However, this is not a typical warranty.

In a bid to be more sustainable, the ATP-01 was designed to allow for all parts to be replaceable. If your product breaks during the warranty period we will be more than happy to repair it, or send you the replacement parts to do it yourself. If it's not possible to repair, the pole will then be recycled and you will be provided with a brand new one. This means less poles in the landfill and more fun outdoors.

We don't want to leave our customers high and dry regardless of the warranty. If a part fails after the warranty period simply contact us and we will find you replacement parts using what is left over from that production run. Unfortunately we cannot offer this post warranty service for the aluminium sections themselves.

 

 

 

 

 

Convinced? Choose from the perks below, scroll to the top of the page, then click Back It.

Or if you're not bored of us yet, scroll past for more details on us, our product testing and the estimated delivery timeline. 

 

We didn't want to be the type of company that pushed our own views on our customers. However, the current climate situation is at a tipping point and something needs to be done. In aid of this, we are pledging to offset 115% of our total carbon emissions, starting by planting a tree for every single pledge we receive. This is something that really matters to us and we hope you'll help out  by supporting our campaign.

 

 

 

 

 

As part of our on-going efforts to operate as a responsible climate positive company and reduce plastic waste, we made the decision not to supply rubber feet and baskets as standard with the ATP-01. This is not in an effort to make an extra quid and if Indiegogo allowed us to list them for less than a £1 we would. We simply want to let you make the decision yourself.

 

As with most Indiegogos we will be dispatching the ATP-01 in batches starting with our super early bird backers. If you're in a particular rush to get your pole, we recommend you select the ""BLANK POLE"" option. This will enable us to assemble and dispatch your pole roughly a month early (depending on batch size) before it goes through the printing process.

 

 

 

 

 

 

The story behind MONT.BLACK

 

MONT.BLACK's journey began back in 2017 when founder Dom Box broke his adjustable ski pole while trying to stand back up after a fall (he swears it wasn't a tantrum but no one saw, so...). He started to wonder whether it was even worth buying another adjustable set. Changing lengths for different scenarios provided huge advantages but was too slow, broke up the flow and often wasn't worth the effort. Not to mention how fragile existing adjustable poles can be. This conclusion is what, later that year, gave rise to the idea behind the ATP-01. A pole that could be adjusted at the press of a button on the handle, designed to maximise utility and strength while removing all dead weight.

 

After researching the available products it was apparent that the alpine pole industry as a whole was lacking. Year on year releasing the same unrefined products with small changes and gimmicks. Often an afterthought from ski-centric brands. There was no saving the existing designs, the pole needed to be redesigned from scratch.

 

And so MONT.BLACK was born, a UK-based alpine equipment manufacturer, driven by mechanical engineering expertise and a passion for outdoor sports. It seemed clear to us that more focus needed to be put on utilising recent technological advancements and precision engineering. Allowing us to produce higher quality products that better meet your needs. So that's what we decided to do.

 

Since then, our initial design solution has been continuously refined and developed iteration after iteration, prototype after prototype, for 4 years, until we felt we had truly created the perfect solution to bring to market.

 

 

 

So why Indiegogo?

• Fundamentally, Indiegogo provides creators with a brilliant pre-order process and an extended lead time – which in turn allows us to produce at scale (bringing prices down), and gauge demand (reducing waste).

• It enables us to grow and continue working without having to seek venture capital. This means we can take on the more innovative products that bigger companies might avoid, without having to worry about revenue targets set by others.

• Using Indiegogo allows us to reward our earliest supporters with the lowest prices as a thank you for believing in us. It also lets us connect better with our customers helping us to steer our products in the directions you actually want.

What sets us apart.

A quick rant: MONT.BLACK was born from the belief that the products currently available to consumers are unimaginative and poorly engineered. We aimed to change this, producing more reliable innovations by using precision engineering and cutting edge technologies in our design process.

 

Material Selection

We utilise smart material selection programmes to refine our pole geometry. Once calibrated the system automatically optimises parameters such as wall thickness, pole overlap and material, helping find the perfect balance of light, cheap and strong. This method in particular led us to a new geometry which, when compared to current products, allows us to bring the weight of the pole itself down while still adding strength.

 

Metal 3D Printing

Recent improvements in industrial scale metal 3D printing have meant that small parts that would have previously been too intricate to produce can now be made quickly and easily at low cost. In the ATP-01 we use this for our smaller internal parts.

 

Strength Analysis + Testing

If you pick up your current poles, you'll likely see in small text ""not according to ISO 7331"" meaning they haven't met the international standards set for alpine poles. We weren't willing to settle for that with the ATP-01. Further analysis programmes and real world tests helped simulate the poles use over a lifetime, helping us walk the line between lightweight and robust, while remaining reliable in the long run. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

An idea of what to expect.

If all goes to plan, we will have finished shipping the ATP-01 out to all levels of backer by the end of December this year, in-time for the majority of the 2021-22 season. The earlier you pledge, the sooner you will get your pole. While we have budgeted extra time within this estimate to allow for unforeseen delays it is still an estimate and not a guarantee. We aim to produce the very best in are field and will not ship products that don't meet our standards.  

 

 

 

 

 

 

Come join our 17k instagram followers or help us grow our other socials. 

 

Still unsure or have further questions? 

We'll be available to chat 12pm-2pm GMT every weekday through Facebook Messenger. A member of the team will be more than happy to discuss the pole at length with you. We won't ever push it on you, we'll simply let you know if we think it's right for you.

 

 

 

 

 

As mentioned above, we’ve already received and tested production samples. We are ready to go straight into production as soon as the campaign concludes. As with any manufactured good, there could be delays. We might not accept the quality of goods we receive from our suppliers, containers might get stuck in ports, there may be reduced output due to further COVID outbreaks. We have tried to mitigate these delays where possible and pad our delivery estimate where it is not, but will keep our backers up to date throughout the entire process making sure there are no nasty surprises.
