We simply want to let you make the decision yourself. As with most Indiegogos we will be dispatching the ATP-01 in batches starting with our super early bird backers. If you're in a particular rush to get your pole, we recommend you select the ""BLANK POLE"" option. This will enable us to assemble and dispatch your pole roughly a month early (depending on batch size) before it goes through the printing process.      The story behind MONT.BLACK MONT.BLACK's journey began back in 2017 when founder Dom Box broke his adjustable ski pole while trying to stand back up after a fall (he swears it wasn't a tantrum but no one saw, so...). He started to wonder whether it was even worth buying another adjustable set. Changing lengths for different scenarios provided huge advantages but was too slow, broke up the flow and often wasn't worth the effort. Not to mention how fragile existing adjustable poles can be. This conclusion is what, later that year, gave rise to the idea behind the ATP-01. A pole that could be adjusted at the press of a button on the handle, designed to maximise utility and strength while removing all dead weight. After researching the available products it was apparent that the alpine pole industry as a whole was lacking. Year on year releasing the same unrefined products with small changes and gimmicks. Often an afterthought from ski-centric brands. There was no saving the existing designs, the pole needed to be redesigned from scratch. And so MONT.BLACK was born, a UK-based alpine equipment manufacturer, driven by mechanical engineering expertise and a passion for outdoor sports. It seemed clear to us that more focus needed to be put on utilising recent technological advancements and precision engineering. Allowing us to produce higher quality products that better meet your needs. So that's what we decided to do. Since then, our initial design solution has been continuously refined and developed iteration after iteration, prototype after prototype, for 4 years, until we felt we had truly created the perfect solution to bring to market.   So why Indiegogo?

Fundamentally, Indiegogo provides creators with a brilliant pre-order process and an extended lead time – which in turn allows us to produce at scale (bringing prices down), and gauge demand (reducing waste).

It enables us to grow and continue working without having to seek venture capital. This means we can take on the more innovative products that bigger companies might avoid, without having to worry about revenue targets set by others.

Using Indiegogo allows us to reward our earliest supporters with the lowest prices as a thank you for believing in us. It also lets us connect better with our customers helping us to steer our products in the directions you actually want.

What sets us apart.A quick rant: MONT.BLACK was born from the belief that the products currently available to consumers are unimaginative and poorly engineered. We aimed to change this, producing more reliable innovations by using precision engineering and cutting edge technologies in our design process. Material SelectionWe utilise smart material selection programmes to refine our pole geometry. Once calibrated the system automatically optimises parameters such as wall thickness, pole overlap and material, helping find the perfect balance of light, cheap and strong. This method in particular led us to a new geometry which, when compared to current products, allows us to bring the weight of the pole itself down while still adding strength. Metal 3D PrintingRecent improvements in industrial scale metal 3D printing have meant that small parts that would have previously been too intricate to produce can now be made quickly and easily at low cost. In the ATP-01 we use this for our smaller internal parts. Strength Analysis + TestingIf you pick up your current poles, you'll likely see in small text ""not according to ISO 7331"" meaning they haven't met the international standards set for alpine poles. We weren't willing to settle for that with the ATP-01. Further analysis programmes and real world tests helped simulate the poles use over a lifetime, helping us walk the line between lightweight and robust, while remaining reliable in the long run.             An idea of what to expect.If all goes to plan, we will have finished shipping the ATP-01 out to all levels of backer by the end of December this year, in-time for the majority of the 2021-22 season. The earlier you pledge, the sooner you will get your pole. While we have budgeted extra time within this estimate to allow for unforeseen delays it is still an estimate and not a guarantee. We aim to produce the very best in are field and will not ship products that don't meet our standards.        Come join our 17k instagram followers or help us grow our other socials.  Still unsure or have further questions? We'll be available to chat 12pm-2pm GMT every weekday through Facebook Messenger. A member of the team will be more than happy to discuss the pole at length with you. We won't ever push it on you, we'll simply let you know if we think it's right for you.     As mentioned above, we’ve already received and tested production samples. We are ready to go straight into production as soon as the campaign concludes. As with any manufactured good, there could be delays. We might not accept the quality of goods we receive from our suppliers, containers might get stuck in ports, there may be reduced output due to further COVID outbreaks. We have tried to mitigate these delays where possible and pad our delivery estimate where it is not, but will keep our backers up to date throughout the entire process making sure there are no nasty surprises.",42.0,0,"1 Campaign

-We’re happy to present to you the knife we’re super proud off,

KUNWU ORION!

This is our first model. Not the first we ever made, but the first one we made for ourselves as a new brand.

-INTRODUCING KUNWU ORION

ORION is a product of passion and love for folding knives, made by a couple of knife fanatics that have deep roots in knife making industry and deep understanding of what high quality folding knife should be, how it needs to perform and what boxes it needs to tick in order to be used daily, performing as a perfect EDC tool. Knives are tools after all, but tools with a soul.

We poured all of our knowledge and love for knife making into one knife that we are happy to present to you. We had two things on our minds, stellar Quality and Affordability. Mid-tech knives that involve a lot of hand finishing and human interaction in the process of making do not need to cost as much as a second hand car, regardless of the country of origin.

Our ORION as a firstborn and first one to come out of our shop rides on high expectations but not without reason.

We played on Crucible’s s35vn and titanium that has been machined to perfection in order to give you the superior knife with featherweight feel and sturdy construction that will not let you down in prolonged use, or even, dare I say knife abuse. We build knives that last, we build knives that have the potential to be inherited, passed down or up with pride.

Watch out for KUNWU in future, ORION being our first for a ridiculous price that will blow your mind.

-KUNWU ORION, HIGH END KNIFE, SUPERIOR MATERIALS AND FLAWLESS EXECUTION!

 -About Our Prices: 

SPECS for KUNWU ORION easily make it a 200 USD dollar knife in retail

We are offering it for 99~128 USD with FREE international shipping.

The price alone is worth the risk, especially where there is none involved.

Knives that use similar materials and production technology and process are easily 3xmore expensive, but the process for ORION is even more delicate and complete as we were making it with perfection in mind and execution. Milled out titanium scales, hand sharpened blade and countless hours spent inspecting the first batch we made. For us at KUNWU the ORION knife is a go big or go home type of gambling situation

 

-So what’s our deal, who is KUNWU?

Kunwu Knives came to life in May 2019, when a bunch of people got together and decided that it is the right time to make a knife brand that can fill a gap in folding knives market that has become saturated with lame ideas and repetitive solutions, we were siting and discussing knives, brands and being in the center of knife making industry in Yangjiang China, knowing all the brands that are being produced in our neighborhood, knowing all the ins and outs of the industry, we were wondering, knowing all the processes and all the technology, whether we could make a superior product that costs less. Guess what? Yes, we could, and it made perfect sense for us to start our own story from scratch with some fresh ideas, fresh people internationally. We wanted something “multidimensional”, a knife company with a backbone and risk taking ability that either pays of or sends us back to square one.

-WHY IS KUNWU ORION SO SPECIAL?

1. Insane PRICE to Quality RATIO!

Making a knife special can come out of two things, one is emotion other being the quality.

We have the quality part set, actually it’s pretty much a perfect knife for a first timer.

 

You just can’t go wrong with our heat treatment of s35vn and Titanium we used to make a decent size ultra-high quality folding knife.

Emotional response part of the knife is a tricky bastard to tackle but we did it anyways.

First of all, you don’t want to feel ripped of ad deprived of your hard earned cash.

Second you want to enjoy the knife for what it is.

So the first problematic part we got sorted as well, there is no better knife for the price anywhere in the world.

No Cold Steel, Spyderco ZT or any Sinkevich can come close to the price to quality ratio.

You will not feel ripped off, actually you will be amazed that you managed to spend so little and get so much. You will suspect we use cheap labor and work from shop in godforbidwill in Chinese back-country, but no man, Yangjiang is modern coastal Chinese city with the biggest knife-making industry in the world.

Our competitors are our next door neighbors, and believe me the competition is stiff, raising the bar each day, not year.

Think of cold war arms race. We outclass each other on daily basis so that you guys can live in an era where good knives are being made daily.

2. Real s35vn, Crucible Industries Super Star Super Steel with adequate Heat Treatment!

Having a knife in s35vn is a no biggie these days, having that same steel heat treated the way it supposed to be heat treated is a rare beast. Most of the companies claim that softer or less HRC blades are more user friendly.

We said, screw that and brought up that marvelous powdered steel to super hard levels without affecting lateral strength of the blade. I’d rather have those Rockwells high than having s35vn deflecting its purpose of being a good carbide distributed steel with an amazing edge holding ability. If you’re novice at sharpening stuff, s35vn will not be harder than 440c to sharpen but it will hold and edge forever.

It’s a tough steel that can take a lot of abuse and has zero chance of getting corrosion anywhere. It really matters not if the blade is stamped s35vn if that steel has been mistreated in the process. So no cheap marketing trick of just using the damn thing to attract people, we just made it right for the knife people to use and love.

3.Milled Titanium Body Super Lightweight Framelock.

Lightest Folder on the market!

So we thought to ourselves, how can we make this thing even better.

So what’s better than shedding some weight without losing the structural composition and strength.

Our Inspiration came from Shimano XTR rear derailleur. We have some MTB nutters in the team that are always looking to save some grams on their bikes. XT, XTR SRAM xx1, besides being perfectly functioning pieces of biking equipment all have that trait of obsession with weight.

So we thought OK, we’re gonna do the same and see where that leads us in knife making. Looking around the knife, few obvious choices popped to mind. Let’s put in on low titanium diet and mill out the excess titanium from the scales and add some g10 for good looks. Our knife is the lightest full titanium framelock folder on the market. Period!

 We added the stainless steel insert on the lock itself to prolong the lock life and extend it beyond the time that usually takes regular frame-locks to reach their end of the life.

--Titanium Handle

--Carbon Fiber Pivot Insert

4.Prolonged life of the blade, Edge And Hand Sharpening on Japanese Stones.

Nothing can ruin a perfectly good knife like a burnt edge. In order to skip that unfortunate turn of events, we decided to use Japanese NANIWA sharpening stones all the way up to 2000 grit. We wanted to keep our edge abrasive enough to catch on materials rather than slip of from them. Perfect almost mirror polished edge can be achieved up to 2000 grit, anything above that is users choice but not really good for everyday use as the edge is not as effective in cutting fibrous materials, which as a matter of fact are basically the stuff your most likely to cut during the day. We always have the real life use scenarios in mind when creating our knives. One thing that we wanted to do with our blade shape, being that it is a drop point and that it matches perfectly with our shallow hollow ground angles, we extended the zero line right behind the edge. Angles are kept at neat 17 degrees for edge stability but the edge itself can be sharpened quite a few times before the blade needs re-profiling thanks to real estate kept at same thickness behind the apex of the edge itself. We effectively extended the sharpening life of the blade by making our hollow grind almost concave in relation to the apex of the edge.

-KUNWU ORION SPECIFICATIONS

 

--Package 

 

--Comments from other platform of Orion previous campaign 

 

-Final Words...What sets us apart from gazillions of other brands?

Reinventing the same thing over and over again is a bit tedious but in the end there is only so much that you can do to better the knife. You can’t make it fly and you certainly can not make it out of thin air. What you can do is better the lock, find the perfect alloy,design it to perfection, forge the blade, assemble it and sharpen it to crazy sharp and pour all of your soul and energy in each folding knife and its blade that comes out of the forge. If you’re lucky and smart you can even patent the locking mechanism if you manage to invent one. So a progress in knife making comes down to a handful of variables which you need to perfect each day to make a knife that is both iconic and loved and has that little zing to it.

That’s why a pursuit for a perfect knife is a daily battle with micro percentages of bettering the process. It’s not a 100 meters race, it’s a marathon. KUNWU KNIVES is all about finding perfection in repetition and micro improvements in all processes that need to take their course in forging and giving life to a knife!

ilmoco's trusted portable and foldable bassinet made to ensure those valuable first few years of sleep are perfect for your child, allowing you to have that perfect parenting experience.

Overview:
• Consists of a comfortable mattress, a mosquito net, two toys and backpack

Welcoming a new baby into the family can mean making plenty of room and changing your schedule. In an effort to make sure your baby grows up in the most comfortable and healthy home possible, you would likely find yourself weighing your options even when picking a simple bassinet. 
Deciding between a bassinet and a crib is a lot different than deciding between an outfit on a day out... I know stressful! Babies spends an astounding amount of their time fast asleep, so investing in an instrument that's both durable and comfortable is well worth your while.
• The bassinet is made up of 100% cotton fabric to care for baby's delicate skin
• The 5° gentle slope mattress gently lifts the baby's upper body to protect the baby's spine
• Once set up, 1 minute is all that is needed to create a warm and breathable sleeping space for your baby!

column2: >The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention recommended that new-borns sleep in the same room as the parents, but in a separate sleeping space. A bassinet is a good investment, even if you have a big house. You might consider a bassinet for its portability that way you can move the bassinet around the house to keep your baby close to you during naps and night time sleep.
column5: >The backpack can be used to put away the bassinet when not in use. As the bassinet is portable, it can be taken with you anywhere you go whether it be indoors or outdoors. A maximum of ONLY 2 minutes needed when assembling and dissembling, ensuring it was made easy and quick for parents to use at home and on the go.
column6: >The backpack has great added storage features on the sides for extra diapers, pacifiers and other items you may need. It is easy to pack up with your babies needs for a few days or a short trip to the beach. It has a unique backpack strap, making it easy to toss over your shoulder and be hands free.
column10: >Here at ilmoco, we have a variety of colours for the bassinet. Baby pink for girls, midnight blue for boys and grey if you still can’t make up your mind…
column12:
>We hope you enjoyed reading this campaign as much as we enjoyed writing it! At ilmoco, no project is without trial and error but we try our absolute best to minimise them. With your help and support we can bring the bassinet to parents worldwide and your contributions will make it possible for us to achieve the best satisfaction for parents, keep our production costs low as possible and maintaining a high level of quality overall. If you have any questions or any enquiries please do not hesitate to email us at: ilmococompany@gmail.com

 

","ilmoco's trusted portable and foldable bassinet made to ensure those valuable first few years of sleep are perfect for your child, allowing you to have that perfect parenting experience.Overview:

column1: Consists of a comfortable mattress, a mosquito net, two toys and backpack

Welcoming a new baby into the family can mean making plenty of room and changing your schedule. In an effort to make sure your baby grows up in the most comfortable and healthy home possible, you would likely find yourself weighing your options even when picking a simple bassinet. Deciding between a bassinet and a crib is a lot different than deciding between an outfit on a day out... I know stressful! Babies spends an astounding amount of their time fast asleep, so investing in an instrument that's both durable and comfortable is well worth your while.
The bassinet dimensions are: 13cm x 53cm x 88cm
The bassinet is made up of 100% cotton fabric to care for baby's delicate skin
The 5° gentle slope mattress gently lifts the baby's upper body to protect the baby's spine
Once set up, 1 minute is all that is needed to create a warm and breathable sleeping space for your baby!

The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention recommended that new-borns sleep in the same room as the parents, but in a separate sleeping space. A bassinet is a good investment, even if you have a big house. You might consider a bassinet for its portability that way you can move the bassinet around the house to keep your baby close to you during naps and night time sleep.                                             The backpack can be used to put away the bassinet when not in use. As the bassinet is portable, it can be taken with you anywhere you go whether it be indoors or outdoors. A maximum of ONLY 2 minutes needed when assembling and dissembling, ensuring it was made easy and quick for parents to use at home and on the go.                                             The backpack has great added storage features on the sides for extra diapers, pacifiers and other items you may need. It is easy to pack up with your babies needs for a few days or a short trip to the beach. It has a unique backpack strap, making it easy to toss over your shoulder and be hands free.                                              Here at ilmoco, we have a variety of colours for the bassinet. Baby pink for girls, midnight blue for boys and grey if you still can’t make up your mind…                                    We hope you enjoyed reading this campaign as much as we enjoyed writing it! At ilmoco, no project is without trial and error but we try our absolute best to minimise them. With your help and support we can bring the bassinet to parents worldwide and your contributions will make it possible for us to achieve the best satisfaction for parents, keep our production costs low as possible and maintaining a high level of quality overall. If you have any questions or any enquiries please do not hesitate to email us at: ilmococompany@gmail.com",17.0,0,"2 Campaigns

column2: >We are proud to be donating 10% of all received pledges to the Semper Fi Fund. Their mission is to provide ""immediate financial assistance and lifetime support to post-9/11 wounded, critically ill and injured members of all branches of the U.S. Armed Forces, and their families."" While you help us cover the extensive production and distribution fees, you are also providing needed support to our veterans.

>3 Mode Function. Half press to select through the modes.
Full press to turn on or off.
>Your Monstrum EDC Tool Light comes with a spot lens installed. We will also be provided a replaceable flood lens if you prefer a more spread out beam.

>We put a powerful magnet in the flashlight cap
so it will hold strong where you need it.

column7: >Your EDC Tool Light will function wherever you do.
column11: >Use any 1/4in bit you already own with the Monstrum EDC Tool Light

column1: Your pledge will help with the extensive costs with producing the EDC Tool Light. A portion of your pledge will go to a great cause as well. We are tooled and ready to begin production as soon as this campaign gets funded. Thank you for your support.

Monstrum Tactical has been manufacturing and selling products for 10 years. We have spent a year in development on the EDC Tool Light to mitigate any potential issues prior to our production run. The only issue we can foresee is a slight production delay that could possibly push the delivery date back, but we are confident at reaching our timeframe goals. We have already made over 200 Pre-production models in order to completely test the processes and to make sure you will receive exactly what is offered at the best quality possible

The Reiff Knives F Series

The Reiff Knives F Series is a line of tough, hard use outdoor knives made from premium, CPM 3V® high alloy steel. These knives are designed to handle any task that the wilderness can throw at you. They are available to order in two flagship models, the F4 Bushcraft Knife with a 4"" blade and the F6 Leuku Knife with a 6"" blade. 

Whether you're shaving feather sticks, building a fire or field dressing dinner, these knives will get the job done and ask for more.

 

The Goal

Our goal is to bring custom quality, American-made outdoor knives to market, making them accessible to anyone looking for a more reliable outdoor knife option. 

 

 

What Makes Reiff Knives Special?

 

CPM 3V® Super Steel

The blades are constructed from American-made super steel, CPM 3V® high alloy tool steel. This carbon steel was specially formulated to resist breaking and chipping during hard use. CPM 3V is tougher, more corrosion resistant and more wear resistant than traditional carbon steels like O1, 1095, D2 and A2.  That means your knife is more durable, more stain resistant and stays sharper longer in the field. You'll have these knives for a very long time. That's why they're guaranteed for life.

 

See The F4 In Action
CPM 3V Steel Compared to D2, A2, O1 and 1095

Durability

Drop Point Blade - The drop point blade is strong and versatile. The sturdy, spear shaped point of the drop point blade makes these knives effective for piercing cuts and fine detail work. The shape also gives the blade a nice belly that is great for tasks ranging from fine wood carving to field dressing game.

 

 

Saber Grind - A high saber grind leaves plenty of spine on the knife, making the blade stronger and allowing it to stand up to hard use in the wilderness. We've mindfully balanced the amount of steel behind the edge to give the grind exceptional strength, while remaining thin enough to do what a knife is supposed to do best: slice and cut with ease.

 

 

Full Tang - The blade steel extends all the way to the end of the handle. This makes the knife incredibly tough and prevents the blade from separating from the handle under extreme stress. The tang has been skeletonized to reduce the overall weight of these knives and makes them lighter and more comfortable to carry. 

 

90° Spine - The spine is left as close to 90° as possible. This gives it the ability to effortlessly strike a ferro rod or scrape wood and bark shavings for fire tinder. Since the blade is carbon steel, it can also strike sparks using flint.

 

 

Comfortable

Our full-size handles are designed for extended use and will naturally accommodate a broad range of hand sizes. The ergonomic contouring of the scales mimics the shape of your hand, reducing fatigue and giving you more cutting power. These handles comfortably fill your hand and prevent the knife from slipping, so they're safer to use in situations where an injury could cost you your life.

 

 

Made in USA

These knives are American-made from beginning to end. 

 

 

Quality

We're leveraging experienced American craftsmanship, the most modern manufacturing techniques and domestically sourced, premium materials to build high-quality production knives. We want every product we bring to market to set a new standard for best-in-class design and performance.

 

Versatility

The F series is a versatile series of outdoor survival knives, perfect for a variety of outdoor adventures. The clean design, functional blade shape and high-quality materials make these great all-around tools. They will quickly earn a prominent spot in your regular knife rotation.

 

 

Modular Design

The handle scales are removable, held in place by 3 sets of stainless steel hardware. The screws are black oxide coated and have a T20 torx drive head, so they are less likely to strip under high torque than hex, phillips or flathead screws. This makes the knives easy to clean or customize with different handle scales.

 

 

Our Development Process

We believe the details are everything. We research, design, test and repeat until we get it right. These knives are the product of more than 1-1/2 years of intense research, development and field testing.

 

Material Selection

We meticulously researched and selected the highest quality, most functional materials to build these hard use fixed blade knives. 

CPM 3V® - Well balanced for superior toughness, higher corrosion resistance and higher wear resistance

G10 - One of the most durable handle materials. Comfortable in the hand and easy to clean and maintain. 

Torx Stainless Steel Hardware - Excellent corrosion resistance and durability. Less susceptible to stripping out.

 

Prototyping

With many knives, the comfort of the handle seems to be an afterthought. In developing these knives, we took a different approach. During the design of the F4 and F6, 3D printing was leveraged to rapid prototype over 40 handle variations until the handle was just right. That's more than 160 hours of just 3D printing prototypes. All along the way, expert field testers were involved in providing feedback on the prototypes to maximize comfort and versatility. It took a long time, but it was worth it.

 

Testing

After perfecting the 3D printed models, we built 54 working prototypes, and sent them to product testers all over the world. These knives were tested and validated under hard use conditions in the field prior to launching.  

 

The F4 Bushcraft Knife

 

The F4 is a general-purpose bushcraft style knife. Its 4"" blade has a robust spine to withstand hard use applications, with a refined edge geometry to breeze through any bushcraft task. Constructed from 5/32"" thick CPM®3V high-alloy steel, these knives are exceptionally durable. The spine will strike a ferro rod or scrape cedar bark for tinder. The sturdy full tang is skeletonized to reduce the overall weight of the knife, making the F4 an ideal carry companion in the field or around town. You'll find the ergonomic 5"" handle has no hotspots, providing a seamless interface between your hand and the tool. Whether you're crafting a bow drill or field dressing an elk, the F4 will get the job done right.

 

 

F4 Specs:

Overall Length: 9""

Blade Length: 4""

Cutting Edge: 3.8""

Blade Width: 1.11""

Blade Thickness: 5/32"" or .15625

Blade Material: CPM 3V®

Hardness: 58-60 HRC

Blade Style: Drop Point

Edge Type: Convex

Blade Grind: Saber Grind

Finish: Acid Stonewash

Handle Length: 5""

Handle Width: 1.1""

Handle Thickness: .95""

Handle Material: G10

Weight: 8.2 oz

Knife Type: Fixed Blade

Country of Origin: USA

Best Use: Bushcraft, Hunting, Survival, Camping

 

 

The F6 Leuku Knife

 

The F6 Leuku Knife is our modern take on the classic Scandinavian leuku knife design. The 6"" blade is 3/16"" thick and made from CPM®3V high alloy steel, making it exceptionally durable for hard use applications around camp. This blade has good weight and balance making it ideal for tasks ranging from light chopping to field dressing dinner. At 5.25"" long, the handle provides the user with many comfortable grip options. If you're heading out into the wilderness and only bringing one knife, this would be a great option. The F6 is a worthy jack of all trades.

 

 

F6 Specs:

Overall Length: 11.25""

Blade Length: 6""

Cutting Edge: 5.75""

Blade Width: 1.47""

Blade Thickness: 3/16"" or .1875""

Blade Material: CPM 3V®

Hardness: 58-60 HRC

Blade Style: Drop Point

Edge Type: Convex

Blade Grind: Saber Grind

Finish: Acid Stonewash

Handle Length: 5.25""

Handle Width: 1.16""

Handle Thickness: .95""

Handle Material: G10

Weight: 12.9 oz

Knife Type: Fixed Blade

Country of Origin: USA

Best Use: Bushcraft, Hunting, Survival, Camping

The F6 Leuku Knife in Hand

 

 

Who We Are

Reiff Knives is a family owned and operated, American knife and tool company founded by two brothers, Stu and Ben Shank. We're sourcing high quality materials from American suppliers and building our products in American shops. We know we have a responsibility to the people who buy our tools. We don't make compromises to bolster the bottom line. We build heirloom quality knives and charge a fair price for tools that are guaranteed to last a lifetime.

 

How We Got Here

The Reiff Knives F Series grew from roots that are firmly planted in the outdoors. Adventuring in the West Virginia wilderness from a young age, my brother and I gained a deep appreciation for functional, reliable outdoor tools. That appreciation for good tools soon evolved into a passion for knives.

Frustrated by the limited number of readily available, premium knife options in the market, we got to work designing and building knives that we wanted to own ourselves. This project is about bringing those knives to you.

 

 

Our Philosophy

When you're heading into the woods, your knife is arguably the most important piece of equipment in your kit. It needs to be up for any challenge the wilderness can throw at it.

It only takes one afterthought to render a knife unusable. We've taken the time and put in the work to ensure that our knives don't just look great, but that they work great. We prioritize function in every form to make sure our knives are the most effective tools you'll own.

Our designs are practical. Every feature serves a purpose. We pour ourselves into what is necessary and eliminate what's unnecessary to make your knife as functional as it can be.

We're building uncompromising tools for uncompromising people. That's the Reiff Knives standard.

 

Guaranteed for Life

We stand behind our products. Reiff Knives are heirloom quality tools and should last a lifetime. If your knife is defective or suffers catastrophic failure during use, we will repair or replace it at no cost to you.

This warranty is fully transferable and does not expire. No warranty registrations or receipts are necessary to initiate or validate a warranty claim.

 

Sheath Options

We offer sheath options in black kydex and brown leather. You will be contacted after the campaign to choose a right or left-handed setup.

 

 

Option 1:

Black kydex, taco style sheath, featuring a rotatable belt clip and removable ferro rod loop. Compatible with most aftermarket carry systems. 

 

 

Option 2:

Brown leather, taco style sheath, featuring a dangler and ferro rod loop.

 

Risks &
column2:
Challenges

There can be unforeseen risks and challenges with any project. However, we've worked tirelessly over the past year and a half to reduce those risks and challenges wherever possible. Here are the risks as we see them: 

1. We've chosen to partner with and experienced American knife producer to build our knives. Our partner has been operating and building quality knives for their own brand and other knife companies for more than ten years and have been producing knives for far longer than that at other well known knife manufacturers. We chose to partner with this manufacturer because their quality has proven to be second to none.

2. We are sourcing our materials from American suppliers and manufacturers. Having a domestic supply chain significantly reduces the risk of a supply chain breakdown. Our knife steels are made by Crucible Industries in New York. Crucible industries has been on the cutting edge of knife steel development and distribution for many years. Most of you probably already own at least one knife made from Crucible Industries steel.  Even our G10 and hardware are sourced from established American manufacturers and suppliers. 

3. We feel that we've given ourselves plenty of time to fulfill your orders as predicted. 

4. We have prototyped and thoroughly tested these knives in the field. We know our manufacturing process works and provides consistent, high-quality results. You'll know what to expect every time you invest in a product from Reiff Knives.

 

Timeline

 

Order Materials - August 2021

Begin Production - September 2021

Fulfillment - December 2021- January 2022

My name is Kirk Kirchev - a product designer from London.  If you google my name you’d find I used to design/invent  some radical tree tents and now - kayaks. I’m so excited to share this with you!
As an avid (but mediocre) kayaker I always felt that kayaks are unstable and frustratingly slow. So I set out to solve this problem. for me, but also - for all of us
Fast, Stable, Portable - all in one package!
• With a successful Kickstarter campaign now I’m in the process of developing the first batch of Super Kayaks this month. Follow my progress on Facebook Instagram, or even better - www.superkayak.com
• Early backers will be able to get a kayak, paddle and pump - to ship in June - just in time for Summer!
• Get the base model now and we will have exciting add ons that you can purchase later - outboard motor mount (yes it works really well), sail mount, gear rack etc etc
Let’s explore this beautiful Water planet together.
Please, share to your kayaker/outdoorsy friends. They will appreciate it. I certainly do!!!

Adventure is out there!

 

Super Kayak specs and features:

FEATURES:
Fast  and efficient - slim streamlined floats shape - for a fast, effortless glide  

Super stable  - increased Stability also means - increased Safety  

Packs in a handy bag. Including the pump and paddles. 
Simple - 4 minute inflate/assembly. Rechargeable pump included 

Comfortable - stable elevated seating positionfor,  more natural posture and feeling of control. No more sitting in bilge water.   

Easy boarding through the middle. Super useful for snorkeling trips!

Add ons - optional rigs: boarding step, mast/sail, motor/engine, solar drive, etc... Coming soon 

Modular  - easy to replace, repair, and upgrade each component    

  

SPECS:

Dimensions: L - 12ft /3.60m, W - 3ft / 94cm, H - 2.5ft /75cm

Size in the bag: L - 28”/65cm, W - 20”/50cm, H - 12”/30cm

Weight - 30lbs / 15kg   Max load capacity - 220lbs/100kg

Floats - inflatable, double skin for increased abrasion resistance  

Max air pressure - 12psi/0.8bar. Top up by mouth.

Frame  - coated/anodized aluminum alloy 

Cruising speed - 5-6kmh/3-4mph,  Max speed - 11kmh/7mph

Accessories included - Paddle, Bag, Pump

As a travel and photography enthusiast, we have spent over 2 years to explore, research and create the optimal backpack combo—Treso backpack system. They can be used not only for photography, traveling and outdoor activities, but also ideal for business travel.
Charge your phone wirelessly on the go with our  10,000 mAh solar power bank.

The efficient solar charging system is also indispensable for outdoor travel ,you will never have to worry when you power bank or phone is running out of batteries ,as you can charge them anytime anywhere.

There’re 2 USB charging ports, 2A high spend and 1A standard speed so you can charge 2 devices at one time.It has low-power charging mode for wearable devices such as smart watches, Bluetooth earphones, fitness bands and much more, so it’s great feature for the people who loves the outdoors and have a lot of wearable devices to charge.

With high quality hardware components’ and advanced safety system, our solar power bank would keep you and your devices safe, there’s overcharge and over discharge protection, short circuit, overpower, over-voltage and over-current protection.

The back of power bank is power light which made up of 217 pieces LED lights and there are 4 different styles of cycling indicator light which include left-hand turn,right-hand turn,speed reduction and 3 styles camping lamp,strong, soft and SOS.
Well used for camping, reading, call for help and of course cycling at night ,it improves visible, reduces accidents and saves lives.

The Bluetooth GPS Tracker and missing item reminder will help to prevent the loss of your precious items. Once your precious items leave a certain distance, Tréso mobile app will issue an warning alarm to remind you.
Track your bag wherever you are, regardless of the distance between you. The GPS tracker allows you always to know the exact location of your backpack.
Tréso backpack with its Anti-Theft chain design which you can attach your bag to a chair or table, never worry about pick pocket incidents again when knowing your belongings are safe and secure.
With its 2 adjustable carry straps and a ball net on the front to guarantee your gear will stay in place, no matter where or how far you go.
Every detail of bag was modified more than 3 times to make sure every detail is thoughtful.
With the automatically extended key ring, makes it a lot easier to find the keys. You’ll no longer have to worry about losing your keys.

The details of the side pockets are also very thoughtful. Pockets are shaped with elastic band so as to prevent the contents, for example like SD cards or batteries from falling out when you open the pockets.
The most interesting thing about the suit bag is that, it is transformable which can be converted to be a Gym bag. This allow you to switch between different scenes.
With its space saving design, whether you’re jet-setting abroad, or driving to a weekend getaway, the stress of not having enough space is no longer going to bother you.
We’ve created a compression bag that keeps clothes compact, organized, and folded.
It would also save space with two compartments to keep your clean and dirty clothes separated.
With its space saving design, whether you’re jet-setting abroad, or driving to a weekend getaway, the stress of not having enough space is no longer going to bother you.
The camera bag is paired with the Tréso backpack, so that you can easily access the camera from the front, back or side.

The details of the side pockets are also very thoughtful. Pockets are shaped with elastic band so as to prevent the contents, for example like SD cards or batteries from falling out when you open the pockets.

Hi, guys.I’m Yolanda,  I’v been spending 2 years to create 7 awesome travel bags.When I was a college student, I started selling some small items on Ebay to earn some pocket money. Since then my 7 years business career has began. With more and more sellers joined Ebay, I felt fierce competition and realized that I didn’t want to sell those stuff anymore. I want to build my own brand.

As a travel and photography enthusiast,I'm travel a lot and I believe safety is of the utmost importance when traveling aboard, whether for backpackers or their belongings.So I decide to create a wonderful backpack which will protect both myself and my belongings.

I like to ride in different countries and travel outdoor,so I created an unique LED solar power bank with safe indicator light which include left-hand turn,right-hand turn,speed reduction and 3 styles camping lamp,strong, soft and SOS,with the power bank I would never worry about dead battery and stay safety at night. To protect my stuff I designed a anti-theft chain and GPS tracker and used the most innovative anti-cutting material.
I like the wireless cellphone charging pocket on shoulder strap very much because it super convenient ,not only free my hands but also never worry about the phone be stolen.

At first, I thought I just need to design a bag by drawing a picture by using Photoshop on my computer. Then just simply find a factory pay them some money and they could have produced the exact same bag I designed. However, after the tenth factory’s master told me that they could not do what I wanted. I was finally aware that making the wonderful backpack is actually not that easy! The bags I designed are too advanced and complicated. There was no big factory willing to spend such a long time to make samples without any  real production order. And other small factories were unable to make perfect samples.

So I started to make the bags by myself. I bought four different sewing machines and started making the bags in my bedroom. It was the first time I sewed bags which i had never done before and there was no teacher. My only belief is that “nothing impossible” &
column2: “I can do it!”!! Then miracle happened (emm... at least , my Mum thought it’s a miracle because she couldn’t believe her ignorant daughter had made all those complicated bag all by herself ).

column1: After 3 months and hundreds of attempts, I succeeded. I did lots of research about different materials and finally picked the world best anti-cutting material. I tried more than 20 times to rebuild them and make sure they are good enough to make a beautiful backpack. Every detail of the bag had been modified more than 3 times to make sure every detail is thoughtful. Oh! I even made over 10 different straps to make sure they’re comfortable, good-looking and able to charging wirelessly , oh my...
And after all the bags were completed, then I spent another 2 months to look for a reliable OEM factory, make sure they can product high quality bags and lot production.

I named my brand Tréso, it comes from the french word Trésor which means treasure. To me, the bags are not only a production but they are like my own real baby! I hope they can grow to become your and even everyone’s wonderful travel partner.We promise we will deliver on time to every supporter.

PRODUCT WARRANTY 
We stand behind all of our products and our OEM factory that collectively has over 30 years of manufacturing experience,where a crew of expert technicians can repair your favorite Tréso product.

SHIPPING POLICY 
Within 24 hours of your order being shipped you will receive a tracking link with your shipping details. When you receive your tracking #, please keep an eye out for the package. We use a shared post shipping method to have your order delivered at an affordable price. 
Your order will be handled by USPS, DHL,YODEL,YAMATO,AUPOST,Canada Post,EXELOT,POSTNL,dpd/CDEK/Russian Post,UTEC up to entry of your country. Once your order enters your country your order will be handed off to your local post office for final delivery. International transit will have a 7-21 Business day delivery time(Ukraine need 3-45 business days, Israel need 18-30 business days).

Your pledge does not include VAT, GST, or other country taxes.All order will ship directly from our distributions centers in HongKong. Each package will come with a tracking number and we will be happy to help solve any problems that arise during the shipping processes. 

There are always challenges and unforeseen obstacles that arise when trying to bring a product to life. There are so many moving parts that must be managed. However, we will work hard to ensure that we deliver what we promise and to go the extra mile whenever it is possible. Thanks for believing in us!

","As a travel and photography enthusiast, we have spent over 2 years to explore, research and create the optimal backpack combo—Treso backpack system. They can be used not only for photography, traveling and outdoor activities, but also ideal for business travel.
Charge your phone wirelessly on the go with our  10,000 mAh solar power bank.

The efficient solar charging system is also indispensable for outdoor travel ,you will never have to worry when you power bank or phone is running out of batteries ,as you can charge them anytime anywhere.

There’re 2 USB charging ports, 2A high spend and 1A standard speed so you can charge 2 devices at one time.It has low-power charging mode for wearable devices such as smart watches, Bluetooth earphones, fitness bands and much more, so it’s great feature for the people who loves the outdoors and have a lot of wearable devices to charge.

With high quality hardware components’ and advanced safety system, our solar power bank would keep you and your devices safe, there’s overcharge and over discharge protection, short circuit, overpower, over-voltage and over-current protection.

The back of power bank is power light which made up of 217 pieces LED lights and there are 4 different styles of cycling indicator light which include left-hand turn,right-hand turn,speed reduction and 3 styles camping lamp,strong, soft and SOS.
Well used for camping, reading, call for help and of course cycling at night ,it improves visible, reduces accidents and saves lives.

The Bluetooth GPS Tracker and missing item reminder will help to prevent the loss of your precious items. Once your precious items leave a certain distance, Tréso mobile app will issue an warning alarm to remind you.
Track your bag wherever you are, regardless of the distance between you. The GPS tracker allows you always to know the exact location of your backpack.
Tréso backpack with its Anti-Theft chain design which you can attach your bag to a chair or table, never worry about pick pocket incidents again when knowing your belongings are safe and secure.
With its 2 adjustable carry straps and a ball net on the front to guarantee your gear will stay in place, no matter where or how far you go.
Every detail of bag was modified more than 3 times to make sure every detail is thoughtful.
With the automatically extended key ring, makes it a lot easier to find the keys. You’ll no longer have to worry about losing your keys.

The details of the side pockets are also very thoughtful. Pockets are shaped with elastic band so as to prevent the contents, for example like SD cards or batteries from falling out when you open the pockets.
The most interesting thing about the suit bag is that, it is transformable which can be converted to be a Gym bag. This allow you to switch between different scenes.
With its space saving design, whether you’re jet-setting abroad, or driving to a weekend getaway, the stress of not having enough space is no longer going to bother you.
We’ve created a compression bag that keeps clothes compact, organized, and folded.
It would also save space with two compartments to keep your clean and dirty clothes separated.
With its space saving design, whether you’re jet-setting abroad, or driving to a weekend getaway, the stress of not having enough space is no longer going to bother you.
The camera bag is paired with the Tréso backpack, so that you can easily access the camera from the front, back or side.

The details of the side pockets are also very thoughtful. Pockets are shaped with elastic band so as to prevent the contents, for example like SD cards or batteries from falling out when you open the pockets.

column7: >Every year, travellers book their tour packages for the dream vacation but they ended up paying more than necessary. For any tour packages they booked, they could have purchased similar tour packages from another tour agency at a cheaper price. Such price inefficiencies happen
column13: >because it's very time consuming for travellers to search and compare the prices from every single tour agency website.

column1: Imagine a single comparison website whereby travellers can search for their ideal destination, the number of days and instantly, they can see the all the prices from the tour agencies. They can then easily compare each deal for them to make a better choice.
This is what we have in mind - to create an effective comparison website that aims to address the inefficiencies in price discovery in the travel industry.
We have done our research and engaged some web designers to provide some ball-park estimates for developing the entire website.  The estimates range from USD 100,000 to 250,000.

column4:
>We feel that we should pay at least 50% of the development costs using our own money (This is to walk our talk).  Hence, we need to raise funding for the remaining 50%, which is around USD 50,000.

The Rewards

For backers who contributed $10 (or more), upon successful campaign with the target goal reached, one of the backers would be randomly picked to win the Applet Watch (Sports Edition).

column1: If you can't contribute with money, no sweat!  There are still a few great ways you can really help us make this project a reality:
• Get the word out!  Use the Indiegogo share tools and tell your friends and family about the project.
• Give us feedback.  We LOVE feedback because we constantly strive to improve for our amazing users.  So tell us what you think of the campaign, the perks, or anything!

Every year, travellers book their tour packages for the dream vacation but they ended up paying more than necessary. For any tour packages they booked, they could have purchased similar tour packages from another tour agency at a cheaper price. Such price inefficiencies happen because it's very time consuming for travellers to search and compare the prices from every single tour agency website.

Imagine a single comparison website whereby travellers can search for their ideal destination, the number of days and instantly, they can see the all the prices from the tour agencies. They can then easily compare each deal for them to make a better choice.
This is what we have in mind - to create an effective comparison website that aims to address the inefficiencies in price discovery in the travel industry.
We have done our research and engaged some web designers to provide some ball-park estimates for developing the entire website.  The estimates range from USD 100,000 to 250,000.

We feel that we should pay at least 50% of the development costs using our own money (This is to walk our talk).  Hence, we need to raise funding for the remaining 50%, which is around USD 50,000.   The Rewards For backers who contributed $10 (or more), upon successful campaign with the target goal reached, one of the backers would be randomly picked to win the Applet Watch (Sports Edition).
Other Ways You Can Help Us
If you can't contribute with money, no sweat!  There are still a few great ways you can really help us make this project a reality:
Get the word out!  Use the Indiegogo share tools and tell your friends and family about the project.
Give us feedback.  We LOVE feedback because we constantly strive to improve for our amazing users.  So tell us what you think of the campaign, the perks, or anything!
Thank you for your support!",2.0,0,"1 Campaign

column1:
0,"

The Problem

95% of the US region does not have coastal access. This creates geographical and financial barriers for millions of people from experiencing and participating in surfing. People just like you get inspired to try surfing by the mass media push of surfing into pop culture, and that's where it ends. Or if you're like us, we were fortunate enough to have lived near the coast in our youth and as young adults, and then found ourselves living in locations far from the coast and cut off from the thing we love most.....Surfing!

Fortunately, there are new technologies that are leveling the playing field and creating opportunities for those that have been left out of the game.

 

The Solution

A little over 10 years ago, SwellSpot Founder Walter Bennett invented a superior way to make artificial waves and artificial reefs for surfing. Walter was looking for a surfing technology that could make the perfect surf system, and has since received 9 patents in his pursuit of that dream.  In the beginning of 2019, Walter met Brian Severance, who lives in Dallas | Fort Worth, TX,  and shares the same vision and dream -- to bring waves to those that don't have access to the ocean no matter where you live, and Viola! SurfSpot was born. 

 

What we do

SurfSpot creates a one of kind surfing and beach experience for the entire family. SurfSpot will have surf pools to match all skill levels from beginner, to intermediate, and advanced.  We will also have a surf pool just for kids 10 and under.  

New to surfing and not sure what to do or where to start? Our facilities are designed to provide a safe, comfortable and inviting introduction to Surfing.  Our trained coaches will guide you through each session and create a culture that celebrates the thrills and spills that will undoubtedly be a part of progressing in your sessions.

Whether you're surfing or just having a fun day at the beach you can enjoy surf inspired food from our gourmet food trucks, meet up with friends for beach volleyball, sand soccer, and other fun activities, or simply just relax and enjoy the vibe.

Specialty events and contests will give you the opportunity to meet and greet with some of surfing's top athletes and personalities, and at night you can catch a concert or other fun gatherings.

At the end of the day we want to bring great surfing waves to everyone in the world, no matter where you live. We want you to leave with sand on your feet and feel like you just had the best day of your life at your new favorite ""SurfSpot"".

 

How we do it
Patented plunger technology and reef designs create perfect surfing waves.

Although SurfSpot is not the first to get to market with artificial wave technology, we feel this gives us a unique position in this pioneering industry.  We have the hindsight to learn what does not work, and the foresight to be innovators and disruptors in this rapidly expanding market.
Key factors that separate us from our competition:
• High wave frequency of 900 swells and 3600 breaking waves per hour.
• High throughput capacity allows us to have the lowest user cost.
• Lowest cost to build in the industry.

Invented wave technology at Swellspot Wave Company. Holds 7 US Patents with 2 more US patents pending. Founder of Swellspot Surf Lakes. Lifelong surfer driven to create the most perfect wave outside of the ocean!

Co-Founder of SurfSpot Surf Facilities. Founder of Lakeside Paddle, Fort Worth, Texas. 25+ years experience in construction | operations | marketing. Avid surfer in the relentless pursuit to bring this project to market!!

This is your opportunity to help us create a place where everyone, from everywhere, can enjoy the thrill and excitement of the surfing lifestyle, or simply have a one of a kind experience with friends and family. Together, we can make this happen!
Click the pink ""Back It"" button and type in your contribution amount or select your perk, and most importantly SHARE, SHARE, SHARE this with everyone you know and we'll see you at SurfSpot soon!
Can't make a contribution? No Worries! Get a dose of good Karma and use Indiegogo's social share buttons to share this with your community!

column2: >
column4:
>Surfboard Luggage Bag 

 

The Surfboard Luggage Bag is a revolutionary surfboard bag specifically designed for airline travel to address the problem of boards being damaged during baggage handling operations.

Global Boardriderz began after what was going to be an amazing surf trip to Kangaroo Island off the coast of South Australia, the third and final flight of the day was a short 35 minute trip from Adelaide to Kingscote which resulted in a cleanly snapped surfboard. The broken surfboard was a three month old Mark Richards Lone Ranger which was also the only board our founder Dean Gossip took on the trip, luckily it was covered by his travel insurance but that didn’t help when he was stuck on the shore watching others surf while he was without a surfboard during a surf trip in a remote location where he couldn't buy or rent a new one. 

It was the first time he had a board break on a flight but while speaking to many surfing friends they said it was normal and even expected sometimes with comments such as ""that's why I always take two seperate board bags in case ones broken"", ""gotta have the best insurance"" or ""I stopped flying with boards for that reason"". The design of the Surfboard Luggage Bag will help prevent damage and breakage of surfboards during travel. 

The Surfboard Luggage Bag contains three separate compartments. A compartment that can accommodate two surfboards is enclosed by two other compartments designed to accommodate clothes and other gear such as wetsuits and towels. These other two compartments provide cushioning to the board compartment in addition to the protective features of the Surfboard Luggage Bag. 

The board compartment in foam lined on all sides with 6mm high density foam, there’s also an additional layer of foam between the two boards. A hard polyurethane film also provides further protection to the boards creating a hybrid solution between a soft and hard case for maximum protection. 

The top compartment contains storage cells for surf accessories including one cell that’s waterproof for the short term storage of damp wetsuits and towels when necessary.

A supplementary feature of the Surfboard Luggage Bags design allows for just one bag to be taken on a surf trip with our bag being able to accommodate boards, wetsuits, towels, accessories and clothes in one bag eliminating the need for multiple bags and reducing costs on airlines that charge extra for multiple bags, a common occurrence especially in North America. 

The internal compression straps keep the boards firmly and securely in place while the external compression straps keep all the other gear such as clothes, towels and wetsuits in the correct position to provide additional protection for the boards.  

We’ve designed the bag to accommodate boards of various shapes and sizes in the one bag, our prototype bag will fit boards up to 6’7” x 23”. Upon successful funding we will contact and survey backers to determine what sized bags will get manufactured. 

Don't forget to like and share us on your socials and tell your friends to make this product a success.

column1: So a couple of years ago I was on holiday with my family and when I came out of the pool, I burnt myself on the matt on the sun lounger because my pool towel was not big enough to cover the whole surface of the sun lounger. So Initially I thought wouldn't it be great to have a towel that covered the whole sun lounger so I could not worry about my legs or arms burning on the sun lounger.

Then I noticed a towel with pockets which I though would be a cool addition to the towel because it makes the towel convenient to use and gives you a place for your sun cream or other essential pool side items.

The final obstacle I had was what can make this towel differentiate from its competitors. so after research on the material I found something which would make this towel compact, quick drying and absorbent.
Introducing the Paradise One Microfibre Sun Lounger Towel.....

By contributing you will help me get my product from idea to being commercialised. The money will go towards the initial manufacturing costs of the towels and helping me develop a website for the company which will create a platform for myself to sell the towels and build the brand.

If you contribute to this campaign you can either get one or two Paradise One towels. they come with a top pocket which goes over the head of the sun bed so it does not fly away in the wind. There is also pockets for your pool side essentials. The towel is sized to cover the full sun bed so you do not burn yourself on the lounger. Finally it is made from a microfibre fabric that is compact absorbent and drys quick.
Each towel comes with a stylish bag which makes it easy to take the towel with you wherever you go.
If you get in there early we have on offer an early bird discount of 25%.
Also we have the duo package for you and a special someone!!
Please note that the final product will differ from the prototype seen in the photos. The rope will be a soft cotton as seen in the photos below.
We promise to not use any form of plastic in the packaging of the product. We plan to only use recyclable paper to help reduce to worlds impact on plastic pollution.
The risks we face is the initial start up costs, we need the money to move the manufacturing process forward.

There is also the matter of the timing of dispatch. I have tried to be generous with when we think we will dispatch. I would like to try and move this time forward however we will endeavour to meet these estimates.
Please share our story on all forms of social media and follow us on Facebook Paradise One Towel.

So a couple of years ago I was on holiday with my family and when I came out of the pool, I burnt myself on the matt on the sun lounger because my pool towel was not big enough to cover the whole surface of the sun lounger. So Initially I thought wouldn't it be great to have a towel that covered the whole sun lounger so I could not worry about my legs or arms burning on the sun lounger.

Then I noticed a towel with pockets which I though would be a cool addition to the towel because it makes the towel convenient to use and gives you a place for your sun cream or other essential pool side items.

The final obstacle I had was what can make this towel differentiate from its competitors. so after research on the material I found something which would make this towel compact, quick drying and absorbent.
Introducing the Paradise One Microfibre Sun Lounger Towel.....

By contributing you will help me get my product from idea to being commercialised. The money will go towards the initial manufacturing costs of the towels and helping me develop a website for the company which will create a platform for myself to sell the towels and build the brand.

If you contribute to this campaign you can either get one or two Paradise One towels. they come with a top pocket which goes over the head of the sun bed so it does not fly away in the wind. There is also pockets for your pool side essentials. The towel is sized to cover the full sun bed so you do not burn yourself on the lounger. Finally it is made from a microfibre fabric that is compact absorbent and drys quick.
Each towel comes with a stylish bag which makes it easy to take the towel with you wherever you go.
If you get in there early we have on offer an early bird discount of 25%.
Also we have the duo package for you and a special someone!!
Please note that the final product will differ from the prototype seen in the photos. The rope will be a soft cotton as seen in the photos below.

When I travel, I always look for what is unique about a new place, and how that relates to universal themes. What do people for fun in Portugal? What games are common in Thailand? How do people create happiness? What does 'romance' mean in Slovakia? What about India, Japan, Germany and Argentina?

Wanderlust Box is my research project. As I step into new cultures and learn about differences, I will send gifts and their stories back to you. With Wanderlust box, you're not going to receive the typical souvenirs that might come to mind when you think of a foreign country. You're going to discover the hidden story. 

 

Each box is going to differ monthly depending on the location it is sent from and what is going on in that location at that time. Although the contents are for now a mystery (that's part of the fun, right?), I guarantee that you find the contents worth the price or you can have 110% of your money back ($43) for that month.

There will be two themes: 

For this box, you have to trust my (weird, I know) tastes that I will choose the best gifts from around the world. Expect a variety of themes, ranging from tastes, games, crafts, and other items of cultural significance. Every box will contain one “big” item, and then a plethora of sweets, spices, teas and smaller samples. This is the perfect way for you to sample cultures of different cities around the globe and satisfy your own wanderlust. 

 

Have you every wondered what 'romance' means in Kenya? Or what it means to be 'sexy' in Korea? Or how to express your 'love' in Germany? As I travel with my boyfriend, we will research what romance means in every place, and share gifts with you. Enjoy sweets, art, scents and massage oils, and so much more. Way more exciting than a chocolate of the month club or wine of the month club, this is the perfect anniversary or birthday gift for your loved one.

 

 

My goal is to make the world smaller and your place in the world larger. By sharing cultures with each other, we are able to love and appreciate more.  I will do the best authentically share what I find with you, but of course keep in mind that you will be experiencing gifts through the lens of a traveler, not a local. Authenticity, love, and play are values that each box will fully embody from purchase to delivery. Not only will you be experiencing new cultures, but you will also be supporting local craftsmen, artists, and entrepreneurs from all over the world with your purchase.  

 

My major costs now are the contents in the box and shipping (included in the price). The boxes are expensive because I want to send you good stuff. These boxes are going to travel halfway around the world to end up at your door, and I want to make sure that it was worth the trip. There is a 110% guarantee to ensure that if you don't love your box, you will receive more than your money back. 

 If I reach my goal on Indiegogo, I will be able to send the first batch of boxes within the next few months. I will personally choose the items for each box as I travel, and ship the box to you. 

The best way to ensure that you will be able to receive Wanderlust Boxes is to sign up now. As an early adopter, your feedback will be crucial in directing the future of Wanderlust Box and ensuring that you are able to experience the world through the subscription service. Please sign up for one of the perks, or donate any amount to the campaign to show your support. If you know anyone who would love Wanderlust Box, share our campaign with them!

Taruca Outdoor was created by two women entrepreneurs, fashion marketer Jessica Zapatero, and film director Heather Angel Chandler. This campaign is very important to us because we're solving a problem for women who have been frustrated finding fashionable apparel in the safari, hunting, ranching and concealed carry markets. We propose a new, modern line that is fashionable and reflects the trends in athletic and athleisurewear women desire today.  Our luxury textile designers created 2 custom camo patterns inspired by a hunting ranch in South Texas, Trinity Ranch. Our patterns GRID Camo and GEO Camo are trendy and versatile, camouflaging you in the world's most popular hunting destinations. Our performance fabrics offer moisture wicking, antimicrobial benefits with superior UPF 50+UV sun protection built directly into the fibers of the fabric.

Our co-founders are two women with a vision of making women look great and feel great outdoors. Their history in fashion and film provides a great foundation for making Taruca Outdoor the next top athletic brand:
• Jessica Zapatero is a fashion marketer that has over 20 years experience in building, launching and marketing fashion brands with a focus on luxury and lifestyle brands.
• Heather Angel Chandler is an award-winning film director that has over 15 years experience telling brand stories that create emotional connections with the consumer.
• Our goal is to raise $36,000 to produce the Jeep Ride Collection in our two custom camouflage patterns.
• Our funding is going into the costs of our custom technical fabric production and manufacturing.
• Our unique perks include buying our product at a significant discount than what will be released to the public.
• If we don't meet our goal, funds will be returned to our backers.
Our funding is going into the costs of our custom technical fabric production and cut and sew manufacturing.
• Our campaign helps us meet the minimum required by our textile manufacturers to produce our custom camouflage patterns and technical fabrics.
• By meeting the goal of this campaign, we can apply another scent control finish that will help women minimize human scent outdoors giving them a chance to be in nature undetected.
• Our funding is also subsidizing the cost of product manufacturing.
<li>We have launched a denim line in California and created award-winning films
column2: a great combination for brands that want to connect with their customers through a visual experience.

column1: • Our experience in branding, marketing, fashion design makes us attuned to what our customer wants and needs.
• Some of the potential risks we can experience are delays in shipping or product manufacturing.
• We have a redundancy plan in place with various domestic vendors that can fulfill orders if our factory partners cannot manufacture our products due to a natural disaster.
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:
• Please help spread the word about Taruca Outdoor on social media.
• If you know of a Safari Lodge or any Influencer that might be interested in our products, please notify us via email:  hello@tarucaoutdoor.com
• Please use Indiegogo share tools to tell your friends about Taruca Outdoor!

What We Need & What You Get

My name is David Slinker. I'm happily married, father of two, and former US Army Infantryman. I am passionate about firearm safety and training.
I developed SoundStrike to help improve safety, and accuracy for any shooter. It is a Laser Target system and allows you to use your own firearms for practice.
SoundStrike gives you a free and safe range with which to practice your marksmanship almost anywhere. Practice safe, and accurate marksmanship anytime, anywhere, without spending cash on ammunition.
SoundStrike behaves like a real target at the range. The steel target plate recoils to a bulls-eye with visible force, sound and lights.
Nothing is more rewarding than seeing and hearing every bulls-eye!
We initially developed SoundStrike as a personal project for ourselves. After seeing the overwhelming response from friends and family, we knew we had something special to share with the world.

We need your help to raise the funds necessary for ordering the parts, creating the tooling, and paying for the labor required for the first manufacturing run of SoundStrike Laser Targets. We look forward to making them available to our backers, and online.

Any project could encounter unexpected obstacles, and this possibility is even more likely in the case of a hardware technology project that requires manufacturing. Keeping this in mind, we have already started to tackle some of these obstacles early on in order to minimize any delays.

1. One potential problem is the lead time before various parts of SoundStrike arrive. Lead time is the time between placement of an order and delivery of the product. In the case of SoundStrike, there are 15 unique parts with lead teams of up to 8 weeks.

2. A second potential problem is legal road blocks. We have already spent thousands to make sure we do not infringe on any existing patents. There is always the potential that a patent that is not currently public, could be published between the time we start this campaign, and the time of delivery. We are prepared for this and will alter SoundStrike to prevent infringement, release it in kit form, or refund any remaining contributions as a last resort.
We want everyone interested in this product to get it. We will do whatever it takes to put this in the hands of those who need it.
Please share this project with those who may be interested. Visit our Facebook page and our website. Thank you!

Imagine yourself camping. You are in the forest enjoying the day. The sun is gently touching your cheek, while the birds are singing the Bohemian Rhapsody for you and your friends. In a moment you will taste the most delicious meal. You are about to smell the tender grilled meat combining its aroma with the smoked grilled vegetables. How hungry you are! Starving to feed your body on the wholesome dishes and your soul on the fascinating time with your friends next to the fire.

But the fire won’t start. The bottle with charcoal lighter fluid has opened in the truck and showered the tomatoes with the chemical substance. The wood sawdust gone wet with the rain. And you are rushing around searching for some paper sheets or newspapers to make the fire eventually. We’ve all been there.

That’s why we came up with the idea of Burnchips, which will be your helpful assistant to start the fire.

How to Use Burnchips

Anytime, anywhere, a fire is needed, Burnchips help you. The pads provide safe, quick and clean way to start a fire. Even if your wood is wet the issue will be easily solved as the chips burn at 1000 C0 approximately. Having no wood is neither a problem as the magic red assistant can start charcoal. The light time is up to 5-10 min. It can help you while travelling, backpacking, hiking, camping, fishing, hunting, surviving, climbing, skiing snowmobiling and the list goes on. It’s so light so that you’ll never notice carrying it.

The Burnchips package can be poured with any type of liquid, as the chips are absolutely waterproof. To start a fire, you simply need to place a chip on the wood and light it with a match or a lighter. It will start the fire easily and quickly, while you’ll be having some joyful time with your friends.
column3:
showinfo=0"">

Our Goal

Our aim is to introduce an easy, safe and eco-friendly way of making a fire to the world.

We are currently raising the necessary amount to start the mass production to spread our idea of safe fire-starters.

We are going to produce 10 000 units and donate 10% to the National Guard of Ukraine. Efficient firestarters are especially useful for the soldiers in wintertime.

 

OUR STORY
When our team was inspired with an idea to develop this product, firestarter seemed to be a complicated and unrealistic undertaking. The milestone of the idea resulted in nearly 1000 units of different shape, weight and design. Finally it turned out that the very first prototype was the most convenient and efficient. We started fire in the fireplace, went camping, had lots of BBQs, giving our product a try. Being outdoors we always tried to present a chip to the people who were going to start a fire. The people seemed enthusiastic to try a new firestarter. The best thank for us was a question: “Where can I buy it?” 
“Where can I buy it?” – the inspirational push for the hard work we’ve done. 
And now we are ready to introduce our Burnchips to you. The idea of hundred stories and emotions, as it gives you something more than fire.

Other ways you can help

You can help us with no contribution.

column1: • Please, spread the word about our campaign. Share! Like! Comment!
• Use hashtag #burnchips when you can so we can see all your support.

Timeline

DIMENSIONS -

Shipping

All products are shipped from Hong Kong.

Shipping will take approximately 3 days to Hong Kong, Taiwan, Japan, Singapore and Korea, 14 days to Europe, 20 days to the US and up to 30 days everywhere else. 

We will use local postal services with tracking for all orders.

Shipping only covers transportation charges and does not include import taxes / duties. These are the responsibility of the end customer. If these costs are requested by your country's customs and are not paid and your items is returned/destroyed, We will not issue a replacement product.

Please make sure to double check the email address recorded in your Indiegogo account. You can do this by going to Indiegogo >
column4:
My Settings. We send all communication to this email address, so if your regular email address differs to your Indiegogo address, please let us know.

Please double-check the shipping information  you input at the time of purchase as we use this address to send your product to you. You can find the address you used on the receipt from Indiegogo at the time of purchase. Please note that any discrepancies between the address you provided and your actual address may mean you cannot receive your products.

About Kore Design 

Founded by Horace, Koo &
column5:
Leslie Ko in 2017, the Kore team is a group of designers and product developers based in Hong Kong, who try to see the world from a slightly different angle, and aim to create products which are simple, elegant and highly functional for everyday use. 

Risks and challenges

Campaigns like this help us raise the funds we need to keep growing and investing in our equipment, our people, and our products. By supporting our campaign, you'll also be among the first to get your hands on our newest bag, and for a price we may never offer again!
