column1: The SafeT+ is an innovative new product that offers all around peace of mind, whether traveling or at home. It features:

1. The CO detector. Most hotels, condos, apartments, and other residences have a smoke detector. However, very few have a CO detector. By now you have probably heard the report of the family that died in their sleep on vacation due to CO poisoning. What you probably do not know is that this is not a rare occurrence. In the US alone, 20,000 people are treated each year for CO poisoning. An early alert CO detector is essential to prevent sickness and even death.

2. The LED lantern. If you have ever been in a hotel during a power outage, you know how dark the rooms can get. And, if you have ever gone to a hotel bathroom in a blackout, which is almost always interior with no windows, you know the meaning of complete and utter darkness. This is why it is vital to have a light with you at all times.

3. The Security camera. With all the new options for vacation accommodations available today, it is more important than ever to be vigilant about security. Vacation swaps, rentals by owner, and AirBNB are great alternatives to traditional hotels and resorts, but the same security measures are not used in these places. Keys are passed from person to person. On site security is not present in most situations. Owners are not vetted. For these reasons, a security camera is a must to ensure that no one is in your vacation rental while you are not.
Together, these features provide security and peace of mind, both while you are at and away from your vacation accommodations.

Dorms and student housing. On campus or off, student housing should be kept to a high standard. Sadly this is not always the case. Poor maintenance and old appliances and fixtures can be very dangerous. When your child sets off for college, CO poisoning should not be on the list of things you need to worry about.

Garage. Did you know that a running car can cause CO levels to rise above 100 ppm in minutes, even with the garage door open? Or that CO passes through drywall and can seep into the house from the garage even if your door is tightly sealed? And, now with the ECO feature available in many cars, it is very easy to unknowingly leave a car running in a closed garage.

Car. Not only is it always a good idea to have a light in your car for emergencies, running the engine of a car stuck in the snow or mud to keep warm can cause CO to build up quickly in the cabin. This has happened too many times. This is another reason SafeT+ is small enough to fit in a cup holder.

Your home during a power outage. No matter where you live, at some point you can lose power due to snow, hurricane, tornado or just an unexpected issue. During a power outage, there are many dangers for CO poisoning.  A generator placed too close to the house or in a garage can easily fill a home with CO. Heavy snow can block a chimney and stop the CO being vented out of it. A propane/kerozene stove used inside can be a CO hazard as well as a fire hazard.
Never leave the engine running in a vehicle parked in an enclosed or partially enclosed space or garage.

Never run any gas powered engine (generator, power washer, blower, compressor) inside a garage, basement or any other enclosed building, even if the windows and doors are open. Gas powered engines must be vented correctly.

Never run gas powered equipment including vehicles and generators near buildings where they can vent exhaust gases into open windows and doors. Recommended placement of a generator is 20 feet from an enclosed area.
Never use an oil lantern, charcoal grill or propane/kerozene stove inside a tent, home or camper.
Always use common sense before using any type of fossil fuel/wood in or near a structure.

Security cameras have been commonplace in homes, businesses, hotel and resort hallways. So much so, that criminals have learned to look for and avoid them. However, due to privacy laws, hotels and vacation rentals do not have security cameras inside living quarters. Therefor, criminals do not look for them in these spaces. This makes bringing your own camera a great way to ensure your belongings are safe when you are out. SafeT+ motion activated safety camera offers:
HD video allows for capturing a high quality short video when needed.
A push signal sent to your phone within a second when camera is armed and motion is detected.
Low battery notifications. Recharge with fast charging micro USB.
Portable means we made it shockproof. The casing is made from a plastic compound for those everyday accidental drops.
Camera and light battery comes with a micro USB charging port.
The CO display is always displayed so there are no worries about whether or not it is working.

Early CO warning alert after 30 minutes if 30 ppm are detected. This low level detection lets you know if there is a CO problem before reaching dangerous CO levels. When CO detector is activated, the LED light in the lantern will flash and a loud 85 dB alarm will sound.
","The SafeT+ is an innovative new product that offers all around peace of mind, whether traveling or at home. It features:
Why is SafeT+ essential for traveling?

1. The CO detector. Most hotels, condos, apartments, and other residences have a smoke detector. However, very few have a CO detector. By now you have probably heard the report of the family that died in their sleep on vacation due to CO poisoning. What you probably do not know is that this is not a rare occurrence. In the US alone, 20,000 people are treated each year for CO poisoning. An early alert CO detector is essential to prevent sickness and even death.

2. The LED lantern. If you have ever been in a hotel during a power outage, you know how dark the rooms can get. And, if you have ever gone to a hotel bathroom in a blackout, which is almost always interior with no windows, you know the meaning of complete and utter darkness. This is why it is vital to have a light with you at all times.

3. The Security camera. With all the new options for vacation accommodations available today, it is more important than ever to be vigilant about security. Vacation swaps, rentals by owner, and AirBNB are great alternatives to traditional hotels and resorts, but the same security measures are not used in these places. Keys are passed from person to person. On site security is not present in most situations. Owners are not vetted. For these reasons, a security camera is a must to ensure that no one is in your vacation rental while you are not.
Together, these features provide security and peace of mind, both while you are at and away from your vacation accommodations.

We are Bare Toes. Sleeping bags made with your feet in mind.

Have you ever been camping with one of those pesky, traditional sleeping bags? How annoying is it having your feet confined to a sweaty oven over night? Here at Bare Toes, we couldn't take it any more, so we created a better one.
Our bags are designed with a magnetic flap at the feet. This gives you the ability to kick your feet out for cool air and retract them back in for additional warmth.
We are human beings, not mermaids... so stop sleeping like one!
Our effort to make Bare Toes happen will need YOUR help. We need to raise $25,000 to achieve our marketing goals, product testing, and of course manufacturing the first 500 Bare Toes bags.

With great support comes great perks. We are commited to decking our loyal fans out in the best swag known to man. Choose from three tiers of donation and we will ensure that you are well taken care of.

1. Bare Toes Sticker. We want you to tell the world that your feet don't sweat when you sleep. How do you do that you ask? We have stickers. Really cool stickers for that matter. Stickers you're going to want to put everywhere. On your computer, on your RAZOR flip phone, even on your 1973 Volkswagen Thing. Bottom line is, you'll want one.

2. You want to take your Bare Toes love to the next level? We want to let you wear our brand and take it to the world! Climbing the Himmaleyas? Wear our shirt. Climbing out of bed? Wear our shirt. Climbing a ladder to unclog your gutters? Wear a different shirt, that sounds nasty.

3. Welcome to the Bare Toes original backers (or BTOB's). You will be able to own your very own Bare Toes bag from our original run of bags! Take it with you wherever you go and have a reminder that you belong to the most sacred group since the founding fathers.

Since the beginning of time (actually about 1876) people have used sleeping bags. And bless their hearts the things are just not comfortable. Our research suggests that more than 60% of people kick their hot feet out of the covers when they sleep, and doing that in a sleeping bag is near impossible without unzipping the entire thing.
Your donation is helping you. You and your sweaty hoofs need a break from the mundane sleeping bag. Let yourself... help yourself.
Your donation is for the millions of children and adults around the world who have had to keep their feet in a sweaty oven over night. Not donating keeps them in that cycle... nobody wants that.
Your donation is helping the dream of a young entreprenuer come true. It is helping a small business serve a big audience... and that is pretty cool.
Temperature Rating: Will be conducted upon completion of campaign. We reccomend using the Bare Toes bag as a 3-season item.

Over the last three years as we have developed this product, we have found that challenges come. Nothing ever goes exactly how you plan for it to. That is why we at Bare Toes clearly define risks and challenges in the forefront of our work. Here are a few we anticipate in the coming year.

1. Financial Challenge - Our minimum order quantity with our current manufacturer is 500 units. That is a large order to fill for a small startup company. The finances from this campaign will fullfill the first order. After making your bag, shipping, filing for a second patent and marketing, the leftover from the sale of those first 500 orders will cover roughly 80% of a second order. This will of course require more $$$.

2. Marketing Challenge - This challenge is summed up by two words... CUSTOMER LOYALTY. We know we have an awesome product. We have tested it, tweaked it and repeated. Now we need our customers to get behind us and spread the word. Ever heard someone say ""it takes a village"" well, we need you and your village to spread the word via social media and tell people how much you love our product!

3. Continued Growth - Our future is unknown. Heck, a Fortune 500 CEO's future is unknown. What we DO know is this, we have an awesome product that solves a pesky problem and we want to give it to the world. Part of that growth will be expanding our product line to fit all size humans (even little niños), continuing to make our bags better, and continuing to put a smile on the face of your feet.

Hey, maybe you can't afford to help us financially right now. We have all been the broke college kid, the person saving up to live in Europe for a year, or maybe you just have bills to pay. That's alright! You can still help! We need you to follow us on Facebook, like and share our posts, and pass this crowd funding campaign link to your friends!

Our design really began as a class project. The winner of the project took home $250 cash and our CEO, Devin Dishner was a broke college kid that needed groceries. He employed his mom Susan to design and sew the very first Bare Toes bag. ​
Bare Toes was created by Devin Dishner of Fayetteville Arkansas. Devin began working on the business side of Bare Toes in 2016 during his time at the University of Central Arkansas.

Along the way, Devin has relied on his UCA professor Bill Doshier for teaching him the in's and out's of starting a business, his mother Susan Hannan for sewing the first two prototypes for Bare Toes, and his mentor Cliff Cabaness for patent funding and early encouragement.
Bare Toes looks to expand in the near future with accounting, supply chain, and fullfillment team members.

column6:
> 

The Fisher House Foundation helps military families by building homes where they can stay while their loved ones undergo medical treatment and rehabilitation. We donate 5% of our sales to help this worthy cause by helping those that sacrifice so much for our country.

 

I was born and raised in North Carolina and my wife in Napa Valley. We have always shared a love of the southwest and the outdoors. It was our dream to move to Flagstaff and we overcame a lot of obstacles to make it happen. We are blessed with a good life and enjoy what we do. We hope that our products will make your life more enjoyable. Thanks again for your support.

column2:
>  

A revolutionary bottle accessory that upgrades your Yeti, Hydro Flask, or Nalgene into an ultra-convenient hydration system. The aqueduct delivers maximum hydration convenience while keeping your drinks cold super long in your Yeti or Hydro Flask! Less time stopping to deal with the hassle of bottles &
column3:
backpacks = more time doing what you love most ❤️ 

Problem: hydration bladders suck

They leak in your backpack and are easy to puncture, get moldy, and can't keep your water cold for long.  Insulated bottles are awesome for keeping drinks cold and are more sanitary, but don't offer enough convenience for active adventurers.

Solution: the aqueduct

It's pretty slick.  The patent-pending system features a 2-in-1 lid, which allows two unique setup options.  It combines the best of your favorite bottle's insulation with the convenience of a tube  and bite valve.  The best part?  It's easy to clean.  That means the same setup can be easily cleaned so you can switch from sipping ice cold water to Gatorade to margaritas?without thinking twice.
column6:
>

The aqueduct is designed for adventurers, by adventurers, and is perfect for on-the-go, long lasting cold hydration when convenience matters above all else: hiking, cycling, skiing, paddle boarding, rock climbing, or even parents juggling their kiddos (the struggle is real to get two free hands!).  To get started with your aqueduct, simply swap your factory lid for the aqueduct and choose your setup.
column8:
>

The hydration tube passes through the lid with a 36"" tube on top of the lid, a premium locking bite valve and cap, all paired with a unique one-way valve nestled in the lid that allows air to enter the bottle as you drink (but liquid can't leak back out).
column10:
>

Need a plain ole' bottle again after you're done? aqueduct has your back
column11: the tube can be removed, revealing a convenient drinking access point which is sealed with the attached cap.
column12:
>

For added flexibility, the tube and bite valve are fully compatible with other aqueduct lids.  So if you're a fan of Yeti, Hydro Flask, and Nalgene at the same time, you'll only need one tube setup.  However, you'll still need to purchase a discounted lid for each unique bottle since one lid size doesn't fit all bottles.
column13:
>

The aqueduct can be easily cleaned in just a few minutes, including the bite valve assembly.  Just grab a hose brush, soapy water, and you'll be done in a snap.
column14:
>

 The aqueduct has been a labor of love over the last two years.  We've gone from sketches, to 3D designs, to messy 3D prints, to creating 3D prints from resin shown below!  Next step, FDA approved food safe BPA/BPS free injection molds ? 

We're now set to sail!  We've been in negotiations with manufacturing partners for many months prior to even launching crowdfunding.  We're hitting the ground running!
column15:
>

For the abundance of clarity, the aqueduct is the lid and tube hydration system only. The aqueduct is designed as an accessory to your previously purchased bottle with the exception of perks that include a bottle explicitly, such as the aqueduct Pro Series.  aqueduct is in no way associated with Hydro Flask, Yeti, Nalgene, or any other bottle brand. Patent Pending.

my dearest friend Nicole, whom some of you already know, is getting married with Julian on the next 2nd of April in MIAMI BEACH! It will be a super lovely and dreamy day by the beach at the Palms Hotel and Spa to celebrate the love of two of my favorites, I can't miss it!!! It's also the perfect opportunity for me to discover Florida for the first time ever, that's why I'm planning to stay there for one week. But for this I need your help! In order to finance the trip I need around 1000 euros: the flight ticket from Berlin costs approximately 500 euros and the extra 500 euros (if we get to it) will help to pay a hotel room/ air bnb for the week. Your help is precious and even a small donation will make me happy and take me closer to the goal! As a reward/ thank you gift and stay in the Miami mood you'll get a handmade funky THONG for a donation of 25 euros, a complete handmade BIKINI for 50 euros and for 100 euros you'll get a bikini PLUS the BEACH BAG that goes along! (in case of donations of 200 euros or more  I'll think about a special handmade gift specially made for you with love :D).
AAAAAND as I will be in Miami for my birthday you can also think about your donation as a kind of BIRTHDAY PRESENT...after all turning 44 is also a bit special!!!
Thank you in advance for your help!

Traveling is a Great Joy, we all love the excitement and the experience we have during traveling One of the common problem during traveling is the luggage size , We all face the same problem with luggage size , When we need to have more space, it always concerns us even when we buy gifts or other stuff and we wonder do I have enough space for that!

 

It's a new solution for a common problem faced by millions of travelers. We designed it for all travelers to be small enough to fit   in an airplane and can also be expanded for more space and used as a check in luggage.

GoExpand gives you the option to have more space whenever you needed it.

 

Simply if you are traveling and you are buying luggage, GoExpand is your best choice , as it can be your normal carry on  and also can be expanded  to bigger size .Therefore your gain is to save money and time when traveling  , getting more space when needed and not to worry about having  luggage when you want to. 

 

All other luggage is just a box on wheels they can expand only a few centimeters / inches , their luggage design has not evolved, the main weakness being the restricted luggage design and space.

Go Expand is the simplest smart design for expandable luggage

When you buy a luggage, there are three main element buyers think off

Space: how much can you fit into that luggage?

Price: how much it will cost?

Looks: Is it great looking, do I like that style?

With GoExpand you are having it all, it has space that can expand up to 35% + with great price rang without compromising of quality. A carry on with great design and great look.

 

Our luggage expanding design is a patented utility design provides a unique design that addresses the luggage space , It extends  up 35% plus more than other luggage giving you 35 % plus space.

This gives you better advantage than other carry on, and makes it extra convenient with more space to use.

We have applied for the patent using the compacted design unique mechanism.

 

We designed GoExpand from the strongest standard materials

We have tested it with ABC- PC, polycarbonate and foam both work good with us but we will be clearer once the manufacturing process for final production is done”

GoExpand Guided profile

GoExpand has  a guided profile that give it advantage when luggage is been expanded it keep it aligned / strong and easy to expand  make sure that the best expand experience can be achieved .

 

With a single button, you can easily expand the luggage into the size you want as shown in the below images and as shown in our video. 

 

MAIN BODY

The Main body of GoExpand consists of 4 shells making it the only luggage in the world having such unique patented design.

We have tested it by using both polycarbonate and ABC-PC and using foam materials. All of these can be used, once we can launch the project we can decide the best materials to be used.

 

Custom Components

 Being our patented and innovated luggage GoExpand needed to have special components, like handler, shells, zipper, sledding parts, internal custom holders ...

 

Expanding modes 

GoExpand has four  expanding modes, each mode has been design to make it easy for you to use and utilize the carry on to the best of your need making it easy to use it.

 

ZIPPER and  TSA lock , Rubber 

 

GoExpand will be compatible with international TSA lock.

GoExpand will have rubber on other side making it tough and strong.

 

Front Pocket 

With a front pocket, it easy access for your iPad, laptop and other stuff.

 

Rubber Hinge 

On the other side, we have added very industrial strong rubber to hold it all together.

 

Interior Design with Organizer 

Using a unique internal design, we have made an internal pocket with strap that make it expandable and also it can hold the internal luggage. One of the innovative steps we took was to make the organizer patch which is pocket that can easy expand to match the right size while still having item inside it.

 

 

Size and expanding advantage .

As seen in image below the size expanding mechanism “is in final phase of product design and a prototype we can give accurate size” 

 

Project Time line 

GoExpand project has come a long way, now the only three steps remaining 

1-Get finance to develop the final GoExpand carry -on.

2- Launch production and quality check.

3-Delivery to our Backers and get feedback.

 

 

Production Plan 

Prototype and design challenges  

We had worked  hard and spent very long time on developing the best design, seeking to make it simple and beautiful while keeping the maximum space , We work on stages of prototypes and we were happy with our first and how it work well but we decided to take to next step .

Designing and developing  GoExpand cost us much more than we expected  and making the best carry on worth it ,.

as shown below images we have even improved our latest design to final design shown here .

 

The below images are of the initial idea concept verification and testing to see if it applicable idea and it was successful testing .

GoExpand has been designed in Netherlands and Hong Kong by two great design teams, Studio Mango is a leading design company in Europe and the prototype is being worked with another team in Hong Kong, we are working on the 3D modelling in USA and prototyping with USA 3D printing services provider.

 

Our Team 

FAQ

1-Why we need your support?

We are normal people with normal job and income .We cannot afford to take this project to the final prototype and production on our own  We were able to finance this to 3D modelling stage  and  develop  a sample and see that it is visible , we need Your help to make it .

2-Is this a real project?

YES this project has been validated and sample tested , the only next step is finalizing product and manufacturing.

3-What is your impact?

When you decide  to contribute to our project you  will make a change in the world of luggage you  will make this project come to life and be part of the  GoExpand project and provide any suggestions during the  manufacturing process until the product is   available  for everyone  ,therefore you contribution will make change in the world of luggage .

4-What are the Risks &
column2:
Challenges?

We have done a lot of work up a head and we made massive effort to make the design simple and particle. The risk to this project is in not having enough funds to make it come to life everything has already been worked out.

5-How can I help GoExpand ?

Be part of the GoExpand project by funding us .If you cannot  contribute by  funding us please you can help by sharing our project to your friends  and family. .

6-Why are we doing this?

We have always travelled and we always had this issue of luggage size so we decided to make a difference and give people the solution, the key to this project is that you can have normal luggage and you can make size more when you needed it. It is that simple.

Introducing a high-quality instant wet wipe designed for sport. Whether you are hiking or running for a marathon, keep cool and keep going with our ultra compact, super light and supersized body wipe.
>スポーツ用の高品質なインスタントワイプ 。 ハイキングと、マラソンと 、コンパクトスポーツボディワイプの実行続けることができます。

>
Feel instant relief and protect yourself from overheating, especially during the summer. Cape Cool’s moisture content brings your body temperature down – making you feel refreshingly cooler so you can stay active longer.

>Unlike other wet wipe brands in the market with unsatisfyingly small individual sheets, Cape Cool comes in the size of an ordinary hand towel (700mm x 320mm). All you need is a single sheet to minimise wastage and maximise that fresh-and-clean feeling.

>

Cape Cool’s compact, individual packaging design is what makes it a wipe above the rest. Measuring 60mm x 180 mm and weighing only less than 50g per packet, it is perfect for minimalist packing – especially when every weight counts in sport.

>Made from hydroentangled non-woven materials, each sheet of Cape Cool comes with a dot matrix surface that cleans and traps dirt better than other wipes. Firm to the touch yet gentle on your skin, it is alcohol-free and contains 99% water. It is 100% recyclable and biodegradable to make sure that is environmental-friendly.

>

Because all the products are made in Japan, we were inspired by Japanese culture -  balance and simplicity. The Sport Body Wipe is the perfect balance between convenient, dampness and body coverage.
>
column6: >Hi, I’m Munhoe, founder and Creative Director of the company. Personally, I love all kinds of indoor and outdoor sports because they keep me calm and focused, especially in the creative field. I want to produce something at a high standard and something I will love to use as a sportsperson too.
column8: >We are looking for adventurous individuals to help us try our product and spread the word. If you have more than 5K followers on Instagram, you can get a trial pack (1 Sport Body Wipe X and 1 Sport Body Wipe +) for FREE! Simply drop us an email with your name and Instagram link today.
column9: >Request for a trial pack for free.
column15:
>

Cape Cool stands for consistency of pursuing goals – regardless of countless failures or obstacles. Anyone can do anything as long as they keep at it. There are no age, gender or cultural limits that should stop you from where you want to go or who you want to be. Give up excuses, but don’t give up doing, running or going and you will reach your goals.

column23: >Thank you for your support. Feel free to email us directly at infocapecool@gmail.com  or leave us a message if you have any other questions.

column1: • We are proud to have our fulfillment plan certified by Floship, a leading crowdfunding fulfillment provider.
• We have calculated the optimal means of shipping Cape Cool Sport Body Wipes to all markets in a fast and cost effective manner.
• For proof of certification into the fulfillment plan please click here.

FAQ

What is a fixed goal?
We are running on a fixed funding goal - which means if we don't meet the goal, your contribution will be fully refunded back to you by Indiegogo.

Do you deliver outside USA?
Yes, we offer free shipping Worldwide – powered by Floship

When should I expect the delivery?
Your manufacturing partner are ready to go, as soon as the campaign has reached its goal, we will start the production and we expect to deliver the first batch of Sport Body Wipes in early November 2017.

Is the packaging waterproof?
Yes our Sport Body Wipe is designed for use in rough environments, so it doesn't affect the quality if the external packaging is soiled.

Can I get a refund?
Please refer to IndieGoGo's policy here.
https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles...

This product is great, how can I refer my friends so that I know they have contributed through my link?
Refer to this page here.
https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles...

","Introducing a high-quality instant wet wipe designed for sport. Whether you are hiking or running for a marathon, keep cool and keep going with our ultra compact, super light and supersized body wipe.
スポーツ用の高品質なインスタントワイプ 。 ハイキングと、マラソンと 、コンパクトスポーツボディワイプの実行続けることができます。

Feel instant relief and protect yourself from overheating, especially during the summer. Cape Cool’s moisture content brings your body temperature down – making you feel refreshingly cooler so you can stay active longer.

Unlike other wet wipe brands in the market with unsatisfyingly small individual sheets, Cape Cool comes in the size of an ordinary hand towel (700mm x 320mm). All you need is a single sheet to minimise wastage and maximise that fresh-and-clean feeling.

Cape Cool’s compact, individual packaging design is what makes it a wipe above the rest. Measuring 60mm x 180 mm and weighing only less than 50g per packet, it is perfect for minimalist packing – especially when every weight counts in sport.

Made from hydroentangled non-woven materials, each sheet of Cape Cool comes with a dot matrix surface that cleans and traps dirt better than other wipes. Firm to the touch yet gentle on your skin, it is alcohol-free and contains 99% water. It is 100% recyclable and biodegradable to make sure that is environmental-friendly.
Because all the products are made in Japan, we were inspired by Japanese culture -  balance and simplicity. The Sport Body Wipe is the perfect balance between convenient, dampness and body coverage.

Hi, I’m Munhoe, founder and Creative Director of the company. Personally, I love all kinds of indoor and outdoor sports because they keep me calm and focused, especially in the creative field. I want to produce something at a high standard and something I will love to use as a sportsperson too.  We are looking for adventurous individuals to help us try our product and spread the word. If you have more than 5K followers on Instagram, you can get a trial pack (1 Sport Body Wipe X and 1 Sport Body Wipe +) for FREE! Simply drop us an email with your name and Instagram link today.Request for a trial pack for free.    Cape Cool stands for consistency of pursuing goals – regardless of countless failures or obstacles. Anyone can do anything as long as they keep at it. There are no age, gender or cultural limits that should stop you from where you want to go or who you want to be. Give up excuses, but don’t give up doing, running or going and you will reach your goals.    Thank you for your support. Feel free to email us directly at infocapecool@gmail.com  or leave us a message if you have any other questions._____________

We have calculated the optimal means of shipping Cape Cool Sport Body Wipes to all markets in a fast and cost effective manner.
For proof of certification into the fulfillment plan please click here.

column3: >Leather cover ,brass grip and handmade wood   pencil make  your travel earth friendly.  Let's go meet Nature .

>Make your travel stay with you for the rest of your life
Pine is seemingly an ordinary notebook with a leather cover and a bundle of papers. Look inside and you’ll see its surprising content! This notebook is intended not only for the trip itself, but also to store the souvenirs the trips have brought you!

column2: >The notebook has been designed entirely by us. The cover is made of high quality leather. There’s a transparent foil sewn in. Together with the cover they make a zipped pocket. A bras handle with a metal pendent is attached to the cover. Over a year of hard work with PINE resulted in designing a notebook dedicated to true travellers!

>

The A5 notebook's cover is made out of a single piece of leather with the PINE logo on the front and your name embossed on the back. You can carry it like any other A5 book, but the flexibility of the leather means that you can also fold it in half and put it in your pocket, jacket or backpack.

column1: On the inside you will find a transparent film pocket with a zipper, sewn into the leather cover.
Regardless of the weather, you can safely store your tickets, photographs, souvenirs and even a smartphone (you don't even have to take it out, the plastic allows you to use the touchscreen).
The brass spine enable bundles of PINE paper to be inserted and replaced when necessary (each set can be screwed into the notebook through the brass spine).

Only the highest quality paper is used - the first seven pages are functional (i.e. travel plans, transport, accommodation and check lists) and the remaining 38 pages are left blank with travel motifs in the background.
Every set of paper comes in a white cardboard box where you can store all your memories once you've finished each journey. A handy tag allows you to easily label and organise your journeys.
To complete the PINE experience you will receive a hand-crafted pencil that perfectly accompanies your notebook (either attached to the brass spine or stored in the pocket).

column13: />
column15:
/>



           




","Introducing Pine

column1: Leather cover ,brass grip and handmade wood   pencil make  your travel earth friendly.  Let's go meet Nature .

Make your travel stay with you for the rest of your lifePine is seemingly an ordinary notebook with a leather cover and a bundle of papers. Look inside and you’ll see its surprising content! This notebook is intended not only for the trip itself, but also to store the souvenirs the trips have brought you!

The notebook has been designed entirely by us. The cover is made of high quality leather. There’s a transparent foil sewn in. Together with the cover they make a zipped pocket. A bras handle with a metal pendent is attached to the cover. Over a year of hard work with PINE resulted in designing a notebook dedicated to true travellers!

The A5 notebook's cover is made out of a single piece of leather with the PINE logo on the front and your name embossed on the back. You can carry it like any other A5 book, but the flexibility of the leather means that you can also fold it in half and put it in your pocket, jacket or backpack.
On the inside you will find a transparent film pocket with a zipper, sewn into the leather cover.
Regardless of the weather, you can safely store your tickets, photographs, souvenirs and even a smartphone (you don't even have to take it out, the plastic allows you to use the touchscreen).
The brass spine enable bundles of PINE paper to be inserted and replaced when necessary (each set can be screwed into the notebook through the brass spine).

Only the highest quality paper is used - the first seven pages are functional (i.e. travel plans, transport, accommodation and check lists) and the remaining 38 pages are left blank with travel motifs in the background.
Every set of paper comes in a white cardboard box where you can store all your memories once you've finished each journey. A handy tag allows you to easily label and organise your journeys.
To complete the PINE experience you will receive a hand-crafted pencil that perfectly accompanies your notebook (either attached to the brass spine or stored in the pocket).",27.0,0,"1 Campaign

0,"

Instantly upgrade your booking class with AeroTable. Although you travel in economy class, you could experience the premium comfort of business class with this table. Innovative and easy to carry, this flight extension table improves and upgrades your flying experiences around the world. You instantly get a 40% larger area to store your drinks, snacks, and even mount your tablet.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Please note that the front seat must be on the original position(should not be reclined) during the meal time according to the flight regulations. Also, please be aware that the AeroTable is flexible to attach to any available location, not only to the most front side.

 

 

 

During the meal time, you cannot even take out all the utensils or beverages in economy class table. Say hello to AeroTable which makes your table a lot wider. With AeroTable, everything could be well arranged.

 

Adjoining AeroTable to in-flight table is mighty easy. Simply insert AeroTable tongs into both sides of in-flight table and insert AeroTable after unfolding it. Then, it’s DONE!!

 

Yes!! AeroTable is portable. As shown in GIF image, AeroTable is designed in folding type. Elevate the portability by folding in half when you store or carry AeroTable. It probably can be carried by storing in your small bag.

 

Yes!! AeroTable is applicable to all the in-flight tables. Since the tongs which combine AeroTable with the in-flight table can correspond more than 1.2 inches(31mm) thick, they are unaffected by the thickness of the in-flight table. Also, due to combination of AeroTable and tongs as fixed at both edges of the in-flight table, AeroTable is unaffected by the width of the in-flight table.

 

AeroTable is completely lighter than iPad Air 2. Moreover, since it is designed in half folding type, it is compact. You will not feel pressure with the size or the weight when you carry AeroTable. Are you planning travel? Put AeroTable in your backpack without any pressure and enjoy a pleasant flight.

 

Yes!! AeroTable withstands heavy weight. As shown in the picture, AeroTable readily endure the weight of six cans of coke. Trust the sturdiness of AeroTable and there would be no problem with enduring weight when you put the in-flight meal.

 

Do you worry about tongs to be slipped when combining with in-flight table? No concern about it. Silicone pad is attached to the cross section of tongs where it meets in-flight table. As you can check GIF image, although a can of beer stands vertically, it readily withstands the weight. Moreover, it didn't slip though being tapped by a hand. AeroTable has strong resistance force which is enough for you to use on the flight.

 

AeroTable could be used as an iPad cradle. AeroTable makes you feel comfortable to enjoy watching movies you prepared in advance or writing documents. You can also hang the brimmed hat, the headphones, and the earphones by using the tong of AeroTable. You can also get more space when AeroTable is retro-binded while you are working on laptop.

 

 

 

We offer special options for Indiegogo backers. Store and carry AeroTable by using a sling bag. Other passengers will be surprised when you take out the world’s first flight carry-on table from the adorable sling bag. You could be in the enviable position with the option we offer.

Do you have your own bag? Put your AeroTable in a hard case pouch not to be damaged, and store it in your own bag. You can carry AeroTable very safely. Also, the hard case pouch can be used in various ways while traveling thanks to its hardness and large enough size.

Sunny Acorn

When I was a little kid, I was always curious about the world around me. I wanted to know why the fireflies gave out such beautiful light, why a bird could fly in the sky while I couldn't, and how an ant could carry things bigger than itself. So much to explore, wonder and learn!

At Sunny Acorn, we design toys to satisfy kids' curiosity about how the world works.

     Only 0.28 oz, lighter than a grape!

The Eagle Drone is super nimble: It can skillfully avoid obstacles, keep a fixed height or elegantly land on your hands with the push of a button. Stable performance with 6 axis gyroscope. Easy to control. On button altitude hold for easy flying.
column3:
showinfo=0"">
 
Gravity sensing control based transmitter allows easy, intuitive movement (forward, backward, left and right).

The controller fits easily in your pocket. Control Eagle anywhere, anytime. Even without anyone else knowing!

You can charge your Eagle Drone anytime and anywhere with your phone, ipad, computer or included charger. 

Pledge now and help us bring this amazing drone to life!

Thank you to BackerPoints for supporting our campaign, they are awesome!

Our Story

We met during our industrial design studies and dreamt of this idea together.
It took us 2.5 years to explore and develop our dream of BOTZ into reality.
We've developed the smallest outdoor kit for making coffee, tea or soup.

Our designing moto is LESS IS MORE and with that concept, we went all in.
Coffee is one of our loves and a big part of our culture. We travel with BOTZ, taking it to the beach, using it during our breaks... any time anywhere!

Because the product is super friendly, we chose to fund the production of BOTZ Kit with your support on Indiegogo. It seems right for our product.

We have a lot of experience in R&
column2:
D OUTDOOR products. But this product is the best we have created so far. After a long time of development, we are very excited to breed the BOTZ Kit.

With your support, the BOTZ Kit will be born into the world. We want to be able to deliver the smallest outdoor kit in the world so you can take it with you anywhere. Join Us!

Katerro is an app only, last minute, on the spot booking platform for hotels, homestays and private stays. The app also provides travel assistance to travelers vital information like ATMs, Banks, Tourist Spots, Restaurants and travel. We have launched in the Hills of Darjeeling and Sikkim.  We are seeking your contribution to scale our product across India, typically to start from the North East. What We Need &
Break it down for folks in more detail:
• We are seeking funding in order to scale into the Indian Subcontinent starting with the travel destinations across NorthEast India.
• We will use your money to increase our foot print across India and hire story writers and bloggers to improve our content on the app.

• We want to go across places and connect them with travelers that haven't been discovered or have poor visibility. Help us in reaching our goal and improving lives of many small town hotel/home stay owners.
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help us.
Here are a few ways which you can help us :
• Provide us information about this cool place you went to. Information in the form of blogs, photos, tips etc.
• Help us in sharing this campaign to as many people as possible.
• Share our FB Page / You Tube Video : https://www.facebook.com/katerrotheapp  OR https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gT6Cp3EmXFE

And that's all there is to it.

As a keen fan of IRONMAN, you probably have tons of action figures and statues placed at home. But there's no fantastic IRONMAN EDC to show off! We made this unique handwork only for collector! So what are you waiting for?
• Ironman head figure painted by protective paint, it's durable if you don't hang with keys or tough stuff that cause wear and tear.
• Eagle eye LEDs are embedded in Ironman's eyes, ten times brighter than regular. Push the button behind the head will light the Ironman's eye(White) and the war scar(red and twinkling).
• it takes at least 12 hours to carve war scar, paint gorgeous color, weld inner printed circuit board, adjust to the finest light. ALL of these are MANUAL.

Material : ABS (Non-metal)
Scale: 1:4 (Length 4.5cm Width 3.5cm Height 3.0cm)

Caution: Due to the safety factor of international transportation, butoon cell(CR2032) is NOT inculded

THANK YOU FOR YOUR GREAT SUPPORT while we were seeking to raise some extra funds after getting funded 679% on Kickstarter.
Unfortunately, due to the timing mistake, we could not focus on both pre-launch stage and the IndieGoGo campaign itself while fulfilling our commitment to our 422 previous backers. (we shipped all :)
Now it is time to build our online store at www.kitmana.com

Intended for those on the go, the Kitmana Convertible Wallet fits snuggly in your back pocket and also comes with a detachable lanyard for convenient conversion into a neck pouch for concealed storage.
PROUDLY INTRODUCING KITMANA CONVERTIBLE WALLET, created with both the adventurous and the stylish in mind.

Kitmana is the first step in your long lasting travel experience. We are dedicated to you, and because we are dedicated to you, we have created a travel wallet that is durable and innovative, a high-quality piece of merchandise that you can take with you wherever you go.

You want adventure in your life. To spend time in nature, to discover our world, to see wildlife for yourself: these are the things your dreams are made of. Kitmana’s Convertible Travel Wallet represents freedom.
This wallet rises above your expectations, filling your needs in a way that other wallets simply do not. If you are someone who like to stay active, then this convertible wallet is for you.
""You did a great project and for sure the people will receive something special :-)""
""If this comes as showing its what I have always hunted for.""
""Congratulations on your campaign. Can't wait to hold this beauty. Another must have item before my world tour. Keep up the good work guys.""
""I would like to thank to all who created and supported this wonderful wallet. Looking forward to using this super functional product!""
""Awesome design, really like the wallets, are you planning on more stretch goals like different color options, etc ?""
This ""one of a kind"" design wallet provides the BEST RFID Protection!
""Cryptalloy"" technology will secure our ID, PASSPORT, CREDIT CARD and all other electronic information from pickpocketing and remote theft!
At Kitmana, we have put in the time and effort necessary to becoming experts at making great travel and outdoor gears. Now, we are producing nothing but the finest travel wallets around.
We have listened carefully to customers’ feedback regarding their experiences with other wallets, and we have curated what we believe to be something that is perfect for travelers and adventurers.
Our innovative approach to design and technology will make waves in this industry, and that’s just the way we like it.

After the first successful crowdfunding campaign, now we need your help help raise another $5000 so that we can spread the word and distribute the initial run of our wallets. As a thank-you, we have planned some excellent rewards, including discounts on our wallets.

After the first campaign, we have all molds in hand. We work closely with leather, textile and accessories providers as well as our professional craftsmen. Kitmana wallets will be shipped to our backers 2-3 weeks after the campaign.
We will keep you updated during and after the campaign regularly!
We have Leather, RFID Foil, Steel Molds and Elastic Bands ready in hand!
We will start shipping the wallets 2 weeks after we receive the funds from Indiegogo
Other Ways You Can Help: HELP US SPREAD THE WORD
Beyond making a monetary contribution, you can help us by sharing our campaign with all your friends and family. Go ahead and use the Indiegogo share tools!
The more people are aware of what we are doing, the more adventurers know that this wallet is for them.  Make your contribution and help us spread the word now!

About Altitude 

I know what you guys are thinking, ""What? Just a shaving cream...??"" What if i told you that this shaving cream has the ability to stop bleeding nicks and cuts, does not require water to be washed off and can double as a moisturiser. Interesting right? Born from a school project, we chanced upon the discovery of this particular haemostat. A unique method of processing virgin coconut oil has enabled us to produce an aqueous cream with accelerated blood clotting effect!

At Altitude, we believe in fusing tradition with modern aspects of everyday products to create a whole new product concept. Crowdfunding helps us stay self-funded while focusing on developing truly unique products for you backers.

 

Our Novel Shaving Cream 

Unexpected dinner dates or late urgent meetings often require men to wear their grungy beards to these important events, which can ruin their appearance. Those who arm themselves with a shaver in the public washroom, more often than not get nicks and cuts.

These nasty wounds can sometimes leave a bloody (pun intended) mess which ruins the event even more. Fear not because Altitude Shaving Cream is here. 

Our product provides the perfect solution by incorporating hemostatat(agent that stops bleeding) and mildly antiseptic elements into our specially formulated shaving cream. This means it can stop bleeding and disinfect at the same time! Since the cream is aqueous and contains only cosmetic ingredients within safe limits, there is no need to even wash it off. In fact, you can simply remove the excess cream by wiping it away with minimal discomfort. How convenient is that! 

Additionally, the thin layer of oil which is notably left on the skin can act as a moisturising agent so an additional use of an aftershave will not required. Say goodbye to dry and irritated skin?

Altitude Shaving Cream contains Virgin Coconut Oil(VCO) which is known for its moisturising and mild wound healing property. So simply apply it on your hands, legs etc and double it as a moisturiser!

 

Altitude Shaving Kit 

Born from a school project on shaving cream, we developed an entire kit to rid the deal of fast-growing hair. You’re now one shave away from looking fresh and good!

Made with hard and solid matte black polystyrene with laser engraved logo. The matte finish also gives the box a grip so it does not slide off you hand easily. What more, it is waterproof!

With thickness of just 4cm, you can fit it in your luggage, handbag and even pockets!                  Size: 17cm by 7.5cm by 4cm

Interior lined with felt material with razor shape cut out.

It also comes with retractable mirrors so you can literally shave anywhere, anytime!

 

Information For Nerds

Hmm... seems like you're one of those nerds who want to know everything huh? This is just the right section for you! 

Patent-pending processing method for VCO

A unique method of processing virgin coconut oil had been developed to produce an aqueous cream which can accelerate the blood clotting process. In vitro studies conducted by us have shown that bleeding can be reduced by nearly 50%* when this cream is applied. To put this into perspective, a Chitosan Cream, which contains active ingredient Chitosan (duhhh) known for its rapid blood clotting property only has an hemostatic effectiveness of 43.8%*. As compared to our patent-pending cream, our cream is more effective with hemostatic effectiveness of 49.6%*. 

*Results are based on studies done in our lab and are not to be used as benchmark for effectiveness of creams mentioned above

How are hemostatic effectiveness tested

The general steps are as follow:

The different type of creams were placed on the cap of the microcentrifuge tube. Real human blood was dripped directly on the cream and incubated. If the cream has accelerated blood clotting effect, the blood dripped on the cream will start forming blood clot.

The tube was inverted as shown above. The liquid in the microcentrifuge tube is Phosphate Buffer Solution(PBS), a common buffer used in biological research. Since the creams with accelerated blood clotting effect will cause the blood to clot, there will be less blood diffused into the Phosphate Buffer Solution(PBS).

A small amount of PBS was drawn out and analysed using spectrophotometer. The amount of blood present in the PBS will affect the reading by spectrophotometer. With this property, we can estimate the amount of blood present in each sample.

After working the magic of statistical calculations, here are the results. As you can see, our shaving cream has a hemostatic effectiveness of 49.6% which is significantly higher than the Chitosan Cream which is known for its rapid blood clotting ability. 

Read more about Chitosan here: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chitosan 

 

How Will Your Money Be Used

Since the money will be from you fellow backers, we really want to be transparent about where the money will go and how it will be used. 

The money will mainly be used for:
• Quality analysis lab test (Certificate of Analysis which is compulsory)

For now, we are not so much focused on profiting from this campaign. Rather, we are focusing all our time, effort and resources to commercialise this product. 

What happens to our money if it is not successfully funded?

If our project does not reach its goal, the funds don't get collected and it will all be returned to you backers. We do not want to end up with a small sum of money, trying to fulfil expectations of a $80,000 project. This is why we opted for a ""fixed-fund"" scheme. Its all or nothing, we want to give you the best, nothing less!

I have already backed this project, what more can I do to help?

Alone we can do so little, together we can do so much. Help us get word out and make some noise about our campaign! Like, share and follow us on

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/altitude.styled/                                                                        Share our campaign video on YouTube: https://youtu.be/ulJuxmfGPzQ

 

Timeline 

 

Challenges &

The greatest loss that may arise from using this awesome product would be for you to throw away your pre-existing shaving creams as this would be the last and only cream you'll ever use on your beautiful beard.

On a serious note though, this cream requires stability testing to ensure it can be produced at a scale large enough for production, without compromising the effectiveness of the product. Factors such as pressure and air exposure during the manufacturing process may influence the cream and alter its properties. But fear not, I mean, there are plenty of experienced manufacturers who have the capability to help us. We will keep you guys updated! 

","About Altitude I know what you guys are thinking, ""What? Just a shaving cream...??"" What if i told you that this shaving cream has the ability to stop bleeding nicks and cuts, does not require water to be washed off and can double as a moisturiser. Interesting right? Born from a school project, we chanced upon the discovery of this particular haemostat. A unique method of processing virgin coconut oil has enabled us to produce an aqueous cream with accelerated blood clotting effect!At Altitude, we believe in fusing tradition with modern aspects of everyday products to create a whole new product concept. Crowdfunding helps us stay self-funded while focusing on developing truly unique products for you backers. Our Novel Shaving Cream Unexpected dinner dates or late urgent meetings often require men to wear their grungy beards to these important events, which can ruin their appearance. Those who arm themselves with a shaver in the public washroom, more often than not get nicks and cuts.These nasty wounds can sometimes leave a bloody (pun intended) mess which ruins the event even more. Fear not because Altitude Shaving Cream is here. Our product provides the perfect solution by incorporating hemostatat(agent that stops bleeding) and mildly antiseptic elements into our specially formulated shaving cream. This means it can stop bleeding and disinfect at the same time! Since the cream is aqueous and contains only cosmetic ingredients within safe limits, there is no need to even wash it off. In fact, you can simply remove the excess cream by wiping it away with minimal discomfort. How convenient is that! Additionally, the thin layer of oil which is notably left on the skin can act as a moisturising agent so an additional use of an aftershave will not required. Say goodbye to dry and irritated skin?Altitude Shaving Cream contains Virgin Coconut Oil(VCO) which is known for its moisturising and mild wound healing property. So simply apply it on your hands, legs etc and double it as a moisturiser! Altitude Shaving Kit Born from a school project on shaving cream, we developed an entire kit to rid the deal of fast-growing hair. You’re now one shave away from looking fresh and good!Made with hard and solid matte black polystyrene with laser engraved logo. The matte finish also gives the box a grip so it does not slide off you hand easily. What more, it is waterproof!With thickness of just 4cm, you can fit it in your luggage, handbag and even pockets!                  Size: 17cm by 7.5cm by 4cmInterior lined with felt material with razor shape cut out.It also comes with retractable mirrors so you can literally shave anywhere, anytime! Information For NerdsHmm... seems like you're one of those nerds who want to know everything huh? This is just the right section for you! Patent-pending processing method for VCOA unique method of processing virgin coconut oil had been developed to produce an aqueous cream which can accelerate the blood clotting process. In vitro studies conducted by us have shown that bleeding can be reduced by nearly 50%* when this cream is applied. To put this into perspective, a Chitosan Cream, which contains active ingredient Chitosan (duhhh) known for its rapid blood clotting property only has an hemostatic effectiveness of 43.8%*. As compared to our patent-pending cream, our cream is more effective with hemostatic effectiveness of 49.6%*. *Results are based on studies done in our lab and are not to be used as benchmark for effectiveness of creams mentioned aboveHow are hemostatic effectiveness testedThe general steps are as follow:The different type of creams were placed on the cap of the microcentrifuge tube. Real human blood was dripped directly on the cream and incubated. If the cream has accelerated blood clotting effect, the blood dripped on the cream will start forming blood clot.

The tube was inverted as shown above. The liquid in the microcentrifuge tube is Phosphate Buffer Solution(PBS), a common buffer used in biological research. Since the creams with accelerated blood clotting effect will cause the blood to clot, there will be less blood diffused into the Phosphate Buffer Solution(PBS).

A small amount of PBS was drawn out and analysed using spectrophotometer. The amount of blood present in the PBS will affect the reading by spectrophotometer. With this property, we can estimate the amount of blood present in each sample.After working the magic of statistical calculations, here are the results. As you can see, our shaving cream has a hemostatic effectiveness of 49.6% which is significantly higher than the Chitosan Cream which is known for its rapid blood clotting ability. Read more about Chitosan here: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chitosan  How Will Your Money Be UsedSince the money will be from you fellow backers, we really want to be transparent about where the money will go and how it will be used. The money will mainly be used for:
Quality analysis lab test (Certificate of Analysis which is compulsory)

For now, we are not so much focused on profiting from this campaign. Rather, we are focusing all our time, effort and resources to commercialise this product. What happens to our money if it is not successfully funded?If our project does not reach its goal, the funds don't get collected and it will all be returned to you backers. We do not want to end up with a small sum of money, trying to fulfil expectations of a $80,000 project. This is why we opted for a ""fixed-fund"" scheme. Its all or nothing, we want to give you the best, nothing less!I have already backed this project, what more can I do to help?Alone we can do so little, together we can do so much. Help us get word out and make some noise about our campaign! Like, share and follow us onInstagram: https://www.instagram.com/altitude.styled/                                                                        Share our campaign video on YouTube: https://youtu.be/ulJuxmfGPzQ Timeline  Challenges & Risks

Factors such as pressure and air exposure during the manufacturing process may influence the cream and alter its properties. is an easy-to-use eco-friendly application, the first one to enable every single person to mark on specially prepared maps the countries and locations they have visited worldwide, to personalise the maps, and to share them with their friends in social media, while caring for the environment!
Easy and pleasant to use – can be used by everyone on the Internet
Online – no need to install anything on your computer or smartphone,
Quick – it operates in a web browser and it is based on the efficient HD Map Technology,
Design – unique, characteristic layout of all the maps,
Mobile – accessible anywhere, from computers, laptops, and smartphones
BeenThere Map will have several dozen different maps to offer, e.g.:
• Of the world, the continents, the region,
• Of the country which you love visiting,
• Of national parks, nature reserves, UNESCO sites,
• Of mountain trails, waterways, bike tracks, car routes (e.g. Route 66), motorcycle routes,
• Sports facilities in different countries (e.g. NHL, NBA, football leagues),
The selection of available maps will be constantly growing!

You can give your unique features to each map – a title, your nickname, avatar, you can also add your photographs with descriptions of places you have visited, which will enhance the individual character of your maps.
Make use of FB and other social media and show your friends where you have been.

The BeenThere Map Online project is very special to us, because for the first time in the world an application is developed thanks to which every person who loves travelling (all of us!) will be able to mark on the map the countries, regions, locations, trails, sports facilities and many other places they have visited, and to share them through social media or a website, online – in a simple, hassle-free way, during their trip or right after returning home. Thanks to BeenThere Map it is also possible to create a chronicle of your journeys and of the places you have visited and to give them unique features by publishing your photographs, giving them a title, and publishing your avatar and nickname.

Various maps in different designs will be available in the application – besides conventional maps there will also be “cyber punk” maps, “looking at the stars” maps, “black-red world” maps, “marine” maps, “old school” maps, any many others. The only thing that limits the number of maps available in the application and their design is our imagination…
BeenThere Map Online is currently at the stage of “a working prototype”, with several maps to choose from.

The objective of our campaign is most of all to complete the application development process – to enable the transition from a working prototype to a finished product, available online, as well as to test it, to extend it with several planned functionalities, to develop subsequent maps of the world, countries, locations, etc., and to widely promote the application online.

Ambassadors of our campaign and ambassadors of BeenThere Maps Online are Elisabeth and Andrew – experienced travellers (over 40 years), journalists, authors of travel books and TV shows, members of the prestigious Explorers Club in New York.
We are aware of the quantities of paper used every single day to print different documents, often quite unnecessarily.
Printing maps is not an exception in this respect. As professionals, we know that in the majority of cases printouts are not necessary to make full use of the map.
Printed maps lose many values that online maps have, such as e.g. the updating and personalisation options.

We believe that undertaking and promoting even the smallest initiatives addressing environmental protection can have significant results. Therefore, in our BeenThere Map Online project we will promote the slogan: Maps – publish online – do not print!
The promotion of the campaign “Maps – publish online – do not print!” will be partially financed by funds collected through Indiegogo.
We are an interdisciplinary team of professionals in the field of geoinformation and online maps development and publication, with many years’ experience gained in numerous projects.

We have been working together as smart geomatic since 2013, but we have been gaining experience for much longer. Consequently, today we can implement our vision of developing and publishing online maps – our vision of geoinformation, which we wish to promote globally along with our ideals, now through the BeenThere Map Online project.
In 2017 we received the 2017 Smart Growth Award for our online map development system – NMaps Engine.
Join our smart team and become the co-author of BeenThere Map Online!
How we minimise risks in the project

As of the launch of the campaign, the BeenThere Map Online application is not just an idea, but the stage of “a working prototype”, with several maps to choose from, after first successful tests. Hence the risk that the project will not be implemented is significantly lower (minor). We are moving on to the extension stage, when new functions will be added, new thematic map sets will be developed, and when we will work on making the application accessible online and promoting it widely. Our experienced team and their commitment constitutes the foundation of significant minimisation of all possible risks of failure.

“The purpose of life is to live it, to taste experience to the utmost, to reach out eagerly and without fear for newer and richer experience.”

I’m Captain Zorah Rose and I believe that life is for living! I’ve dedicated the past 3 years to bringing Creative Concierge SF into existence so I can help you create life-long memories with the people you love. In addition to the pro-bono Seaheart Kids Sailing Camp, I offer bespoke San Francisco Bay sailing experiences on the S/V Seaheart, a fully restored 36-foot Islander sailboat.

The thing is The Seaheart is ready and sailing as a Coast Guard Approved charter vessel on the California Coast.  The galley and head  are needing to be updated to be completely restored and cozy for overnight excursions in the bay or out the gate.  Of course we like bells and whistles too and need raise capital for all that. That’s where you come in. I’m offering you a variety of sailing experiences in return for your financial contribution to my goal of making the world a better place through the restorative powers of sailing.

column2: of a moonlit adventure, surprise engagement, weddings, celebration of life, birthdays, anniversaries
column3: give a gift of sailing or donate to our community outreach pro bono sails. Help us create memories that we can all share for generations.

column1: In order to provide world-class experiences and make the world a better place, I need your help to complete the upgrades to the Seaheart.

S/V Seaheart is a 36-foot Islander, a classic California-made sturdy cruiser built in the mid-70s. The “Islander 36” was a forerunner among dual-purpose racer/cruisers, boats with enough performance for competition-minded sailors and enough comfort for cruising. It’s nice wide cabin, complete with a stowaway table and plenty of headroom, sleeps 6 people and has a spacious deck for seeing the sights and soaking up the sun. It’s perfect for a short cruise, a weekend getaway, or a long-haul sail up or down the coast.

I bought this beautiful boat earlier this year and immediately began work to restore it to its original glory. My team and I have already made significant repairs and upgrades to the functionality, safety, and comfort of the boat. So far, we’ve had a haul out with bottom job, new thru holes, new valves, serviced the engine
column2: pulled the mast, new electrical, painted the deck and kiwi grip
column3: added new standing rigging and hardware
column4: rebedded the stanchions, rebuilt the transom,  added a new bilge pump, water pump and macerator
column6: as well as dozens of other little tweaks to make this a spectacularly safe, comfortable and fun ship.

column1: But there’s still work to be done, so I'm calling on you to book a sailing adventure with me. In return for your financial contribution, you’ll receive a reservation for a sailing experience on and around beautiful San Francisco Bay. Take a look at the options on the right to choose the best for your desires and budget.

My goal is to pre-sell charters, overnight excursions, sailing lessons, or add retainer clients to my sailing club so I can complete the restoration of this fine coastal cruising vessel and help you “to reach out eagerly and without fear for newer and richer experience.”
This campaign will be regularly updated with new Specials &

The goal of Creative Concierge SF (and my personal mission) is to spread connection, camaraderie, and magic in the world. I do this in my own unique way by creating sailing packages that lead to once-in-a-lifetime experiences with lasting memories. Whether it’s a short 2-hour excursion in the Bay, a sunset or moon lit cruise, or a full-blown overnight adventure, you’ll not only get the unforgettable experience - you’ll get the satisfaction of knowing that you’ve contributed to making these experiences possible for countless others. One of our pet projects is a pro-bono kids’ sailing camp where we share the wonders of sailing with youth that would otherwise never have a chance. We’re deeply committed to bringing meaning, connection, and empowerment to young people.

I have been on and around boats regularly for over 40 years. My grandfather had a boat in Boston Harbor and all my siblings all have boats. Being on the ocean is in my blood and after sailing the bay more than 430 times in less than 8 years, I have become one with the Bay. I’m intimately familiar with its varying conditions, demanding tides, and entertaining opportunities for world-class adventures in nature. I’m committed to sharing the transformative power of sailing as a way to improve mental health, physical aptitude, teamwork, and confidence.
I’ll guide you through the magic of the Bay by visiting the nooks and crannies only accessible by an avid Captain who has investigated the ins and outs of its special locations.

I pride myself on being a “social artist”. That means that I naturally build camaraderie and confidence among my guests and crew. I’ve been told that my wholehearted love of life, nature, and people is an infectious force for bringing joy into people’s lives. Whether it’s the sight of the moon rising over the Golden Gate Bridge, the sounds of whale song heard through our underwater microphone rig, or the feel and smell of the salt spray, I love sharing this incredibly special place with other good people.
What will we do with your contribution?

Let’s face facts. Refurbishing a 36-foot sailboat is not an easy or inexpensive task. Our team has already spent countless hours and tens of thousands of dollars getting the Seaheart ready to host passengers. It’s seaworthy and safe and taking people out but we need your help to fine-tune the details and make it a truly special experience-building-machine.
When you buy one of the perks, your money will fund the materials and labor for our remaining upgrades, renovations and dream touches. What are those upgrades, renovations and dreams?
Refinished the teak woodwork : topside and cabin
Modernized the galley: propane burner stove, convection oven, cookware and counter top
Modernize the head: new plumbing, H2O tanks and shower (already hot water off the engine)

With your help, the Seaheart will be ready for the next 15 years of memory-making. This has been an incredible journey and it's only going to get more interesting and adventurous. Are you coming? Bring your friends. Send your people. Because we need you to help us convert this dream of spreading wonder into reality!

A big challenge we’re facing is how to reach people who want to share in this ride. Over the years, I’ve met a LOT of great people through sailing and my previous work with Premium Pour and Jaxx Locals Lounge. If you’ve had a great experience with me (on the water or on land), I implore you to share your personal experiences and (especially) photos at https://www.facebook.com/creativeconciergeSF. If you know anyone who loves the water, nature and making awesome memories, please share this campaign with them. I need your help to make this dream a reality!

SANKIboard - is the first full-blown snowboard suspension in the World. All you need to enjoy your ride - is your snowboard, bindings, boots and this innovative system, that amortizes all bumps and pits on the trail.
• You don't depend on a whims of nature and conditions of tracks.
• Minimization of muscle ""clogging"" effect during long riding.
• Minimization of riders' occupational knee and spine diseases.
• More stable carving due to unsprung weight.
• The gap lets you avoid the contact of your boots and the slope during agressive carving.

column2: >Universal suspension integrates with any type of snowboard bindings.

column1: • And the most important, is a unique opportunity to use it as a personal bench without fear to freeze your ass of)).
includes 2 flat springs, 2 fixing racks, set of clamping plates and standart metric fittings
and could be easily installed by only one usual allen key.
For SANKIboard PRO kit  we use fiberglass and wood, reinforced by carbon and the aluminium alloy.
column4: > All together it provides low weight 2,4 kg with high reliability.

column2:
>    How to carry it around?  

    SANKIboard can easily fit in

column1: the standard board case with snowboard and bindings in it.  All you need is to remove the bindings from
the board and place them at different sides of the case.

At this stage, only M - size available, if your snowboard has 2x4 or 4x4 binding sistem, please, scale the space between inner and outer binding holes on your board. If the inner holes are not closer then 480mm and outer holes not further then 660mm, M - size will fit your snowboard.
If your Snowboard EST binding system, you do not have to worry about.
M-size designed for 70 - 90 kg rider.

column4: >   The brand got its name from the Russian word for санки (sanki), is translated as sled.

column10: > SANKIboard we've done a great job with a lot of victories and setbacks.

column1: January 2014 - Partially successful test trial sample of plywood veneered with springs . Sample collapsed , but the principle is proved to work .The testing results were pending on the invention in Russia.
The year of 2014 was dedicated to the selection of construction materials and production sample with springs made of fiberglass.
May 2014 Have been granted a patent for invention in the Russian Federation (РФ 142401).
January 2015 Filing an international patent application under the PCT (still valid).
March 2015 Intermediate sample test, gettint to the next conclusions : it is necessary to use carbon fiber in the construction of platforms and springs. The first promo video.
2015 Testing technology options of individual parts . Developing the process chain of industrial manufacturing.
January 2016 Small series test sample confirmed the declared characteristics.
Thess are some test models of suspensions.

With your help we hope to move to a next level of mass production, where we can still keep the quality of proper small-production business. A further plan is to develop a professional version with the maximum use of advanced materials for boardercross athletes. Now we are in process of developing technology and creating design of the ski suspensions. We hope you join us and be the firt to get 30% discount for this breakthrough gear from the future!

Sergey Yarosh graduated from the Ural State Architecture and Art Academy in 1998. I have developed a wide range of monoroller skates to the concept of a warship with the architecture of low visibility (patent РФ 118289). In 2006 I became interested in snowboarding, which led to the idea of creating this suspension .
Igor Afanasiev (CJSC ""CUB-A"") for providing manufacturing platforms and equipment for producing first samples in the initial period .
Sergey Lozhkin and Denis Logvinenko (""LAZY FRENDS”) for help with promo materials.
Alexey Kostromin (""Yellow Snow"") for help with promoting the idea of snowboard suspension in the Ural region .
Yulia Plekhanova and Mikhail Zhurov for communicating  with the global Internet community.
Anastasiya Sokolova for taking care of our lovely daughter 24/7, while I was enthusiastically worked on a designing this suspension.

SANKIboard - is the first full-blown snowboard suspension in the World. All you need to enjoy your ride - is your snowboard, bindings, boots and this innovative system, that amortizes all bumps and pits on the trail.
You don't depend on a whims of nature and conditions of tracks.
Minimization of muscle ""clogging"" effect during long riding.
Minimization of riders' occupational knee and spine diseases.
More stable carving due to unsprung weight.
The gap lets you avoid the contact of your boots and the slope during agressive carving.
Universal suspension integrates with any type of snowboard bindings.
And the most important, is a unique opportunity to use it as a personal bench without fear to freeze your ass of)).
includes 2 flat springs, 2 fixing racks, set of clamping plates and standart metric fittings
and could be easily installed by only one usual allen key.
For SANKIboard PRO kit  we use fiberglass and wood, reinforced by carbon and the aluminium alloy.  All together it provides low weight 2,4 kg with high reliability.
How to carry it around?      SANKIboard can easily fit in
the standard board case with snowboard and bindings in it.  All you need is to remove the bindings from
the board and place them at different sides of the case.

At this stage, only M - size available, if your snowboard has 2x4 or 4x4 binding sistem, please, scale the space between inner and outer binding holes on your board. If the inner holes are not closer then 480mm and outer holes not further then 660mm, M - size will fit your snowboard.
If your Snowboard EST binding system, you do not have to worry about.
The brand got its name from the Russian word for санки (sanki), is translated as sled.
Inventing SANKIboard we've done a great job with a lot of victories and setbacks.

January 2014 - Partially successful test trial sample of plywood veneered with springs . Sample collapsed , but the principle is proved to work .The testing results were pending on the invention in Russia.
The year of 2014 was dedicated to the selection of construction materials and production sample with springs made of fiberglass.
May 2014 Have been granted a patent for invention in the Russian Federation (РФ 142401).
January 2015 Filing an international patent application under the PCT (still valid).
March 2015 Intermediate sample test, gettint to the next conclusions : it is necessary to use carbon fiber in the construction of platforms and springs. The first promo video.
2015 Testing technology options of individual parts . Developing the process chain of industrial manufacturing.
January 2016 Small series test sample confirmed the declared characteristics.
Thess are some test models of suspensions.

With your help we hope to move to a next level of mass production, where we can still keep the quality of proper small-production business.
