• I am the type of traveler that likes to have as little as possible with me while on the go, but I also like to be comfortable. That’s when I noticed we needed a different type of travel pillow.
• Traditional shape, hood that can cover your face (if you sleep with your mouth open like myself), and a full-size blanket stored inside.
The Sleep Ninja was created out of a need that most travelers have. On those long flights when you just want to shut out the world, or even the over talkative seat mate.
• The contributions will help move The Sleep Ninja from prototype stage to manufacturing and distribution.
• It’s currently patent pending and made in the USA.
• In return for your support you will receive rewards including The Sleep Ninja.
• Each contribution helps. Support can even be in the form of sharing this link. Everything is greatly appreciated!

I’ve been riding motorcycles for the past 14 years. I had dreamed of riding but never did until I bought my first bike from my best friend. A 1988 Suzuki GSX-R750(Slingshot), which was a lot of fun for a first bike and it’s been all downhill from there. Wish I would have kept it but, “she gone”. I wasn’t really aware of how many rides and events there were every week until joining an MC(motorcycle club) in 2006 and furthermore when social media took off. Never imagined the brotherhood of riders by going to these rides and events. No matter what color, all riders seem to be family. The more connections and gatherings we make, the more fun. I think that is the basis for being a motorcycle rider, freedom and FUN. Motorcycle riders, we are our own network.

There are tons of motorcycle events and rides that are around and the RowlOut mobile app is the best way to put everything we love in one spot withe ease of access. This campaign will raise money to add all the necessary functions to the already existing app to make this happen.

For all the add-ons and upgrades, my goal is to raise $40,000, in which I have put almost that same amount into the existing app. This will make the app more than a force for bringing the motorcycle world together starting first and foremost in the U.S.. The funding will be going towards adding a Newsfeed, similar to that of other social networking apps where your posts are for you, your friends and those in your area or areas to see. It will update the calendar to make it easier to navigate the Events through the year including a search function. Sharing the events on the RowlOut app, with friends and other social media networks will also be easier. Updating the Groups function will allow one to create groups and add riders to it or allow other riders to request to join. Alerts will get an upgrade to include adding Amber alerts and making it easier to post an alert in different areas that you do or don’t follow. The Rides section of the app will be updated so that customizable rides can be created for those specific outings. A profile page will be added for friends lists, along with a way to message friends or other riders. The RowlOut.com website will also be updated to mimic all functions of the mobile app, so it can be accessed from a laptop or desktop computer. Server upgrades will also be needed from adding all of these additional functions and to compensate for additional app users and content.
Mailed items could ship sooner than fulfillment date if stock is on hand.

If around $3000 isn't raised to be able to update the app to accept all current OS's from all smart phones and placing image perks in the app, those who bought the image perk will be refunded their money. Since without the update, the image cannot be placed. Any money after that will go towards redesigning the look and function of the app to add the newsfeed. This will make it easier to navigate the app and see information from your desired areas.
Here are the links for the existing app in the app stores.

WELCOME TO THE MAGIC WORLD OF “NORTH SHELTER”!

We have a dream to improve our shelter, and your contribution can make it come true.

You are very welcome to contribute to this great environment-friendly project!

 

MYTHOLOGICAL ROOTS

Since the beginning of time, there is a mountain with sky-scraping trees, friendly trails, impressive gorges, crystal waters, and stunning views all over. The mountain of Oiti is home to gods, wizards, elves, fairies, and heroes. In the heart of the mountain, an iron throne is awaiting the arrival of the true king to the game of thrones, located where the throne of Zeus used to be.
The hero of heroes Hercules, also lived here.

 

THE MAGIC WORLD OF “NORTH SHELTER”

It is in this very mountain where you can experience the magic world of “North shelter”. It was created by Vasilis, a modern hero and a dreamer, who has spent eight years building almost every detail with his own hands (everything except stone walls), always accompanied by his faithful dog, Casper.

For his constructions, Vasilis has used wood from the cypress trees that he found around, but he immediately regenerated that piece of land with other trees. He is an experienced multi-faceted artist and sculptor who gives life to wood, transforming it into useful objects: roofs, beds which host the dreams of his guests, cosy sofas, long tables where food is enjoyed in company.

 

The main building and the three cave-like rooms are stone-built, the latter evoking hobbits from the Lord of the Rings.

 

Vasilis has also designed and built a treehouse whose geodesic-dome-shape makes it unique. It is a sort of a hive which embraces a big fir tree and it can host up to three people.

 

“North” shelter aims at hosting people and their dreams, providing them with care and affection. This is a place where guests can listen to their heart, open their mind, share knowledge, and, most of all, enjoy the moment, in an incredibly inspiring environment. Currently, “North” shelter organizes yoga and martial arts courses, music concerts, cooking classes and other activities such as hiking, canyoning, collecting wild herbs and mushrooms etc.

 

DONATIONS

North shelter is looking forward to your support in order to carry out the following development works:

A fence which would surround the shelter: This is necessary in order to protect the garden from wild animals and create a space where outdoor activities can be carried out safely.

An artificial lake, which will be called Dryope: This will enhance biodiversity in the surrounding area and will give life to the forest garden. Before its creation, funding is necessary in order to carry out a study which would guarantee its feasibility in terms of ecological compatibility and hygiene.

Your support is fundamental! For any donation you may provide, “North shelter” will award you with a special gift.

column2:
>Welcome to the Mojo Sports Licensing Family!

We at Mojo SL are first and foremost sports fans. Our passion for sports and teams are evident in the products we design and produce. We are blessed to design wheeled travel products that carry some of the most recognized team logo’s in the world! NFL, MLB, NBA, NHL, NCAA and Team USA. The Mojo SL team has 25 years of “Travel / Bag” and “Sports Licensing” business experience.

>1). To raise money for our new start-up company (Launched in April 2016). Like any “Boot-Strap” start up we are working hard to manage over seas production, local warehousing, staffing and overall cash flow. Your investment in our campaign will absolutely help us to launch other new products that are in the development stage. In return, Mojo SL is offering you The Ultimate Collapsible Wheeled Duffel for below wholesale prices. It’s a Win-Win for sure!

2).  To offer you, the traveler and team fan, an amazing value: It’s important to the Mojo SL family that we deliver high quality, great looking product and this campaign will allow us to do that, and at an amazing price.
column3:
>Funding the campaign:

Our funding goal is set at $25,000. Our plans are to use the funds to help complete this project and to assist with launching new innovative travel pieces in late 2017.

Once the campaign is complete Mojo SL will deliver your Team Duffel to you in no more than 120 days. We will communicate to you along the way.

If we strike out and fail to meet our campaign goal, we will refund your money invested.
column4:
>The Campaign Details: 

Keeping this simple....

column1: • You Save $40 off of the retail price!
• Invest in TWO of the 36"" Collapsible Wheeled Duffels:
• Invest in THREE of the 36"" Collapsible Wheeled Duffels
• Invest in FOUR of the 36"" Collapsible Wheeled Duffels at $45/ea.

column2:
>How to Pick Your Team(s)?

 After you invest, we (Mojo SL)  will send you a follow-up email that includes a complete order form with a list of all NFL, MLB, NBA, NHL, NCAA and Team USA teams to choose from. Whether you're a house divided and need different teams for each bag, or you stand united and need all bags the same team, it's 100% your choice!
column4:
Challenges:

We are seasoned veterans in the travel &
column5:
licensing world. Our main challenge is just timing out of Asia. Factories quote anywhere from 90-120 days to arrive to our California warehouse. Please know that our team has 25 years of sourcing experience and our factories are super excited to work with Mojo SL on this project and future opportunities. The key word here is “FACTORIES”. More than 1. Mojo SL sources product out of several factories which helps to protect our flow of goods to the USA.

We at Mojo SL ask for your investment and help:  

We feel very confident that you will absolutely love your new collapsible wheeled team duffel, especially at the amazing perk price. Congrats!

We would also greatly appreciate it if you would buy multiple duffels. These make great gifts!

Lastly, please be so kind to share our campaign with your world. We are working hard to build the Mojo SL business and your help in spreading the Mojo SL love would be greatly appreciated.    Thank you in advance for your investment!

Your investment in our campaign will absolutely help us to launch other new products that are in the development stage. In return, Mojo SL is offering you The Ultimate Collapsible Wheeled Duffel for below wholesale prices. It’s a Win-Win for sure!2).  To offer you, the traveler and team fan, an amazing value: It’s important to the Mojo SL family that we deliver high quality, great looking product and this campaign will allow us to do that, and at an amazing price.Funding the campaign:Our funding goal is set at $25,000. Our plans are to use the funds to help complete this project and to assist with launching new innovative travel pieces in late 2017.Once the campaign is complete Mojo SL will deliver your Team Duffel to you in no more than 120 days. We will communicate to you along the way.If we strike out and fail to meet our campaign goal, we will refund your money invested.The Campaign Details: Keeping this simple....
Invest in ONE 36"" Collapsible Wheeled Duffel:
You Save $40 off of the retail price!
Invest in TWO of the 36"" Collapsible Wheeled Duffels:
You save $100 off of retail price!
Your choice of ANY two teams!
Invest in THREE of the 36"" Collapsible Wheeled Duffels
Invest in FOUR of the 36"" Collapsible Wheeled Duffels at $45/ea.

How to Pick Your Team(s)?  After you invest, we (Mojo SL)  will send you a follow-up email that includes a complete order form with a list of all NFL, MLB, NBA, NHL, NCAA and Team USA teams to choose from. Whether you're a house divided and need different teams for each bag, or you stand united and need all bags the same team, it's 100% your choice! Risks & Challenges:We are seasoned veterans in the travel & licensing world. Our main challenge is just timing out of Asia. Factories quote anywhere from 90-120 days to arrive to our California warehouse. Please know that our team has 25 years of sourcing experience and our factories are super excited to work with Mojo SL on this project and future opportunities. The key word here is “FACTORIES”. More than 1. Mojo SL sources product out of several factories which helps to protect our flow of goods to the USA.We at Mojo SL ask for your investment and help:  We feel very confident that you will absolutely love your new collapsible wheeled team duffel, especially at the amazing perk price. Congrats!We would also greatly appreciate it if you would buy multiple duffels. These make great gifts!Lastly, please be so kind to share our campaign with your world. We are working hard to build the Mojo SL business and your help in spreading the Mojo SL love would be greatly appreciated.    Thank you in advance for your investment!",11.0,0,"1 Campaign

Introduction

Do you find heat unbearable in summer? Do you want to get the chill feeling just like as air-con in outdoor in 40°C (104°F)? Coldfront 26 can help you. 

Misting system is an efficiency cooling system. It is well used in the sunny party, outdoor marketplace, park etc. It is a tower like industrial machine, expensive, installation needed and big. Now I have minimized the conventional misting system to a palm size, ONE hand controllable misting fan, Coldfront 26.

Temperature drop 3°C instantly

Coldfront
26 is the world's smallest, hand-held, touch switch control misting fan. It is an

ergonomic DC fan with an innovative streamline design. Coldfront 26 included misting device and DC fan. In summer, tradition fan is not capable to cool you down as it deliver you hot air actually. However, Coldfront 26, it draw the strong wind mixed with tiny mist. Tiny mist absorbed your heat energy and the wind bring mist out. That is miracle chill feeling performed and it can drop 4°C within 15 sec. 
It is best used for outdoor person.
On the market, there are spray bottle, manual spray fan, evaporate fan etc. None of it is real portable size. Coldfront 26 size is 130 x 34 mm, weight 134 g. That's called PORTABLE.
Battery power affect the device performance directly. Low end Li-ion battery is danger, not long lasting, unstable current output.
Coldfront 26 built-in original LG/ Samsung 2200mAh Li-ion battery. Power is recharged through micro USB charging port.
Coldfront 26 equip with advance power management chip with over-charge protection, over-heat protection, over discharge protection.
Child proof blades ensure the safety use no matter elderly or children.

column1: Contribute now to enjoy up to 50% off discount.
There are rubber black and pearl white in color. Please remark the color when contribution. Thanks

Most challenge is the balance of size and performance. I have tested many sizes of Li-ion battery but only 18650 size battery can supply enough current and it's capacity large enough for long time operation. The capacity of 18650 battery is still improving, so Coldfront 26 can be upgraded easily.

The water tank design is also a challenge. The atomizer plate work only when it is just on the water surface. So how to deliver the distilled water to the atomizer plate but the water tank is below it? I had tested over 26 water tank designs and get a prefect one finally, no electronic pump, no absorbent stick needed. So that's the Coldfront 26 now.

All contribution is for injection mold making only. The most expensive of the tooling is the injection mold. The cost of mold is nearly USD 8500. Please help to realize these amazing cooling gadget for summer time.

TREEHOUSE TOURISM
lugar donde la naturaleza es la protagonista. Con la inspiración de un
paisaje mágico, cuidando con mucho detalle el impacto medioambiental.
Estas casas árbol han sido diseñadas para fundirse con el bosque sin
dañarlo, donde los árboles no sufren con las construcciones y se utiliza

Juan y Karina, una pareja joven, que hemos dejado muchas cosas atrás (casa, trabajo, amigos, país) para apostar por éste sueño.
Nos
apasiona la naturaleza y creemos firmemente en que se puede disfrutar
de ella sin dañarla. Dejando de lado el turismo de masas y apostando por

un turismo más

respetuoso con el entorno. Un día, cansados de nuestra rutina y en plena crisis existencial, decidimos buscar una casa en cualquier lugar del mundo para meditar y ordenar nuestras ideas.
Así,
hemos encontrado éste lugar al norte de Portugal, del que nunca
habíamos oído hablar, que nos sorprendió por su belleza natural y por la

paz que nos transmitió.
¿Cómo no enamorarse de un lugar como éste?
 Así empezó nuestra idea….¿Cómo compartir esta sensación con los demás?
de esta premisa y con la ilusión de habernos topado con un lugar mágico
y poco explorado, hemos creado y creído en esta idea:  Construir  un
conjunto de 5 cabañas en los árboles , ¡ ayúdanos a hacerla realidad !.
proyecto esta aprobado en el ayuntamiento, ya contamos con la
licencia para construir y están todos los diseños arquitectónicos
preparados para ponernos en marcha. Sólo nos hace falta tu apoyo
para recaudar 16500€ para construir nuestra primera casa.
objetivo es construir un total de 5 casas árbol, con la intención
de promover un turismo a pequeña escala eco-consciente basado en
disfrutar de la naturaleza de forma respetuosa y con especial cuidado
de inicio la construcción esta prevista para el 10/02/2016 una vez
duración de la construcción será de 45 días por casa, con lo que
esperamos tener todo preparado para inaugurar en el mes de mayo de
hacer un presupuesto escalonado, así por cada 16500€ recaudados
podríamos construir una casa árbol con un máximo de 5.

Nuestra campaña de crowdfunding es del tipo fija"" todo o nada"", esto significa que las donaciones se harán efectivas solamente en el caso de alcanzar nuestro primer objetivo:  16500€. En caso contrario, todos los aportes serán devueltos de forma 100 x 100 segura. Ya que nosotros no tendremos acceso al dinero hasta que la campaña no este finalizada y el objetivo alcanzado.
encontramos al norte de Portugal en el conselho de Vieira do Minho. En
una  zona  incluída en la reserva ecológica nacional debido a su riqueza
de fauna y flora, junto al Parque Nacional Peneda Gerês (único parque
nacional de Portugal y que comparte con el norte de España). Desde
nuestra ubicación nos sorprenden los avistamientos de corzos, caballos
salvajes y una fantástica variedad de aves entre las que se encuentran
..el milano real, el ratonero común, el búho real, el halcón y la
tarabilla norteña entre otros. Todo esto con el embalse de Caniçada como

fondo.
Es un lugar estratégico situado en medio de la naturaleza
pero con la comodidad de la cercanía de ciudades como Braga, Porto y
Un buen punto de partida para
conocer infinidad de lugares de interés en sus alrededores . Con un
sinfín de opciones de deportes acuaticos y terrestres como trekking,
kayak, canyoning, escalada, rappel, equitación, pesca,etc
bosque con árboles verdes y enormes, una naciente de agua de montaña en
su centro y de fondo  un espejo brillante y cristalino formado por la
albufeira del rio Cávado.
column5: />Con una cabaña de madera , un bosque en el que

column1:
los árboles se plantaron con menos de un metro y hoy  miden mas de 20!.
El
bosque donde se encontrarán nuestras casas árbol es un lugar mágico y
colorido donde se respira aire puro y se escucha el canto de los
pájaros, un lugar ideal para descansar y limpiarse del stress de la vida

column3:
/>

Se encuentra en medio de una región antiguamente celta

column1: donde nuestros antepasados veneraban  a los bosques, las piedras y el
agua por encima de todo . Tierra de donde nacen infinidad de mitos y
e imagínate por un momento descansando en un árbol, dejándote invadir
por el aire puro y los sonidos de la naturaleza. Tal vez escuches  el

ruido de una cascada cerca o el susurro del viento entre los árboles.
 Creemos que estas son las sensaciones que enriquecen nuestras vidas, nos hacen reflexionar, meditar……nos inspiran.
sociedad está dando un cambio, cada vez más y más gente es consciente de la importancia de vivir en armonía con la naturaleza, sin dañarla.
Esta consciencia ecológica nos ha llevado a que todo nuestro proyecto
esté basado en formar parte de ella, intentando modificar lo menos
posible el entorno. Además estamos comprometidos con el trabajo regional
, colaborando con agricultores de productos orgánicos de la zona.
cabañas se construirán con un formato hexagonal de 24m2  a una altura
de  2,50 a 3,00 metros desde el suelo a la base , obteniendo así un
fácil acceso, dejando la terraza /balcón/mirador a una altura

considerablemente mayor gracias a la pendiente natural del terreno.
La
madera, que es un potente regulador de la humedad  y el aislamiento
elegidos proporcionan una óptima climatización con mínimos recursos,

consiguiendo así máximos resultados con el menor impacto medioambiental.
Las
cabañas están pensadas para apoyarse en los árboles, cuidándolos al
máximo,  mediante un sistema innovador de soportes que sostienen la

estructura sin dañarlo gracias a la compartimentalización del árbol y sin impedir el crecimiento natural del mismo ( ver Michael Garnier Limb). Además de un diseño que armoniza  con el entorno.  El mobiliario
interior será en su mayoría de madera reciclada y se proveerá  a las

cabañas de energías renovables (dependiendo de lo recaudado).
Todas las cabañas estarán provistas de agua y luz.
Baño independiente (ducha y wc).

Proyectos futuros:
Piscina (reparación) y agua salada.
Pelletadora y calefacción a pellets generados a partir de hojas y ramas de nuestro bosque.
Construir cascada con generador hídrico para proveer de electricidad a las cabañas.
Huerta ecológica.
Zona de árboles frutales ( se plantarán arboles frutales gracias a las donaciones que tienen como recompensa apadrinar un árbol).
Gracias y no olvides escoger tu recompensa !!!
TREEHOUSE TOURISM

Um lugar onde a natureza é a protagonista, inspirando-se numa paisagem mágica, tendo como grande cuidado o impacto ambiental. Estas casas nas árvores são projetadas para se misturar com a floresta sem a danificar, onde as árvores não sofrem com as construções e com utilização de madeira reciclada  no seu interior.

Nós somos Juan e Karina, um jovem casal que deixou muitas coisas para trás (casa, trabalho, amigos, país,…) para apostar neste sonho.
Nós amamos a natureza e acreditamos verdadeiramente que se pode desfrutar dela sem a danificar, deixando de lado o turismo em massa e com foco num turismo mais eco-friendly.
Um dia, cansados da nossa rotina e em plena crise existencial, decidimos procurar uma casa em qualquer lugar do mundo para meditar e organizar as nossas ideias.
Então, nós encontramos este lugar no norte de Portugal, do qual nunca tinhamos ouvido falar. Fomos surpreendidos pela sua beleza natural e paz que nos acolheu.
Como não amar um lugar como este?
Assim começou a nossa ideia... Como compartilhar este
sentimento com os outros?

Nesta base, e com a ilusão de ter encontrado um lugar mágico e inexplorado, criamos e acreditamos nesta ideia: construir um conjunto de 5 casas nas árvores!
Ajude-nos a fazer com que isto aconteça!

O projecto foi aprovado pela câmara, e já temos a licença para construir, os projectos de arquitectura estão todos concluídos. Só precisamos do seu apoio para reunir 16.500,00 € para construir a nossa primeira casa na árvore.

O Nosso objetivo é construir um total de 5 casas nas árvores, com a intenção de promover o turismo de pequena escala eco-consciente, com base na filosofia de apreciar a natureza com respeito e tendo cuidado especial com o ambiente.
A data de início da construção está prevista para 10/02/2016 quando a campanha crowdfunding estiver concluída. A duração da construção é de 45 dias por casa, esperamos ter tudo pronto para abrir maio de 2016.
Decidimos fazer um orçamento em fases e para cada uma delas necessitamos de reunir os 16.500,00 €, deste modo, poderiamos construir uma casa na árvore até a um máximo de 5 casas.
A nossa campanha é fixa ""tudo ou nada"", isso significa que as doações só serão eficazes se atingirmos o nosso principal objetivo: 16.500,00 €.
 Caso contrário, todas as contribuições serão integralmente devolvidas com 100% de segurança, isto porque não teremos acesso ao dinheiro até que a campanha não esteja terminada e o objetivo alcançado.

Ubicaçâo do terreno:

Estamos no norte de Portugal, no concelho de Vieira do Minho, numa área incluída na reserva ecológica nacional, devido à sua riqueza de fauna e flora, junto ao Parque Nacional de Peneda Gerês (único parque nacional em Portugal e partilhado com o norte de Espanha).
É nesta nossa localização que ficamos constantemente surpresos
com os aparecimentos de Corços, Garranos e uma grande variedade de aves entre os quais estão o Milhafre-Real, Águia-de-Asa-Redonda, Águia-Real, Coruja, Gavião e o Cartaxo Nortenho entre outros. Tudo isto com a barragem da Caniçada como fundo.  É uma localização estratégica, situada no meio da natureza, mas com a conveniência da proximidade de cidades como Braga, Porto e Vigo.

Um bom ponto de partida para explorar muitos locais de interesse na área circundante. Com infinitas opções de desportos de água e terra como trekking, canoagem, canyoning, escalada, rapel, passeios a cavalo, pesca, etc.

Descripción del lugar de construcción:
Uma enorme floresta com árvores verdes, uma nascente de água em seu centro e um brilhante espelho cristalino como fundo, formado pela albufeira do rio Cávado.
column5:
/>

Com uma cabana de madeira, uma floresta onde as árvores foram plantadas com menos de um metro e hoje tem mais de 20 !.

column1: A mata onde nossas casas vão se encontrar é um lugar mágico e colorido, onde poder respirar ar puro e ouvir o canto dos pássaros, um lugar para descansar e limpar do stress da vida quotidiana.
Ele está no meio duma região anteriormente Celta onde os nossos antepassados adoraram as árvores, rochas e água por acima de tudo. Terra de onde nasceram numerosos mitos e lendas.

Feche os olhos e imagine-se por um momento a descansar sob de uma árvore, deixando-se invadir pelo  ar puro e pelos sons da natureza. Talvez possa ouvir o som de uma cascata perto ou o vento sussurrante através das árvores. Nós acreditamos que estes são os sentimentos que enriquecem as nossas vidas, que nos fazem refletir, meditar ... inspirar-nos!.

Consciência ecológica:
A nossa sociedade está a mudar, mais e mais pessoas estão conscientes da importância de viver em harmonia com a natureza sem a danificar. Esta consciência ecológica levou-nos a realizar todo o nosso projecto por forma a se integrar como parte dela, tentando modificar o ambiente o menos possível. Nós também estamos comprometidos com o trabalho regional, asociando-nos com os agricultores orgânicos (Agricultura Biológica) da região.

Descriçâo técnica:

As casinhas serão construídas com um formato hexagonal 24m2 a uma altura de 2,50 a 3,00 metros do chão, obtendo-se assim fácil acesso, deixando o terraço / varanda para uma consideravelmente maior altura graças à inclinação natural do terreno.
A madeira, que é um regulador potente de humidade e o isolamento escolhido, proporcionam uma climatização óptima com mínimos recursos, alcançando o máximo de resultados com o menor impacto ambiental.

As casas estão projetadas para a construção nas árvores, tendo em conta a sua maxima preservação, através de um sistema inovador de suportes que prendem a estrutura sem a danificar, graças à compartimentação da árvore e sem impedir o
crescimento natural dela (ver Michael Garnier Limb).

Além de um desenho que se harmoniza com o ambiente. O mobiliário interior é principalmente madeira reciclada e as cabanas serão equipadas com energia renovável (dependendo do colectado).
Todas as unidades serão equipadas com água e electricidade, casa de banho separada (chuveiro e WC).

Piscina (reparação) e filtros de água salgada.
Caldeira de aquecimento com “pellets” confeccionados a partir de folhas e ramos da nossa floresta.
Construir gerador com base na cascata de água para fornecer eletricidade para as unidades.
Área de árvores frutíferas (árvores frutíferas serão plantadas por doações cuja recompensa seja patrocinar uma árvore).
AS RECOMPENSAS APENAS PODEM SER PUBLICADAS NUM SÓ IDIOMA
FAVOR DE CONTACTAR CONNOSCO EM CASO DE TER ALGUMA DÚVIDA
English
TREEHOUSE TOURISM

A place where nature is the protagonist. With the inspiration of a magical landscape, taking care in great detail the environmental impact. These treehouses are designed to blend in with the forest without damaging it, where trees do not suffer with the buildings and for interior it is used recycled woods .
This is us, Juan y Karina,a young couple who have left many things behind (home, jobs, friends, country) to bet on this dream.

We love nature and we firmly believe we can enjoy it without damaging it. Leaving aside mass tourism and focusing on a more eco-friendly tourism. One day, tired of our routine and in full existential crisis, we decided to find a house anywhere in the world to meditate and organize our ideas.
So we found this place in northern Portugal, which we had never heard of, we were surprised by its natural beauty and peace.
How can you not love a place like this?
  Thus began our idea ... .How to share this feeling with others?

Starting from that point and with the illusion of having found a magical and unexplored place, we have created and believed in this idea: Build a set of 5 cabins in the trees, help us to make it happen!.

The project is already approved by the local Hall, we have the license to build and the architectural designs are all ready to get it started. We just need your support to raise € 16,500 to build our first treehouse.
<span>Our goal is to build a total of 5 treehouses, with the intention of
promoting small scale eco-conscious tourism based on enjoying nature
respectfully and with special care to the environment.

The construction start date is scheduled for 10.02.2016 once completed crowdfunding campaign. The duration of construction is 45 days per house aprox, which we hope to have everything ready to open in May 2016.
We've decided to do a phased budget as for every € 16,500 collected we could build a tree house with a maximum of 5.
crowdfunding campaign is FIXED ""all or nothing"", this means that

donations will be effective only if we get to reach our first target: € 16,500. Otherwise, all contributions will be returned in a 100%. Since we will not have access to the money until this campaign is not finished and the goal achieved.

We are situated at the north of Portugal in the concelho of Vieira do Minho. In a national ecological reserve due to its wealth of fauna and flora, next to the Peneda Geres National Park (only national park in Portugal shared with the north of Spain) area. From our location we are ocasional surprised by deers, wild horses and a great variety of birds among which are ..the kite, buzzard, eagle owl, hawk and Whinchat among others. All this with the lake of Caniçada as background.
It is a strategic location situated in the middle of nature but with the convenience of the proximity of cities like Braga, Porto and Vigo.

A good starting point to explore many points of interest in the surrounding area. With endless water and land sports like trekking, kayaking, canyoning, climbing, abseiling, horse riding, fishing, etc.

Construction place description:

A forest with huge green trees and a natural water spring at its center and a bright crystal mirror background formed by the Cávado river.
column5: /> With a log cabin as our home. A forest where trees were planted on less than a meter and measure over 20 today !.

column1: The forest where our treehouses will be at it's a magical and colorful place where you can breathe fresh air and hear birdsongs, a place to rest and clean up from daily stress.
column3:
/>

It is in the midst of a formerly Celtic region where our ancestors worshiped the forests, rocks and water above all. Cradle of numerous myths and legends.


Philosophy:

column1:
Close your eyes and imagine yourself for a second relaxing on a tree,  invaded by the fresh air and the sounds of nature. Maybe you can hear the sound of a waterfall nearby or the wind rustling through the branches.
  We believe these are the feelings that enrich our lives, make us reflect, meditate ...... inspire.

Ecological consciousness:
Our society is changing, more and more people are aware of the importance of living in harmony with nature without damaging it. This ecological consciousness has led us to our whole project, trying to modify the environment as little as possible. We are also committed to regional labor, working with organic farmers in the area.

Technical description:
The treehouses are built with an hexagonal format 24m2 at a height of within 2.50 and
3.00 meters from the ground to the base, thus obtaining easy access,
leaving the terrace / balcony / veranda to a considerably greater height
thanks to the natural slope.<span>The wood, which is a potent regulator of moisture and the chosen isolation provide optimum  ambience with minimal resources, achieving maximum
results with the least environmental impact.<span>The
cottages are designed to be build on the trees, taking care these to the maximum,
through an innovative system of supports that hold the structure without

damaging it thanks to the natural compartmentalization of the tree and letting the tree grow naturally (see Michael Garnier Limb). In addition a design that harmonizes with the environment. The interior furnishing is mostly made from recycled wood and the cabins are provide with renewable energy (depending on funds raised).All cabins will be equipped with water and electricit and a separate bathroom (shower and toilet).
Salt water filters for the swimming pool
Pellet extrusioner and pellets made from leaves and small sticks of our forest.

Small waterfall generator to suply our cabins from electricity.
Ecological kitchen-garden
Orchard  ( fruit trees will be planted thanks to donations reated to ""plant tree perk""l).
THE PERKS CAN ONLY BE SHOWN IN ONE LANGUAGE - WE APOLOGIZE FOR THE INCONVENIENTS
PLEASE DO NOT HESITATE IN CONTACTING US IF YOU HAVE ANY DOUBT WITH THEM
lugar donde la naturaleza es la protagonista. Con la inspiración de un
paisaje mágico, cuidando con mucho detalle el impacto medioambiental.
Estas casas árbol han sido diseñadas para fundirse con el bosque sin
dañarlo, donde los árboles no sufren con las construcciones y se utiliza
para el interior madera reciclada.Nuestra historia:
Juan y Karina, una pareja joven, que hemos dejado muchas cosas atrás (casa, trabajo, amigos, país) para apostar por éste sueño.Nos
apasiona la naturaleza y creemos firmemente en que se puede disfrutar
de ella sin dañarla. Dejando de lado el turismo de masas y apostando por

un turismo más respetuoso con el entorno. Un día, cansados de nuestra rutina y en plena crisis existencial, decidimos buscar una casa en cualquier lugar del mundo para meditar y ordenar nuestras ideas.Así,
hemos encontrado éste lugar al norte de Portugal, del que nunca
habíamos oído hablar, que nos sorprendió por su belleza natural y por la
paz que nos transmitió.¿Cómo no enamorarse de un lugar como éste? Así empezó nuestra idea….¿Cómo compartir esta sensación con los demás?
de esta premisa y con la ilusión de habernos topado con un lugar mágico
y poco explorado, hemos creado y creído en esta idea:  Construir  un
conjunto de 5 cabañas en los árboles , ¡ ayúdanos a hacerla realidad !.
proyecto esta aprobado en el ayuntamiento, ya contamos con la
licencia para construir y están todos los diseños arquitectónicos
preparados para ponernos en marcha. Sólo nos hace falta tu apoyo
para recaudar 16500€ para construir nuestra primera casa.
objetivo es construir un total de 5 casas árbol, con la intención
de promover un turismo a pequeña escala eco-consciente basado en
disfrutar de la naturaleza de forma respetuosa y con especial cuidado
de inicio la construcción esta prevista para el 10/02/2016 una vez
duración de la construcción será de 45 días por casa, con lo que
esperamos tener todo preparado para inaugurar en el mes de mayo de
hacer un presupuesto escalonado, así por cada 16500€ recaudados
podríamos construir una casa árbol con un máximo de 5.

Nuestra campaña de crowdfunding es del tipo fija"" todo o nada"", esto significa que las donaciones se harán efectivas solamente en el caso de alcanzar nuestro primer objetivo:  16500€. En caso contrario, todos los aportes serán devueltos de forma 100 x 100 segura. Ya que nosotros no tendremos acceso al dinero hasta que la campaña no este finalizada y el objetivo alcanzado.
encontramos al norte de Portugal en el conselho de Vieira do Minho. En
una  zona  incluída en la reserva ecológica nacional debido a su riqueza
de fauna y flora, junto al Parque Nacional Peneda Gerês (único parque
nacional de Portugal y que comparte con el norte de España). Desde
nuestra ubicación nos sorprenden los avistamientos de corzos, caballos
salvajes y una fantástica variedad de aves entre las que se encuentran
..el milano real, el ratonero común, el búho real, el halcón y la
tarabilla norteña entre otros. Todo esto con el embalse de Caniçada como
fondo.Es un lugar estratégico situado en medio de la naturaleza
pero con la comodidad de la cercanía de ciudades como Braga, Porto y
Un buen punto de partida para
conocer infinidad de lugares de interés en sus alrededores . Con un
sinfín de opciones de deportes acuaticos y terrestres como trekking,
kayak, canyoning, escalada, rappel, equitación, pesca,etc
bosque con árboles verdes y enormes, una naciente de agua de montaña en
su centro y de fondo  un espejo brillante y cristalino formado por la
albufeira del rio Cávado. Con una cabaña de madera , un bosque en el que
los árboles se plantaron con menos de un metro y hoy  miden mas de 20!.El
bosque donde se encontrarán nuestras casas árbol es un lugar mágico y
colorido donde se respira aire puro y se escucha el canto de los
pájaros, un lugar ideal para descansar y limpiarse del stress de la vida
cotidiana.Se encuentra en medio de una región antiguamente celta
donde nuestros antepasados veneraban  a los bosques, las piedras y el
agua por encima de todo . Tierra de donde nacen infinidad de mitos y
e imagínate por un momento descansando en un árbol, dejándote invadir
por el aire puro y los sonidos de la naturaleza. Tal vez escuches  el
ruido de una cascada cerca o el susurro del viento entre los árboles. Creemos que estas son las sensaciones que enriquecen nuestras vidas, nos hacen reflexionar, meditar……nos inspiran.
sociedad está dando un cambio, cada vez más y más gente es consciente de la importancia de vivir en armonía con la naturaleza, sin dañarla.
Esta consciencia ecológica nos ha llevado a que todo nuestro proyecto
esté basado en formar parte de ella, intentando modificar lo menos
posible el entorno. Además estamos comprometidos con el trabajo regional
, colaborando con agricultores de productos orgánicos de la zona.
cabañas se construirán con un formato hexagonal de 24m2  a una altura
de  2,50 a 3,00 metros desde el suelo a la base , obteniendo así un
fácil acceso, dejando la terraza /balcón/mirador a una altura
considerablemente mayor gracias a la pendiente natural del terreno.La
madera, que es un potente regulador de la humedad  y el aislamiento
elegidos proporcionan una óptima climatización con mínimos recursos,
consiguiendo así máximos resultados con el menor impacto medioambiental.Las
cabañas están pensadas para apoyarse en los árboles, cuidándolos al
máximo,  mediante un sistema innovador de soportes que sostienen la

estructura sin dañarlo gracias a la compartimentalización del árbol y sin impedir el crecimiento natural del mismo ( ver Michael Garnier Limb). Además de un diseño que armoniza  con el entorno.  El mobiliario
interior será en su mayoría de madera reciclada y se proveerá  a las
cabañas de energías renovables (dependiendo de lo recaudado).Todas las cabañas estarán provistas de agua y luz.Baño independiente (ducha y wc).

Proyectos futuros:Piscina (reparación) y agua salada.Pelletadora y calefacción a pellets generados a partir de hojas y ramas de nuestro bosque.Construir cascada con generador hídrico para proveer de electricidad a las cabañas.Huerta ecológica.Zona de árboles frutales ( se plantarán arboles frutales gracias a las donaciones que tienen como recompensa apadrinar un árbol).
Gracias y no olvides escoger tu recompensa !!!

Um lugar onde a natureza é a protagonista, inspirando-se numa paisagem mágica, tendo como grande cuidado o impacto ambiental. Estas casas nas árvores são projetadas para se misturar com a floresta sem a danificar, onde as árvores não sofrem com as construções e com utilização de madeira reciclada  no seu interior.

Nós somos Juan e Karina, um jovem casal que deixou muitas coisas para trás (casa, trabalho, amigos, país,…) para apostar neste sonho.Nós amamos a natureza e acreditamos verdadeiramente que se pode desfrutar dela sem a danificar, deixando de lado o turismo em massa e com foco num turismo mais eco-friendly. Um dia, cansados da nossa rotina e em plena crise existencial, decidimos procurar uma casa em qualquer lugar do mundo para meditar e organizar as nossas ideias.Então, nós encontramos este lugar no norte de Portugal, do qual nunca tinhamos ouvido falar. Fomos surpreendidos pela sua beleza natural e paz que nos acolheu.Como não amar um lugar como este?Assim começou a nossa ideia... Como compartilhar este sentimento com os outros?
Nesta base, e com a ilusão de ter encontrado um lugar mágico e inexplorado, criamos e acreditamos nesta ideia: construir um conjunto de 5 casas nas árvores! Ajude-nos a fazer com que isto aconteça!

O projecto foi aprovado pela câmara, e já temos a licença para construir, os projectos de arquitectura estão todos concluídos. Só precisamos do seu apoio para reunir 16.500,00 € para construir a nossa primeira casa na árvore.

O Nosso objetivo é construir um total de 5 casas nas árvores, com a intenção de promover o turismo de pequena escala eco-consciente, com base na filosofia de apreciar a natureza com respeito e tendo cuidado especial com o ambiente.A data de início da construção está prevista para 10/02/2016 quando a campanha crowdfunding estiver concluída. A duração da construção é de 45 dias por casa, esperamos ter tudo pronto para abrir maio de 2016.Decidimos fazer um orçamento em fases e para cada uma delas necessitamos de reunir os 16.500,00 €, deste modo, poderiamos construir uma casa na árvore até a um máximo de 5 casas. A nossa campanha é fixa ""tudo ou nada"", isso significa que as doações só serão eficazes se atingirmos o nosso principal objetivo: 16.500,00 €. Caso contrário, todas as contribuições serão integralmente devolvidas com 100% de segurança, isto porque não teremos acesso ao dinheiro até que a campanha não esteja terminada e o objetivo alcançado.Ubicaçâo do terreno:

Estamos no norte de Portugal, no concelho de Vieira do Minho, numa área incluída na reserva ecológica nacional, devido à sua riqueza de fauna e flora, junto ao Parque Nacional de Peneda Gerês (único parque nacional em Portugal e partilhado com o norte de Espanha). É nesta nossa localização que ficamos constantemente surpresos com os aparecimentos de Corços, Garranos e uma grande variedade de aves entre os quais estão o Milhafre-Real, Águia-de-Asa-Redonda, Águia-Real, Coruja, Gavião e o Cartaxo Nortenho entre outros. Tudo isto com a barragem da Caniçada como fundo.  É uma localização estratégica, situada no meio da natureza, mas com a conveniência da proximidade de cidades como Braga, Porto e Vigo.

Um bom ponto de partida para explorar muitos locais de interesse na área circundante. Com infinitas opções de desportos de água e terra como trekking, canoagem, canyoning, escalada, rapel, passeios a cavalo, pesca, etc.

Descripción del lugar de construcción:Uma enorme floresta com árvores verdes, uma nascente de água em seu centro e um brilhante espelho cristalino como fundo, formado pela albufeira do rio Cávado. Com uma cabana de madeira, uma floresta onde as árvores foram plantadas com menos de um metro e hoje tem mais de 20 !.
A mata onde nossas casas vão se encontrar é um lugar mágico e colorido, onde poder respirar ar puro e ouvir o canto dos pássaros, um lugar para descansar e limpar do stress da vida quotidiana.
Ele está no meio duma região anteriormente Celta onde os nossos antepassados adoraram as árvores, rochas e água por acima de tudo. Terra de onde nasceram numerosos mitos e lendas.

Feche os olhos e imagine-se por um momento a descansar sob de uma árvore, deixando-se invadir pelo  ar puro e pelos sons da natureza. Talvez possa ouvir o som de uma cascata perto ou o vento sussurrante através das árvores. Nós acreditamos que estes são os sentimentos que enriquecem as nossas vidas, que nos fazem refletir, meditar ... inspirar-nos!.

Consciência ecológica: A nossa sociedade está a mudar, mais e mais pessoas estão conscientes da importância de viver em harmonia com a natureza sem a danificar. Esta consciência ecológica levou-nos a realizar todo o nosso projecto por forma a se integrar como parte dela, tentando modificar o ambiente o menos possível. Nós também estamos comprometidos com o trabalho regional, asociando-nos com os agricultores orgânicos (Agricultura Biológica) da região.

Descriçâo técnica:As casinhas serão construídas com um formato hexagonal 24m2 a uma altura de 2,50 a 3,00 metros do chão, obtendo-se assim fácil acesso, deixando o terraço / varanda para uma consideravelmente maior altura graças à inclinação natural do terreno. A madeira, que é um regulador potente de humidade e o isolamento escolhido, proporcionam uma climatização óptima com mínimos recursos, alcançando o máximo de resultados com o menor impacto ambiental.

As casas estão projetadas para a construção nas árvores, tendo em conta a sua maxima preservação, através de um sistema inovador de suportes que prendem a estrutura sem a danificar, graças à compartimentação da árvore e sem impedir o crescimento natural dela (ver Michael Garnier Limb). Além de um desenho que se harmoniza com o ambiente. O mobiliário interior é principalmente madeira reciclada e as cabanas serão equipadas com energia renovável (dependendo do colectado).Todas as unidades serão equipadas com água e electricidade, casa de banho separada (chuveiro e WC).

Piscina (reparação) e filtros de água salgada. Caldeira de aquecimento com “pellets” confeccionados a partir de folhas e ramos da nossa floresta. Construir gerador com base na cascata de água para fornecer eletricidade para as unidades. Área de árvores frutíferas (árvores frutíferas serão plantadas por doações cuja recompensa seja patrocinar uma árvore).
AS RECOMPENSAS APENAS PODEM SER PUBLICADAS NUM SÓ IDIOMA
FAVOR DE CONTACTAR CONNOSCO EM CASO DE TER ALGUMA DÚVIDA

A place where nature is the protagonist. With the inspiration of a magical landscape, taking care in great detail the environmental impact. These treehouses are designed to blend in with the forest without damaging it, where trees do not suffer with the buildings and for interior it is used recycled woods .
This is us, Juan y Karina,a young couple who have left many things behind (home, jobs, friends, country) to bet on this dream.

We love nature and we firmly believe we can enjoy it without damaging it. Leaving aside mass tourism and focusing on a more eco-friendly tourism. One day, tired of our routine and in full existential crisis, we decided to find a house anywhere in the world to meditate and organize our ideas. So we found this place in northern Portugal, which we had never heard of, we were surprised by its natural beauty and peace. How can you not love a place like this?  Thus began our idea ... .How to share this feeling with others?

Starting from that point and with the illusion of having found a magical and unexplored place, we have created and believed in this idea: Build a set of 5 cabins in the trees, help us to make it happen!.

The project is already approved by the local Hall, we have the license to build and the architectural designs are all ready to get it started. We just need your support to raise € 16,500 to build our first treehouse.
Our goal is to build a total of 5 treehouses, with the intention of
promoting small scale eco-conscious tourism based on enjoying nature
respectfully and with special care to the environment.

The construction start date is scheduled for 10.02.2016 once completed crowdfunding campaign. The duration of construction is 45 days per house aprox, which we hope to have everything ready to open in May 2016.
We've decided to do a phased budget as for every € 16,500 collected we could build a tree house with a maximum of 5.
crowdfunding campaign is FIXED ""all or nothing"", this means that

donations will be effective only if we get to reach our first target: € 16,500. Otherwise, all contributions will be returned in a 100%. Since we will not have access to the money until this campaign is not finished and the goal achieved.

We are situated at the north of Portugal in the concelho of Vieira do Minho. In a national ecological reserve due to its wealth of fauna and flora, next to the Peneda Geres National Park (only national park in Portugal shared with the north of Spain) area. From our location we are ocasional surprised by deers, wild horses and a great variety of birds among which are ..the kite, buzzard, eagle owl, hawk and Whinchat among others. All this with the lake of Caniçada as background. It is a strategic location situated in the middle of nature but with the convenience of the proximity of cities like Braga, Porto and Vigo.

A good starting point to explore many points of interest in the surrounding area. With endless water and land sports like trekking, kayaking, canyoning, climbing, abseiling, horse riding, fishing, etc.

Construction place description:A forest with huge green trees and a natural water spring at its center and a bright crystal mirror background formed by the Cávado river. With a log cabin as our home. A forest where trees were planted on less than a meter and measure over 20 today !.

The forest where our treehouses will be at it's a magical and colorful place where you can breathe fresh air and hear birdsongs, a place to rest and clean up from daily stress. It is in the midst of a formerly Celtic region where our ancestors worshiped the forests, rocks and water above all. Cradle of numerous myths and legends.Philosophy:

Close your eyes and imagine yourself for a second relaxing on a tree,  invaded by the fresh air and the sounds of nature. Maybe you can hear the sound of a waterfall nearby or the wind rustling through the branches.  We believe these are the feelings that enrich our lives, make us reflect, meditate ...... inspire.

Ecological consciousness:Our society is changing, more and more people are aware of the importance of living in harmony with nature without damaging it. This ecological consciousness has led us to our whole project, trying to modify the environment as little as possible. We are also committed to regional labor, working with organic farmers in the area.
Technical description:The treehouses are built with an hexagonal format 24m2 at a height of within 2.50 and
3.00 meters from the ground to the base, thus obtaining easy access,
leaving the terrace / balcony / veranda to a considerably greater height
thanks to the natural slope.The wood, which is a potent regulator of moisture and the chosen isolation provide optimum  ambience with minimal resources, achieving maximum
results with the least environmental impact.The
cottages are designed to be build on the trees, taking care these to the maximum,
through an innovative system of supports that hold the structure without

damaging it thanks to the natural compartmentalization of the tree and letting the tree grow naturally (see Michael Garnier Limb). In addition a design that harmonizes with the environment. The interior furnishing is mostly made from recycled wood and the cabins are provide with renewable energy (depending on funds raised).All cabins will be equipped with water and electricit and a separate bathroom (shower and toilet).
Salt water filters for the swimming pool
Pellet extrusioner and pellets made from leaves and small sticks of our forest.
Small waterfall generator to suply our cabins from electricity.Ecological kitchen-gardenOrchard  ( fruit trees will be planted thanks to donations reated to ""plant tree perk""l).

There are many bottle carriers out there but they're either too bulky, cheaply made, and limited on bottles that fit. That's why we came up with the TOTE-ALL carrier which is compact, lightweight, easy to carry, and fits many bottles and flasks!

The TOTE-ALL carrier consists of a shoulder strap, bottle holder and caddy which are all adjustable! The bottle holder is a loop system that closes firmly under the edge of a bottleneck by pulling the straps outward. The caddy is a velcro system that adjusts to carry items like your phone or wallet.
How can you use TOTE-ALL?  You can bring it to the gym, hiking, to the mall, to school, to the office, camping, to the beach, traveling, virtually anywhere!

So in order for us to bring TOTE-ALL to you, we need your help. We have secured our manufacturer and they are ready to go.  So please checkout our perks and be part of the TOTE-ALL solution! Thank you so much for your support!

Mithril Customised Luggage

By Carnage Atelier

AFFORDABLE. FAIRLY PRICED. HIGH QUALITY. CUSTOMISED LUGGAGE. 

Hi, I'm Melvin, and I love to travel, like most people do. However I am not a fan of boring, monotonous luggage cases. Everyone has their unique look and style, why should our luggage all look the same?

Express your individuality with Mithril Customised Luggage cases. Expertly crafted, 100% hand assembled on order. Unique. Just for you.With the benefits of 15% lighter than competitor yet with more storage space and at least 23% more scratch resistant Anodized casing forged out of one piece magnesium alloy

The Luggage:

Anodised surface treatment - for added strength and scratch resistance Lovingly hand built in our very own workshop - assembled to order
Dual lever clamps with integrated TSA combination locks
Tight fitting tongue and groove closure - ensures no liquid or dust will get in
Silent multi directional spinner wheels - sourced from same suppliers of big name luggage brands
Titanium telescoping retractable locking handles - Aerospace grade titanium for strength and durability
Fairly priced - a fraction of what other comparable luggage cases would cost.
Light weight, extremely tough and durable. Built to last a lifetime.

The luggage cases come in two sizes:

All our luggage comes with the option to engrave wordings of your choice, on the flat surfaces on your luggage. 

*Currently we are offering the option for the area right above the side handle or under the top handles (as seen in the pictures above). We are working with our production facility to include more areas.

Make the luggage truly yours. Engrave your name, special dates, your favourite quote, a verse of your favourite song!

Ordering Process:

Step 1: Select you luggage size, S or M.

Step 2: Select the colours for the individual luggage parts

- Case (2 pieces)

- Centre Case (2 pieces) 

- Case Corners (2 pairs)

- Hinges (2 pieces)

- Dual Lever Clamps (2 Pieces)

- Handles (Top, Side)

- Telescoping Handle (Handle and bars)

Current colours offered are: Black, Platinium, Silver, Rose Gold, Champagne Gold, Yellow Gold, Lime Green, Fuscia Pink, Candy Red, Sky Blue, Lilac

- Rivets *Choose from Black/ Silver/ Champagne Gold

- Wheels *Choose from Black/ Silver/ Champagne Gold

Step 3: If you would like to include engraving. 

-Specify the area
column21:
Under top handle (up to 15 letters) or below side handle (as many as space allows),  

- Tell us your wordings (currently we only offer words consisting of alphabets and punctuation). 

*We will contact you to discuss the wordings should the selected words not fit.

","Mithril Customised LuggageBy Carnage AtelierAFFORDABLE. FAIRLY PRICED. HIGH QUALITY. CUSTOMISED LUGGAGE. Hi, I'm Melvin, and I love to travel, like most people do. However I am not a fan of boring, monotonous luggage cases. Everyone has their unique look and style, why should our luggage all look the same?Express your individuality with Mithril Customised Luggage cases. Expertly crafted, 100% hand assembled on order. Unique. Just for you.With the benefits of 15% lighter than competitor yet with more storage space and at least 23% more scratch resistant Anodized casing forged out of one piece magnesium alloy Customised Black and Red Cabin Luggage CaseThe Luggage:

column1: Hard sided grooved Magnesium Aluminium Alloy case - The very material aircrafts are constructed from!
Anodised surface treatment - for added strength and scratch resistance Lovingly hand built in our very own workshop - assembled to order
Dual lever clamps with integrated TSA combination locks
Tight fitting tongue and groove closure - ensures no liquid or dust will get in
Silent multi directional spinner wheels - sourced from same suppliers of big name luggage brands
Titanium telescoping retractable locking handles - Aerospace grade titanium for strength and durability
Fairly priced - a fraction of what other comparable luggage cases would cost.
Light weight, extremely tough and durable. Built to last a lifetime.
TUV/BV/ROHS/MSDS certified - The big boys approve!
The luggage cases come in two sizes: S : 50cm x 36cm x 23cm (40L) , 4.3kgM : 63cm x 41cm x 25cm (63L) , 5.7kgCustomisationChoose from a wide range of colors

column1: Welcome to Paragon X: The World's Sleekest, Smart Backpack.

My name is Phillip. I was born and raised in the beautiful and rainy city of Seattle. I am a lover of music, sports and the outdoors. As someone always on the go, I realized there was something missing in the backpack space... A sleek backpack that is actually smart and secure
column2: that's why I took the matter into my own hands and designed the Paragon X.

column1: par·a·gon - ""A person or thing viewed as a model of excellence.""

An integrated built-in charger allows your phone, tablet, or other devices to be charged while on the go. The usb port is located conveniently under the right strap.

17 pockets and a smart layout allows you to conveniently travel with all your essentials, effectively turning your backpack into mobile office.
 

The Hidden Zipper - Anti-Theft System

Stay at peace. Your valuables can only be accessed when the backpack is off your shoulders thanks to the hidden zipper design.

On the back side of the backpack, the hidden zipper prevent thieves from sneaking away with your valuables. 
 

The Interior Layout

Your items will be kept safe and secure with a well organized 17-pocket system. The backpack can hold and protect a 15.7"" laptop and a 10.1"" tablet.
 

The Quick Access Pockets

 

Secure, but Convenient
Two quick access pockets on the front straps make it easy to reach your essentials like credit cards, cash, or ID.

The Rain Cover

 

 

As we all know, it's what's inside that matters most. We added a built-in rain cover to keep your belongings safe from pouring rain. The rain cover can be easily accessed by a zipper located on the bottom of the backpack.

Designed for Comfort and Support

 

Paragon X helps decrease back stress thanks to smart pocket placement. Be more comfortable with up to 20-25% less stress off your shoulders than competing brands.

Keep your back sweat-free thanks to the breathable material and unique airflow-improving design used in production.


The Backpack Specs

 

 

Safety Reflectors

 Stay visible and safe in night time with 4 safety light reflectors located on the front and back of the backpack.

Your Rewards

Stretch Goals​

COMING SOON..

 

 Thank you for viewing our project!

 

 

 

Project Timeline

PRODUCTION SCHEDULE

JAN 02 - PROJECT BEGINS
FEB 01 - PROJECT ENDS
MAR 01 - PARAGON X OUT FOR DELIVERY

As of today, we are completely ready for production if we reach our funding goals.

Thank you for supporting our vision and backing Paragon X - we know you will absolutely love it as much as we do!

Risks and challenges

We took it upon ourselves to minimize your risk as much as possible. Paragon X is completely ready for production with the manufacturing set in place
column2:
all we need is the funding. We are ready to tackle any issue that may arise during and after the funding process.

column1:
0,"

(ENG) We are 3 young people who have travelled for a long time around the world. We have decided to return to our land to promote it and enhance it through our skills. We have experience in tourism, communication, travel and human relationships with customers. We master languages, social networks and our territory, but above all we deeply love the Dolomites.

We want to make this incredible and little known valley known all over the world. We believe that once you have visited these places it is impossible to forget them. Up to now, effective marketing tourism and promotion of this territory have been completely missed. This is causing a slow but unstoppable depopulation. We want to offer to young people the opportunity to continue living in this area.  We can give to the tourists and travelers the key to discover this corner of paradise.

With your help we can create a unique project, able to promote this wonderful valley internationally. We can let visitors from all over the world know about these places. We can leave them speechless. Together, we can increase employment for many local businesses and thus encourage young people to open new accommodation facilities and launch new business initiatives.



(ITA) Siamo 3 giovani che dopo aver viaggiato a lungo in giro per il mondo, hanno deciso di tornare nella loro terra per promuoverla e valorizzarla attraverso le proprie competenze. Abbiamo esperienza nel turismo, nella comunicazione, nei viaggi e nei rapporti umani con i clienti. Conosciamo le lingue, i social network e il nostro territorio, ma soprattutto amiamo profondamente le Dolomiti.

Vogliamo far conoscere a tutto il mondo questa valle incredibile e poco conosciuta. Riteniamo che una volta visitati questi posti sia impossibile dimenticarli. Fino ad oggi, sono mancate completamente azioni efficaci di marketing turistico e promozione di questo territorio che, a poco a poco, si sta spopolando. Noi vogliamo dare ai giovani la possibilità di continuare a vivere nei nostri paesi e ai turisti e viaggiatori la chiave per scoprire questo angolo di paradiso.

Con il Vostro aiuto possiamo creare un progetto unico nel suo genere, in grado di promuovere a livello internazionale questa valle stupenda. Possiamo far conoscere ai visitatori di tutto il mondo questi posti che lasciano chiunque senza parole. Insieme, possiamo dare lavoro a tantissime realtà del territorio, incentivare così i giovani ad aprire nuove strutture ricettive e lanciare nuove iniziative imprenditoriali.



(ENG) We would like to raise at least € 30,000 to run our start-up and offer a level of tourist experience to our supporters. An effective and professional website (€ 5,000), an info-point as a point of receipt and promotion (€ 10,000), paper and digital promotional materials (€ 5,000), participation in trade shows (€ 8,000), promotions on social media (€ 2,000) are needed to start.

You will have the opportunity, with our support, to live an experience that will allow you to spend a week-end or a week of sport, relaxation, love and culture in an incredible place that will leave you speechless and with indelible memories! The prices of packages (perks) are promotional, exclusive and discounted only for you and only during the time of this campaign.

Without achieving the goal, we will give up our project. We will return to everyone the amount invested.



(ITA)
column3:
'>Vorremmo raccogliere almeno € 30.000 per avviare al nostra start-up e offrire un’esperienza turistica di livello ai nostri sostenitori. Un sito web efficace e professionale (€ 5.000), un info-point come punto di ricevimento e promozione (€ 10.000), materiali promozionali cartacei e digitali (€ 5.000), partecipazioni a fiere del settore (€ 8.000), promozioni sui social media (€ 2.000).

Avrete la possibilità, con il nostro sostegno, di vivere un’esperienza che vi permetterà di passare un week-end o una settimana all’insegna dello sport, del relax, dell’amore e della cultura in un territorio incredibile che vi lascerà senza parole e con dei ricordi indelebili! I prezzi dei pacchetti (premi) sono promozionali, esclusivi e scontati rispetto i prezzi di listino che in futuro offriremo ai turisti.

Senza il raggiungimento dell’obiettivo rinunciamo a lanciare il nostro progetto. In tal caso restituiremo a tutti quanto investito.

(ENG) With your contribution you will help our land and at the same time you will give yourself a unique experience at a special price.

Every year 70 million travelers visit Venice which is only one hour's drive from here. We are convinced that with the right promotion targeted, at least 2-3% of them will decide to visit our land. We are talking of 1,5-2 million visitors per year and a turnover of ca. 350 million euros. We are talking about a very small part of travelers already in the area that with little effort could come to know and then promote our beautiful territory. With your help, we can build a future for this valley and you can be among the first to use our services (discounted and limited offers).



(ITA) Con il tuo contributo aiuterai la nostra terra e contemporaneamente ti regalerai un’esperienza unica a un prezzo speciale.

Ogni anno 70 milioni di viaggiatori visitano Venezia che si trova a solamente 1 ora di strada da qui. Siamo convinti che con una giusta promozione mirata almeno un 2-3% di loro possa decidere di visitare anche le nostre terre. Stiamo parlando di 1,5-2 milioni di visitatori all’anno per un fatturato di ca. 350 milioni di Euro. Stiamo parlando di una piccolissima parte di viaggiatori già presenti in zona che con poco sforzo potrebbero venire a conoscere e poi promuovere i nostri territori incantevoli. Con il tuo aiuto possiamo costruire un futuro per questa valle e tu puoi essere tra i primi a usufruire dei nostri servizi (a prezzi scontati e offerte limitate).

(ENG) If at this moment you can not buy one of our experiences, help us by word of mouth! Share this project on social media, help us to reach as many contacts as possible! Introduce the Cadore in the world. Use the tools on this page to increase our visibility.

(ITA) Se in questo momento non puoi comprare una delle nostre esperienze, aiutaci con il passa parola! Condivi sui social questo progetto, aiutaci a raggiungere più contatti possibili. Fai conoscere il Cadore nel mondo. Utilizza gli strumenti presenti in questa pagina per aumentare la nostra visibilità.

​#01 - Poster and sticker - €10

We need your support to make our dream come true. You will receive a poster with suggestive images of Cadore and our Welcome Dolomiti sticker - (ITA) Necessitiamo del vostro supporto per realizzare il nostro sogno. Riceverete un poster con delle suggestive immagini del Cadore e il nostro adesivo Welcome Dolomiti.

• Poster of Cadore/Dolomiti - Poster del Cadore/Dolomiti 
• Sticker of Welcome Dolomiti - Adesivo di Welcome Dolomiti        

​#02 - Our Lake on Pedalo - €25

No noises just relax, you can immerse yourself in this pedalo-tour around our magnificent lake. For one person - (ITA) Niente rumori ma solo relax per voi, in questo tour in pedalò, nel nostro magnifico lago. Per una persona.

• Welcome drink - Aperitivo di benvenuto      
• Pedalo rental for 3 hours for a tour on the lake - Noleggio pedalo per 3 ore per un giro del lago

​​#03 - Visit to Pieve di Cadore - €50

The artistic and cultural centre, where Tiziano Vecellio, known renaissance painter, was born. Come to discover our history in a special visit. Guided visit for one person - (ITA) Uno tra i nostri centri culturali più importanti e casa madre di Tiziano Vecellio. Scoprite le nostre origini attraverso questo piccolo tour culturale. Visita guidata per una persona.

• Welcome drink - Aperitivo di benvenuto 
• Cultural and artistic visit in Pieve di Cadore - Visita culturale ed artistica a Pieve di Cadore  
• Local guide for 3 hours - Guida del posto a disposizione per 3 ore

column1:
​​​#04 - Bike ride on Dolomites - €58

The famous ""Ciclabile Dolomiti"" (considered one of the most amazing trail in the world) cycle lane runs along the old railway line. From Dobbiaco to Calalzo di Cadore, through Cortina d'Ampezzo. This bike-ride through the Dolomites will give you emotional panoramic views. For one person - (ITA) La famosa ""Ciclabile delle Dolomiti"" (considerata tra le più belle ciclabili del mondo) percorre tutta la vecchia linea ferroviaria. Da Dobbiaco a Calalzo di Cadore, attraverso Cortina d'Ampezzo. Questa pedalata vi regalerà emozionanti scorci panoramici. Per una persona.

• Bus tickets - Biglietti autobus
• Bike rent - Noleggio bici
• ""Ciclabile Dolomiti"" T-shirt, as a gift - Maglietta ""Ciclabile Dolomiti"", in omaggio
• Lunch on a local bar on the road - Pranzo presso un punto ristoro lungo il percorso

Live this experience, with a romantic high-altitude happy hour, in Cortina D'Ampezzo. For two people - (ITA) Vivete quest'emozione regalandovi un'aperitivo romantico in alta quota a Cortina D'Ampezzo. Per due persone.

• Cable car tickets - Biglietti funivia
• Drinks and finger food - Aperitivo con finger food

​#06 - Basket of local products - €99

Perfumes of healthy food that you can taste having one basket of Cadore typical products. A good tasting to support our project - (ITA) Profumi di natura e cibo sano, che potrete degustare con un nostro cesto di prodotti tipici del Cadore. Un assaggio di gusto per supportare il nostro progetto.

Basket of typical products - Cesto di prodotti tipici
• High quality and here produced cheese and cold meat from malga, honey, cider, fruit and vegetables - Prodotti localmente formaggi e affettati di malga, miele, sidro, frutta e verdure di alta qualità.

​#07 - Deluxe and traditional dinner - €180

A luxury dinner in one of our award-winnings restaurants. For two people - (ITA) Una lussuosa cena in uno dei nostri ristoranti stellati. Per due persone.

• Welcome drink - Aperitivo di benvenuto 
• Deluxe dinner for two people. Special menù for our backers to try all the tastes of our Dolomites- Cena di lusso per due persone. Menù pensato per assaggiare i sapori del nostro territorio.

​#08 - Wild weekend summer - €390

With this perk, we offer you 3 days in which you can really experience the mountains. Immersed in the unspoiled nature of the Dolomites. For two people - Con questo premio, vi offriamo 3 giorni in cui potrete vivere la montagna nella sua massima espressione: immersi nella natura incontaminata delle Dolomiti. Per due persone. 

First day - Primo giorno
• Mountain trekking - Camminata in montagna
• Dinner in mountain hut - Cena in rifugio
• Overnight stay in mountain hut - Pernottamento in rifugio
Second day - Secondo giorno
• Mountain trekking - Camminata in montagna
• Local lunch - Pranzo tipico
• Dinner in mountain hut - Cena in rifugio
• Overnight stay in mountain hut - Pernottamento in rifugio
Third day - Terzo giorno
• Mountain trekking - Camminata in montagna
• Local lunch - Pranzo tipico

#09 - Sport weekend summer - €520

If you love sports, this is the right experience for you. 3 days of pure sport to fully experience the Dolomites - (ITA) Se ami lo sport, questa è il premio giusto per te. 3 giorni di puro sport per vivere appieno le Dolomiti.

First day - Primo giorno
