Grazie a Aldo Del Favero, Andrea Da Cortà, Roberto Zanette e Franco Oliveri per alcune fotografie presenti in questa pagina. Grazie ad Alessandra del Favero, Francesco Cervo e Manaz Production per il video.  

Contact / Contatti: info@welcomedolomiti.it

","(ENG) We are 3 young people who have travelled for a long time around the world. We have decided to return to our land to promote it and enhance it through our skills. We have experience in tourism, communication, travel and human relationships with customers. We master languages, social networks and our territory, but above all we deeply love the Dolomites.We want to make this incredible and little known valley known all over the world. We believe that once you have visited these places it is impossible to forget them. Up to now, effective marketing tourism and promotion of this territory have been completely missed. This is causing a slow but unstoppable depopulation. We want to offer to young people the opportunity to continue living in this area.  We can give to the tourists and travelers the key to discover this corner of paradise.With your help we can create a unique project, able to promote this wonderful valley internationally. We can let visitors from all over the world know about these places. We can leave them speechless. Together, we can increase employment for many local businesses and thus encourage young people to open new accommodation facilities and launch new business initiatives.(ITA) Siamo 3 giovani che dopo aver viaggiato a lungo in giro per il mondo, hanno deciso di tornare nella loro terra per promuoverla e valorizzarla attraverso le proprie competenze. Abbiamo esperienza nel turismo, nella comunicazione, nei viaggi e nei rapporti umani con i clienti. Conosciamo le lingue, i social network e il nostro territorio, ma soprattutto amiamo profondamente le Dolomiti.Vogliamo far conoscere a tutto il mondo questa valle incredibile e poco conosciuta. Riteniamo che una volta visitati questi posti sia impossibile dimenticarli. Fino ad oggi, sono mancate completamente azioni efficaci di marketing turistico e promozione di questo territorio che, a poco a poco, si sta spopolando. Noi vogliamo dare ai giovani la possibilità di continuare a vivere nei nostri paesi e ai turisti e viaggiatori la chiave per scoprire questo angolo di paradiso.Con il Vostro aiuto possiamo creare un progetto unico nel suo genere, in grado di promuovere a livello internazionale questa valle stupenda. Possiamo far conoscere ai visitatori di tutto il mondo questi posti che lasciano chiunque senza parole. Insieme, possiamo dare lavoro a tantissime realtà del territorio, incentivare così i giovani ad aprire nuove strutture ricettive e lanciare nuove iniziative imprenditoriali.(ENG) We would like to raise at least € 30,000 to run our start-up and offer a level of tourist experience to our supporters. An effective and professional website (€ 5,000), an info-point as a point of receipt and promotion (€ 10,000), paper and digital promotional materials (€ 5,000), participation in trade shows (€ 8,000), promotions on social media (€ 2,000) are needed to start.You will have the opportunity, with our support, to live an experience that will allow you to spend a week-end or a week of sport, relaxation, love and culture in an incredible place that will leave you speechless and with indelible memories! The prices of packages (perks) are promotional, exclusive and discounted only for you and only during the time of this campaign.Without achieving the goal, we will give up our project. We will return to everyone the amount invested.(ITA) Vorremmo raccogliere almeno € 30.000 per avviare al nostra start-up e offrire un’esperienza turistica di livello ai nostri sostenitori. Un sito web efficace e professionale (€ 5.000), un info-point come punto di ricevimento e promozione (€ 10.000), materiali promozionali cartacei e digitali (€ 5.000), partecipazioni a fiere del settore (€ 8.000), promozioni sui social media (€ 2.000).Avrete la possibilità, con il nostro sostegno, di vivere un’esperienza che vi permetterà di passare un week-end o una settimana all’insegna dello sport, del relax, dell’amore e della cultura in un territorio incredibile che vi lascerà senza parole e con dei ricordi indelebili! I prezzi dei pacchetti (premi) sono promozionali, esclusivi e scontati rispetto i prezzi di listino che in futuro offriremo ai turisti.Senza il raggiungimento dell’obiettivo rinunciamo a lanciare il nostro progetto. In tal caso restituiremo a tutti quanto investito.(ENG) With your contribution you will help our land and at the same time you will give yourself a unique experience at a special price.Every year 70 million travelers visit Venice which is only one hour's drive from here. We are convinced that with the right promotion targeted, at least 2-3% of them will decide to visit our land. We are talking of 1,5-2 million visitors per year and a turnover of ca. 350 million euros. We are talking about a very small part of travelers already in the area that with little effort could come to know and then promote our beautiful territory. With your help, we can build a future for this valley and you can be among the first to use our services (discounted and limited offers).(ITA) Con il tuo contributo aiuterai la nostra terra e contemporaneamente ti regalerai un’esperienza unica a un prezzo speciale.Ogni anno 70 milioni di viaggiatori visitano Venezia che si trova a solamente 1 ora di strada da qui. Siamo convinti che con una giusta promozione mirata almeno un 2-3% di loro possa decidere di visitare anche le nostre terre. Stiamo parlando di 1,5-2 milioni di visitatori all’anno per un fatturato di ca. 350 milioni di Euro. Stiamo parlando di una piccolissima parte di viaggiatori già presenti in zona che con poco sforzo potrebbero venire a conoscere e poi promuovere i nostri territori incantevoli. Con il tuo aiuto possiamo costruire un futuro per questa valle e tu puoi essere tra i primi a usufruire dei nostri servizi (a prezzi scontati e offerte limitate).(ENG) If at this moment you can not buy one of our experiences, help us by word of mouth! Share this project on social media, help us to reach as many contacts as possible! Introduce the Cadore in the world. Use the tools on this page to increase our visibility.(ITA) Se in questo momento non puoi comprare una delle nostre esperienze, aiutaci con il passa parola! Condivi sui social questo progetto, aiutaci a raggiungere più contatti possibili. Fai conoscere il Cadore nel mondo. Utilizza gli strumenti presenti in questa pagina per aumentare la nostra visibilità.​#01 - Poster and sticker - €10We need your support to make our dream come true. You will receive a poster with suggestive images of Cadore and our Welcome Dolomiti sticker - (ITA) Necessitiamo del vostro supporto per realizzare il nostro sogno. Riceverete un poster con delle suggestive immagini del Cadore e il nostro adesivo Welcome Dolomiti.• Poster of Cadore/Dolomiti - Poster del Cadore/Dolomiti • Sticker of Welcome Dolomiti - Adesivo di Welcome Dolomiti        ​#02 - Our Lake on Pedalo - €25No noises just relax, you can immerse yourself in this pedalo-tour around our magnificent lake. For one person - (ITA) Niente rumori ma solo relax per voi, in questo tour in pedalò, nel nostro magnifico lago. Per una persona.• Welcome drink - Aperitivo di benvenuto      • Pedalo rental for 3 hours for a tour on the lake - Noleggio pedalo per 3 ore per un giro del lago​​#03 - Visit to Pieve di Cadore - €50The artistic and cultural centre, where Tiziano Vecellio, known renaissance painter, was born. Come to discover our history in a special visit. Guided visit for one person - (ITA) Uno tra i nostri centri culturali più importanti e casa madre di Tiziano Vecellio. Scoprite le nostre origini attraverso questo piccolo tour culturale. Visita guidata per una persona.• Welcome drink - Aperitivo di benvenuto • Cultural and artistic visit in Pieve di Cadore - Visita culturale ed artistica a Pieve di Cadore  • Local guide for 3 hours - Guida del posto a disposizione per 3 ore

column1: ​​​#04 - Bike ride on Dolomites - €58The famous ""Ciclabile Dolomiti"" (considered one of the most amazing trail in the world) cycle lane runs along the old railway line. From Dobbiaco to Calalzo di Cadore, through Cortina d'Ampezzo. This bike-ride through the Dolomites will give you emotional panoramic views. For one person - (ITA) La famosa ""Ciclabile delle Dolomiti"" (considerata tra le più belle ciclabili del mondo) percorre tutta la vecchia linea ferroviaria. Da Dobbiaco a Calalzo di Cadore, attraverso Cortina d'Ampezzo. Questa pedalata vi regalerà emozionanti scorci panoramici. Per una persona.• Bus tickets - Biglietti autobus• Bike rent - Noleggio bici• ""Ciclabile Dolomiti"" T-shirt, as a gift - Maglietta ""Ciclabile Dolomiti"", in omaggio• Lunch on a local bar on the road - Pranzo presso un punto ristoro lungo il percorso

Live this experience, with a romantic high-altitude happy hour, in Cortina D'Ampezzo. For two people - (ITA) Vivete quest'emozione regalandovi un'aperitivo romantico in alta quota a Cortina D'Ampezzo. Per due persone.• Cable car tickets - Biglietti funivia• Drinks and finger food - Aperitivo con finger food

Have you been searching for a stylish travel bag which is also functional and yet all you can find are stylish bags that are not functional to functional bags that are not stylish.

 

Well, your search is over. We have designed a unique leather weekender bag which not only is elegant and stylish but also super functional.

 

We don’t believe in compromise - From now on, it is possible to keep travel easy and stylish with a high-performance product which will last for years. We have designed our bags to be both beautiful and multifunctional. This bag is designed with the sole purpose to give you great looks while travelling but also great comfort of a true traveller.

The combination of style and functionality is hard to find in any other bag of such kind:

Separate side compartment to safely store laptops, cables, chargers, books, hard drives and headphones. This compartment makes airport security checks simple - you can simply remove all electronics without opening the main compartment. Now, all are easily accessible so you don’t need an extra laptop bag.

- Separate shoes &
column2:
dirty clothes compartment will make packing more efficient

- Two outer pockets to keep important papers or keys safe.

- One open front pocket to keep things for easy access while travelling. 

- A luggage strap to hook on trolly bag.

All of these features in beautiful colour combinations, made out of strong, life-lasting buffalo leather, will make this bag your best travel companion

column1: • The laptop compartment was carefully designed for easy access while travelling.
• The compartment can fit laptop up to 15''.
• The compartment has a thick double safe padding to keep the laptop well-protected while travelling.

THE STYLISH DESIGN - The bag is designed to keep the elegant style, which makes it stand out among other bags. 

While being a stylish leather bag, it still delivers high functionality during your short or long travels.

The bags are made from top-grade buffalo leather. Buffalo leather is much stronger traditional leather and presents a unique high-end finish, With an epidermal protective layer up to three times thicker than cowhide, buffalo leather provides unsurpassed strength and flexibility. Available in a wide range of colours gives a unique style.

 

VÖÖR BAGS SUITS ALL KIND OF TRAVELLERS. 

 

 

DIMENSIONS - The bag has carefully made in a specific measurement to be compatible with its unique laptop compartment, easy to carry, to adopt all kinds of travel and within all IATA cabin bag sizes.

MULTI-COLOURS - Each bag is designed in multi-colour combination to give a beautiful and unique look.

COLOUR OPTIONS -

BLACK WITH CHEERY BROWN

CHEERY BROWN WITH BLACK

 

 

ALL BAGS HAVE BEAUTIFUL HIGH-QUALITY NYLON LINING

PASSPORT COVERS

The passport cover is beautifully designed as well. It comes in a multi-colour combination of suede leather and leather to keep passport, cards and boarding passes all in one place.

THE TOILETRY BAG

Unique design with 180 degrees open and has a separate compartment to keep things according to your needs, it is designed to give you full excess to all stuff inside with a full wide opening. 

DIRECT MANUFACTURERS 

WE ARE A DIRECT MANUFACTURER OF OUR ALL PRODUCTS AND BECAUSE OF THAT, WE CAN MAINTAIN HIGH QUALITY AND GOOD PRICE RANGE WITHOUT ANY MIDDLE MAN OR OFFSHORE FACTORY INVOLVEMENT OR COMMISSION.

 

SHIPPING &
column2:
TAXES

We are offering free shipping worldwide.

You will receive a tracking number within 24hr of shipping of the consignment.

The prices do not include taxes and customs duties which may apply outside the EU.

 

SUMMARY

TRAVEL BAG

LAPTOP/ELECTRONIC COMPARTMENT

HANDMADE

THE HIGH-END  DESIGN

TOP GRADE BUFFALO CRUNCH LEATHER VEG NATURAL TAN

SHOE/DIRTY CLOTHES COMPARTMENT

DIMENSIONS - H:30 CM, W:50 CM, D:20 CM TOP 26 CM BOTTOM

WEIGHT -1.8 KG 

THREE INNER POCKETS

ONE INNER ZIPPER POCKET

COLOUR- CHEERY BROWN WITH BLACK, BLACK WITH CHERRY BROWN

2 OUTER ZIPPER POCKETS

1 OPEN FRONT POCKET 

METAL BUCKLES

YKK ZIPPERS

TROLLY STRAP

NYLON LINING

LIFETIME WARRANTY 

PASSPORT WALLETS

SUEDE LEATHER 

CALF LEATHER

COLOURS- BLACK, BURGUNDY, CAMEL, BLUE AND MAROON

DIMENSIONS- H:14.5 CM, W: 9 CM

4 INTERNAL POCKETS

TOILETRY BAG

COLOUR- BLACK, DARK ORANGE

DIMENSIONS-D: 9 CM, W: 21 CM H:16 CM

2 SEPARATE COMPARTMENTS

Risks and challenges

This is our first campaign although Vöör as a fashion brand is successfully running from last few years since it has started, we care about our customer upmost and keep very high standards for all productions and quality of leather used in our all kinds of bags.

We make high-quality luxury handmade leather bags with a very reasonable price range. Because we own our manufacturing facility and are direct producers, we cut the middleman commissions, passing the savings on to you. Because we design and produce our bags ourselves, we are in complete control of the quality and keep special attention to all minor details.

LIFETIME WARRANTY
We as a company believe in providing the best of the quality and customer service, our Leather bags are handmade for lifetime use and that we warranty them against defects in materials and any manufacturing defects. on that behalf If there is ever a problem with one of our products just send it back to us and we will replace it.

* We do not guarantee if our leather products damage by your own miss care or mishandling.

If you will receive after campaign any manufacturing defect or damage product we would return it and send you a new on our cost.

Thank you for showing interest and support for the campaign. if you have any kind of queries you can contact us on indiegogo or directly on our email.
sales@voorfashion.com

We love to bike and do

outdoor activities just like anyone else. However, carrying our personal belongings in one place is a challenge.  We end up carrying pouches, water bottle, bags and essential kits in a disorganized way. Hence we set our sights on completely changing the way people carrying their belongings and water on the go with greater convenience.  This is why Seizon™ is born.

column2: >Seizon™ is patent pending design for its dual-compartment to store your personal essentials in the bottom and drinking water in the top.
column3: >Comes in aesthetically pleasing graphics, its ergonomically designed bottle shape provides better grip and fits perfectly into bike cages or backpacks' pocket.  We choose made-in-USA Eastman Tritan™ co-polyester material, normally found in premium sports bottles, for its durability, BPA and odor free. It's leak-proof design  keeps your essentials clean and dry. Seizon™ is a testimony to the inventive utilization of space and design in what would otherwise be a run-of-the-mill sports water bottle.
>We received a government award for R&amp
column4: D, thus helping us to refine the design to its maximum capabilities in lightness, size and durability.

column1: Use it ANYWHERE – We welcome you to share ways in using Seizon™ to improve your daily lifestyle.

Be ready anytime, anywhere in an emergency situation. Let Seizon™ bottle organized your emergency essentials kit including water while on-the-go. The 2-in-1 benefits give greater convenience and peace of mind to all.
Equip when your are out at the outbacks:
Seizon™ is a good way to separate your safety essentials for your backpack and allow these essentials to move from pack to pack.
column2: >You can keep your mini-torchlight, matches, compass
column3: >, swiss army knife, emergency blanket, hiking map and energy bar.

column1: Re-charge with energy bars and drinks on an expedition:
Enjoy your outdoor adventure with confidence and style. Recharge and refresh with precious water and energy supplements to keep you hydrated and energized at all times. Ideal for Gym workout too!
Learn to share your goodies at school:

Picnics and outdoor activities are the most fun and exciting part for any school going kids. Parents are always anxious about their safety and to stay hydrated in a hot day. You can rely on Seizon™ bottle for their drinking needs. You can even pack snacks like chocolate bar or cookies in the bottom compartment so your children can snack when they are hungry.

A great way to remember your supplements:
carrying a pre-pack First Aid box, why not use Seizon™ to store your own
preferred First Aid Kit with your vitamins or supplements and necessary medical essentials?

column7: '>Seizon™ bottle is a simple idea, but we believe it can impact the active communities in a BIG way. We’re still a new start up that is established with our personal savings so that’s why we need your help. You can support by pledging and also sharing the campaign on social media.

column1: F               Y                I                 T            www.seizon.online
the design of my Seizon™ bottle?
will be sending a survey at the end of the campaign to request for your
selection and confirm the shipping address. If you’ve purchased more than one Seizon™, you can choose different
plan the first 10,000 pieces to be shipped out in the period of Dec 16 - Jan 17.
choose  EastmanTritan® special grade co-polyester resin that is non-toxic, BPA-free and can
withstand high impact. This same material is commonly used in
baby milk bottles and premium water bottles.
special cap design allows the liquid to be sucked or dripped out from the top
compartment. The drip rate can be controlled by rotating the silicon nipple.
top compartment can contain 400 mL (equivalent to 1 coffee cup). If
the bottom compartment is used to store liquid, it can contain 380 mL. This is equivalent to a volumetric size of a Campbell's tomato soup can (net wt :310g/10.9oz).
essentials can be stored in the bottom compartment?

Any items that can fit!   You can use it to carry your cash, credit card, keys, mini-torch light, multi-function toolkit, usb, and even snacks for on-the-go lifestyle activities. It’s up to your imagination on how best to utilise the Seizon™.
bet!  We have undergone several testing
iterations to ensure that it’s leak-proof and able to withstand drops without dislodging
or crack. The selection of the material and thread design are keys for superior
use cases for Seizon™ is limitless. For bikers, it can be used to store bike

essentials such as spare tire, repair kit, or energy bars. For an elderly strolling in the park, these may include cash, keys, a small towel, important medication and of course, water.  Movie-goers can include snacks and a soda drink while enjoying their entertainment.
weight of Seizon™ before adding water and essentials?
The height measures 267 mm and bottom diameter is 73 mm. The total weight is 167.5 grams.
skin design for corporate gift/major events?

At this stage, our priority is on delivering the product to our faithful backers via crowdfunding. After this, we have plans to market Seizon™ bottles to international distributors and retailers as well as produce exclusive design for corporate events. Do contact us - sales@seizon.online if you are interested.

outdoor activities just like anyone else. However, carrying our personal belongings in one place is a challenge.  We end up carrying pouches, water bottle, bags and essential kits in a disorganized way. Hence we set our sights on completely changing the way people carrying their belongings and water on the go with greater convenience.  This is why Seizon™ is born.

Seizon™ is patent pending design for its dual-compartment to store your personal essentials in the bottom and drinking water in the top. Comes in aesthetically pleasing graphics, its ergonomically designed bottle shape provides better grip and fits perfectly into bike cages or backpacks' pocket.  We choose made-in-USA Eastman Tritan™ co-polyester material, normally found in premium sports bottles, for its durability, BPA and odor free. It's leak-proof design  keeps your essentials clean and dry. Seizon™ is a testimony to the inventive utilization of space and design in what would otherwise be a run-of-the-mill sports water bottle.
We received a government award for R&D, thus helping us to refine the design to its maximum capabilities in lightness, size and durability.

About Me and Do More Derby (www.DoMoreDerby.com)

My name is Jax Kerowhack and I’m a pivot for Central Kansas Roller Derby and a blocker for Team Kansas.  Like most derby players, I travel for derby – to away bouts, boot camps, tournaments – every chance I get to learn more, play more, and watch more derby.  I decided to start DoMoreDerby.com to help lower my travel costs so I can, we all can, Do More Derby.

We are running this campaign to collect pre-paid memberships so that we can launch our new website, www.DoMoreDerby.com.  This website will:
• Be membership based, open to everyone in the roller derby community

• Be a mix of AirBNB and Couchsurfing – you will search the site for other members in any location you are planning to travel for derby.You can search through member profiles to find the location and host that you think fit you best.Your stay with this host is totally free, the only cost is the $20 per year annual membership to the site.Hosts are not expected to provide meals or transportation, only a clean, safe place to sleep.

• Include profiles of each member including their city, state, the team they are affiliated with, 2 references from that team, pictures of the space they have to offer, and information such as their smoking and drinking policies, as well as if they have pets, kids, and allergies.
• Display ratings and feedback from previous trips, left by both hosts and guests.

For DoMoreDerby to work, we needed to find a way to collect all the interested members information so we can load it in to the database so that when the site launches, it is immediately useful be all of its members.

If this is something that you are interested in, please contribute and become a member now.  When the campaign closes, we will contact you to collect  your profile information.  If we don’t meet our campaign goals, all contributed funds will be returned to you.

If you have any questions, please check out our landing page at DoMoreDerby.com, or email us at questions@domorederby.com
column2:
>The Details

It’s Simple

Host: You provide a free, clean, safe place to stay - anything from a private bedroom with a traditional bed, to a spot on the living room floor for an air mattress.  The accommodations you are offering will be well detailed in your member profile, including pictures so there are no surprises – everyone knows what to expect before they arrive.  Details such as pet, smoking, and alcohol policies are shared in your profile as well.  

Travelers: You find a host in your desired area, communicate the details and confirm the stay, then get a free place to stay when you travel for roller derby.

How DoMoreDerby.com Will Help Roller Derby

I talked to lots of friends about this idea, put out a survey on Facebook in many derby groups, and received lots of great feedback.  The expense of traveling for derby is an obstacle many of us share.

DoMoreDeby.com is a way that we can all save money, and maybe more importantly, advance our sport.  The more we all play, watch and train, the higher the average skill level becomes, and as our skill increases, so does our bout attendance and recruitment appeal!

Managing away bouts, farther away than a couple of hours, will become more financially feasible for many teams with DoMoreDerby.com. When you sit down to book your season, look for fellow DoMoreDerby participating teams and know that at least some (hopefully most, if not all) of your travelers could have a free place to stay!

Another opportunity - leagues could gift their area zebra's and nso's with memberships as thank you's, and as a way to encourage them to travel a little further to do their derby thing!  

Why an Indiegogo Campaign? 

DoMoreDerby.com will only work if we have lots of beds in lots of places.  That is the primary reason we decided to launch an Indiegogo campaign – to gauge the true interest in the idea, and get as many members enlisted and loaded into the database as possible before launch, so that when the site does launch it is immediately useful.  

Raising some capital is the secondary reason - the funds will be allocated as follows:

column1: Marketing, Marketing, Marketing - as we said, the only way this really works is to have lots of beds in lots of places, so we have to continually spread the word, both pre and post launch.  Roller derby has a pretty steady stream of new players and fans, so we'll have to do whatever we can to keep getting the word out. Our future marketing plans include a booth and ad's at RollerCon, airing a video (produced by HitSquad TV!!) during WFTDA playoffs and championships, and attending as many tournaments and gatherings as we can.  We will also create fundraiser marketing packets to send to teams to help them promote it with their fans (teams get 10% back on membership dues when their team is listed at sign-up)!

Technology – Our top priorities that we develop a user friendly site that is secure. Phase 1 of the launch will include search and filtering functions, a user ratings system, a way for members to safely communicate with one another through the site to arrange the stays, and a database full of profiles, pictures, and information about each member. Phase 2 will include event listings, and bout coordination tools.

​Membership Levels

We will offer two membership levels:

​Traveler and Host - $20 per year.  This means that you want to use the service when you travel, and that you are willing to offer space to others when they travel.  The accommodations must be clean, safe, and accurately represented in your profile.  A living room floor with space for an air-mattress is perfectly acceptable, as long as that is how you list it on your profile.  We really encourage as many people as possible to agree to host, as the only way the site will be successful is if we have lots of places for people to stay everywhere they go.

Traveler Only - $50 per year.  We understand that some people just don’t have the space or circumstances to offer accommodations, but don’t want them to totally miss out on being able to travel more for derby, so we have made the Traveler Only option available at a higher cost. 

​We do have a give back to derby policy – every team listed as the affiliate team will receive 10% of the membership dues.  They don’t even have to ask – we will just send it!
column2:
>How You Can Help

Join or Contribute NOW!

Show your interest in the project by pre-purchasing your membership now.  After the campaign closes, we will contact you to start working on getting your account set up and building your profile.  Your one year membership will not start until the actual website, www.DoMoreDerby.com, is fully launched.  If we don't meet our Indiegogo goal, all funds will be returned to you.

Share! Share! Share!

Please consider helping to fund this project, and more importantly, please share this with as many people as you can who you think would enjoy and benefit from this service. Indiegogo has some great sharing tools – check them out! Share it on your social media accounts, on your team’s website, group boards, and tell everyone at practice.  Tell your families and friends who travel for derby.  Tell other teams in your area.  I need you and a whole lot of other people to be a part of this community so we can all help each other!  (Remember, if my campaign goals are reached – 10% of the membership dues will be sent to whatever team each member claims as their affiliate team!)

column2: >
column3:
>

Parce que les routes et chemins empruntés par vos enfants lorsqu'ils apprennent à faire du vélo ne sont pas toujours des surfaces de billards. Parce que les obstacles sur leur chemin, malgré les stabilisateurs standards, ne sont pas suffisant pour éviter la perte d'équilibre et les chutes.
column4:
>

Nous avons développé une solution efficace de stabilisateurs pour améliorer la sécurité des enfants, et assurer votre sérénité !
column5:
>

Ce système breveté, complètement mécanique, remplace les stabilisateurs traditionnels de chaque côté des roues arrières du vélo. Des mouvements alternatifs de montées et descentes des roues compensent et absorbent tous les obstacles que votre enfant rencontre sur son chemin. La bicyclette reste droite, sans déport.
column8:
>

Avec des stabilisateurs traditionnels, qui n'ont qu'une seule roue de chaque côté, le passage dans ou sur un obstacle, provoque le déport du vélo. Il perd sa perpendicularité et l'enfant perd l'équilibre.

Ce phénomène est aggravé par la posture de l'enfant qui, en se penchant involontairement de part et d'autre, déplace son centre de gravité. La conjonction des deux phénomènes conduit souvent à une chute.
column9:
>

Avec JustED, chaque roulette en déplacement provoque le blocage de l'autre en position neutre. Ce qui assure une parfaite stabilité de la bicyclette.​

 

La taille du vélo est déterminée par celle de votre enfant ainsi que par son âge. Afin de faciliter son apprentissage et son épanouissement, il est primordial que votre enfant évolue sur un vélo à sa taille. Ainsi, les stabilisateurs JustED sont conçus pour être montés sur des bicyclettes de 8 jusqu'à 14 pouces pour couvrir toute la gamme de tailles standards.

Vous pourrez installer le système soit sur l'axe de la roue arrière, soit sur les perçages existants, selon le modèle de vélo. Toutes les instructions nécessaires seront livrées avec le système.

Pour un montage plus rapide vous pouvez également acheter notre clé JustED. Cette clé remplacera toute vos clés de différentes tailles pour un montage plus facile.
column10:
>

Les coques extérieures sont fabriquées en PC/ABS (Polycarbonate/Acrylonitrile Butadiène Styrène). Une combinaison unique de la haute transformabilité de l‘ABS avec les excellentes propriétés mécaniques, de résistance aux chocs et à la chaleur du PC.

Les leviers intérieurs sont en Polyamide 6 chargé 20% fibre de carbone. Le polymère à renfort fibre de carbone ou PRFC est un matériau composite très résistant et léger.

Les pièces métalliques sont en acier type acier de construction non allié S300PB à usinabilité améliorée étiré à froid. Elles sont protégées de la corrosion par un traitement électrolytique.

Nous avons choisi de produire JustED en France, pour avoir un meilleur contrôle de la qualité et des délais de livraison.
column12:
'/>

JustED est un système breveté et a reçu plusieurs récompenses : 

Pour soutenir ce projet et faire de celui ci une réalité vous pouvez soit pré§commander notre système JustED, ou faire un don libre. Pour ce faire, remonter en haut de cette page et cliquez soit sur une des contreparties à droite de la page, soit sur ""soutenir ce projet"" et insérez le montant que vous voulez donner.

Tous les prix des contreparties incluent les frais de port.

 

Le prototype final a été testé et approuvé. La phase de production est déjà planifiée et prête à être lancée. Nous avons besoin de 135,000$ pour enter dans la phase de production et financer le premier lot de produits. Vos pré-commandes nous permettront de lancer la machine. 

Si vous avez la moindre question, écrivez à  : contact@justed.fr
column21: version=v2.8"" rel=""noopener nofollow"" target=""_blank"">
column24: related=indiegogo%3AIndiegogo"" rel=""noopener nofollow"">
column25: >
column27:
>

Because roads and paths taken by your kids while they are learning to ride a bike are not always billiard tables. Because the obstacles on their way, despite the standard stabilizers wheels, are not enough to avoid the loss of balance and falls...
column28:
>

We developed an efficient solution of stabilizers to improve the security of your kids, and ensuring your serenity !
column29:
>

This patented device, completely mechanical, replaces the traditional stabilizers on both sides of the back wheel of the bicycle. Alternative movements of ups and downs of the wheels compensate and absorb all the obstacles your kid meet on his path. The bicycle remains straight.
column30: >
column31:
>

With traditional stabilizers, including only one wheel, the passage, on or in, an obstacle generates bicycle offset. It loses its perpendicularity and leads to destabilize the child.

This phenomenon is increased by the posture of the child which, by bending involuntarily on both sides, moves its center of gravity. The conjunction of both phenomena often leads to a fall.
column32:
>

With JustED Security, each moving wheels causes the blocking of the other one in a neutral position. That insures a perfect stability of the bicycle.

 

The size of the bike is defined by the size of your child as well as by its age. To facilitate his learning process and its self-fulfillment, it is essential that your child evolves on a bike that fits his size. That is why JustED stabilizers are designed to fit bicycles from 8 to 14 inches, to cover all the range of standard sizes.

You will be able to install the system or on the axis of the rear wheel or on the existing drilling, depending on the bicycle model. All the instructions and necessary pieces will be delivered with the system.

For an easier assembly you can also purchase the JustED key. This key replaces all the keys of different sizes and will provide you with an easier assembly experience.
column33:
>

 

The outer shells are made of PC ABS. The PC/ABS (Polycarbonate / Acrylonitrile Butadiene Styrene) is a unique combination of the ABS high workability, with the PC excellent mechanical properties, impact and heat resistance.

The inner levers are made of Polyamide 6 with 20% carbon fiber. The Carbon Fiber Reinforced Polymer (CFRP) is a very resistant and lightweight composite material.

The metal parts are made of steel type S300PB non-alloy construction steel with enhanced cold stretching 11SMNPB37. It is protected from corrosion by electrolytic treatment.

We chose to produce JustED in France, to have a better control on the product quality and on the delivery time.

JustED is a patented system and it won multiple awards : 

 

To support this project and make it real you can either pre-order our JustED system, or just donate the amount of money you want. To do so, scroll up on this page and click either on one of the rewards on the right side, or on ""support this project"".

All the prices includes the shipping.

 

 

 

The final prototype has been tested and approved. The production stage is already set up and ready to go. We need 135,000$ to enter the production stage and finance the first batch of products. Your pre-orders will enable us to launch the production.

If you have any questions please email : contact@justed.fr

THE LELIO BICYCLES PROJECT

Hi let me introduce myself, my name is Antonin Van Der Gulik and I am 15 years old.

I am a passionate biker and love the outdoors. I have been riding bicycles for years now and the excitement never gets old.
column2:
>

There is a lot to say about cycling. It is the second least polluting mode of transportation after walking, since horseriding is not such a common mode anymore.  And just like walking and horseriding, it allows you to feel in communion with the environment you are journeying amongst.

Unlike horses however, bicycles are man made and built in manners that are not necessarily friendly to mother nature. Through my growing up, and being a student at the Green School in Bali for 6 years now, much of my thoughts have been concerned on how to limit my personal carbon footprint.

Not so long ago I was lucky to join in a Bamboo bike building workshop at school. That is when it suddenly became clear to me that I wanted to be more involved with the concept of lowering carbon footprint. The idea and beauty of producing “plant built” bicycles, not only for myself but for my community simply became the obvious road to pursue.

That is what the Lelio Bicycles project is about: to promote more meaningful and effective bicycle designs and lifestyle habits, to strengthen the human nature/ mother nature connection.

Welcome to my project.
column3:
>

 

What is so cool about Bamboo Bikes?

BAMBOO

Bamboo is a grass that freely grows all over Asia and can easily be found in Bali where I live.

It is the fastest growing plant in the world, and it is 100% recyclable, because it is 100% plant based and natural.

Bamboo doesn’t corrode or rust. It is a very strong and durable material, when properly taken care of, and it is even said to be stronger than steel.
column4:
>

In the event that it may break or deteriorate, it is easily replaceable with no damageable waste to the environment. Thus if the bamboo frame of a bike were to break, deteriorate, or get damaged, then all the non-bamboo parts of the bike can easily be transferred to another bike. That is what I actually did for my first bamboo bike, taking the good parts of a bicycle frame that was rusted, which I tuned and reworked onto my bamboo bike frame.
column6:
ECO FRIENDLINESS

Bamboo grows in all sort of shapes, and it is so fun to try and find the funkiest pieces to be used for a frame design. I am really inspired by the great designs of Klaus Volkmann from “The Art Bike Bamboo Company in Brazil” who lead the workshop I attended, and Craig Calfee from Calfee Design in the U.S., who also came to lead a workshop at the Greenschool.
column7:
>

My parents are both designers and it has been really cool growing up surrounded by their ideas and creations. Thanks to the Bamboo bike workshop that I took, with experts Klaus Volkmann and Mark Donovan from Ewabi, I have now experienced for myself the thrill to design something, and see it become a real thing through my own effort, process and actions. That excitement and the thought of being able to make a difference, in the way something is perceived, through design ingenuity, is why I have decided to take on this journey.
column8:
>

I am so grateful to be growing up in a community that supports and promotes care, understanding and communion with the environment, and I can’t wait to build my own workshop and have a space in which to gather and transform bamboo into awesome “plant based” cycling machines.

 

CYCLING &
column9:
MOUNTAIN BIKING

Cycling, or biking if you prefer,  is awesome as a rule ! But riding a bamboo built bicycle somehow heightens the all experience. Knowing that my ride is complementing to the nature surrounding me, is simply just cool. Plus the ride is really smooth thanks to the material of the frame, bamboo, and its natural ability to absorb vibrations.
column10:
>

And riding in nature is the second part of my passion for bikes.

I have always loved the coolness of the wind, the smell of the trees and plants, the scenery and the overall exposure to nature's hidden secrets.

And I feel very lucky as Bali is a beautiful place to ride, yet most people miss out on the opportunity because there is no real knowledge of the off road possibilities. Everything seems, too often, to be just a big rice field, an impenetrable thicket or even overcrowded highways, yet it is not so at all.
column11:
>

I have been riding quite a bit with my parents, brother, teachers, and friends all over Bali, in the past few years, and we love it.  But it is true that we are always at a loss to find maps that would show us some nice trails to discover.
column12:
>

That is why part of the Lelio Bicycles project is also to create a collection of maps, to complement the bamboo bicycles, with insightful knowledge of the nature that inspired their creations. This collection will include roads and trails ranging from, easy and perfect for a laid back family ride, to thrilling and trying off road biking, to ensure that each and all get tempted to go and mingle more often with the beautiful nature of the island.
column13:
>

My parents might have something to say about the thrilling and trying, but I will find a way to surround myself with a good supportive team for the mapping of these rides, so that I may add them to the collection of maps.
column14:
>

Your support will allow me to*:

- set up my workshop, with all the tools and materials needed.

- build 5 bamboo bicycles to be used during the project term, some of which will be donated, once the project is completed, to a locally based philanthropic association, supportive and promoting of The Lelio Bicycles Project values.

- and of course provide me with the resources to build &
column15: produce all the perks: the bamboo bikes &amp
column16:
bike frames, the Lelio Bicycle Project T-shirts, jackets, and bottles, and to organize the tours on which I will be taking you to complete the journey.

Each of the Lelio Bicycles Project bamboo bikes will be unique and special :-)

Let’s get on the road to riding bamboo bikes and stay tuned for more through the campaign updates.

 

*This is a non-profit project campaign, but it certainly is teaching me a lot about the hidden cost of our material world and the business of promoting a concept. When I started, I did not think I would end up having to organize the production of T-shirts, etc. But it has still been fun, and I am learning a lot more then I expected.

Last, regardless of what you choose to pledge, I will be very grateful for any help given to spread the word about my campaign through Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Email, or any other platform you can think of. Oh, and don’t forget to tell your friends and family, so they may tell their friends and family. Thank you :-)
column17:
>

This campaign is a Fixed Funding campaign, which means that if I do not reach my entire goal then I do not get anything. So please help me spread the word about it.
column18: >FOLLOW ME ON FACEBOOK
column21:

0,"

Say Hello to BlueLed - The World's First Joystick Controlled Smart Suitcase

 

BlueLed is going to redefine the way you travel. 

Forget lugging your luggage around endless airport terminals, now you can drive this remote controlled smart suitcase horizontally or vertically as you walk or even run with it.

With speeds up to 13 km/h (8mph) and omni wheels that rotate 360 degrees, you can enjoy excellent manoeuvrability on any terrain.

Besides being joystick controlled, BlueLed offers features that normal suitcases do not.

Two USB ports with protective rain covers enable you to charge your electronics on the go. What’s more? BlueLed's regenerative technology also allows the battery to self-charge when the suitcase is being driven downhill or dragged manually.

Add all this to a thoughtfully designed suitcase made from premium materials, and you have one magnificent masterpiece.

Introducing BlueLed Luxe Plus and BlueLed Luxe

 

 

Colours

 

Features

Joystick Controlled

With its accurate and discrete joystick you can easily manoeuvre around obstacles and through crowds of people - all while having your belongings within view. The BlueLed joystick gives you complete control over your smart suitcase like no other so you can enjoy hassle free, hands-free travel. 

 

                         BlueLed Joystick

 

What's more? The joystick connects easily with the push of a button. 

This makes BlueLed a must-have carry-on suitcase for any kind of traveller from expectant mothers to global jetsetters that are forever on the move.
 

You can even lend a hand to a friend by placing their luggage on BlueLed as you drive along.

 

Quiet powerful electric motor

BlueLed Luxe Plus features a powerful and quiet motor, enabling you to drive uphill with ease.

 

2 USB Ports to charge your electronics

Today, we travel with more technology than ever before. As tech has become a necessity of our lives, so have charging points
BlueLed’s intelligent approach to design gives travellers easy access to two USB ports to charge your electronics from the bag itself so you don’t have to hunt for charging points.

 


With its USB charging ports, there is no need to worry about your devices running low. Both the USB ports and the charger plug have protective rain covers, allowing you to travel safely in any weather.


 

Portable battery

BlueLed can be driven for 6 hours* without a single recharge. Electronics alone can be charged for 30 hours* and in stand by mode, the battery can last up to 150 hours*. The battery is portable, which means it can be easily removed and charged through power outlets.
BlueLed's regenerative technology also allows the battery to self-charge when the suitcase is being driven downhill or dragged manually. 
Additionally, the portable battery makes BlueLed fully compliant with international regulations (TSA, DOT, FAA and IATA) so you can safely travel with BlueLed anywhere across the world.
 

Wheels that spin 360 degrees

BlueLed Luxe Plus features Omni wheels and BlueLed Luxe features spinner wheels, both of which rotate 360 degrees so you can enjoy excellent manoeuvrability on any terrain.

 

Frontal pocket

This ergonomically designed bag also features a frontal pocket for easy access to laptops, tablets or any other electronics, making it easier for travellers to breeze through security. 

 

You really don’t want to miss out on being a part of this revolution. 
 

Technical Specifications

For detailed technical specifications, please visit https://blueledinc.com/technical-specifications/

 

 

BlueLed In The News

 

 

""Ukens gründercase: – Terminalvandring blir en lek med fjernstyrt koffert"" - iNNOMAG. (in Norwegian)

“This week’s entrepreneurial case: - Terminal walking becomes fun with remote-controlled suitcase - BlueLed” - iNNOMAG. (English translation)

 

“Can you keep up with your Smart Suitcase?” - New Gizmo Blog

 

""BlueLed – The World’s First Joystick Controlled Smart Suitcase"" - Inceptive Mind and Tech Explorist

 

For press inquiries, please contact info@blueledinc.com

 

Team BlueLed

 

To know more, visit blueledinc.com

Connect with us on social media

 Facebook

 Twitter

 Google+

 Instagram

DREAM VACATION IN THE CLEANEST DESTINATION IN THE WORLD

The northern part of Finland, Lapland, has the cleanest nature and air in the world. Pure white snow, glass-igloo -houses with panoramic windows and the restaurant offering local food will make you feel relaxed and savor your holiday in our resort.

We have ten wonderful glass-igloo -houses in our resort, where you can enjoy the beauty of Lapland in an unforgettable way. They can house two adults and two school aged children. The houses include following features.
• Bedroom with panoramic windows, roof window and motorized bed.
• Living room with cozy fireplace and sofa bed
• Kitchen with stove, microwave oven, table and utensils.

The Igloo House is more than just an igloo. It is like a small house, which has a lot of room. The many features listed above make the Igloo Houses a wonderful place to spend a relaxing holiday surrounded by the beautiful nature of Lapland. Another feature that makes the Igloo Houses special is their mobility. For example, if clouds prevent viewing the Northern Lights, the accommodation can be moved to where the skies are clear. For an additional cost we can change your location, if you so desire.
RESTAURANT SERVING LOCAL FOOD AND INTERNATIONAL CUISINES

Northern Lights Restaurant serves our guest by offering three delicious buffets each day: breakfast, lunch and dinner. Our selection includes local meals mixed with international flavors. The restaurant building also acts as the reception of our resort, open 24/7.

Our resort offers you a chance to enjoy all the popular program services such as meeting Santa Claus, riding a husky sled, driving a snowmobile, ice fishing and visiting a reindeer ranch. All activities are first-class and available at an affordable price.

The prices of the perks include one reservation for a glass igloo, which can house two adults and two children. If the perks include program services or the all-inclusive package, they are for everyone lodging in the same house, meaning max. 2 adults and 2 children.

We are Tanja Hyväri and Timo Tapaninen - tourism entrepreneurs from Finnish Lapland. For the past two years our company LaplandNews has been focusing on travel marketing. Among other things, we have grown our social media followers to 350 000 and made over 120 videos about Lapland. Now we’ve decided to move on from marketing other holiday attractions to running our own. Our goal is to establish a next generation travel centre called Northern Lights Igloo Resort.
Tanja Hyväri and Timo Tapaninen in London 2018
Lapland is a fast growing travel destination

The number of people traveling to Lapland is growing rapidly. Santa Claus, elves, northern lights, reindeer, huskies and all the different snow activities interest people from all over the world. One of the hottest trends right now is arctic glass accommodation, known as a glass igloo. Our goal is to build the travel destination of your dreams here in Lapland, which will include 10 astonishingly beautiful, mobile glass igloo houses, a restaurant serving local and international food and all the popular Lappish program services, provided by us or our partners.

Campaign in Indiegogo

This Indiegogo pre-sale campaign plays a big part in our funding plan. All of you early bird -backers will get a holiday package of your dreams with a 60% discount. You can choose any date during the season in the next three years to be the date of your arrival. After the campaign you will receive an e-mail with a booking code for our booking website. With the code you will get to book your holiday two weeks before our site opens to the general public.

We are going to build this resort in any case, but with these pre-orders, we can fund the project better and build higher quality lodging and restaurant. According to Finnish laws, we can only provide substitutional pre-sales campaigns. We do not accept any charitable donations.

Northern Lights Igloo Resort is a perfect travel destination for people seeking peace, safety, visuality, beautiful pictures and showstopping videos. We know that you too would love the opportunity to see the beauty of the northern lights at this amazing location. Guests at the resort can enjoy local food along with a taste of international cuisine at the Northern Lights Restaurant, in which you will have the opportunity to meet the local culture. At the resort you will be able to experience all favorite activities that Lapland has to offer, such as meeting Santa Claus and his elves, going on a husky ride, riding snowmobiles and visiting the reindeer. These activities are available for purchase here on IndieGoGo, on ”Items”-section after choosing your perk.
You will be charged after the campaign only if we have reached our goal.

After you’ve chosen your perk, advance to check-out. There you’ll find all the various activities we offer at a 20% discount. You can pick as many as you like.  After our campaign ends you can buy more activities at any time before your trip and even on a whim when you’re already here, but you won’t get the discount if you buy the activities after the campaign.

The growth projectile of Lapland’s tourism seems promising. Annually there are around 3 million visitors to the area with an annual growth of 10%. Respect for nature, sustainable traveling, safety, peace and cleanliness are few of our most important values. This is the case when it comes to our resort as well. Our glass igloo houses will all have solar panels and even though it is dark here during winter, installing and using them is still ecological.

Northern Lights Igloo Resort will start constructions in Autumn 2019 and our goal is to get the resort ready for Christmas 2019. It will be in the proximity of skiing centre Aavasaksa in the municipality of Ylitornio. This peaceful area is away from the light pollution of the city centre but still near the Lappish program services.

Professional team

As a team we are well known in Lapland. We have the second largest number of followers in social media in Lapland and we know how to market. Our team also includes Timo Paulin, who works as a content creator along with Outi Rantaniemi, who is the consultant of our restaurant operations. This lodging project is completely new to us, but we know the Lappish hotels and traveling as an industry well.

Our building schedule is tight. Although we've already bought the piece of land, and we have made preparations , we have a lot to do before we can welcome our first guests. We have prepared the timeline and gathered help from experts as well. Completing the project in time is possible, otherwise we wouldn’t even aim at being ready this winter season. The fact that the glass igloo -houses and the restaurant are built in a factory and then brought to the resort as ready-made modules, reduces the schedule risks. We are certain that everything will be in order by mid-December 2019.

The progression of this project will be enjoyable for you to follow. You will be able to see our fantastic location being built by receiving video and photo updates. You can also partially influence the materials chosen for the resort. We will be asking for your opinion as the project progresses!

It is great that you are interested in our project! If you cannot buy a perk, we understand completely. Instead you can help us and the others by letting as many people as possible know about our idea. You could even ask if one of your close friends or family members has ever been to Finland or Lapland or would like to visit this amazing travel destination. One way to share this information is through Indiegogo's own share tools.

Aavasaksa Hill, is located about 10 km to the north of Ylitornio town centre. The hill, which rises 242 metres above sea level, is a well-known scenic attraction and vantage point. Visitors can admire one of Finland's official national landscapes from the summit. A four-kilometre nature trail goes around the hill in this exceptionally beautiful setting. Today's Aavasaksa offers accommodation, a small ski centre, a cafeteria-restaurant, an observation tower and the Keisarinmaja (Imperial Lodge) museum, which is housed in a villa built in 1882. The hill is the southernmost point in Finland where the midnight sun can be seen during the summer solstice. A French Academy of Sciences expedition led by Pierre Maupertuis came to Aavasaksa to perform geophysical measurements in 1736. Kruununnäyttämö stage for outdoor performances, audience capacity 200.

column2: >WHAT DO I NEED TO DO NEXT?

column1: You can claim your perk from the list on the right. There are options for 1-6 winter nights and two different perks for summer.  In the perks check out you can book our Lappish activity programs with 20 % discount. You can redeem your perks at any time during the next three years, so you don’t need to have your travel plans ready yet. We’ll open a booking calendar on our website as soon as our Indiegogo campaign ends. All backers shall receive an e-mail with a code and instructions. With their codes backers will be able to book their holidays. We will give our backers one week time to book their trips before the booking calendar opens to the general public.

Now we’ve decided to move on from marketing other holiday attractions to running our own. Our goal is to establish a next generation travel centre called Northern Lights Igloo Resort.
Tanja Hyväri and Timo Tapaninen in London 2018
Lapland is a fast growing travel destination

The number of people traveling to Lapland is growing rapidly. Santa Claus, elves, northern lights, reindeer, huskies and all the different snow activities interest people from all over the world. One of the hottest trends right now is arctic glass accommodation, known as a glass igloo. Our goal is to build the travel destination of your dreams here in Lapland, which will include 10 astonishingly beautiful, mobile glass igloo houses, a restaurant serving local and international food and all the popular Lappish program services, provided by us or our partners.

Campaign in IndiegogoThis Indiegogo pre-sale campaign plays a big part in our funding plan. All of you early bird -backers will get a holiday package of your dreams with a 60% discount. You can choose any date during the season in the next three years to be the date of your arrival. After the campaign you will receive an e-mail with a booking code for our booking website. With the code you will get to book your holiday two weeks before our site opens to the general public.
WHAT DO WE NEED AND OFFER

We are going to build this resort in any case, but with these pre-orders, we can fund the project better and build higher quality lodging and restaurant. According to Finnish laws, we can only provide substitutional pre-sales campaigns. We do not accept any charitable donations.Northern Lights Igloo Resort is a perfect travel destination for people seeking peace, safety, visuality, beautiful pictures and showstopping videos. We know that you too would love the opportunity to see the beauty of the northern lights at this amazing location. Guests at the resort can enjoy local food along with a taste of international cuisine at the Northern Lights Restaurant, in which you will have the opportunity to meet the local culture. At the resort you will be able to experience all favorite activities that Lapland has to offer, such as meeting Santa Claus and his elves, going on a husky ride, riding snowmobiles and visiting the reindeer. These activities are available for purchase here on IndieGoGo, on ”Items”-section after choosing your perk.
You will be charged after the campaign only if we have reached our goal.

After you’ve chosen your perk, advance to check-out. There you’ll find all the various activities we offer at a 20% discount. You can pick as many as you like.  After our campaign ends you can buy more activities at any time before your trip and even on a whim when you’re already here, but you won’t get the discount if you buy the activities after the campaign.

The growth projectile of Lapland’s tourism seems promising. Annually there are around 3 million visitors to the area with an annual growth of 10%. Respect for nature, sustainable traveling, safety, peace and cleanliness are few of our most important values. This is the case when it comes to our resort as well. Our glass igloo houses will all have solar panels and even though it is dark here during winter, installing and using them is still ecological.

Northern Lights Igloo Resort will start constructions in Autumn 2019 and our goal is to get the resort ready for Christmas 2019. It will be in the proximity of skiing centre Aavasaksa in the municipality of Ylitornio. This peaceful area is away from the light pollution of the city centre but still near the Lappish program services.

Professional teamAs a team we are well known in Lapland. We have the second largest number of followers in social media in Lapland and we know how to market. Our team also includes Timo Paulin, who works as a content creator along with Outi Rantaniemi, who is the consultant of our restaurant operations. This lodging project is completely new to us, but we know the Lappish hotels and traveling as an industry well.

Our building schedule is tight. Although we've already bought the piece of land, and we have made preparations , we have a lot to do before we can welcome our first guests. We have prepared the timeline and gathered help from experts as well. Completing the project in time is possible, otherwise we wouldn’t even aim at being ready this winter season. The fact that the glass igloo -houses and the restaurant are built in a factory and then brought to the resort as ready-made modules, reduces the schedule risks. We are certain that everything will be in order by mid-December 2019.

The progression of this project will be enjoyable for you to follow. You will be able to see our fantastic location being built by receiving video and photo updates. You can also partially influence the materials chosen for the resort. We will be asking for your opinion as the project progresses!

It is great that you are interested in our project! If you cannot buy a perk, we understand completely. Instead you can help us and the others by letting as many people as possible know about our idea. You could even ask if one of your close friends or family members has ever been to Finland or Lapland or would like to visit this amazing travel destination. One way to share this information is through Indiegogo's own share tools.

Aavasaksa Hill, is located about 10 km to the north of Ylitornio town centre. The hill, which rises 242 metres above sea level, is a well-known scenic attraction and vantage point. Visitors can admire one of Finland's official national landscapes from the summit. A four-kilometre nature trail goes around the hill in this exceptionally beautiful setting. Today's Aavasaksa offers accommodation, a small ski centre, a cafeteria-restaurant, an observation tower and the Keisarinmaja (Imperial Lodge) museum, which is housed in a villa built in 1882. The hill is the southernmost point in Finland where the midnight sun can be seen during the summer solstice. A French Academy of Sciences expedition led by Pierre Maupertuis came to Aavasaksa to perform geophysical measurements in 1736. Kruununnäyttämö stage for outdoor performances, audience capacity 200.
Ylitornio on the map of Finland
WHAT DO I NEED TO DO NEXT?

You can claim your perk from the list on the right. There are options for 1-6 winter nights and two different perks for summer.  In the perks check out you can book our Lappish activity programs with 20 % discount. You can redeem your perks at any time during the next three years, so you don’t need to have your travel plans ready yet. We’ll open a booking calendar on our website as soon as our Indiegogo campaign ends. All backers shall receive an e-mail with a code and instructions. With their codes backers will be able to book their holidays. We will give our backers one week time to book their trips before the booking calendar opens to the general public.

Logic Research 2 Development LLC.

Lr2d.com

We are a product design company that need your help in finishing and marketing the Smart Trailer System. 

We know that this system will make the roads safer and save lives. 

Your funding will help us create a new standard for vehicle trailers that connects it to your smart phone. Gone would be the days of not knowing how you trailer is doing while you are pulling it. If it has a bad wheel bearing and is heating up. Or your trailer has a flat tire or is about to hit something or someone. Can I move over in traffic? Now you can know with your smart phone or our display unit (LGS) which has some advanced feature like (gauges, advanced code reading, advanced data logging and more).

We have done the whole product development cycle. From case design in Solidworks or FreeCAD.  Printed circuit board design in Altium and EagleCAD. Assembly of circuit board and final product in our own factory. Along with product support in house. 

Your contribution will get you first debs and a 5% to 15% discount depending on how much you contribute on this new product. And help make pulling a trailer a safer job.

We are looking at the product price per kit to be roughly:

$499.00 w/o the LGS display unit.

$699.00 with the LGS display unit

Your Funding will be used for:

Hardware, Research and development, Labor and Advertising.

With the Smart Trailer Kit it will give you the peace of mind to monitor your trailer and the traffic around you and an early warning system that can save you from costly repairs and road side emergencies.

We are currently selling on our website (easycodereader.com) A EZ Plus Code Reader that we designed.

For Years 2008 Vehicle's and up. With These Features:

 

Full color LCD Screen

Easy to use,

Read/Clear Diagnostic Trouble Codes,

Detailed description of Trouble Codes,

I/M Readiness check

Live Stream PID (Gauges).

Detailed Vehicle Information: Year, Make, Model, VIN and PCM Calibration.

Data Log Live Streamed PID to Micro SD Card.

Easy internet updatable for new features.

WE ARE SERIOUS ABOUT MAKING DRAWSTRING BAGS
Super Light, slick, versatile and quite affordable, drawstring bags are perfect choice for minimalists. But current products on market are either way too fancy, or way too simple.
• Shouldn't there be a bag that is minimal in functions and appearance, yet super comfortable and capable of everyday task? Absolutely!! Hence the Karry bag.
• We have made many generations of Karry bags, delivered couple thousands of bags to backers all over the world, and learnt quite a lot from all kinds of mistakes.
• Learnt from previous experience, we have re-arranged our supply chain, and we promise, Karry4.0 will have great quality just like previous Karry3.0 and Karry2.0.
• Also, we had quite some difficulties during the pandemic period, but we are now doing very good, and we are ready for the new campaign and the fulfillment after :)
Our kickstarer campaign was very successful, and most backers have already received their reward with great satisfaction :)
• We listen to our backers very carefully, including the drawstring rope length issue, so we made new version Karry4.0 with new adjustable shoulder straps to meet backers' needs. :)

•  Detachable gadget bag is a new design feature in the new version, since we find out many backers use Karry bag as weekend bag for family trip, a handy small pouch around wrist can be quite nice. :)
• And we made the bag size a bit bigger, but don't worry, since now the rope length is adjustable, the bigger size won't look saggy. :)

• People use drawstring bags for many purpose, commute, sports, study. Although many other brands designed their drawstring bags with many cool functions, Karry bag want to return to the very essential things about drawstring bags: Comfortableness, and functional.
• Karry4.0 bag uses top quality nylon material, we have hundreds of backers can back us on this fact. Light weight, tough against scratch, durable, and pleasing to touch.

• Sand proof, and water resistant: If you are using Karry bag as weekend bag, then you may find Karry to be super functional. It is sand proof, and doesn't get dirty easily, plus it is water resistant thanks to back coated layer.

• We use customized thick shoulder ropes. Thickest in this world, yes we dare to make that claim.  The following image is a simple comparison between common rope on the left and Karry4.0 rope on the right.

• We went out to design Karry4.0 with clear purpose. Nothing fancy like cut proof or anti-blablabla, only the very very basic thing, the very core of the bag, the shoulder rope itself, which is t he only factor dominating the bag's comfortableness.
• Super thick rope: Our customized made shoulder rope is much thicker than the common shoulder ropes used. World's thickest and most comfortable. :)
•  Soft stuffing: Yes, there are many other thick ropes as well, but way harder and rigid. Our ropes are the most cozy ropes there are.

• One of the most annoying thing about common drawstring bags is the rope sliding problem. Even bags from famous brands like Nike etc. We fixed the shoulder sliding problem once and for all. Thanks to our unique rope sheath design. :)

• As a new feature, we introduced adjustable shoulder straps to fit different height and weight of different backers, and big thank you to all the backers who have been giving us valuable feedback. :)
Private back pocket: The back pocket on Karry4.0 can be used for instant access for smart phones, power bank, wallet, passport, etc. Any thing flat and important. Super intuitive :)
• Karry4.0 bag also has two side zipper pockets for smaller items.
• One of the side zipper pocket is bigger, and deep enough for a common water bottle.
• One of the side zipper pocket is smaller, perfect for items like keys or wallet. It designed to be smaller such that users don't have to dig around.
• Karry4.0 bag has two inner zipper pockets, one is attached to the bag, the other one is detachable, and it can be paired with the handle and turn into a nice hand bag. :)
•  Quite spacy: You can fit 13inch laptop, notebook, outfits, many more stuff into Karry bag. Super roomy :)
• Karry4.0 comes with a small gadget bag can be hooked inside or hanging out the bag. Plus, it can be used as an individual hand bag, super convenient. :)
Hang out the gadget bag from outside like a little cap for more instant access. Perfect for storing glasses, ear bugs and etc.
• The detachable gadget bag can be installed inside the bag with the hook, to be used as an inner pocket.
The gadget bag can also be completely removed from the bag, pair with the handle belt to be used as an individual hang bag, if you don't want to carry the whole bag,
• It can even be considered as a wallet pouch or a purse. Minimal, super light, and quite functional.
<ul><li>When we go out, we might have some extra stuff to carry. Something bulky like a ball, a helmet
column2: something wet and smelly, like shoes, wet towels.

column1: Karry bag comes with Elastic cord to handle this problem, now you can bring a blanket, slipper, shoes, ball, towel etc.
• Please note that dimensions in the following image is only for reference, and the actual product could be little different.

The following time is our general standard production steps, and they are only for reference. The current situation is, we have already finished our first round of production with plenty of stock left.

•  Gathering order info: For two weeks, we shall wait for backers to answer their survey. Please note that backers are always change their address for our survey, however do shoot us an message when you about to do so. And do let us know ahead of time if you are moving. Kickstarter can be a long march :(

•  Confirm order and buy materials: For this step we shall start calculating the material we need and start ordering them. Manufacturing: We shall work with our contractors and start making Karry. Tell from experience that timing could be on and off for this stage, you never know. But even if you are off the schedule, please understand that we are only trying to make sure that Karry is of good quality.
•  Packaging: Packaging can be quite challenging as well, since we have backers from all over the world. Have to be careful. :)
•  Shipping: Please note that our estimated delivering date is the shipping date, not arriving date. Shipping time could be quite different depends on the locations of each backer.
We have fulfilled orders for almost one thousand supporters, and we still have stock.

1. On timing: Since the exact number of backers is unknown to us, so the timing may fall out of schedule a little. But we did leave ourselves with extra time already, and we will try to get ahead of time for each step, so don't worry. :)

2. On shipping: Shipping is another potential problem as well. Shipping period can vary from 3 weeks to 6 weeks or even longer depends on shipping location and local Custom policy. Should the shipping take way too long than regular time, we will assume the package is lost and resend the reward. Promises promises :)

3. On refund: We will arrange refund, if it is strongly insisted. There is no point in keeping the money from backers if they don't have our back any more. We will do our best to meet backers' anticipation as we should, and hope the worst won't happen.

4. On customer support: We are still at kickstarter stage, and there is a long run for us to give good customer support like famous brands, it might take longer time for us to respond sometimes, but we will do our best.

5. On pandemic: Covid-19 out-break can cause great hit on logistic system and industrial supply chain. But we have made a lot of preparation including arranging production at early stage. We will our best.

One of the easiest and most effective ways to help wildlife is to preserve the environment in which the animals live. Volunteer with organizations in your area to restore native forests, grasslands, and coastal ecosystems by planting native species, manually removing invasive plant species, and taking out old fences.

column3: >
column4:
>

Folding like origami, we make packing and unpacking faster, easier. and more convenient
column5: >
column6:
>

One of the most annoying things about traveling is folding or rolling your clothing into your suitcase, just to arrive at your destination and ruin the neatly organized items because you have to dig to the bottom of the suitcase to find that one shirt you want to wear.

Oregami Luggage solves the problem!
column9:
> 

Oregami Luggage is designed with smart travelers in mind. Our carry on is approved for use with most airlines and large rolling duffle come with three compartment trays that keep items organized and where you want them for easy access.

The compartment trays also unzip from the luggage base, so you can place them in a dresser for easy access or organize them as needed.

 

Oregami in the Media
column13:
>

The key differentiator for Oregami Luggage is the organizing trays. Both Oregami Luggage sizes come with three compartments that fit the width of the suitcase base. However, as you can see in the rewards section , you can also get the duffle with half-width organizing trays to make room for larger gear.
column16: >
column30: >
column32:
'/>

Our carefully designed carry-on suitcase is the approved size for most overhead compartments on an aircraft. Our carry-on’s dimensions actually fit better than most when you take into consideration the method of storing suitcases airlines prefer- “wheels or handle first”.  Our length and depth fit almost every airplane’s overhead bins.
column33:
> 

Check out the other cool features of our carry-on bag.

column1: • Zipper pockets on the outside cover for easy access to passports and boarding passes
• Zipper pockets on the inside of the cover for smaller items like toiletries and accessories

column4:
>


Over Packers rejoice! Our large rolling duffle is big enough to hold all sorts of items. From ski boots to your favorite outfits, our various packing and organizing options will leave you with space for just about anything. The large rolling duffle is unlike any other luggage you’ve owned.
column5:
>

Here are all the ways you can use the large rolling duffle to accommodate your travel needs:
column6:
>

You can use three full-size compartment trays to hold all of your belongings, fold them into each other for easy packing and unfold them to see everything you packed in seconds
column7:
>

If you’re going skiing or are packing larger items, like boots or hats, use one carry-on tray and leave the other side empty so you can fit what you need without packing it in a separate bag.

The large rolling duffle also has the following features to make travel easier.

column1: • Zipper pockets on the outside cover for easy access to passports and boarding passes
• Zipper pockets on the inside of the cover for smaller items like toiletries and accessories

column5:
>

Take a look at where these exclusive Oregami Luggage tester took theirs…

column1: Where will you take Oregami? Let us know in the comments section [link] of our page!

We have been working on designing additional features to make travel even easier, but we need your help! We will not be able to introduce these unique features to you right off the bat because of cost, but we do plan on making some stretch goals for you once we hit certain milestones. Some of the things we’re considering are waterproof tray for wet and dirty gear, a removable garment cover attachment, a seat back organizer kit and more.

column7:
>
