The primary perk for this campaign is the RIDER T1: a new tire for our original, off-road legends. The initial production will be manufactured in a single specification as follows:
Measured Width:            56.5mm, at max pressure, on a 21mm rim (inner width)
Rubber:                              Dual compound (56 Shore A center with 48 Shore A sides)

For those who pre-order the RIDER T1 through this campaign, I will include additional Terra One merchandise at no charge to properly thank you for your strong support. Since I don't want to dilute the value of my new tires by discounting their price before the first pair has been sold, the more tires you buy, the more Terra One swag you'll receive: for example, this hooded sweatshirt, printed by Bike Ninja UK. Thanks in advance for helping promote my new brand.
If you'd like to ensure a bright future for Terra One, but funds are too tight right now, I can also offer you this same merchandise at levels of support below the price of a pair of tires.

And if you commit to exceptional support of Terra One's goals, I'll invite you to visit me in Switzerland to spend a couple days living them with me: preserving history by tracking down hidden treasures to add to your collection, building community by meeting fellow vintage MTB enthusiasts and enjoying their collections, and naturally, riding as much as we can.
What Happens if the Campaign isn't Fully Funded?

Terra One is built to last. This crowdfunding campaign is intended to help me more fully achieve its goals, and more quickly serve the needs of passionate vintage cycling enthusiasts who want products beyond the RIDER T1, but its long-term future isn't entirely dependent on the short-term results of this campaign.

Terra One has committed funds to pay for the initial production run of 1,000 RIDER T1 tires. In the unlikely event that we don't reach the campaign's primary goal together, these tires will still be produced and sold, but likely shipped from Switzerland or Europe at higher total costs than through this campaign.

If we reach the first stretch goal of CHF 40,000 together, I will open molds for a second Terra One tire model, the design of which has been influenced by early feedback from supporters, both in person and on social media.

If we reach the second stretch goal of CHF 60,000 together, I will develop one additional specification of the RIDER T1, to be produced in a future order. Black sidewalls? Additional puncture protection? Colored tread rubber? You can help decide its future by supporting this campaign now.

Now that I'm managing my own brand, I'm determined to not make mistakes which I've seen too many times during my 20+ years on the supply side of the bicycle business. I intend for Terra One to act responsibly and consistently, so fair, stable pricing is important.

• No high suggested retail prices paired with deeply discounted everyday prices

Ever since he has been old enough to express his opinions, Jeremias Walter Malone has insisted that he work side-by-side with his father when he grows up. I founded Terra One in July 2019 to ensure that years from now, we can make his dream a reality.

Terra One is a Swiss company, focused on product design, development, production and distribution in the bicycle and e-mobility sectors. In addition to consulting for other companies and brands, Terra One will also distribute its own products.

As a balance to my recent professional efforts to develop e-bikes for premium Swiss brands, I began to study, collect and restore “me-bikes”: notable road and mountain bicycles from the 1980s and 1990s, the period during which cycling transitioned from my hobby to my career.

The initial products sold under the Terra One brand will be inspired by my experiences in vintage cycling. My goals are to allow like-minded individuals to ride more frequently, preserve our history, and build a strong global community. Jeremias and I welcome you to come along for the ride!

Most of us ride our classics to enjoy free time exploring the outdoors, and to improve our mental and physical well-being. Then why risk flats, crashes, and long walks home by riding on old tires with age-hardened treads &

The more confidence you have in your equipment, the fewer excuses you'll have to not go for a ride. This is especially important when you're fortunate enough to be riding with fellow fanatics. None of us wants to be the one holding up a long-awaited group ride with friends while improvising a field-expedient repair on a tire which has exceeded its service life.

Tire manufacturers aren’t making any more MTB tires from the 1980s. Let’s reserve the few examples that remain for static display in museums and at shows, and mount up fresh RIDER T1 tires before we roll out to the trails.

Even if thirty year old tires look good enough to ride, their age represents a risk to your beloved vintage mountain bikes, as well as to your health. Sidewalls dry out and deteriorate. The oils which keep rubber fresh and compliant leach out from the tread rubber. Don’t risk crashes which risk the condition of your classics or your own well-being
column2: save old tires for show, and use Terra One tires to go!

column1: Terra One supports organizations which keep the legacy of mountain biking alive, including, but not limited to, the Mountainbike Museum in the Netherlands, the International Mountain Bike Hall of Fame in California, and Génération Mountainbike in France.
In addition, Terra One will contribute to, and participate in, events which bring us together as enthusiasts, and will support them in their efforts to attract, educate &
column2: infatuate the public with the vintage bikes we love. I look forward to meeting you at such an event soon.

column1: 1983: Learned how the right choice of rubber can transform a bike when a pair of CyclePro Snakebelly tires with beige sidewalls gave me and my stripped-down Stingray instant BMX credibility around (and slightly above) my neighborhood.

1987: Survived my first mountain bike adventure in Winter Park Colorado together with my brother: three hours and 15 minutes of oxygen deprived climbing, followed by 45 minutes of white-knuckle descending to return the bikes we had rented for the afternoon.

1991: Tried a set of black sidewall tires on my second mountain bike, and didn’t like the way they looked together with hard-anodized rims. I went back to beige sidewalls until my fourth MTB two years later, which was equipped with silver rims.

1998: Developed the Pathfinder, a 26” multi-terrain tire, together with Cheng Shin Tire. A red-striped version was featured on my full-suspension, Diamondback concept bikes for a Shimano showcase at Interbike, while a black sidewall version was specified on their Wildwood and Voyager models soon after. Sadly, beige sidewall versions of this tire were only available in the aftermarket for a very short time.

2017: Collaborated with Pirelli to develop the CYCL-E tire for Stromer: the first premium, ultra-high performance tire for fast, urban electric bikes. Declined immediate assistance from paramedics after finally discovering the high limits of this tire’s traction on the wet handling track at their Vizzola Ticino proving grounds. Lesson learned: stay out of the marbles!

2018: Worked with Vee Tire Co. to create their E-Winter: the first M + S rated, ECE-R75 certified winter tire for L1e-B motor vehicles with a low-temperature-tolerant Silica compound and a load-specific pattern of siping across the tread blocks, which is also sold as the Stromer TW757.
2018: Sketched the first pencil drawings of what eventually became the RIDER T1: the first new, modern tire model designed with fit, form and function focused on vintage mountain bikes.

2019: Opened the molds needed to create the first prototypes of the RIDER T1. Evaluated the looks and function of the tire, and compared different constructions to determine the initial specification.

2020: Planned availability of the first production run of RIDER T1 tires. Barn finds, garage queens and museum pieces will now be able to retain their vintage looks, while benefitting from fresh, modern rubber.

Compared to many crowdfunding projects, we face fewer risks and challenges on the trail towards delivery of the RIDER T1, as the molds are complete, the prototypes tested, the initial specification confirmed, and the first production order has been placed with the factory.
As the first product offered under my new brand, I designed the RIDER T1 to help fellow vintage mountain bike enthusiasts ride more frequently, preserve our history and build the community.

However, until well after I have successfully delivered this first tire, TERRA ONE will only have a single employee: me. If an unforeseen illness or accident should sideline me during the production and shipping phases for the RIDER T1, its delivery date could be delayed.

Two custom tire designs which I developed with the same manufacturer chosen for the RIDER T1 are already in production, having been brought to market by another brand. I know and trust the key members of their team, having hosted them here in Switzerland and visited them in Thailand. During development, prototype, and production phases, they've consistently met or beat their delivery date estimates. Based on this experience, I am confident in their ability to produce my tires on schedule.

However, unexpected obstacles are always possible. As the future of my company rides strongly on the reputation of the RIDER T1, I will only begin shipping tires after they fully meet my high expectations for quality and performance. If a delay occurs, rest assured that I will be open about the reason with you, and realistic about its duration.
I have made arrangements in the UK, the USA &
column2: Australia (countries from which I expect high demand) to drop-ship the tires domestically. This is intended to reduce shipping costs &amp
column3: protect my supporters in these countries from the possibility of having to pay import duty or other taxes on incoming shipments from Switzerland or the EU.

column1: While I trust my partners, we simply aren't able to test these planned delivery channels in advance with the large volume of packages expected as perks from this campaign.  If significant shipping delays are expected in one of these countries, and I can ship tires to you directly without affecting deliveries to other supporters, I will contact you and give you that option.
If your country is not listed as an option within the Indiegogo shipping menu, please select Rest of the World, and I will personally ship the tires to you.

The RIDER T1 is designed to help us ride more vintage mountain bikes more often. While I'm thankful that other 26"" tires remain available, I'm confident that none of them suits most early mountain bikes as well as this one, combining period-appropriate looks, modern materials and unique design.

No one tire can perfectly suit every rider, across every terrain, in every weather, on every bike. While the RIDER T1 provides balanced, all-around performance to fit many vintage mountain bikes, your support of this campaign will help Terra One produce additional tires which better suit other styles, conditions, eras &

Thank you in advance for supporting the goals of my Terra One brand, and ordering the RIDER T1 tire through this campaign. I look forward to hearing your stories about how they made new experiences possible with your classic mountain bikes: either online, or even better, while riding together. Enjoy!
Founder and Managing Director of Terra One GmbH

My name is Austin and I launched an online business called 1stopfestyshop.com in March of 2018. Since then we have grown tremendously and are now branching out into designing and trademarking some of our product ideas such as the reflective backpack you see above. We have prototypes created for 3 products that we think will be VERY successful in our Music Festival and Concert Market.

We have a great relationship with a manufacturer that was willing to help us turn our idea into a prototype. Once we received the sample for this product we knew it could be a groundbreaking product in our market.  We are currently facing funding issues due to a lot of our funds being tied up in reserving our vendor spots in order to sell these products this summer.

In order to raise funds we will be offering this amazing reflective backpack for 50% OFF for anyone who makes a donation before April 1st. and a 25% OFF Discount for anyone else who makes a donation before the campaign ends
We are super excited to get more of this product produced so that we can start selling it on the website along with selling it during Festival Season in 2019.
Any Donation of $50 or more will recieve one of these amazing reflective backpacks before April 30th

Have you ever ruined your travel due to a heavy luggage on rough roads?
Have you ever left essential items at home because you worried to carry a heavy luggage?

Introducing FrontGo.
Just push it and it goes like a cart or stroller.
Enabled by new telescopic handle mechanism, FrontGo is easy to carry and control.

* For samples, colors of aluminium frames, telescopic handles, and luggage shells do not match.
* Colors of shell, frame, and handle will match when rewards are made.
* You are not buying a shop page, but a product, right? I can guarantee product quality, but not shop page quality. Sorry for poor shop page quality.

FrontGo is a grocery-cart-like push luggage.
FrontGo imposes no burdens against you.
FrontGo is easy to carry and control.

FrontGo uses 100% Polycarbonate (PC).
FrontGo uses high quality Japanese Hinomoto wheels.
FrontGo uses solid aluminium frame with TSA locks.
FrontGo provides two independent spaces.
Internal spaces of FrontGo can be reached at without putting it down on the floor.

FrontGo will be produced by a 30-year experienced luggage company.
FrontGo is ready to be produced and you are free from incomplete reward.
FrontGo is priced reasonable while using quality materials and unique design.

In the highly competitive travel goods market, it is not easy for a one-man company to develop new models, find partners, and sell products through them.
Thus, it may take little more time until I finally find partners.
Maybe, I need to build my own brand and business.

This campaign is the best option for you to meet FrontGo this summer.
Everything is ready.
Order now and meet FrontGo earlier then others.
* Total linear length of FrontGo (60.8 and 58.9 inch) follows 62 linear inch airline regulation.

For the best quality, I use quality material and 30-year experienced luggage manufacturer.
I need to make plastic moulds for new telescopic handles.
In these reasons, it is not easy to lower price further.

It may possibly be 2020 when I launch products to the market.
Retail prices will be $189 for 26inch and $199 for 28inch.
You can meet FrontGo now at up to 37% lower price.

Color choices :   Rose gold  /  Green  /  Black

1.  [Super early bird]   1  FrontGo 26inch / $119 / 100pcs limit
2.  [Super early bird]   1  FrontGo 28inch / $129 / 100pcs limit
3.  [Early bird]   1  FrontGo 26inch / $129 / 100pcs limit
4.  [Early bird]   1  FrontGo 28inch / $139 / 100pcs limit
5.  1  FrontGo 26inch / $139 / No limit
6.  1  FrontGo 28inch / $149 / No limit

* For samples, colors of aluminium frames, telescopic handles, and luggage shells do not match.
* Colors of shell, frame, and handle will match when rewards are made.
* Rose gold luggage will have corner guards when rewards are made.

May 2018 :  Started developing mechanism and design
Nov 2018 :  Completed mechanism development and design work
Nov 2018 :  Chose two manufacturers, one for luggage set and one for telescopic handle
Dec 2018 :  Design works for production were completed for both handle and luggage
Feb 2019 :  Luggage shell moulds were completed.  3D printing was complete for handle
Mar 2019 :  Four sets of samples were complete
Mar 2019 :  Visited The Travel Goods Show 2019 to find brands for business cooperation
Apr 2019 :  Indiegogo campaign starts
May 2019 :  Indiegogo campaign ends
May 2019 :  Starts building plastic moulds for telescopic handle
Jun 2019 :  Complete plastic moulds
Jun 2019 :  Luggage mass production starts
Jul 2019 :  Luggage mass production ends
Aug 2019 :  Reward delivery starts

InnoTravel is a new luggage brand with unique design and mechanism.
InnoTravel plans to make more original products to the market.

As a one-man company which only does original design works, I was a frequent traveler to visit Chinese manufacturers and found that carrying luggage was not easy outside airport, especially when it was loaded with heavy stuff.
For several years, I tried to improve luggage mechanism and I could finally make FrontGo.

Soon after starting a new trading company in January 2016, I realized that I need my own original products to avoid competition.
I thought outsourcing designers could make my ideas in reality.
After spending quite some amount of money and time, I realized that designers could do only cosmetic things, but couldn't really solve any mechanism issues.
Then, I taught myself and became a designer and mechanism developer.

Unlike typical designers, I designed, made, and sold my original products since I thought I could do it successfully.
My new products, i.e. 'BatteryBand' and 'Peelar: a male dog urinal', were so unique and new to the market that people did not really know existence of my products.
My new products could not be classified with traditional product categories.
They were too new and unique.

After three years, I spent a lot of money though I learned a lot from my experience.
I kept developing products and FrontGo is one of them.
Now, I have a few FrontGo samples in hand, more projects to be developed, low balance bank account, and a lot of Chinese friends from various manufacturers.

I went to Las Vegas to visit The Travel Goods Show 2019 and to find FrontGo buyers.
It was not easy to persuade decades-old luggage brands to buy my FrontGo.
Then, I came back to Korea empty handed.

One lady, after checking my FrontGo at the Las Vegas, told me that she finally found a perfect luggage for her use.
I believe that there should be more people who will need my FrontGo just like a Las Vegas lady.

With all these reasons, I chose Indiegogo.
I hope you like FrontGo and be my backer.
Have you ever ruined your travel due to a heavy luggage on rough roads?Have you ever left essential items at home because you worried to carry a heavy luggage?
Introducing FrontGo.Just push it and it goes like a cart or stroller.Enabled by new telescopic handle mechanism, FrontGo is easy to carry and control.

Get a chance to WIN iPhone XS for Christmas!

Win iPhone XS for Christmas by backing and sharing our campaign with your friends!

Two iPhone XS prizes are drawn in the Christmas lottery.      

To join the referral program, all you need to do is:
• Become a Designo Brand backer making an order for FEATURED “X Backpack Basic”.
• Visit Designo Brand campaign page and copy the link. Share the unique referral link with your friends on Facebook and Twitter.
• Follow us on Instagram and like our referralprogram picture. Write a comment on referral program picture “I want an iPhone” and tag 5 friends.

Versatile Carry

 

X Backpack is very versatile, it can be carried in a variety of different ways.

For daily use, it easily carried like a backpack. When you need to look more professional carry it like a briefcase, It includes an adjustable hide away shoulder strap system to look sleek and minimal.
column15:

Retractable wire coils are in the past.

It’s time for innovation solutions.

X Backpacks real time GPS tracker shows exact location of your backpack.

No more feeling stressed about stolen backpack.

Now you can kick back and relax.

We are brothers who travel a lot and like designing. Couple of years ago, my brother and I were searching for a good quality, versatile and nice looking backpack. And we were quite upset when we found that the backpack we searched for is too expensive and regular backpacks are not good enough. Then we stopped searching and start designing the most innovative - stylish backpack with premium quality and unique features. We have traveled to many factories, negotiated with plenty of experts and have been working for more than a year designing perfect backpack.

We believe that our ultimate invention will help people to be more productive, organized, feel more comfortable and they would be proud of using our Backpack.

 

Designo Brand guarantee you acquire a sustainable product.

We will check each product before shipment and give you 5 years guarantee for all our backpacks.

You will get the StingRay at a discounted price (up to 53% off). Every StingRay flashlight comes with a carabiner and a micro-USB charging cable.
Twist the head to turn it on or off.
Out of juice? No sweat, simply charge it via from USB port with the included charging cable. The red LED light indicates charging is in the process and will turn off when fully charged.
StingRay is designed with portability in mind. You can wear it around your neck, clip it on your jeans or with your keys. It is so tiny and light that you won't even feel you are carrying it.
Unlike most of the flashlights that have aluminum or plastic bodies, the StingRay has its body entirely made of stainless steel, which gives it unparalleled strength.
We have tested its strength by running cars over it, and the test didn't even leave a mark on it.

On top of that, the StingRay has an IPX6 waterproof rating, meaning you can bring it on the adventure regardless of the weather. It utilizes three rubber rings in different parts of the body to create watertight seals. As shown in the campaign video, the flashlight has been submerged in the water for several hours while staying on.
The above is tested in front of the garage with a distance of 5 meters to the roller door.

The above is tested in the bedroom with a distance of 2.5 meters to the wall. 

StingRay can maintain such level of brightness for about an hour. The brightness will decrease slowly over time. Although it manages to stay on even after 8 hours (at the end of the campaign video), the brightness becomes unsuitable for outdoor usage after approximately 2 hours. It is recommended to recharge once the brightness is significantly reduced in order to extend the battery life (and stay prepared for new adventures).
Although we have everything ready for manufacturing, we still need your help to meet the minimum order quantity required by the factory for the initial production run.

column2:
Challenges

Once the StingRay project is successfully funded, we will make every effort to meet the delivery deadline. The factory is ready for production and just waiting for the required minimum order quantity to be met. Also, we have operations and logistics arranged and ready to go. Although we don't see any apparent risks and challenges in the project, there is always a chance that subtle things don't go according to the plan, in which case we will do our best to minimize the possible delay.

We're closing the campaign down and moving this party to our own webstore!

We have a small inventory of Axxis from our first production run for sale now. Check out the BD BladeWerX store to see which Axxis are available as well as more Bone Daddy gear!

 

 

Not a knife. Not an axe.

Less than both but more than either.

 

All serious adventurers know that an axe or a large camp knife, usually both, are critical for any deep journey into the bush. Anyone that has had to carry either knows what a pain in the A$$ it is to lug them around.

Inspired by the simplicity of prehistoric man’s flint hand axes – the patent-pending Axxis hand axe is a perfect marriage between the versatility of a bushcraft knife and the awesome chopping power of an axe, with none of the dead weight of either.

 

 

10,000 YEARS IN THE MAKING

 

In the bush, less is more. I’ve spent over a decade systematically stripping down my pack, reducing weight and improving functionality where I could. Easy enough for a tent or a sleeping bag, where innovations in materials and design have led to some major weight saving break-throughs. Unfortunately, when it comes to reducing the weight of bushcraft knives and camp axes, there has been little to no design evolution since the first stone blades and axes emerged on the scene tens of thousands of years ago. That is, until now...

My design odyssey ultimately led to the discovery – or should I say, rediscovery – of the stone-age hand axe.  

 

 

As ancient as fire itself, it is the great ancestor from whence the modern knife and axe emerged. Made from flint or stone, they could be chipped to produce razor-sharp edges for slicing and cutting, or lashed to wooden hafts to make axes. 

With this as a starting point, I began to see ways that modern technology could improve upon this stone age design. Creating a lighter, and more functionally versatile wood processing tool than has ever come before it. 

 

 

Start having the sort of adventures you've always dreamt of,

A knife when you need kindling or to prepare a meal. A hand axe when you need to clear a campsite or build a shelter. A full-size axe for felling giants and splitting logs. With 21st century materials and technology at our disposal, we made your primary bushcraft chopper, STRONGER, LIGHTER, BETTER so you can adventure FARTHER, DEEPER, FASTER.

and carry the only tool versatile enough to fulfill your fantasies.   

 

 

 

AXXIS TOOL SPECIFICATIONS

 

 

 

 

If you can spare a second, consider sharing the #AxxisKickstarter campaign online and tagging a friend or two who would value stripping a few pounds from their pack. Everyone is looking for a better adventure. You'd be helping the campaign and doing your friends a solid too! ???
column2:
body=Hi!%0A%0AI%20found%20this%20wicked%20knife%2Faxe%20thing%20and%20I%20felt%20compelled%20to%20share%20it.%20What%20do%20you%20think%20of%20this%20little%20nasty%3F!%20%0A%0Ahttps%3A%2F%2Fwww.indiegogo.com%2Fprojects%2Faxxis-hand-axe-the-power-of-an-axe-in-your-pocket%2F"" rel=""noopener nofollow"" target=""_blank"">

 

11 UNIQUE FEATURES. ONE SOLID PIECE. NO MOVING PARTS. 

 

 

In an orgiastic confluence of goodness, 11 unique design features come together in a harmonious union of form and function. Adventure with confidence
column3:
no matter how tough the path may get, the Axxis has what you need to get the job done.  

 

 

 

 

Use a “pistol-whip” style swing to unleash the awesome chopping power of the Axxis. The forward-facing trigger rotates around your middle/pointer finger. The in-hand rotation or “axial rotation” aids the blade in gaining a far greater edge velocity than would be expected from a tool of this size.

 

 

 

 

Transforming the Axxis from a pocket-sized, EDC hand axe into a full-size axe is as simple as finding a tree in the woods. Literally.  When you need a haft, the entire forest becomes your hardware store. You bring the lashing cord and the Axxis will do the rest.

 

 

 

 

Boasting an astounding 10 different grip options – perhaps more – the Axxis can be used in more ways than we dare to count, and its skeletonized body with its many holes fit fingers of all sizes. CHOPPING, CUTTING, SPLITTING, SKINNING – find the grip that works best for you.

 

 

 

At only 14oz, the Axxis is far lighter than its closest competitors. With this pint-size tool, you can easily dispatch of any task that would normally require a much larger axe to complete.

 

 

 

This little beauty was cold forged from a solid hunk of 3/8” D2 Tool Steel. Often used to make dies for punching/cutting other metals, D2 is exceptionally wear-resistant and will aid the Axxis in maintaining an awesome edge over prolonged chopping use. Not to be too punny, but in short, what the Axxis lacks in length it more than compensates for with exceptional girth. 

 

 

 

 

With no dedicated tie-down method, the Axxis was born for bondage. We strategically placed the lashing holes throughout the frame of the Axxis so you can tie it to a handle any way you like it.

 

 

 

Compact, with nearly 5 1/2 inches of hair-poppin' edge length from a tool that’s a mere 7 inches overall, we dare say it’s the littlest big axe that’s ever been made! And, its streamlined profile makes it discreet enough to fit in your pocket.

 

 

 

The Axxis was designed for ambidextrous use. Even the Kydex sheath can easily be reversed for left-hand users. 

 

 

 

Made from D2 tool steel, which is something of a high carbon stainless, the Axxis is exceptionally wear-resistant and well guarded against rust and corrosion. Wipe her down with a little oil before you tuck her in at night and she’ll be ready to go in the morning.

 

 

 

Because the grip holes are integrated with the frame, your fingers are free to do more of what you need to do, when you need to do it, without ever having to put your Axxis down. As an extra security measure, the ambidextrous sheath guards the blade without interfering with your grip, or the lashings when mounted to a haft.

 

 

 

Unlike thick baked-on coatings that come off, Titanium Nitride(TiN) bonds with the metal on a molecular level for ultimate abrasion resistance. The TiN coating also provides a better protective barrier against corrosion and rust.

 

 

 

 

HAFTING

The mounting wedge at the center of the tool aids in splitting the end of the haft so the Axxis can be inserted. Once seated, the channeled edges of the wedge secure the tool from sliding forward or back under heavy chopping.

 

 

 

The front and rear-facing triggers are a full 3/8"" thick and guard against ""head-pivot"" as well as prevent slippage by firmly bracing off the haft below the split. Lashing holes have been strategically placed throughout the frame so that even tie-pressure can be applied above, below, and throughout the tool, when being lashed. Once mounted and secured, this combination of features work synergistically to reinforce the axe head and promises a bushcrafting tool that is far greater than the sum of its parts.

column1:
HAND AXE

Unlike traditional hand axes, the fully skeletonized frame of the Axxis allows you to engage the Axxis as though it were an extension of your own hand. However, the true beauty of the Axxis rests in its forward-facing trigger. This feature, in addition to the aggressively sloped pommel, work together to create an ergonomic grip which naturally encourages a ""pistol-whip"" style swing.  

 

 

When it comes to hand axing, there are two grip options you can choose from depending on your comfort level. A 4 finger grip gives you more security, but less rotation, making it better suited for light work. The more advanced 3 finger grip option allows for a greater degree of ""axial rotation"" to occur in the user's hand around their pointer finger. Achieving a far greater edge velocity than would ordinarily be expected from a tool of this size.
column3:
showinfo=0"">
 
 
 

What's in the box?

 

 

Within the box of each Axxis you’ll also find its reversible sheath, and a co-branded Madrock Ultra Light Wiregate Carabiner for carrying your Axxis any way you like. You'll also find a 10 ft length of paracord for lashing the Axxis to a haft during your next grand adventure into the bush.

 

The First 200 &
column4:

column5:
more than either and less than both. With the patent-pending Axxis technology, Bone Daddy Blade WerX is introducing a whole new bladed tool to the world. Do you want to own a piece of this history? Get one of the first 200 Axxis that will ever be made. To set these rare firsts apart from all that will follow, each of these Axxis will be numbered, come with a certificate of authenticity, and carry the Bone Daddy’s mark. And, in accordance with his original inspiration, these will all be in gunmetal with a Stone Age chisel finish.

Along with your limited, collector's edition numbered Axxis, your Champion's Haul will also include:

column1: • An additional Axxis in your choice of color and finish so you can keep your numbered prize in the safe.
• 3 hell-a-cool designer tees to champion your Bone Daddy support

We are NOT a t-shirt company! But we make bad A$$ tees! These beauts are premium, tri-blend, works of art and are the pinnacle in comfort. Fit is athletic so if you're on the line, we recommend going a size up. Of course, a tighter fit makes it easier to show off the guns… We leave the choice to you.

Para-squid Flamethrower/Bottle Openers

 

 

Boasting a steely bite for cracking open your favorite brew, and perfect for throwing hot gobs of 5500℉ mayhem! We built these limited edition Para-squid Flamethrower/Bottle Openers to commemorate the launch of Bone Daddy Blade WerX and the Axxis Kickstarter. 

 

 

Emissaries from another world bearing our colors and mark, here to herald the launch of Bone Daddy Blade WerX. Hand made by the Bone Daddy himself (color varies.) Each Para-Squid is made of roughly 9ft of paracord, which equates to over 70ft of line when the innner strands are removed. Concealed within is an industry best ¼ inch diameter FireSteel.com GobSpark RangerTM Ferro Rod. Need fire? The head of each Bone Daddy Para-Squid boasts a steely bite that is perfect for throwing hot gobs of 5500℉ mayhem! 

 

 

After the heat, use the BD Bottle Opener to crack open a cold one. Why make these monstrosities you ask? Because what could be cooler than a skull-headed squid that shoots fire from its mouth and cracks beer with its teeth. Nuff said…    

 

 

 

 

Meet Bone Daddy Blade WerX

Starting my own minimalist bushcraft company has always been a dream of mine. However, it only became a reality when I met the girl of my dreams. One year to the month after Jacqueline and I first met, Bone Daddy Blade Werx was born. Since then, we got married. And, like our commitment to each other, we are 100% committed to the successful launch of the Axxis and Bone Daddy Blade WerX at large.

With 3 radical, new designs following hot on the heels of the Axxis, we produce skeletonized wilderness tools that reduce weight while increasing functionality SO YOU CAN DO MORE WITH LESS. Utilizing the same archaic principles that inspired the Axxis, our unorthodox approach to design has led to discoveries that will reshape the survival gear landscape and challenge adventurers the world over to rethink their entire approach to minimalist bush prep.

 

 

Thank you for supporting the dream and helping us to bring the Axxis Hand Axe to the world! We can't do this without your support!

Want to connect with us and follow our journey? We'd love to have you along for the ride!

Facebook | Instagram | Twitter | Pinterest | Youtube | LinkedIn | Contact

 

 

 

 

","We're closing the campaign down and moving this party to our own webstore!We have a small inventory of Axxis from our first production run for sale now. Check out the BD BladeWerX store to see which Axxis are available as well as more Bone Daddy gear!  Not a knife. Not an axe.Less than both but more than either. All serious adventurers know that an axe or a large camp knife, usually both, are critical for any deep journey into the bush. Anyone that has had to carry either knows what a pain in the A$$ it is to lug them around.Inspired by the simplicity of prehistoric man’s flint hand axes – the patent-pending Axxis hand axe is a perfect marriage between the versatility of a bushcraft knife and the awesome chopping power of an axe, with none of the dead weight of either.  10,000 YEARS IN THE MAKING In the bush, less is more. I’ve spent over a decade systematically stripping down my pack, reducing weight and improving functionality where I could. Easy enough for a tent or a sleeping bag, where innovations in materials and design have led to some major weight saving break-throughs. Unfortunately, when it comes to reducing the weight of bushcraft knives and camp axes, there has been little to no design evolution since the first stone blades and axes emerged on the scene tens of thousands of years ago. That is, until now...My design odyssey ultimately led to the discovery – or should I say, rediscovery – of the stone-age hand axe.    As ancient as fire itself, it is the great ancestor from whence the modern knife and axe emerged. Made from flint or stone, they could be chipped to produce razor-sharp edges for slicing and cutting, or lashed to wooden hafts to make axes. With this as a starting point, I began to see ways that modern technology could improve upon this stone age design. Creating a lighter, and more functionally versatile wood processing tool than has ever come before it.   Start having the sort of adventures you've always dreamt of,A knife when you need kindling or to prepare a meal. A hand axe when you need to clear a campsite or build a shelter. A full-size axe for felling giants and splitting logs. With 21st century materials and technology at our disposal, we made your primary bushcraft chopper, STRONGER, LIGHTER, BETTER so you can adventure FARTHER, DEEPER, FASTER.and carry the only tool versatile enough to fulfill your fantasies.      AXXIS TOOL SPECIFICATIONS    If you can spare a second, consider sharing the #AxxisKickstarter campaign online and tagging a friend or two who would value stripping a few pounds from their pack. Everyone is looking for a better adventure. You'd be helping the campaign and doing your friends a solid too! ???  11 UNIQUE FEATURES. ONE SOLID PIECE. NO MOVING PARTS.   In an orgiastic confluence of goodness, 11 unique design features come together in a harmonious union of form and function. Adventure with confidence
column2: no matter how tough the path may get, the Axxis has what you need to get the job done.       Use a “pistol-whip” style swing to unleash the awesome chopping power of the Axxis. The forward-facing trigger rotates around your middle/pointer finger. The in-hand rotation or “axial rotation” aids the blade in gaining a far greater edge velocity than would be expected from a tool of this size.     Transforming the Axxis from a pocket-sized, EDC hand axe into a full-size axe is as simple as finding a tree in the woods. Literally.  When you need a haft, the entire forest becomes your hardware store. You bring the lashing cord and the Axxis will do the rest.     Boasting an astounding 10 different grip options – perhaps more – the Axxis can be used in more ways than we dare to count, and its skeletonized body with its many holes fit fingers of all sizes. CHOPPING, CUTTING, SPLITTING, SKINNING – find the grip that works best for you.   At only 14oz, the Axxis is far lighter than its closest competitors. With this pint-size tool, you can easily dispatch of any task that would normally require a much larger axe to complete.   This little beauty was cold forged from a solid hunk of 3/8” D2 Tool Steel. Often used to make dies for punching/cutting other metals, D2 is exceptionally wear-resistant and will aid the Axxis in maintaining an awesome edge over prolonged chopping use. Not to be too punny, but in short, what the Axxis lacks in length it more than compensates for with exceptional girth.     With no dedicated tie-down method, the Axxis was born for bondage. We strategically placed the lashing holes throughout the frame of the Axxis so you can tie it to a handle any way you like it.   Compact, with nearly 5 1/2 inches of hair-poppin' edge length from a tool that’s a mere 7 inches overall, we dare say it’s the littlest big axe that’s ever been made! And, its streamlined profile makes it discreet enough to fit in your pocket.   The Axxis was designed for ambidextrous use. Even the Kydex sheath can easily be reversed for left-hand users.    Made from D2 tool steel, which is something of a high carbon stainless, the Axxis is exceptionally wear-resistant and well guarded against rust and corrosion. Wipe her down with a little oil before you tuck her in at night and she’ll be ready to go in the morning.   Because the grip holes are integrated with the frame, your fingers are free to do more of what you need to do, when you need to do it, without ever having to put your Axxis down. As an extra security measure, the ambidextrous sheath guards the blade without interfering with your grip, or the lashings when mounted to a haft.   Unlike thick baked-on coatings that come off, Titanium Nitride(TiN) bonds with the metal on a molecular level for ultimate abrasion resistance. The TiN coating also provides a better protective barrier against corrosion and rust.    HAFTINGThe mounting wedge at the center of the tool aids in splitting the end of the haft so the Axxis can be inserted. Once seated, the channeled edges of the wedge secure the tool from sliding forward or back under heavy chopping.    The front and rear-facing triggers are a full 3/8"" thick and guard against ""head-pivot"" as well as prevent slippage by firmly bracing off the haft below the split. Lashing holes have been strategically placed throughout the frame so that even tie-pressure can be applied above, below, and throughout the tool, when being lashed. Once mounted and secured, this combination of features work synergistically to reinforce the axe head and promises a bushcrafting tool that is far greater than the sum of its parts.

column1: HAND AXEUnlike traditional hand axes, the fully skeletonized frame of the Axxis allows you to engage the Axxis as though it were an extension of your own hand. However, the true beauty of the Axxis rests in its forward-facing trigger. This feature, in addition to the aggressively sloped pommel, work together to create an ergonomic grip which naturally encourages a ""pistol-whip"" style swing.    When it comes to hand axing, there are two grip options you can choose from depending on your comfort level. A 4 finger grip gives you more security, but less rotation, making it better suited for light work. The more advanced 3 finger grip option allows for a greater degree of ""axial rotation"" to occur in the user's hand around their pointer finger. Achieving a far greater edge velocity than would ordinarily be expected from a tool of this size.    What's in the box?  Within the box of each Axxis you’ll also find its reversible sheath, and a co-branded Madrock Ultra Light Wiregate Carabiner for carrying your Axxis any way you like. You'll also find a 10 ft length of paracord for lashing the Axxis to a haft during your next grand adventure into the bush. The First 200 & the Champions HaulThe Axxis hand axe is going to change the world. For the first time ever, there is truly an alternative to the knife or axe

Introducing TWIDDLE SPIN, a Meticulously designed, Precision-machined, All-metal, Modular kinetic desk toy to unleash your creativity in discovering infinite gaming possibilities. 

 

Designed on core principles of FUN, FORM &
column3: FUNCTION.
column5: SNAKE AND LADDER DISC
column6: >CUSTOMIZATION to its CORE.
column7: >EVERYDAY CARRY OUTDOOR COMPANION
column8:
>FLAUNT IN STYLE 

 

 

 

 

ALL METAL CONSTRUCTION. BUILT TO LAST.  

Aluminum Case: A solid chunk of Aluminum 6082 is CNC precision-machined, sandblasted and Mil-A-8625 anodized for a premium finish, takes the form of a disc with contours from the core extending towards the circumference of the spin for better grip and superior feel of the product. 

 

Brass Cap: A 1-inch diameter 319 Brass Rod is Precision turned and machined to form the central part of the Spin and contoured towards the core for better placement of the thumb and index finger. Laser Engraved detailing along with a clear coat provides a long-lasting finish.

 

Stainless Steel Play Discs: The Play discs are laser cut from SS 304 grade sheet, buffed for a matte finish, and laser engraved with various details. Swappable with other Play discs, various games can be loaded into the Spin.

 

Neodymium Magnets, Steel Balls, and Ball Bearings: The 4mm N35 grade Nickel coated magnets, 5mm Carbon Steel balls, and 686 open style ball Bearings form a crucial role in making various games possible in Twiddle Spin.

 

 



 

 

 

 


 

 



 





WHY CROWDFUNDING? We were always amazed by the backer's community to support innovative projects. Twiddle Spin being a modular gaming gadget with infinite gaming possibilities, new Game suggestions and feedback from the community will definitely help grow the prospects for Twiddle Spin and is an ideal destination for us to launch via Crowdfunding.

 

PACKAGING: As is with the premium product, comes superior packaging to enhance the user experience to own the product and feel proud of having one. The package along with Twiddle Spin holds up to 8 Play Discs and the Keyring which will enable the user to play various games and have them all at a single place for convenience.

 

FULL-SCALE PRODUCTION: We have already produced a batch of 500 units and have sorted out all manufacturing and assembly-related issues to eliminate any surprises at a later stage. We work closely with our manufacturing partners and have already set-up required fixtures and are capable to produce on a large scale.

OUR TEAM: We are a team of Cross- Border tech and gaming enthusiasts from USA and INDIA who share between them wide domain expertise in Robotics, Product Design, Advanced Manufacturing and Software Development. We have worked between us in Microsoft and Industrial Automation firms that have executed time-bound large-scale projects. We together form NOTION BUILDS LLC.

","How about playing Dice, D20 Dice, Roulette Wheel, Mini Ludo, Snake & Ladder, Truth/Dare, Decision Maker, and many more right out of your pocket with just a single gadget? EXCITED?  Introducing TWIDDLE SPIN, a Meticulously designed, Precision-machined, All-metal, Modular kinetic desk toy to unleash your creativity in discovering infinite gaming possibilities.  Designed on core principles of FUN, FORM & FUNCTION.                     MINI LUDO & SNAKE AND LADDER DISC   CUSTOMIZATION to its CORE.   EVERYDAY CARRY OUTDOOR COMPANION     FLAUNT IN STYLE     ALL METAL CONSTRUCTION. BUILT TO LAST.  Aluminum Case: A solid chunk of Aluminum 6082 is CNC precision-machined, sandblasted and Mil-A-8625 anodized for a premium finish, takes the form of a disc with contours from the core extending towards the circumference of the spin for better grip and superior feel of the product.  Brass Cap: A 1-inch diameter 319 Brass Rod is Precision turned and machined to form the central part of the Spin and contoured towards the core for better placement of the thumb and index finger. Laser Engraved detailing along with a clear coat provides a long-lasting finish. Stainless Steel Play Discs: The Play discs are laser cut from SS 304 grade sheet, buffed for a matte finish, and laser engraved with various details. Swappable with other Play discs, various games can be loaded into the Spin. Neodymium Magnets, Steel Balls, and Ball Bearings: The 4mm N35 grade Nickel coated magnets, 5mm Carbon Steel balls, and 686 open style ball Bearings form a crucial role in making various games possible in Twiddle Spin.         WHY CROWDFUNDING? We were always amazed by the backer's community to support innovative projects. Twiddle Spin being a modular gaming gadget with infinite gaming possibilities, new Game suggestions and feedback from the community will definitely help grow the prospects for Twiddle Spin and is an ideal destination for us to launch via Crowdfunding. PACKAGING: As is with the premium product, comes superior packaging to enhance the user experience to own the product and feel proud of having one. The package along with Twiddle Spin holds up to 8 Play Discs and the Keyring which will enable the user to play various games and have them all at a single place for convenience. FULL-SCALE PRODUCTION: We have already produced a batch of 500 units and have sorted out all manufacturing and assembly-related issues to eliminate any surprises at a later stage. We work closely with our manufacturing partners and have already set-up required fixtures and are capable to produce on a large scale.   OUR TEAM: We are a team of Cross- Border tech and gaming enthusiasts from USA and INDIA who share between them wide domain expertise in Robotics, Product Design, Advanced Manufacturing and Software Development. We have worked between us in Microsoft and Industrial Automation firms that have executed time-bound large-scale projects. We together form NOTION BUILDS LLC.",23.0,1,"1 Campaign

Meet TeamGee’s Behemoth. The perfect balance of power and agility. Behemoth lets you glide across any terrain with ease while giving you a tight turning radius and balanced ride so you can drift and slide around corners. It features an independent suspension system only found on fast, high-end cars. This advanced self-leveling suspension gives the Behemoth the balancing power and shock absorption of a car and gives you a perfectly balanced and controlled ride.

column2: >

column1: Behemoth is made for your all-terrain, off-road, and cross-country adventures. Whether you’re riding through mountain roads, desert trails, gravel paths, or are just out for bigger and better experiences, Behemoth will help you make the most of any ride. Go on any trail knowing your board will let you ride across it with ease.
Have questions? Message us on Facebook using the button below >

Behemoth uses the same shock absorption structure as high-end cars. The bridge frame of each wheel adjusts to the right itself, absorbing bumps so you never feel them, and ensuring you stay upright and balanced. This ensures a smooth ride on any road or surface you decide to hit up.

Using a unique bridge frame design, the Behemoth gives each wheel more space for movement. And at 120cm, it offers the best and tightest turning radius in the world. All without compromising on flexibility, performance, or balance. Meaning you can drift and turn around right corners no matter what terrain you’re in. No other e-board can turn on a dime as tightly or quickly as the Behemoth.

Enjoy a smooth ride wherever you ride. Using 155mm extra-large grain off-road rubber tires inspired by off-road vehicle tires. This, combined with our independent suspension system, lets Behemoth deliver incredible stability on any road, surface, or terrain.
We opted for rubber tires and aluminum wheels to provide better elasticity, wear-resistance, and puncture defense than traditional tires.

With each swing arm working independently to balance itself, this lets each wheel keep Behemoth’s deck flat. This means you have the ability to adjust to meet the demands of every environment you want to ride through without worrying about terrain slowing down your adventures or losing balance on a bumpy trail.
The difference between not having a self-leveling suspension system and having one on your electric board is like day and night.

The independent suspension on the truck of each wheel allows for automatic swing amplitude adjustment based on terrain conditions. Whether you’re driving on bumpy city roads or uneven gravel paths, the swingarm on each wheel will angle and auto-adjust to keep the board perfectly balanced.
It further absorbs the vibrational force exerted by riding on uneven ground, allowing the deck to always stay horizontally stable.
Our suspension system is directly inspired by the shock absorption principle and independent suspension of high-end cars such as BMWs.
The shock absorption that Behemoth’s self-leveling suspension offers is so smooth and far beyond what regular boards offer that you’ll probably never want to ride on a rigid axle board ever again.

With an entire deck made of carbon fiber, you won’t have to worry about any weather or environmental hazards. The Behemoth is strong enough to handle any adventure while staying light and thin. Thanks to the slim edge design and how carbon fiber is sharped
column2: it offers more space for wrapped batteries while maintaining a thin body. Meaning you won’t have to worry about wear and tear from the bottom.

column1: Thanks to its enclosed carbon fiber body protecting the batteries, the Behemoth is IP54 waterproof rated, so you can take it through puddles and the rain without fear of damage.
Enjoy 22 Miles (36 KM) of range at a top speed of 25 MPH (40KM/H). And Behemoth comes with four-speed modes so you can find your ideal acceleration &
column2: braking and control your ride with ease.

column1: Behemoth uses regenerative braking technology to regain battery power while slowing down. Meaning you’re recharging your battery and making it last longer every time you go downhill or break.

Behemoth uses state-of-the-art dual hub motors that hide inside its wheels. The 600W brushless motors work to increase energy efficiency and reduce energy loss, allowing you to ride up 30° steep hills with ease.

Behemoth comes with 2 powerful LED lights so you can enjoy your night rides safely. The front spotlight lets you see obstacles coming your way on the road while also giving you a cool under-light for your rides. And the LED tail-light with 3 auto-switching colors (Green/Yellow/Red). ensures you’ll be seen by anyone coming behind you.

The power behind the Behemoth is its built-in 12AH lithium batteries. Taking only 3 hours to charge from 0 to 100%, the 18650 battery is inspired by and uses the design of electric car batteries to give you a far-riding range, high energy storage, and thousands of re-charges.

With a unique U-shaped foot contour, Behemoth offers the firmest and most stable foot placement of any board. And the concave design gives even more rider stability by helping to remove any shock resistance and keeping the board balanced on any uneven surface.

Behemoth uses 3M shock-absorbing rubber grip tape to provide you with awesome wear resistance and a better grip than sandpaper. This means your grip tape will last longer while letting you stay firmly planted on your board.
Experience unparalleled control in the palm of your hand. Enjoy 4-speed modes, 4 braking modes, and all the information, from battery level to speed, to keep you riding for as long as possible.
• Four gear brake force：B4, B3, B2, B1
• B4 is the strongest, B1 is the weakest

Inspired by the largest creature in mythology, Behemoth has unmatched power, speed, and design. We wanted every ride to feel like they were riding a beast of old, whose biblical might and strength are yours to wield on your adventures.

TeamGee has been a leader in electric longboard design for years. We are focused on helping people transition to new ways of riding and commuting. Our boards have won multiple awards, been written about and highly reviewed, and have been ridden on every continent across the world. And we have no plans of slowing down. Check out what’s been said about us and what or dedicated TeamGee riders love about our boards!

The TeamGee electric boards have 12 years of design, research, and development behind them. Our boards are made to combine ultra-thin decks with extreme performance. Our ultra-thin models are the H5/H6/H8/H9
column2: H20/H20 mini/H20T/H9V and are all focused on providing the ultimate rider experience. We have perfected boards that are a perfect mix of high speed, strong battery life, and high horsepower. And we are proud to have given people from more than 40 countries around the world the joy of riding our boards.

column1: Want to help us get the word out? Use our media kit below to let your audience know about the powerful Behemoth and how perfect it is for any adventure.

Winning and losing in a sports game is a matter of seconds, and you might be surprised how a pair of suitable insoles can possibly turn a game around. Professionally designed for athletes, Inxtinct insoles will give you maximum movement control, faster reacting times, and reduce the chance of injuries. Even in daily life, it will provide superior support and comfort after prolonged standing or walking.

 


In professional sports games, the slightest difference may determine if you win or lose. Inxtinct insoles, with their innovative S-shaped guidance design and TPR anti-slip particles, will be the essential gear to help boost your athletic performance.

 

 

Inxtinct insoles take pride in their patented S-shaped design. Based on rigid studies of ergonomics of the foot and the configuration of stress distribution, Inxtinct insoles can effectively guide the transmission of the kinetic energy of the foot to establish a complete gait habit.

 

The force flow of a natural and healthy gait should be S-shaped. The action force from your feet to the ground flows, starting from the outer sole of the heel, and gradually moving to the inner side of the sole, and finally ending with a toe-off. 

 

 

The shape of an insole greatly influences the maximum stress and its distribution, and Inxtinct insoles can reduce pressure felt on key peak pressure points and guide you to naturally perform an S-shaped gait. 

 

 

 

The height difference of Inxtinct insoles can help you exert your full athletic strength, minimize fatigue when going through intensive training, and reduce the valgus angle of the sole when moving laterally. 

 

Improper foot protection during lateral movements will cause the foot arch to collapse, further causing the foot to slip down or lead to painful pes valgus. Inxtinct insoles will provide a supportive energizing foundation and protect your feet from injuries. 

 

Unlike other insoles that add auxiliary materials to support your foot arch, Inxtinct uses the subtractive design to create a natural arch height difference, guiding you to perform naturally the S-shaped gait.

 

 

When you are performing intense exercise, you might notice that your feet slide and move constantly within your shoes. These movements, no matter how slight, limit your performance and speed potential. Inxtinct insoles, with their TPR anti-slip granules, give you excellent foot control and reactivity. 

 

After putting on the Inxtinct insoles, your toes will not move back and forth in the shoes, sparing you from having blisters. And the friction tests show that Inxtinct insoles grip better than other insoles in both dry and wet conditions! 

 

The special TPR anti-slip granules give the insole 6 times the grip compared to other insoles, locking in the vertical and horizontal displacement of the insole. Our TPR particles are placed in the S-shaped zone for more traction.

 

 

Inxtinct insoles support your foot arch and lower the position of your thumb ball, keeping your sole in the optimal position and your fascia in the most comfortable state. 

 

 

The original version of our insoles was composed of EVA (Ethylene-Vinyl Acetate) material, but after several refinements, we came up with the 2021 Indiegogo brand new edition by blending 20% of rubber elastomers with EVA. 

This upgraded high-elasticity EVA composite material allows the reinvented Inxtinct Insoles to possess greater flexibility and durability, enhance natural shock absorption, and reduce the chance of insole deformation. 

 

 

If you are suffering from recurrent and chronic problems, including bunion, plantar fasciitis, deformed thumb, and even lower back pain, look at your shoe soles, it’s very likely that your footwears are at fault.

 

 

Simply by standing, we are placing pressure on our feet and joints, so not only athletes but also people from all walks of life deserve a pair of comfortable insoles. The Inxtinct team came up with the Daily Life Edition for people that have to be on their feet all day, runners, and joggers to provide extra comfort for everyone!

 

 

 

Performing a natural gait is even more essential for children, for an unhealthy posture can lead to severe foot problems in the long term. The Children Edition will help position children’s thumb into the proper place, and guide them to perform a healthy gait with the S-shaped design.

 

 

We highly suggest you measure the length of your current insole instead of simply checking your shoe size. The difference between consecutive sizes of Inxtinct insoles is only 0.4 to 0.5cm, making your shoes fit as if they were custom-made.

 

 

Normally, people choose the insole size that corresponds with their shoe size, without even noticing that two same-sized shoes may have inner insoles of different sizes and shapes due to the functions. Without the right size, insoles can’t offer maximum performance enhancement.

 

Every professional athlete has their own customized shoes, for the structure of the insoles and the shoes fit their feet perfectly. If your insole keeps sliding in your shoe, it will certainly lead to extreme discomfort and reduce your athletic performance.

 

  • We conducted a small experiment to demonstrate the importance of choosing the correct size of your insoles.

 

 

Inxtinct insoles are for all athletes who want to improve their performance and anyone that yearns for extra comfort to tackle their day. We have offered some samples of our insoles to various users for a tryout before we publish the project. Let’s see what they said about our design!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Inxtinct insoles inherit the 90-year craftsmanship from the fourth-generation of a Taiwanese shoe-making family, which has long cooperated with well-known sports brands such as Nike and Adidas.

 

Our designer was an enthusiastic soccer player, and after accidentally twisted the anterior cruciate ligament of his left knee, he started to acquire knowledge of the human body structure during his rehabilitation and began to brainstorm and design Inxtinct insoles for others to prevent injuries. The design has undergone multiple testing experiments conducted by the Sports Biomechanics Laboratory of PCCU.

 

 

Later, we went beyond designing insoles for sport-lovers. We looked for answers to improve the problems of backache, plantar fasciitis, and standing discomfort for people from all walks of life, and months later, the Daily Life Edition and Children Edition were designed. After multiple refinements, we started to design various sizes for everyone.
column3:
showinfo=0"">
 

To ensure the quality of our insoles, we cooperated with Taiwan Paiho, the leading Taiwanese listed company for the manufacture and distribution of the related products for shoes and garments. The renowned company has gained recognition in the global sporting goods market, providing materials for international brands, including Nike, Adidas, Reebok, and Puma. With their exclusive technology, we are able to adhere the TPR anti-slip granules to the fabric, and you can rest assured that our design can withstand all the everyday tear and wear, giving you the extra power, control, and comfort you deserve!

 

 

Paiho and Inxtinct are the co-owners of INXTINCT INSOLE, from the basic product designs to technology development, Paiho and Inxtinct have both been the cornerstone of their shared success. Furthermore, Paiho will also take responsibility for manufacturing and the delivery of INXTINCT INSOLE.

 

Paiho &
column4:
Inxtinct Official Declaration of Cooperation

Paiho and Inxtinct both own specific patents of INXTINCT INSOLE, with Inxtinct owning patents for insole designs and structure refinements, and Paiho owning their trademarked TPR Anti-Slip technology. The Anti-slip granules used on the 2021 New Edition INXTINCT INSOLE are the results of the cooperation of both companies. We've listed our technology patents below for your reference.

Paiho Inxtinct｜Patent Publications &
column5:
Test Certificates

 

Press Kit

View on YouTube

The True Places Folding Chair is a modern, portable outdoor chair that provides true comfort and convenience! 

 

Let’s face it, standard portable chairs are really uncomfortable. Using new, patent-pending folding technology, the True Places Folding Chair is designed to create an ultra-comfy seat that stays taut — no more sagging or pinching — while still folding compactly.

The innovative, modern design features optimal ergonomic angles to provide maximum comfort that you won’t want to get out of, even after sitting for hours.

 

 

 

The True Places Folding Chair is much easier to tote than traditional outdoor chairs. The frame is made from lightweight aerospace-grade aluminum which is 3x lighter than steel and folds up very small, making it easy to carry!

The sustainable, high quality carrying bag has a padded shoulder strap so you can carry the chair messenger style or just over your shoulder. You can also connect two of the chairs and carry them both backpack style.

 

 

 

The strong, comfortable outdoor fabric is weather, stain, and UV/fade-resistant, breathable, and designed to last for years to come. And the durable, high quality aerospace-grade aluminum frame is naturally corrosion-resistant.

Plus, the premium carrying bag is reinforced in all the right places to keep performing over time.

 

 

 

The True Places Folding Chair has bottle openers under each arm, a cupholder and phone holder that can go on either side and hooks for the carrying bag and more. The chair also features large feet for stability on any surface!

 

 

 

The carrying bag is made of recycled polyester constructed from landfill and ocean-bound plastic bottles. Plus, not only is the aluminum frame lightweight, it is also endlessly recyclable

 

 

We’re a team of entrepreneurs, designers, engineers and dreamers from across the globe. We ventured out on our own after decades of experience creating and building products and brands for some of the biggest companies in the world.

More importantly, we’re also dads, moms, kids sports team coaches, concert-in-the-park lovers, and just hang-out-with-the-neighbor-outside-the-house enthusiasts. We came together to start True Places because we realized that all these moments just outside our doors are a huge part of our lives and the best times to connect with family and friends.

But the things we use and take with us feel like they’re stuck in the dark ages – low quality, uncomfortable, easily broken and not in line with who we are or how we live. With our backgrounds in product innovation, we knew we could do better. Our founders Nelson and Ben partnered with some of the best industrial designers, engineers and manufacturing experts around the world, and after thousands of hours of researching, designing and experimenting we can’t wait to share the first results – the True Places Folding Chair –  with you, wherever your true places may be.

 

Nelson and Ben have a combined 30+ years experience in product innovation and brand development. We spend so much time outdoors with friends and family and we couldn't get the idea out of our heads that what we used in those situations wasn't great. We knew there had to be a better way. After years of thinking about it, we finally made the leap to make True Places happen. 

 

October 2019 - Initial Designs Created

January 2020 - Prototype Testing Began

June 2020 - Designs Complete

October 2020 - Kickstarter Campaign

November 2020 - Live on Indiegogo InDemand

December 2020 - Final Sampling and Tooling

January 2021 - Production Begins

May 2021 - Pre-Sale Product Ships

 

We can’t thank you enough for checking out our project and helping us make True Places Folding Chair a reality.

We know not everyone will be able to support us with a pledge, so even if you can’t give a dollar or pre-order a True Places Folding Chair, if you’re a supporter of True Places, you can help us spread the word on Facebook, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of! 

","The True Places Folding Chair is a modern, portable outdoor chair that provides true comfort and convenience!  Let’s face it, standard portable chairs are really uncomfortable. Using new, patent-pending folding technology, the True Places Folding Chair is designed to create an ultra-comfy seat that stays taut — no more sagging or pinching — while still folding compactly.The innovative, modern design features optimal ergonomic angles to provide maximum comfort that you won’t want to get out of, even after sitting for hours.   The True Places Folding Chair is much easier to tote than traditional outdoor chairs. The frame is made from lightweight aerospace-grade aluminum which is 3x lighter than steel and folds up very small, making it easy to carry!The sustainable, high quality carrying bag has a padded shoulder strap so you can carry the chair messenger style or just over your shoulder. You can also connect two of the chairs and carry them both backpack style.   The strong, comfortable outdoor fabric is weather, stain, and UV/fade-resistant, breathable, and designed to last for years to come. And the durable, high quality aerospace-grade aluminum frame is naturally corrosion-resistant.Plus, the premium carrying bag is reinforced in all the right places to keep performing over time.   The True Places Folding Chair has bottle openers under each arm, a cupholder and phone holder that can go on either side and hooks for the carrying bag and more. The chair also features large feet for stability on any surface!   The carrying bag is made of recycled polyester constructed from landfill and ocean-bound plastic bottles. Scroll down to find the English version.

 

Notre histoire

Nous sommes fans de cyclisme... et de nature, les 2 allant souvent de paire.

Avoir une connaissance approfondie de l'industrie du textile nous a vraiment donné une nouvelle perspective, ou plutôt une perspective alarmante: la grande majorité des vêtements de cyclisme d'aujourd'hui sont fabriqués directement à partir de pétrole, dans une économie linéaire qui est très néfaste pour notre planète.

Notre objectif est de fabriquer un produit entièrement circulaire qui n'utilise que des matieres recyclés, qui peut être retourné en fin de vie et qui peut devenir un nouvel équipement flambant neuf. Nous repoussons les limites de l'éco-conception et de la technologie pour des vêtements haute performance.

Découvrez comment nos maillots ont été conçus:

 

La pré-commande est un élément essentiel de cette campagne. En fabricant uniquement ce qui a été commandé, il n'y a pas de stocks perdus, pas de gaspillage. En pré-commandant votre maillot, vous aurez la preuve que la fabrication éco-responsable de vêtements n'est pas seulement une idée pour l'avenir, mais une véritable solution dès aujourd'hui.

Les avantages - Notre collection

Vous pouvez contribuer de deux manières:

1- en pré-commandant nos articles éco-responsables - vous bénéficierez de conditions avantageuses. Mais n'attendez pas pour commander car nous avons une quantité limitée de vêtements disponibles.

* Remarque : une fois que vous avez passé votre commande via Indiegogo, nous vous contacterons par e-mail pour le choix de la taille et de la couleur.

2- en faisant un don: ""Back it"". Tout montant est le bienvenu et nous aidera à atteindre notre objectif de devenir entièrement circulaire.

En plus de cela, partagez le message autour de vous afin que nous puissions atteindre l'objectif, ensemble.

Offrir des vêtements de cyclisme éco-responsables ne signifie pas sacrifier le confort, la performance ou le prix. Nous travaillons avec un site de fabrication de haute qualité en Europe. Tous nos produits ont été testés et approuvés par d'anciens coureurs professionnels, ainsi que par des passionnés de cyclisme qui ont validé leurs coupes (adaptées à toutes les morphologies), leur confort, leur légèreté et leur respirabilité.

Le design est intentionnel, minimaliste et reconnaissable. Découvrez notre collection:

- Le maillot à manches courtes a été conçu pour les sorties au-dessus de 15°C. Tout en étant extrêmement respirant et léger, il offre également un ajustement parfait. Le tissu très extensible aide à disperser rapidement la chaleur pour vous garder au sec. Ce maillot Velor a été conçu avec plus de 95% de matériaux recyclés.

- Le maillot à manches longues est disponible en orange, gris et vert. Ce maillot a été conçu avec plus de 95% de matériaux recyclés et est adapté pour rouler dans les jours les plus froids du printemps, de l'automne et même de l'hiver (5-15 ° C).

- Le cuissard a été conçu avec 66% de nylon recyclé. Ce matériau offre une durabilité exceptionnelle tout en étant extrêmement confortable. Le design est minimaliste et notre cuissard offre le meilleur de la performance. Il est disponible dans toutes les couleurs, à condition qu'il soit noir.

Nous vous contacterons peu de temps après avoir passé votre commande afin que vous puissiez choisir la bonne taille et la bonne couleur. D'ici là, prenez un peu de temps pour consulter notre page Produits sur notre site Web pour y trouver toutes les informations nécessaires : https://www.velor-cycling.com/our-products

Nous avons pris la décision de rester dans une fourchette de prix compétitive pour tous nos produits. Le choix de changer le monde du cyclisme ne doit pas être plus cher.

Pourquoi nous avons besoin de votre support.

Fabriquer des maillots avec plus de 95% de matériaux recyclés n'est que la première étape. Dans le futur, nous voulons rendre tous nos vêtements entièrement circulaires: des bouteilles en PET jetées aux vêtements de cyclisme haut de gamme, qui seront à leur tour recyclés pour devenir de nouveaux maillots. Nous devons nous appuyer sur les technologies émergentes pour le recyclage des fils en PET, fabriquer le tissu et le tester efficacement. Pour cela, nous avons besoin de votre soutien dans ce crowdfunding et après.

De plus, nous élargirons notre gamme pour proposer des vêtements éco-responsables pour toutes les saisons et différents types d'activités cyclistes.

 

Velor et les objectifs de développement durable

 

_____________________________________________________________________________________

 

 

 

 

 

Our story

Our love of cycling equals our love of nature and the healthy environment we want to live in. Having a deep knowledge of the fiber industry really gave us a new perspective, or rather an alarming one: The vast majority of today's cycling garments are made directly from oil, in a linear economy that is in fact very harmful to our planet.

Our aim is to make a fully circular product that uses only recycled polyesters, that can be returned at end-of-life and that can be remanufactured into a new fabric again. We are pushing the boundaries of sustainability and technology for high-performance garments.

Find out more about how our jerseys have been designed :

 

Pre-ordering is an essential part of manufacturing management and this campaign. Because pre-ordering means we do not have to keep stock, we have zero waste in sales. By pre-ordering your jersey, you will become part of a demonstration to the cycling industry that sustainable garment manufacturing is not only an idea for the future, but a real solution starting today.

Let’s change the mindset and the footprint of the cycling industry!

The Perks - Our collection

There are two ways you can contribute :

1- by pre-ordering our garments*. You will find attractive perks to get your hands on our sustainable garments. But, do not wait to order as we only have a limited quantity of garments available.

*Note: once you place your order through Indiegogo, we will contact you via email for selection of size and color.

2- by making a donation : ""Back it"". Any amount is welcome and will help us to reach our goal to become fully circular.

On top of these, please share the message around you so we can reach the target, together.

Offering sustainable cycling apparels does not mean sacrificing comfort, performance or price. We work with a high-quality manufacturing site in Europe. All our products have been tested and approved by former professional riders, as well as cycling enthusiasts who value good fit, comfort, weight reduction and breathability.

The design is intentional, minimalistic and recognizable. Discover our collection:

- The short-sleeve jersey has be designed for rides above 15 degrees Celsius. While being extremely breathable and lightweight, it also offers a perfect fit. The high-stretch fabric helps to quickly disperses the heat to keep you dry. Velor short sleeve jersey is made with 95% recycled materials.

- The long-sleeve jersey is available in orange, grey and green. Velor long sleeve jersey has been designed with 95%+ recycled materials and is adaptable to a huge range of conditions for riding in the colder days of spring, fall, and even winter (5-15°C)

- The bib short has been designed with 66% recycled Nylon. This material offers exceptional durability while being extremely comfortable. The design is minimalistic and our bib short offers the best of the performance. It's available in all colors, as long as it is black.

We will get in touch with you shortly after you made your order so you can choose the right size and color. Please have a look to our Products page in our website to find all necessary information with regards to our products : https://www.velor-cycling.com/our-products

We made a firm decision to stay within a competitive price range for all of our products. The choice to change the world of cycling does not have to be more expensive.

Why we need your support

Making jerseys with 95+% recycled materials is only the first step. Ultimately, we want to make all our garments fully circular: from discarded PET bottles to premium cycling garments, and back to recycled materials. We need to build on emerging technologies for PET yarn-to-yarn recycling, manufacture the fabric, and effectively test it. For this, we need your support in this crowdfunding and after.

Moreover, we will expand our portfolio to offer sustainable garments for all seasons and different types of cycling activities.

 

Velor and the Sustainable Development Goals
