This journey began when COVID forced bunker rakes off the courses. That sparked Ryan Curran, a professional golfer on the Ontario/Canadian mini-tour circuit, to scratch out the initial design of Rake Caddy on a napkin. Isn’t that how all great ideas are born? Ryan brought the idea to me, Mike White, a Mental Performance Coach and former Marketing Agency owner, and a partnership was formed.

But the question we asked ourselves was, “Does this idea have life after COVID?”.  Judging by the reaction to our prototype, the answer was a resounding, “Yes!”. The convenience factor alone scored extremely high with our small test group.  Rake Caddy is always with you.
We also asked ourselves, “What problems are we solving?”.
• The rake always seems to be on the other side of the bunker.
• It gets in the way of a good lie.
• You never know who or what has touched it last.
• Avoids the question, “What is that green thing on the handle?”.
• No splinters or bugs, snakes and other surprises hiding in the grass.
• No rakes on the course speeds up maintenance and saves costs.
• A personal rake improves the pace of play, meaning more revenue for the course.
Promotional companies are always looking for unique items with ample space for logos. Rake Caddy would make a great addition to any prize table. And of course, it makes a great gift!
After four prototype versions and with patents and trademarks in place, Ryan and I have our first production run set for September 2021.

You are one of thirty-three million golfers in North America, or at least know one of them. We would love you to help us get the word out to your golfing friends through social media shares, likes and stories.
Share the video, we had fun doing it, (19 takes later!). Rake Caddy is a very cool device and is fun to use.  And it weighs less than 1 lb.!
Give us your thoughts on Rake Caddy, send us an
column2: body=Thanks%20for%20reaching%20out.%20We'll%20get%20back%20to%20you%20shortly."" rel=""noopener nofollow"">email.  Also, let us know what else we can do for you.  We love collaboration and see Indiegogo as a great platform to share ideas and support one another.

column1: Interested in becoming a strategic partner? Please reach out.

Changing the way we rake a bunker can take time. But we have a clear vision on how Rake Caddy will offer a better experience for golfers and golf courses alike.  With your support, we can bring Rake Caddy to life.
A golfer might hesitate to add another item to their bag, but at less than 1 lb. and foldable and retractable, it will become an essential tool in the arsenal.

column2: >We are as surprised as you are that this tent doesn't already exist. It's about time we give more thought to our best adventure buddies and provide them the best experiences in the wild.
column3: >Let's change how we backpack with our dogs, starting here!

column1: • Separate section in the tent for your dog
• Dog area accessible through large indoor mesh wall

If your dog is crate trained or loves their personal space at night, they will thrive with this tent set-up. After using our Kings Peak tent for the first time I can tell you, we won’t be using any other tent. Ollie slept more than he ever has backpacking, which is important because dogs need their rest just as much as humans do. He was never anxious because he could see that we were right next to him all night, and I even slept better knowing he was safe in his own area.
column4:
Rainfly: 30-denier polyurethane-coated ripstop nylon

Mesh: 15-denier ripstop nylon mesh

Poles: 8.5MM Aluminum

Tent width: 52in 

Human section length: 88in

Dog section length: 24in

Tent height: 46in
column5:
>

When we initially came up with this tent idea we were stoked about it. Then the prototype finally came and we were honestly anxious about trying it out because it didn’t matter how much we liked the idea, what mattered was if the dogs liked it! Let me tell you, Ollie thrived with this set up. Both Ollie and I slept better backpacking than we ever have! If you’re not convinced yet, we think your dog will be.

column1: • Let’s be honest both you, and more importantly, your dog will get a better night’s rest in your own separate spaces
• It separates your dirty pup from your gear
• You can leave the doggy door open for them to roam while keeping your section partitioned off from mosquitoes and other bugs
• You will know your dog is safe and protected from the elements inside the tent
• The interior wall is mesh reducing anxiety for your dog, and you, because they can see you at all times
• The separate dog section utilizes your dog’s natural instinct or prior crate training to adjust quickly for a good night’s rest

“For thousands of years dogs have sought out small, enclosed spaces for shelter and security. Crating your dog can give him that feeling of safety, like he has his own room to go to.” -American Kennel Club (AKC)
column2: >
column4:
>

This tent has 30% more space than your average 2 person tent to accommodate 2 people and 1-2 dogs. Besides the fact of keeping dirt and mud off your gear, the separate dog section utilizes your dog’s natural instinct or prior crate training to adjust quickly for a good night’s rest. Ollie is a restless sleeper at night unless he is in his crate. We will never use another tent with Ollie after experiencing the difference in sleep both he and we got.
column6: >The large mesh wall on the inside is removable to allow quick access to your dog. The see-through material is there to let you and your dog see each other at all times and to enclose their space if desired to create a crate-like appearance. This wall can be easily unzipped so you can hang out with your dog while still leaving a thin baseboard to keep water and dirt away from your gear.
column7:
>

A separate exit for your dog can provide many benefits. We like to allow our dog access to his shelter throughout the evening in case he wants to head to bed early or simply have a comfy place to relax. Being able to open only his section and not get mosquitoes in the main tent space is a big deal. As we all know, our pups like to follow us everywhere. Have you ever had to tinkle in the middle of the night and your furry friend takes off into the black abyss... well this will allow you to not worry about getting your dog all riled up at night and having to finding them when you’re half awake.
column8:
>

The shorter third pole that supports the front and back doors help maximize living space and create more head room. It proved effective while chilling in the tent and being able to sit up straight.
column9: >
column10:
>

Just like everyone else we bought a puppy during the 2020 pandemic and it has been a blast. Even before we got Ollie, backpacking was a big part of our lives and we wanted our pup to be a part of that too. Taking dogs to the mountains is like taking kids to Disneyland, they obviously belong there. But we quickly found there was no easy way to accommodate Ollie sleeping at night without either making a mess of our gear or making him sleep outside. After contemplating a DIY solution, we decided that we should spend more time and effort to make the perfect solution and see if others were interested in the same idea. So, we created the Kings Peak tent that we are so excited to launch through this crowdfunding campaign.
column12:
Challenges

The Kings Peak tent is still in development and the final designs may change. The images for limited editions are the latest prototypes that we have, and we will update you with any changes to appearance, cost, or function.

By purchasing the Kings Peak tent on our crowdfunding campaign, you are helping to create something new — not ordering something that already exists. There may be changes or delays, and there’s a chance something could happen that prevents us from being able to finish the project as promised.

If we fail to complete this project, we will make every reasonable effort to find another way of bringing the project to the best possible conclusion for those that have reserved.
column13:
>Return and refund policy

We offer a 1 year guarantee on all our products, but we do not offer refunds, exchanges, or returns for Kings Peak products received as a reward unless there is a clear malfunction from the factory. 

We do not offer refunds if you have changed your mind, regretted your contribution, or are unsatisfied due to a shipping delay. 

","We are as surprised as you are that this tent doesn't already exist. It's about time we give more thought to our best adventure buddies and provide them the best experiences in the wild.Let's change how we backpack with our dogs, starting here!

column1: Separate section in the tent for your dog
Dog area accessible through large indoor mesh wall

If your dog is crate trained or loves their personal space at night, they will thrive with this tent set-up. After using our Kings Peak tent for the first time I can tell you, we won’t be using any other tent. Ollie slept more than he ever has backpacking, which is important because dogs need their rest just as much as humans do. He was never anxious because he could see that we were right next to him all night, and I even slept better knowing he was safe in his own area.  Trail weight: 5lbs 2oz Main Tent Floor & Rainfly: 30-denier polyurethane-coated ripstop nylonMesh: 15-denier ripstop nylon meshPoles: 8.5MM AluminumTent width: 52in Human section length: 88inDog section length: 24inTent height: 46in When we initially came up with this tent idea we were stoked about it. Then the prototype finally came and we were honestly anxious about trying it out because it didn’t matter how much we liked the idea, what mattered was if the dogs liked it! Let me tell you, Ollie thrived with this set up. Both Ollie and I slept better backpacking than we ever have! If you’re not convinced yet, we think your dog will be.
Let’s be honest both you, and more importantly, your dog will get a better night’s rest in your own separate spaces
It separates your dirty pup from your gear
You can leave the doggy door open for them to roam while keeping your section partitioned off from mosquitoes and other bugs
You will know your dog is safe and protected from the elements inside the tent
The interior wall is mesh reducing anxiety for your dog, and you, because they can see you at all times
The separate dog section utilizes your dog’s natural instinct or prior crate training to adjust quickly for a good night’s rest

“For thousands of years dogs have sought out small, enclosed spaces for shelter and security. Crating your dog can give him that feeling of safety, like he has his own room to go to.” -American Kennel Club (AKC) This tent has 30% more space than your average 2 person tent to accommodate 2 people and 1-2 dogs. Besides the fact of keeping dirt and mud off your gear, the separate dog section utilizes your dog’s natural instinct or prior crate training to adjust quickly for a good night’s rest. Ollie is a restless sleeper at night unless he is in his crate. We will never use another tent with Ollie after experiencing the difference in sleep both he and we got.The large mesh wall on the inside is removable to allow quick access to your dog. The see-through material is there to let you and your dog see each other at all times and to enclose their space if desired to create a crate-like appearance. This wall can be easily unzipped so you can hang out with your dog while still leaving a thin baseboard to keep water and dirt away from your gear.A separate exit for your dog can provide many benefits. We like to allow our dog access to his shelter throughout the evening in case he wants to head to bed early or simply have a comfy place to relax. Being able to open only his section and not get mosquitoes in the main tent space is a big deal. As we all know, our pups like to follow us everywhere. column28:
>Will the AER fit my vehicle?

In order to get the Crua AER on your vehicle, you will need a set of crossbars (see image below). Please check both the static and dynamic loads of your crossbars. These crossbars should run perpendicular to your vehicle.

 

The gap between the mounting rails on the Crua AER is 33in/83cm.
column32:

- Reflective flysheet

- Annex Room

- LED Lighting

- Electric Pump

- Connector Flysheet

- Locking Mechanism

Configuration 1 - Cover

Configuration 2 - Room

Who are We?

At Crua, we're a team of outdoor enthusiasts and adventure lovers. With one office in Co. Kerry, Ireland and another in Adirondacks, NY, USA, we're perfectly situated to design and develop great gear. We take immense pride in creating the best possible outdoor experience for you. We don't just do hammocks, we make the world's toughest tents. You can trust our experienced craft.

column2: >Find out more on our website: travelmaterobotics.com
column6:
>

Travelmate is the first true fully autonomous suitcase. It works seamlessly in crowds, doesn't require any extra peripherals and you can buy it at a starting price of 1099$. Travelmate integrates with your smartphone to accomplish complex tasks that no other suitcase can do. It can move vertically or horizontally with ease. You can put more items or perhaps another suitcase on top of Travelmate when it is traveling autonomously in horizontal mode. Travelmate navigates large crowds and is able to recognize and avoid objects as needed. As you can see in the video above, our suitcase is not just a concept – it is a real working model and all of the features demonstrated already work on the Travelmate autonomous robotic suitcase.

column1: Travelmate is available to purchase right now on indiegogo. We launched our indiegogo project to raise funds for commercial scale production, to expand our team and to establish distribution channels for Travelmate. Now, we have accomplished all of that and have officially released Travelmate! There are currently 3 different suitcase models, ranging from carry on sized to a large suitcase. Travelmate is practical, innovative and brings the future to you. If you decide to back Travelmate, then thank you very much for your support!

Travelmate isn't just a normal suitcase -- it's an autonomous robot companion that follows you wherever you go and makes traveling much easier. Our suitcase is smart enough to always follow you and avoid any obstacles in its way. Travelmate is perfect for any situation. It can carry your stuff for you when you're going to work, walking to school or rushing to the airport gate. Smart features like omni wheels and our Follow Me system means that Travelmate is at the cutting edge of AI and autonomous movement technology. The Follow Me system has built in sensors that detect as well as avoid obstacles like people and furniture. It uses the Travelmate application to follow you and to better pinpoint its location at all times.

In addition to fully autonomous horizontal and vertical modes, the Travelmate has a variety of useful features that other suitcases do not have. The battery that powers Travelmate can be easily removed and is charged with wireless technology. The battery can be used to charge almost all electronics through a USB port and a standard electrical outlet. In addition, the Travelmate suitcase features unique optional omni wheels that allow for unprecedented multi-directional movement. This is great for autonomous technology. Since the suitcase functions as a robot in practice, it uses AI and machine learning to optimize its movements and omni wheels allow for markedly increased stability and range of motion.

The Travelmate's autonomous functionality is unmatched and doesn't require any extra peripherals. All you need is the suitcase and your smartphone. Travelmate will follow you wherever you go. Whether you're at the airport, going to work or going to school
column2: the Travelmate suitcase can help you carry luggage in a wide variety of situations.

column5:
s=d7485f9574c2ca95b8326539907211ce"" src=""""/>
 

Travelmate has a battery life of 4 hours when in full autonomous mode and up to 100 hours in stand by mode (meaning when you are using it like a normal suitcase). The electric motor and internal components that enable autonomous functionality take up almost no space in the suitcase, accounting for less than 3% of the suitcase's volume. Multi colored LED lighting is a feature on all Travelmate models and signifies your suitcase's battery level. There are over 16 million different color variations. You can customize or turn off all LED lighting through the Travelmate application.

 

The Travelmate suitcase features convenient directional indicators that show you exactly where it's going at all times. This is similar to turn signals in cars. We've also added a speaker that will inform you of obstacles and the suitcase's location – this feature is completely optional and you can turn it on or off in the Travelmate application.
column9:
s=9f968aab3f9f00fbce9821034a594e5e"" src=""""/>
 

In addition to autonomy, we've differentiated ourselves with convenient features like a customizable design, a smart lock system, a built in scale, an integrated camera and much more.

 

Travelmate is fully TSA compliant and our suitcase sizes are standardized. The smallest Travelmate is carry on sized and fits the specifications of all major airlines' requirements for carry on specifications. The Travelmate has a smart lock system. You can open your suitcase directly or through your smartphone. In order to comply with TSA guidelines, we have also included a mechanism to manually open the suitcase. You can always add a separate lock to your suitcase for extra security.

column6:
s=9d898b521b6e58aa51b2e9792376d94f"" src=""""/>(Omni wheels)

Travelmate includes a GPS chip that helps orient the suitcase and allows you to know the location of the suitcase at all times with the Travlemate smartphone application.
column11:
s=0e2055e49b484660eaa72b7d631086d2"" src=""""/>

All Travelmate models will include a built in scale that will accurately measure the weight of your suitcase's contents. You'll never have to worry about over packing because Travelmate will conveniently display the suitcase's weight. You can switch between Kilograms or Pounds via the Travelmate application.
column16:
s=6dc8de48753caf452535c63fa10da256"" src=""""/>
 

The Travelmate autonomous suitcase is fully functional and we have full app integration ready. Travelmate will constantly improve through machine learning. This is achieved by uploading movement data automatically to the Travelmate application
column17: your suitcase will essentially become smarter and smarter as time goes on and more people have Travelmate suitcases. You can disable this feature in the app if you want to. After it releases, we have plans to update the free Travelmate application regularly to improve and add features. Eventually we want to add things like travel suggestions, airport information, airport gate information and much more to the application.
column22:
s=ae4a761d71f4f21635c877d93c9dc530"" src=""""/>

The vast majority of our team consists of robotics specialists and that's very evident when you look at the Travelmate's features. It's far more than just a suitcase. Travelmate has integrated adaptive AI that knows where it's going at all times and adjusts its movement on the fly. Some examples of other practical applications for the Travelmate are using it as a guide for people who are visually impaired or as a robot friend who can respond to simple commands (you can turn this feature on or off). You can also mount a camera to the Travelmate which can be incredibly useful when you don't have anyone else to film you.  Our goal for Travelmate is for it to eventually become the first widely available and affordable robot companion.
column27:
s=84d96f47a6dba8a6563cee256933e4a8"" src=""""/>
 

The Travelmate application is crucial for this. We've worked hard to make it easy to use and feature rich. We think that the best way to make sure that your Travelmate always improves is to give you the freedom to do whatever you want with it. You can add more features to your Travelmate by looking through new features that developers have made for the Travelmate application.
column31:
s=5f92b0b6fea804703c79dfa4bdf28d44"" src=""""/>
 

Travelmate is constantly evolving and has actual elements of artificial intelligence. This is a first for smart suitcases. Travelmate is truly autonomous and improves by looking at data from all other Travelmate suitcases to improve its movement, actions and response time. This principal has been applied before to other technology, but we are the first to do it for suitcases.
column36:
s=4c87eade6051abbe3218e4e8ff40e97b"" src=""""/>

 

One example of a possible future feature is to use as an impromptu security guard. If you attach a camera to it, you can leave it to patrol your home even when you're not there. There is endless potential to implement more features like this and that's why we call Travelmate a robot companion.
column45:
s=083dd610e8e8664a1442076f25407f1b"" src=""""/>

 You can attach cameras or virtual reality ready cameras to the suitcase
column46: because of this, you can use the Travelmate as your camera operator. This is perfect for video blogging or for recording yourself and your surroundings.
column50:
s=dccb01b126289598707cfad39cb31c33"" src=""""/>
 

You can attach a 360 degree VR camera to your Travelmate. 

• Make VR ready video blogs. You no longer need to hold anything in your hands to film yourself and your surroundings. Travelmate takes a full panorama of your life and follows you everywhere.

• Interact with your friends and bring them along with you. Attaching a camera to the Travelmate will allow you to take your friends with you wherever you go.
column55:
s=58dc5d19c1db1b09c50f996bb38d4613"" src=""""/>

Currently, we've released three different models, which essentially differ only in terms of size. You'll also be able to customize the color of your suitcase. Since this suitcase is your travel mate, you can name it through the Travelmate app and it'll show up on the suitcase's display.

- Travelmate S: The best carry on suitcase ever.

The S model is perfect for any situation and is sized to comply with all carry on specifications. This means that you can take it with you when you board a plane instead of checking it at the airline's kiosk. 

Dimensions:

column1:
- Travelmate M: medium sized and perfect for traveling.

The aptly named M model is medium sized and is great for road trips, flights and every day situations. It's a jack of all trades and is great for most vacations.

Dimensions:

- Travelmate L: Large and unapologetic about it.

The L model is the largest model that we have. It's perfect if you're planning on a long trip or even for moving. If you can't decide on what to take with you, then why not take it all with the L model?

Dimensions:
Currently, you can choose between Blue, Pink and Black colors. We plan on adding more colors that you can choose from in the future.
column6:
s=284509f356ad5093c99d8ebc1e1ebbbd"" src=""""/>

Our team consists of more than 26 people who work hard everyday to make Travelmate the best suitcase and robot companion around. Our team's background mostly consists of robotics development and software development. Our design philosophy is very much influenced by our background in those fields.
column9: >President and team leader of Travelmate Robotics.
column21:
s=57d3afc96dcd736254f5048923e1cf0c"" src=""""/>

We're happy to announce that Travelmate has officially been released! You can still purchase directly through indiegogo. Thank you to everyone who's backed our project (and to anyone who backs our project in the future)-- you've helped us to make Travelmate and see it through to completion.
column26:
s=94df59a3e5c3cef1130a2a814e8cafae"" src=""""/>
 

Travelmate is Open to Developers

All code for Travelmate's application will be completely open to developers. In addition, we will have approved features in our application within a separate section of the Travelmate application. We think that doing this will foster a great community and improve Travelmate in ways that we can't even imagine. If you're a developer, all you need to do is go to our website: travelmaterobotics.com and then click on the developers tab. Further instructions are provided there.

In addition, the Travelmate suitcase features unique optional omni wheels that allow for unprecedented multi-directional movement. This is great for autonomous technology. Since the suitcase functions as a robot in practice, it uses AI and machine learning to optimize its movements and omni wheels allow for markedly increased stability and range of motion.

The Travelmate's autonomous functionality is unmatched and doesn't require any extra peripherals. All you need is the suitcase and your smartphone. Travelmate will follow you wherever you go. Whether you're at the airport, going to work or going to school
column2: the Travelmate suitcase can help you carry luggage in a wide variety of situations.

column1: Travelmate has a battery life of 4 hours when in full autonomous mode and up to 100 hours in stand by mode (meaning when you are using it like a normal suitcase). The electric motor and internal components that enable autonomous functionality take up almost no space in the suitcase, accounting for less than 3% of the suitcase's volume. Multi colored LED lighting is a feature on all Travelmate models and signifies your suitcase's battery level. There are over 16 million different color variations. You can customize or turn off all LED lighting through the Travelmate application. The Travelmate suitcase features convenient directional indicators that show you exactly where it's going at all times. This is similar to turn signals in cars. We've also added a speaker that will inform you of obstacles and the suitcase's location – this feature is completely optional and you can turn it on or off in the Travelmate application. In addition to autonomy, we've differentiated ourselves with convenient features like a customizable design, a smart lock system, a built in scale, an integrated camera and much more. Travelmate is fully TSA compliant and our suitcase sizes are standardized. The smallest Travelmate is carry on sized and fits the specifications of all major airlines' requirements for carry on specifications. The Travelmate has a smart lock system. You can open your suitcase directly or through your smartphone. In order to comply with TSA guidelines, we have also included a mechanism to manually open the suitcase. You can always add a separate lock to your suitcase for extra security.

(Omni wheels)Travelmate includes a GPS chip that helps orient the suitcase and allows you to know the location of the suitcase at all times with the Travlemate smartphone application. All Travelmate models will include a built in scale that will accurately measure the weight of your suitcase's contents. You'll never have to worry about over packing because Travelmate will conveniently display the suitcase's weight. You can switch between Kilograms or Pounds via the Travelmate application. The Travelmate autonomous suitcase is fully functional and we have full app integration ready. Travelmate will constantly improve through machine learning. This is achieved by uploading movement data automatically to the Travelmate application
column2: your suitcase will essentially become smarter and smarter as time goes on and more people have Travelmate suitcases. You can disable this feature in the app if you want to. After it releases, we have plans to update the free Travelmate application regularly to improve and add features. Eventually we want to add things like travel suggestions, airport information, airport gate information and much more to the application.The vast majority of our team consists of robotics specialists and that's very evident when you look at the Travelmate's features. It's far more than just a suitcase. Travelmate has integrated adaptive AI that knows where it's going at all times and adjusts its movement on the fly. Some examples of other practical applications for the Travelmate are using it as a guide for people who are visually impaired or as a robot friend who can respond to simple commands (you can turn this feature on or off). You can also mount a camera to the Travelmate which can be incredibly useful when you don't have anyone else to film you.  Our goal for Travelmate is for it to eventually become the first widely available and affordable robot companion.  The Travelmate application is crucial for this. We've worked hard to make it easy to use and feature rich. We think that the best way to make sure that your Travelmate always improves is to give you the freedom to do whatever you want with it. You can add more features to your Travelmate by looking through new features that developers have made for the Travelmate application.   Travelmate is constantly evolving and has actual elements of artificial intelligence. This is a first for smart suitcases. Travelmate is truly autonomous and improves by looking at data from all other Travelmate suitcases to improve its movement, actions and response time. This principal has been applied before to other technology, but we are the first to do it for suitcases.  One example of a possible future feature is to use as an impromptu security guard. If you attach a camera to it, you can leave it to patrol your home even when you're not there. There is endless potential to implement more features like this and that's why we call Travelmate a robot companion. You can attach cameras or virtual reality ready cameras to the suitcase
column3: because of this, you can use the Travelmate as your camera operator. This is perfect for video blogging or for recording yourself and your surroundings.  You can attach a 360 degree VR camera to your Travelmate. • Make VR ready video blogs. You no longer need to hold anything in your hands to film yourself and your surroundings. Travelmate takes a full panorama of your life and follows you everywhere.• Interact with your friends and bring them along with you. Attaching a camera to the Travelmate will allow you to take your friends with you wherever you go.Currently, we've released three different models, which essentially differ only in terms of size. You'll also be able to customize the color of your suitcase. Since this suitcase is your travel mate, you can name it through the Travelmate app and it'll show up on the suitcase's display.- Travelmate S: The best carry on suitcase ever.The S model is perfect for any situation and is sized to comply with all carry on specifications. This means that you can take it with you when you board a plane instead of checking it at the airline's kiosk. Dimensions:

column1: - Travelmate M: medium sized and perfect for traveling.The aptly named M model is medium sized and is great for road trips, flights and every day situations. It's a jack of all trades and is great for most vacations.Dimensions:

- Travelmate L: Large and unapologetic about it.The L model is the largest model that we have. It's perfect if you're planning on a long trip or even for moving. If you can't decide on what to take with you, then why not take it all with the L model?Dimensions:

Currently, you can choose between Blue, Pink and Black colors. We plan on adding more colors that you can choose from in the future. Our team consists of more than 26 people who work hard everyday to make Travelmate the best suitcase and robot companion around. Our team's background mostly consists of robotics development and software development. Our design philosophy is very much influenced by our background in those fields.Max KovtunPresident and team leader of Travelmate Robotics.We're happy to announce that Travelmate has officially been released! You can still purchase directly through indiegogo. Thank you to everyone who's backed our project (and to anyone who backs our project in the future)-- you've helped us to make Travelmate and see it through to completion.  Travelmate is Open to DevelopersAll code for Travelmate's application will be completely open to developers. In addition, we will have approved features in our application within a separate section of the Travelmate application. We think that doing this will foster a great community and improve Travelmate in ways that we can't even imagine. If you're a developer, all you need to do is go to our website: travelmaterobotics.com and then click on the developers tab. Further instructions are provided there.",35.0,2,"2 Campaigns

Wireless. Waterproof. Wearable. The Glowstone Flashlight is a tiny, ultra-bright and ultra-tough light. It’s as bright as expensive high powered flashlights, yet just 1/2"" (13mm) thick and a fraction of the price.

Glowstone has reinvented the everyday flashlight to be more compact, versatile and functional so it can be easily used for everything from DIY jobs, outdoor adventuring and even scuba diving! 

 

 

Its shape and design make it incredibly versatile and rugged. You can clip it to your belt, stick it to a wall, mount it to your GoPro or attach it to the Glowstone tripod handle. Whatever you’re doing, the Glowstone Flashlight will never leave you in the dark again. 

And we really mean rugged. This little guy can handle pretty much everything you throw at it. Its tough silicone case and ATEX rated design make it waterproof, heatproof, shockproof and gasproof.

This is the only torch you'll ever need.


 

The Glowstone Flashlight is wireless charging only, the benefit of which allows us to completely seal the Flashlight in the super tough, yet soft silicone casing.  

Underneath that soft silicone case, the electronics are mounted onto a thick aluminum substrate that gives the Flashlight a solid rigidity. This unique construction means there no mechanical join lines, weak points or leak paths in the smooth, soft and incredibly durable design. This also helps preserves the electronics and batteries from oxidisation, extending its life even further.

 

Glowstone Flashlight is IP69K waterproof and EX hazardous area rated. 

We choose silicone for a number of reasons, and it's part of the reason why this is a total reinvention of the flashlight. Silicone is both soft, highly durable and incredibly resistant to degradation from the elements, making it the ideal choice for sustained outdoor use. It's also made from silica that comes from sand, so it's more ocean-friendly than the plastic that's littering the world's oceans.

The Glowstone Flashlight is available in white or dark grey.

 

The difference between the Glowstone Flashlight compared to a standard flashlight is staggering. To put it to the test, watch our video of a normal flashlight vs Glowstone Flashlight. See what happens...

 
Simplicity is the key to a great product and the Glowstone Flashlight is a testament to this. We wanted to make the user experience as easy as using a light switch in your home, so with a single button you can switch between the 8 modes.
Press the middle power button once to turn on the flashlight to 90 lumens mode.
• Press four times for 7 lumens candle mode
• Hold button again for 900 lumens boost mode
To turn off the Glowstone Flashlight, simply hold the power button for 1 second and release.

When the Glowstone Flashlight does eventually run out of juice, it's ludicrously easy to get it back up to full power thanks to its wireless charging technology. Make sure the Qi wireless charging pad is connected to power via USB and then just place the Flashlight on top, a red light indicates it's charging which turns green when it's fully charged.
The Qi charging matt supplied with the flashlight can also be used to charge your mobile phone and other wirelessly powered devices.

What good is a flashlight if it's not practical for the job at hand? We've designed Glowstone Flashlight to be adaptable to your needs, interests and hobbies. It works with multiple attachments and mounts to be the perfect companion, whether you're a keen photographer, a DIY enthusiast or an outdoor explorer.

Thanks to the lightweight nature of the Flashlight, the nano-suction pad allows you to fix the flashlight to almost any flat surface. Just press it against the surface you want to fix it to and it'll stay there with nano-suction technology. When you're finished, it comes off smoothly and ready to be stuck to the next place.
Our Glowstone handle is specially engineered to have multiple functions and uniquely transforms to suit your needs.
Simply slide the metal collar up or down the handle to turn it into a clamp, a stand or even a grappling hook.
It's always fun to see the flashlight handle transform into a video and lighting studio just by sliding its metal collar up and mounting it alongside a GoPro.

The holes in the handle aren't just for decoration. They can be used to clamp your torch to objects. Hang your torch from any nearby pipe, branch or pole and leave your hands free to get on with your work or play.

Transform it into a traditional flashlight handle for hand-use when you're on the move. Unlike traditional torches, you can pivot the Glowstone Flashlight to aim the light exactly where you want it, illuminating those hard to reach places. The perfect tool for the mechanic, builder, plumber or home DIYer.
You can also open up its legs to transform it into a tripod, also with directional fixtures to aim the light exactly where you need it.
Get the perfect light when you're filming with the GoPro attachment. See the difference to your video footage when you have the power of the Glowstone Flashlight lighting up your scenes.

The Glowstone Flashlight is the perfect photographers tool. It delivers a clean light output and a colour output of 5600k. It's CRI (colour rendering index) is an impressively high 95 and It also has a wide light spread like professional light setups produce.  Don't miss a moment, even in the dark!
Strap the flashlight to your arm or your belt with the clip to help you stand out in the darkness. Perfect for nighttime runners, dog walkers or workers at night.

The supplied slim-line clip comes with every pledge level. It easily slips round the flashlight, similar to a mobile phone cover. and enables the torch the be clipped, strapped and even hung through the hole on the back of the clip.
The flashlight clip clips it to your clothes or belt just like a tape measure does.
For those interested in photography and filming, The GoPro flash screw mount has a 1/4 "" Female thread which means it can be screwed onto your camera hot shoe mount in the same way as your flash.

With a colour temperature of 5600K, A CRI value of 95 and a linear array of high powered LEDS that emits a clean, even light output, the Glowstone flashlight is a shrunk down version of the expensive professional light panels used in photography and film shoots.
Need to see where you're going hands-free? Glowstone Flashlight can be attached to the head strap to make any tricky task in the dark a breeze.

Using the bike mounts, Glowstone Flashlight can turn into powerful lights for your bicycle including a red filter and flashing mode for the rear lights. You can also attach a Glowstone Flashlight to your bike helmet to make sure you're seen on the road.
Whether you like pot-holing or decorating, biking or scuba diving, there is a Glowstone Flashlight pack for you that will suite your application perfectly. Below show whats-in-the-box- for each pack.
*Please note The pack shots below were taken with earlier prototypes.  - all accessories will be supplied in black - as above

Glowstone is a British company that builds intelligent technology to optimise life. Our mission is to use technology and creativity to unlock the full potential of everyday products and make life more convenient for everyone.
Founded by British inventor Thomas Gostelow, we're proud to be an engineer-led company with an extremely high bar for quality in everything we do.
We’re truly delighted to be bringing Glowstone Flashlight to life for you, and are incredibly grateful that you're joining us along on this journey. You’re a shining light!

Hi! We are HUNU. Two years ago we set about to create a cup that we could carry with us all day, everyday. And now we've made it bigger and better! To preorder HUNU+ and help us bring it to life click BACK THIS PROJECT or keep scrolling to find out more :)
We are able to offer shipping to most of the world and are aiming to ship locally from within the USA, UK, Europe and Canada.
HUNU+ features a unique new folding system that allows a 16oz cup to easily fold into a 3 cm disk without compromising on the sturdiness of the cup.
Every time you use your own cup one less piece of plastic goes to landfill. HUNU+ is a reusable cup that you will not only love using but also one that will actually be with you when you need it!
Our goal at HUNU is to design reusable products that fit into your life and HUNU+ does just that by slipping away easily into a pocket or bag after use.

We founded HUNU because we realized that we could do better. We started looking around and learning about how much the little bit of daily waste we use add up. A fact that really shocked us was that 165 million coffee cups end up in landfill every year and less than 1% are ever recycled due to the plastic lining.

We went looking around for a good reusable alternative but couldn't find one that fitted into our lifestyle and that was convenient and compact enough to be with us whenever we actually wanted to use it!

In the past year we have discovered that a lot of people are looking for the same thing we are. Stylish, well designed products that are convenient and make it easy to move towards a zero waste lifestyle.
We have grown an amazing community of HUNU lovers from all over the world!
And had a lot of nice things written about us!
1. Select a Perk At The Top Of This Page
Select the reward you would like  on the right side of the page.
HUNU+ is available in 2 sizes 16 or 20 oz. You will be able to choose your sizes and colours in a survey after the campaign ends as well as finalize shipping details.

When designing the HUNU cup we had a few non negotiable requirements. It had to be compact enough to comfortably carry around in a pocket all day. It had to be sturdy enough to safely hold a hot drink. It had to be made using the highest quality food grade materials. It had to look good and be light and durable. None of this changed when we started the design work for HUNU+

Silicone is a highly durable, non toxic material that can withstand extreme temperatures and doesn't leech toxic chemicals. It is very easy to clean and flexible enough to fold down easily but strong enough to form a sturdy, safe cup when unfolded.
The silicone we use is both LFGB and FDA certified meaning it meets the highest level of both USA and European certification.

When we brought out our original HUNU cup we used a bamboo composite for the lid (a mixture of resin and bamboo fibre). However our goal is to always be learning and over the course of last year we learned more and more about recyclable plastic and what a stable and safe material it is as well as how widely it can be recycled. We have since chosen to use a BPA and BPS free polypropylene for our new lids. While there are many new materials coming onto the market and we will always looking for ways we could improve, right now not many of the plant based plastics are durable enough or easily recycled enough to compete with polypropylene.

Silicone is very non porous meaning that it is incredibly easy to clean. If you are out and about during the day a simple rinse out with water or even a wipe with a napkin will often be enough. At the end of the day using some dish soap in the sink or taking the lid and band off and popping everything in the dishwasher works great.
The HUNU cup is fully dishwasher safe!

When designing our first HUNU cup we started out with one very clear thought. Single use cups are convenient. Reusable cups are not. How do we change that? By designing a cup that fits in your pocket as easily as your phone or keys ensuring that its always with you when you need it.
So we started with some basic principles.
It needed to be big enough to hold your coffee but collapse small enough to fit in your pocket.
It needed to be sturdy and have a lid.
It needed to have some form of insulating so that you could hold even the hottest drinks.

With HUNU+ we still had these principles at the forefront but to them we added all the feedback we have received from all our amazing backers to not only increase the size but to improve on every aspect that we could.
Playing around with these early prototypes led to the refining of our design. More 3D rendering allowed us to see how different colours and materials could look.

After a first round of prototyping we continually refined our design to make sure all the details were up to the standard we needed. From fit of the lid (loose enough to take on and off but tight enough to be leakproof) to feel of the silicone (stiff enough to be a great cup but flexible enough to fold easily) to size of the drinking hole and plug we have worked on every detail.

We've relaunched our indiegogo campaign. You can pre-order Travelmate by clicking here: https://igg.me/at/travelmate/x/15028332
column5:
>

Travelmate is the first true fully autonomous suitcase. It works seamlessly in crowds, doesn't require any extra peripherals and you can buy it at a starting price of 399$. Travelmate integrates with your smartphone to accomplish complex tasks that no other suitcase can do. It can move vertically or horizontally with ease. You can put more items or perhaps another suitcase on top of Travelmate when it is traveling autonomously in horizontal mode. Travelmate navigates large crowds and is able to recognize and avoid objects as needed. As you can see in the video above, our suitcase is not just a concept – it is a real working model and all of the features demonstrated already work on the Travelmate autonomous robotic suitcase.

column1: Travelmate is a fully working prototype. We are launching an indiegogo project to raise funds for commercial scale production, to expand our team and to establish distribution channels for Travelmate.  There are currently 3 different suitcase models, ranging from carry on sized to a large suitcase. Our goal is to make Travelmate practical, innovative and to bring the future to you. The prices that we are offering on indiegogo are lower than what we will price for retail, and that is because you are actually supporting the development of this project. If you decide to back Travelmate, then thank you very much for your support!

Travelmate isn't just a normal suitcase -- it's an autonomous robot companion that follows you wherever you go and makes traveling much easier. Our suitcase is smart enough to always follow you and avoid any obstacles in its way. Travelmate is perfect for any situation. It can carry your stuff for you when you're going to work, walking to school or rushing to the airport gate. Smart features like omni wheels and our Follow Me system means that Travelmate is at the cutting edge of AI and autonomous movement technology. The Follow Me system has built in sensors that detect as well as avoid obstacles like people and furniture. It uses the Travelmate application to follow you and to better pinpoint its location at all times.

In addition to fully autonomous horizontal and vertical modes, the Travelmate has a variety of useful features that other suitcases do not have. The battery that powers Travelmate can be easily removed and is charged with wireless technology. The battery can be used to charge almost all electronics through a USB port and a standard electrical outlet. In addition, the Travelmate suitcase features unique omni wheels that allow for unprecedented multi-directional movement. This is crucial for autonomous technology. Since the suitcase functions as a robot in practice, it uses AI and machine learning to optimize its movements and omni wheels allow for markedly increased stability and range of motion that cannot be achieved otherwise.

The Travelmate's autonomous functionality is unmatched and doesn't require any extra peripherals. All you need is the suitcase and your smartphone. Travelmate will follow you wherever you go. Whether you're at the airport, going to work or going to school
column2: the Travelmate suitcase can help you carry luggage in a wide variety of situations.

column5:
s=d7485f9574c2ca95b8326539907211ce"" src="""" style=""""/>
 

Travelmate has a battery life of 4 hours when in full autonomous mode and up to 100 hours in stand by mode (meaning when you are using it like a normal suitcase). The electric motor and internal components that enable autonomous functionality take up almost no space in the suitcase, accounting for less than 5% of the suitcase's volume. Multi colored LED lighting is a feature on all Travelmate models and signifies your suitcase's battery level. You can customize or turn off all LED lighting through the Travelmate application.

 

The Travelmate suitcase features convenient directional indicators that show you exactly where it's going at all times. This is similar to turn signals in cars. We've also added a speaker that will inform you of obstacles and the suitcase's location – this feature is completely optional and you can turn it on or off in the Travelmate application.
column9:
s=9f968aab3f9f00fbce9821034a594e5e"" src="""" style=""""/>
 

In addition to autonomy, we've tried to differentiate ourselves with convenient features that most other smart suitcases do not have. The Travelmate has a unique handle that turns into a portable desk that you can use for laptops, books, documents and many other things. In addition, the Travelmate has an easily accessible separate compartment that allows you to store valuables that you might need to take out of the suitcase. This compartment is perfect for things like passports and portable electronics.

 

Travelmate is fully TSA compliant and our suitcase sizes are standardized. The smallest Travelmate is carry on sized and fits the specifications of all major airlines' requirements for carry on specifications. The Travelmate has a touch enabled lock system that uses your fingerprint to open your suitcase. In order to comply with TSA guidelines, we have also included a mechanism to manually open the suitcase. You can always add a separate lock to your suitcase for extra security.

column6:
s=9d898b521b6e58aa51b2e9792376d94f"" src="""" style=""""/>(Omni wheels)

Travelmate includes a GPS chip that helps orient the suitcase and allows you to know the location of the suitcase at all times with the Travlemate smartphone application. You can remove the GPS chip and use it for other suitcases or attach it to other things that are easily lost. Most other smart suitcases have GPS integration, but none of them allow you to remove it easily. We will also include two extra GPS chips in all Travelmate models, so that you can conveniently track your belongings.
column11:
s=0e2055e49b484660eaa72b7d631086d2"" src="""" style=""""/>

All Travelmate models will include a built in scale that will accurately measure the weight of your suitcase's contents. You'll never have to worry about over packing because Travelmate will conveniently display the suitcase's weight. You can switch between Kilograms or Pounds via the Travelmate application.
column16:
s=6dc8de48753caf452535c63fa10da256"" src="""" style=""""/>
 

The Travelmate autonomous suitcase is fully functional and we have full app integration ready. Travelmate will constantly improve through machine learning. This is achieved by uploading movement data automatically to the Travelmate application
column17: your suitcase will essentially become smarter and smarter as time goes on and more people have Travelmate suitcases. You can disable this feature in the app if you want to. After it releases, we have plans to update the free Travelmate application regularly to improve and add features. Eventually we want to add things like travel suggestions, airport information, airport gate information and much more to the application.
column22:
s=ae4a761d71f4f21635c877d93c9dc530"" src="""" style=""""/>

The vast majority of our team consists of robotics specialists and that's very evident when you look at the Travelmate's features. It's far more than just a suitcase. Travelmate has integrated adaptive AI that knows where it's going at all times and adjusts it's movement on the fly. Some examples of other practical applications for the Travelmate are using it as a guide for people who are visually impaired or as a robot friend who can respond to simple commands (you can turn this feature on or off). You can also mount a camera to the Travelmate which can be incredibly useful when you don't have anyone else to film you. We're also adding virtual reality integration to the Travelmate so that people can come with you on your adventures.  Our goal for Travelmate is for it to eventually become the first widely available and affordable robot companion.
column27:
s=84d96f47a6dba8a6563cee256933e4a8"" src="""" style=""""/>
 

The Travelmate application is crucial for this. We're working hard to make it easy to use and feature rich. We think that the best way to make sure that your Travelmate always improves is to give you the freedom to do whatever you want with it. That's why we're making Travelmate open source, so that anyone can look at the underlying software and make improvements or think up of new features. This way, you can add new features to your Travelmate by looking through community mods that people have developed for the Travelmate application.
column31:
s=5f92b0b6fea804703c79dfa4bdf28d44"" src="""" style=""""/>
 

Travelmate is constantly evolving and has actual artificial intelligence. This is a first for smart suitcases. Travelmate is truly autonomous and improves by looking at data from all other Travelmate suitcases to improve its movement, actions and response time. This principal has been applied before to other technology like Tesla cars, but we are the first to do it for suitcases.
column36:
s=4c87eade6051abbe3218e4e8ff40e97b"" src="""" style=""""/>

 

Since Travelmate is autonomous, you can even use it as an impromptu security guard. If you attach a camera to it, you can leave it to patrol your home even when you're not there. There is endless potential to implement more features like this and that's why we call Travelmate a robot companion.
column45:
s=083dd610e8e8664a1442076f25407f1b"" src="""" style=""""/>

 We've included a mount in all Travelmate suitcases which will allow you to attach cameras or virtual reality ready cameras to the suitcase. Because of this, you can use the Travelmate as your camera operator. This is perfect for video blogging or for recording yourself and your surroundings.
column49:
s=dccb01b126289598707cfad39cb31c33"" src="""" style=""""/>
 

You can attach a 360 degree VR camera to your Travelmate. 

• Make VR ready video blogs. You no longer need to hold anything in your hands to film yourself and your surroundings. Travelmate takes a full panorama of your life and follows you everywhere.

• Interact with your friends and bring them along with you. Attaching a camera to the Travelmate will allow you to take your friends with you wherever you go.
column54:
s=58dc5d19c1db1b09c50f996bb38d4613"" src="""" style=""""/>

Currently, we're planning on releasing three different models, which essentially differ only in terms of size. You'll also be able to customize the color of your suitcase. Since this suitcase is your travel mate, you can name it through the Travelmate app and it'll show up on the suitcase's display.

- Travelmate S: The best carry on suitcase ever.

The S model is perfect for any situation and is sized to comply with all carry on specifications. This means that you can take it with you when you board a plane instead of checking it at the airline's kiosk. 

Dimensions:

column1:
- Travelmate M: medium sized and perfect for traveling.

The aptly named M model is medium sized and is great for road trips, flights and every day situations. It's a jack of all trades and is great for most vacations.

Dimensions:

- Travelmate L: Large and unapologetic about it.

The L model is the largest model that we have. It's perfect if you're planning on a long trip or even for moving. If you can't decide on what to take with you, then why not take it all with the L model?

Dimensions:

- So Much Love Package: Get all three models!

The SML or So much Love package includes all three Travelmate models at an unbeatable price!

After the indiegogo campaign ends, we'll send out an email with a list of color options to all indiegogo backers who bought the Travelmate. All you need to do is reply with the color that you want for your suitcase. Please note that the Travelmate suitcase interior is not final and will be improved before release.
column6:
s=284509f356ad5093c99d8ebc1e1ebbbd"" src="""" style=""""/>

Our team consists of 26 people who work hard everyday to make Travelmate the best suitcase and robot companion around. Our team's background mostly consists of robotics development and software development. Our design philosophy is very much influenced by our background in those fields.
column14: >President and team leader of Travelmate Robotics.
column26:
s=57d3afc96dcd736254f5048923e1cf0c"" src="""" style=""""/>

We're planning on delivering the Travelmate suitcase in June, 2017 for indiegogo backers. In order to make sure that we don't have any problems with availability, we're going to launch a month later for people who pre-order after the indiegogo campaign ends and for general retail. The primary reason that we decided to raise funds on indiegogo is because we need funds for distribution and large scale production. If you're an indiegogo backer, then no matter which model you buy, you'll be getting it at a lower price point. This is because you're contributing to the project's development and we're immensely grateful for that. After the indiegogo campaign ends, you'll still be able to pre-order the Travelmate directly on our website, but the price point will be 50$ higher for each model, so if you want to buy the suitcase anyway, then becoming an indiegogo backer makes a lot of sense.
column31:
s=94df59a3e5c3cef1130a2a814e8cafae"" src="""" style=""""/>
 

The reason that we chose the timeline specified above is because we don't want to have a situation wherein we endlessly delay this project. This way, you know exactly when you're getting your suitcase. There's been other smart suitcases on crowdfunding websites and they have promised delivery within a month or two after a project ends. Without exception, they have always delayed their project and that is a disingenuous way to go about things. The timeline for delivery that we set is very reasonable and you won't have to worry about delays.
column36:
s=ec5fd04d7634a5c8cec96a05bcac225e"" src="""" style=""""/>

All code for Travelmate and its application will be completely open source. In addition, we will have approved mods in our application within a separate section of the Travelmate application. We think that doing this will foster a great community and improve Travelmate in ways that we can't even imagine.
column51: s=e321d12eae56d62c03b987e7691582c0"" src="""" style=""""/>","We've relaunched our indiegogo campaign. You can pre-order Travelmate by clicking here: https://igg.me/at/travelmate/x/15028332 News about us:Travelmate is the first true fully autonomous suitcase. It works seamlessly in crowds, doesn't require any extra peripherals and you can buy it at a starting price of 399$. Travelmate integrates with your smartphone to accomplish complex tasks that no other suitcase can do. It can move vertically or horizontally with ease. You can put more items or perhaps another suitcase on top of Travelmate when it is traveling autonomously in horizontal mode. Travelmate navigates large crowds and is able to recognize and avoid objects as needed. As you can see in the video above, our suitcase is not just a concept – it is a real working model and all of the features demonstrated already work on the Travelmate autonomous robotic suitcase.

column1: Travelmate is a fully working prototype. We are launching an indiegogo project to raise funds for commercial scale production, to expand our team and to establish distribution channels for Travelmate.  There are currently 3 different suitcase models, ranging from carry on sized to a large suitcase. Our goal is to make Travelmate practical, innovative and to bring the future to you. The prices that we are offering on indiegogo are lower than what we will price for retail, and that is because you are actually supporting the development of this project. If you decide to back Travelmate, then thank you very much for your support!
